i purchased in january of       i have been using it     times a week for exercises  one fine day this week it stopped working  the i fit screen would not come up   the fan   the incline works but the treadmill won t start and the screen doesn t come up  pathetic   not even   months

arrived on time and in good shape   took two hours  two guys with experience and knowledge to put it together   did not work immediately   wanted me to do the i fit registration   called in to nordictrack    they were immediately helpful  less than   min call   simply hold the sync button down and it reverts to a traditional no frills treadmill   it is nice   it is light weight   that can be good or bad depending on size of person and how many persons will be on and off of it   i want it for only walking   was told this would do the job   i m sure it will do running but that was not my purpose   i am      i do know a little about fitness equipment and i never recommend treadmills for the bulk of your work out   it is hard on your back and your knees   sometimes weather does not allow that but down here in texas  outside is best for walking running  but weights and classes are best for our age group   seems to be a good machine   it is best suited for someone at average height            to         i think if a stabilization bar were added between the uprights  it would really make it an excellent medium machine   it is just right for the price

i bought this treadmill about a month ago and while i was lucky that the installation wasn t too bad  i didn t have horrible problems like other people mentioned  this stuff is heavy    you will need two people  there is a step where you have to hold the belt in an upright position and attach this bit at the bottom of the machine  it s unsafe to do alone there are a few things they don t tell you you re going to need   wrenches  the instructions say an adjustable wrench  but there are a few places where an adjustable just wouldn t fit  i think i used      for those spots  phillips screwdriver  most people probably have this at home   surge suppressor  has to match their ratings  you can look on their manual for that  amazon customer services was helpful in finding one that worked i had one issue with the motor hood arriving cracked in several places  not due to any kind of shipping damage  i had to register my treadmill with nordic track but then they replaced the part   although the little connectors i had to pry off the old hood to install the new undamaged hood because they didn t send me any hardware    but it works as for use  it s quiet so far  my walking on it sounds louder than the treadmill  to me  it s easy to fold up  though i don t unless i m cleaning  i ve had it trip the breaker when i tried going directly to  mph from  mph  but i also tested it to  mph with no problems  i had nothing else plugged in and i didn t try to go past  mph  i m not in great shape  i m pushing it at  mph right now   i took off a star for the ifit stuff  it s annoying but easy to get past  just press the blue ifit button until your screen changes to show the regular display   time distance calories etc  it should say lap     if it s like mine

the treadmill seems to be working well for my purposes   i like to jog at a relatively slow pace and add the incline   i really love the fold up down feature   it seems to be designed well and operates on a piston   as other have noted the company gives the impression that you must sign up for their program which is not true   i didn t appreciate all the warnings in the packaging but i was aware of the workaround from the amazon reviews   also  the treadmill delivered with my original order was damaged and the end shipper would not accept it   i have to thank amazon from scrambling and getting me the replacement in time for christmas

this is a very sturdy  robust treadmill  the belt moves smoothly  with consistent speed  controls are responsive  i cannot attest to long term reliability  as i have had the product for   day only    however  should i experience any major problems  i would be very concerned with how customer service would handle them and potentially apply warranty    see notes below  amazon delivery was excellent assembly was surprisingly straightforward  i did it by myself in   hours  with some occasional help from my wife  eg  hold the console for a moment   you will need some basic tools  the assembly instructions are good  but a couple videos on youtube were helpful  the package is  heavy       lbs   so i recommend to spend the extra     for the delivery guys to place it in the room of your choice  for clarity  no heavy parts have to be moved to assemble the treadmill the user interface looks more like from the   th century    eg  ipod connection or no bluetooth connectivity    but not a big deal the built in hr monitor using handgrips is useless at best  the values jump completely randomly around in a        bpm range  in about   second intervals  for example  something like this                        all this during one minute  while consistently walking and steadily holding the grips  my true hr was about     but more importantly  this brings me to my earlier point about customer service so i called nordictrack to let them know about the heart rate monitor problem  the troubleshooting process went as follows      they told me that i should not move to get accurate readings    ironic  given that we are dealing with a treadmill    so i tried to stand on the side rails  without any movement    no effect on the erratic hr readings      my hands cannot be wet    hmm  isn t the treadmill meant for exercise      anyways  wiped off my hands  problem not solved      then the rep said that it is the light dimmer switch that is interfering with the monitor    turned off lights  no effect    the rep says it s the dimmer regardless whether lights are on or off    so i shut down the entire circuit breaker for the dimmer   lights  to no avail  after that the rep says that the hr monitor is not supposed to give accurate readings anyways  and there is nothing they can do about that  upon a warranty question i posed  they said that warranty did not apply to problems that cannot be fixed  they would not replace the console  they would not dispatch a service rep to fix the problem  if i want  i can return the unit to amazon  nordictrack is not responsible frankly  i don t really care that much about the hr monitor  the only reason i am sharing this entire customer service episode is to provide feedback on that part of nordictrack s business  what left a sour taste in my mouth was two fold  a  nordictrack tried to blame the customer for a problem they evidently knew about  and b  their absurd claim that warranty did not apply to problems that cannot be fixed  i can only hope i won t have to deal with customer service with a bigger problem bottom line  sturdy build  smooth run  out of date user interface  hr monitor useless  terrible customer service  warranty not honored  wishing good luck to anyone who encounters problems with the product and would like to apply warranty

when i opened the box  i noticed that there were shards of black plastic everywhere  after i put the thing together  i realized that all the plastic pieces were once a part of the bottom right foot of the machine  it s not a structural piece  just a cosmetic piece that surrounds the rubber foot  i tried calling  but that was no luck  their livechat service was also not helpful  since it s not even a real person  nor does it let you connect with one  i emailed nordictrack customer support regarding the issue  and i included the part number as well as pictures  after a week or so they finally responded with some generic questions  so i answered  another week or so goes by and they respond with some more questions  that are not even relevant anymore  i respond  it has now been   months and i haven t heard back from them i also purchased the   year maintenance plan  the way that is has been going  i m pretty sure that was a waste too overall the treadmill is good  it goes to    incline and can speed up to   mph  there are minor creaks that i hear  but other than that  it s all working good update  finally got in touch with icon fitness  and they told me the warranty is voided because the treadmill is in the garage  even though i clearly mentioned to them that the damage had occurred during shipping  they were persistent in saying that since it is in the garage  it must have been damaged by the garage door or a vehicle  except that the garage is now turned into a home gym  and we do not park cars in there    if you have any issues with your equipment  do not tell them it is in the garage  move it back inside the house before you contact them and send images

tl dr if you are looking for a affordable basic treadmill that can do moderate speed and incline this is the treadmill for you   hold down ifit button for    secs to skip activating ifit membership and use basic functions on treadmill  i ve been really happy with this treadmill  bout it a little over a month ago  it was relatively easy to assemble  i was able to assemble it myself  and i m a      female    the instructions were a bit difficult to understand but i was able to find youtube videos which were really helpful  the belt was very off to one side so i did have to adjust quite a bit in terms of working out  it s great my runs are typically       mins and i run     days a week  did   days the first couple weeks with no issues   with moderate speed and lower incline so this treadmill has been perfect for me  i like that as i make improvements to my speed and endurance i have room to increase both speed and incline  from what i can tell it uses low energy as well  have not seen a large impact to my power bill at all  to be fair i also don t keep it plugged in when not in use in terms of space it takes up very little space i have it in my living room near my patio and there is plenty of room to pass by without bumping into it  i normally keep the deck down because otherwise it feels like it cuts the room  but i like that it s easy to fold when i need to vacuum or if i want to do a circuit and need more space  deck is also cat approved i know a lot of reviews complain about the ifit registration  i did research beforehand and knew that i wouldn t need to activate the membership to use the machine  just hold down the ifit button for    secs   i can t speak about the work out programs or hr monitor because i don t use either feature  i prefer to set manual workouts and i wear a fitbit versa   when working out that tracks my hr and workout automatically for me  overall this has been a very versatile machine i m personally happy with

using it for rehab  we like it i have been in gyms pretty much all my life back to the days of jack lalaine   this treadmill is an impressive midrange machine  no question  it s not gym strength  but for home use it appears to be an outstanding choice  couple of points  one  get the install   unless you can tap a hole  you need to get someone to put it together  delivery was very good as was the packaging  we ran into trouble on step   which involves attaching the crossbar  short story  i had to retap the holes with a       tap and buy             screws  also  the replacement grounding screw was unusable so we used the shipping screw  anyway  unless you are comfortable taping a hole get somebody to assemble it  customer service  donna  was a pleasure to work with and did what was possible with step    but we couldn t fix it without retaping the holes  search the reviews for step   for all the horror stories  this machine has all the features one would expect in a treadmill  you can get better features  larger screen  industrial strength  etc   but you have to  open the vault  for those  much was made about ifit  but i feel it s irrelevant to the machine itself  one last thing  the machine goes to    miles an hour and that s nice  but since we brought it for rehab it is more importantly to me is that it goes down to    miles an hour  nice machine we ll see if it lasts more on step    like many others  we got stuck at step     search step   in comments   the problem  i believe is that the screws do not match the tap used for the holes  for one  they are wood screws  anyway after the usual unsuccessful calls  we re tapped the holes with a       tap and brought the corresponding       by      inch machine screws  it s fixed  i do not recommend this to anyone  it s just what we did to get to step    photos attached  ps  we watched the youtube video on assembly  and wow  nothing on step     also  the grounding screw was uninstallable and we just used the original

mom of a toddler here  this is the only way i get in a workout without spending half of the day packing driving and baby prepping for a gym trip  so far it seems very sturdy and works well  i skipped the ifit subscription because i hear its garbage  but i didn t get the treadmill for that  paid for amazon assembly  no complaints

overall  the treadmill is great  i was able to easily skip ifit as i certainly do not need it     on board programs are more than enough for me at this stage  ih fact i currently use only the manual mode that provides me the setting flexibility i need however  i initially encountered a couple of issues    when i assembled the  treadmill  the incline motor did not function  i contacted the customer service and was pleasantly surprised   the customer service is great  it is the main reason i give   star overall  first they sent me the new motor  when i got difficulties during the motor installation then  they also sent a technician that made it to work great    the box as delivered is very heavy  so lifting the treadmill  to install it on the  st or  nd floor  requires significant efforts  the assembly itself is not very difficult and i did it myself but is still lengthy and occasionally requires a help of another  person but generally i am happy with the purchase and trying to excise on a daily basis

this may be the most expensive piece of junk i ve ever purchased  preface that i m an engineer  so this isn t my first assembly rodeo in assembling the treadmill  there are multiple screws you have to take out before assembling it properly  some of them make sense to keep the parts together during transit  and some are just an unnecessary pain  the best part is that the user manual doesn t even list some of the extra screws  and those ones in particular  when removing  don t properly fit loved scratching the metal getting them out so that i could install the actual screws that belonged from the guidance in the manual now let s talk about the app  created my account online and then downloaded the app  tried to use the same login information on the app and it didn t work  tried sending a link to reset my password and it s been several hours with zero email  so i went online  logged in  and changed my password to the good ol          just in case for some reason i couldn t type like a normal human being  still didn t work on the app  and their helpline is only available     mst  so looks like i ll be calling during my lunch hour to figure this out  another fun finding   some of the links in the mobile view of the online website are broken piece of junk  through and through

this review is for the nordictrack t   s we purchased in november       we have had other nordictrack products before and were happy  this time  not so much  assembly was challenging  but not so bad  no complaints on that front  really  fit and finish are pretty good  it makes some strange noises now and then  but generally it is pretty solid  and the buttons do as they should the real problems have been with ifit  this unit has an android operating system that drives the screen  and all of the basic functionality  even the ability to start walking or running  depends on this  ifit is the app they use for managing your workouts  following coaches trainers  etc  and when this works  it is very nice  i have been walking and running in portugal  morocco and costa rica so far with three different trainers  the machine automatically increases decreases its speed and incline based on what the trainer decides in his workout  so as you climb a big hill  they typically slow down your speed and of course do a big increase in the   incline  up to as much as     i think  maybe it s      not sure   and the trainers typically do a    or    session workout plan  one per day  so you can stay in shape  with each session getting progressively harder  it is nordictrack s answer to what peloton is doing where we re having real issues is with the login and user management of the ifit software  because nordictrack ifit are so worried about people using the apps without paying  you can t do much of anything without signing in  and that has been a big problem  my wife s account somehow got replaced with my son s  and we cannot get her back on the machine  and when i logged out of the system for my account  now there is no way to log back in  all it does is tell you all of the great things you can do with the software and offer to sell you an account  you can add a user  which fails if the user already exists   but there is no login button  it s really dumb programming  this has been the theme for ifit in general  they have so much content you can access but the organization is terrible and disorganized  nordictrack should have probably have chosen a different partner than ifit  unless nordictrack owns this brand company   and of course they only have live chat and telephone support monday friday      or something like that  real people tend to also work out on weekends  and that s when stuff happens and when we need help i hope they respond to this review and tell us why things will be getting better soon

i received my treadmill a week ago saturday          two men brought it  one was holding what looked like a scanner  while to other man did all the work  when taking it off the dollie he tried to push it through the door  it caught on the top door frame  he  alone  adjusted it until he could tip it to clear the door frame  he was obviously worn out and frustrated  as so as it cleared the door he pushed it over onto the narrow side  after it slammed onto the floor he shoved it on inside  but wait    there is more    i found the directions and it calls for a special surge protector that i could find at the hardware store  i went to three  popular stores  in one i had three people trying to find one  i looked online  i could find one that meet all of the qualifications  so the box is setting in the entrance hall  the base is in place  and all the parts are setting around it still in the plastic cardboard  i did not want to put it together until i have what i need  so nobody it temped to use it the following tuesday         i submitted inquiry on the nordictrack website  i do not use a phone  so could not call   i asked if they could give me the name of a surge protector or if they sell them  thursday         i was contacted and told i could get one in a maintenance kit  that they sell and was asked for the model number  i replied the same day  today         i am still waiting and everything is still laying around so i have had this for more than a week  not only have i not been able to use it  the  return time and warranty time is passing by even though i have not been able to use  needless to say  this experience has not been a good one  i am considering just returning it and getting one elsewhere  for all i know  this one is not going work anyway since it was dropped to the floor

i actually ordered a different treadmill from a different company but it was extremely damaged when it arrived so i ended up online searching for another one and i must say some of the reviews on this treadmill almost changed my mind on getting this one but i took the chance   all the features and the size and everything was exactly what i wanted so i ordered it and crossed my fingers it arrived in better shape then the last one and i was extremely happy to see it arrived perfectly and it s been a great machine so far   it s sturdy and very well made and i had no problem with exiting out of the ifit   i held the button down for a few seconds and the treadmill was ready for me to use with no problems   putting it together took awhile but my husband had no issues whatsoever and i was happy about that bc reading some of the reviews some have said they had to try calling nordictrack for help and were on hold for hrs and that right there almost kept me from purchasing bc if you can t easily get a hold of the company something is wrong somewhere   but while my husband was putting it together i figured i would test that theory to see if i would be left on hold forever  so i dialed customer service   put it on speaker and went about my business and i kid you not i was on hold waiting for customer service to get to my call for a whole   hrs and   mins          that is insane and unacceptable     they need to fix that issue and i pray i never have issues like many have to where i ever have to call them again and if that wasn t bad enough after purchasing the treadmill i returned to try and find a review with some helpful tips on putting it together and i wanted to show my husband so i signed on to amazon and starting looking through the reviews and my husband was like are you sure thats the same one we ordered and i said yes why   and he said didn t you notice the price drop from just   day ago    i about lost my lunch when i looked up and saw the price was      cheaper then when i had ordered it the day before      i have shopped on this site for years and have never seen that happen    i was instantly sick to my stomach          is a huge difference   my husband was shocked too but he assured me if i contacted amazon they would more than likely refund the difference since we just bought the damn thing and i was thinking he was right bc i know walmart and other stores do exactly that    so i contacted amazon and was told they no longer do that   so ya i was out an extra      for a treadmill i could have waited just hrs later to order and would have gotten it way cheaper    i frankly think that d pretty sickening but the fact the machine is everything i was looking for and has given me zero issues i will be happy with that but i might shop around a lot more next time before ordering from amazon again   they are a billion dollar company         shouldnt be anything to them but their greed has gotten the best of them

so far so great   this treadmill is wonderful   quiet  easy to operate  it does exactly what i need it for delivery was great  they texted for a delivery window and were on time   the folks delivering it were super nice and helpful  there was some minor box damage which was noted on the tracking information  but there was no damage to the machine at all   all the pieces required for assembly were there   the assembly instructions were very clear and the diagrams were spot on one note on assembly   i m a    year old female       and weigh about     lbs   this was difficult for me to put together because i didn t have the upper body strength to hold position lift several of the pieces   it definitely is a   person job at some points   if it weren t for the current pandemic  i would have gladly paid for assembly   as it was i did get it done  but it took me several days because of my own strength limitations   it was my issue  not nordictrack s fault by any means   i look at it like i got a bonus workout just from putting it together   loli did not sign up for ifit   i held the button down to bypass it as described in the top comment   worked like a charm   i may sign up for ifit later  but i want to choose to do it  not  have  to do it just to try out the machine the treadmill s display works great  the interface works perfectly and is easy to use   i did have to set it to  english  as opposed to  metric   that was the only change i had to make i purchased a mat to go under it so i wouldn t risk damaging the floors overall this is a fantastic treadmill and i m looking forward to getting into better shape with it

so i bought this a year ago  it was tough putting together  but not too bad  i used it for a few months  then an injury kept me from using it for a couple of months  then the pandemic hit  and we had to stay home  my inquiry felt a bit better so i was hoping to use the treadmill again  wouldn t start i was still under the   year warranty  plus i purchased a   year warranty  i contacted their support  automatic reply  no person ever contacted me  though  i tried a few more times  absolutely nothing  what did i pay for  so  i turned to twitter  the person in charge of their twitter responded and tried helping me  it s sad how am seo person or more reliable for support than a customer support representative   eventually i had to call in with a number the seo person helped me with  and i talked to a real person  after discussing the issue and doing video of the treadmill  she sent me a new part for it  it took a long time to ship  and when i got it i had to suddenly be my own treadmill technician and take apart the whole thing the part didn t work  same as the old part i contacted her again and she sent me a different part that took about a month to ship  at this point it s now late july or early august  seeing how bad the last experience was  and how hard it was  i procrastinated for a few weeks until i finally got it done guess what  part doesn t work contacted her again  and she says  i am not sure on other solutions  i would call back in so that we can see what is going on with the machine  it s literally the same thing  as before  but fine  i ll call  i ask her where to call    no response so i m here  with a broken treadmill  and a   year warranty    with no way to use it  i can t exactly get a refund  either    no one coming to fix it  or correctly figure out what is wrong

don t buy this  if it didn t cost more than     of the treadmill s price to return it  between shipping   restocking fees   etc   i would have sent it back already if your wifi is down  or if it has poor access  this treadmill will not work  at all  as in  you won t be able to just start a simple run  i d understand if the ifit features were disabled without internet  but the fact that the treadmill itself can t do the most basic task of letting you run is just ridiculous to me  i asked their support why this strange limitation existed  and was told  that is the way the machine is designed  you will need a wifi connection to use both the manual workout feature and the ifit content with your machine  the second reason i wouldn t recommend it is a smaller  but still persistently annoying issue  you can t turn off  warmups   so any time you do start a workout  it s just a bunch of extra and unnecessary taps to end the warmup early and reset your speed and the last reason i wouldn t recommend this treadmill is the belt motor dynamic  it s adjustable  but the  fine point  is very narrow and you re likely to either end up with the belt slipping regularly or with the motor straining under an overly tightened belt now  there are some good things about this treadmill  and i do want this review to be honest and complete   the fan is a great addition  on warm days  it s a lifesaver   if you re putting this on a perfectly level floor  it s surprisingly quiet and stable  if your floor is not perfectly flat and level  do not get this treadmill   it doesn t have any leveling features  and we used a bunch of shims and cardboard to fill in the gaps   it folds up nicely when not in use to reduce the footprint   it s reasonably simple to put together  but the parts are somewhat poorly machined so don t be surprised if you end up with some gaps all in all  this could have been a great treadmill  but the issues i listed at the beginning are just too much  don t buy this

covid has changed my life   i now work from home and am no longer teaching water aerobics or doing pilates   i went from a fairly active lifestyle to sitting and not getting out   my body has paid the price   i finally purchased this great treadmill to get me going again and i love it     i just wish i had purchased it sooner    i felt better after the first use and continue to feel even better as i continue to use it   i m very grateful i was able to purchase this treadmill as so many in local stores were out of stock   many other people doing the same as me   i felt like the price was reasonable  too  for such a high quality treadmill   paid       tax included    i did a lot of research before purchasing and i m glad i ordered the nordictrack t series    s   i didn t need all the bells and whistles of the more expensive models   i just turn on my music or catch up on programs i like to watch and i m good to go   i love that it folds up   down easily  too   it is a cold wet day outside  but no worry  i ll just hope on my treadmill inside and get a great workout    thank you

i ve had this for a little over a month now   i use it at least   days out of the week  usually jogging     miles a day   i m a fairly big guy at    lb      and i haven t had a problem at all with the machine not performing as expected   it does get a little shaky at speeds above   but a mat under the treadmill helped out a lot with that   the heart rate sensors are complete garbage as they do not give an accurate reading  nor are they in a position where a person as tall as i am can grab hold of them while walking without stepping off the front end of the treadmill belt   so in summary  if you want a machine that can keep up mechanically and do what it s supposed to do to help you get fit  it ll do the job   if you want frilly stuff like a big screen  flashy buttons and that sort of thing  you need to buck up and pay more for another model   and finally  just like all the other reviews will tell you  it sucks that they try to make you think you must have a subscription to the ifit service to use the machine   that is a flat out lie   dam them for such deviousness

love the options  had to have at least a    inch screen and be sure to sign up for a year of ifit training because it motivates you to stay on track every day with so many variations and workout with different trainers   it is heavy and  fed ex left it at the door   they are supposed to place the machine where you want it but we didn t know it had been delivered   amazon made it right and we hired a couple strong teens to move it   then the installer came and it took him a couple hours   i could not imagine trying to put this together so spend the money for assembly   totally worth it   i have been using the treadmill every day for   weeks and feel stronger with more endurance already

this treadmill seems to perform as advertised  packaged it weighs over     lbs  and is not easy to move  though once you have it assembled  it can be moved more easily  getting it upstairs would be another story altogether  assembly is straightforward but does go easier with two people at some stages  my wife was hiding out at that point   all parts were included  as well as an allen wrench  the so called  user s manual  is not   it is basically an assembly guide  there is very little info about how to use this device  which would be really useful  previous reviewers are correct   you can bypass the ifit stuff by simply holding down the ifit icon for about    seconds and it will start right up  only challenge is there is no guidance as to what the various programs will do  be careful here   the belt will move very fast at any speed above     you must be ready to run or be tossed off  just exercise caution  i have spent several days exploring the various programs and there are a nice variety for interval training  which my doctor recommended  the machine is acceptably quiet  i bought an extended warranty as i plan to keep this think for a good while  overall  i think i made a good purchase here  as i have decided i will not be going back to the gym anytime soon  together with a teeter cross trainer  i can get most of the benefits that the y offered

i am writing this review after having the nordictrack for       months and can say   as of today  that i thoroughly enjoy it and it accomplished for me what i wanted it to  which was to lower my a c  i have been a type   diabetic for about   years  but by watching what i eat and exercising have kept my a c mainly below      i have never taken any medication for my diabetes and am very thin  but   months ago my a c jumped to      most likely because i d been cheating with food and exercising less  especially through the winter  i immediately bought this treadmill instead of turning to drugs and now after       months of daily use  my a c has dropped to      my doctor says i don t need drugs unless it stays above   so i m very satisfied that this has worked for me  it does help if you like walking to begin with   but now there is no worry about bad weather and i use it after almost every meal  music for me is the key to enjoying it and not becoming bored  i do   to   hours a day total  i do not use any of the preset programs but set and vary the speed and incline myself as i walk  i find it to be fairly quiet and can t hear it at all with earbuds in  it can be assembled by yourself if you use something like a short step ladder as a stand in for someone holding a section up  assembly was not easy but once together it works great and i hope it lasts many years

beware  in order to get the treadmill to run  you have to register with ifit and then give them your cc information for a free trial after which you will be charged a monthly fee of     one reviewer wrote that you can actually activate the machine without registering  unfortunately  i didn t read his review until after i gave my credit card information and registered forcing buyers to buy another product in order for the product they ve already purchased merits a one star review  i will never use ifit and i will cancel my subscription asap because of these unethical practices the treadmill itself seems solid  installation wasn t the easiest  but the instructions were decent and the parts were well organized

i bought this tread to use with the peloton app and it works perfectly   i ve used it for a power walk  a run and   tread boot camps   the      shortcuts work very well to adjust to each of the instructors ques   if you hit   numbers consecutively  it will jump to that tenth of a mph   for example  if you hit   and then    it will jump to     mph speed   also  there are arrows to adjust the speed and incline up and down   the ipad holder is perfect and a standard ipad doesn t block the    lcd screen   the tread is sturdy and long enough for most strides   when setting it up  be sure to attach the red emergency stop magnet   also  hold on ifit button for    seconds to bypass paying for ifit

the product  t   si  could be a great treadmill  but they neutered it with ifit   after about   months  it won t allow me to continue using without registering  perhaps its a software update  the ifit app had previously allowed you to use it in manual mode if i clicked on all the small text links to run it manually in ifit   now a new screen pops up and it seems i have to register an account  and have wi fi based internet    maybe after registering with ifit i can get manual mode back  but i shouldn t have to   all the technology is there for a great machine  but i do not want to make an account or pay for ifit and i shouldn t have to   they should just be honest  say that the company making the treadmill is also the company making the ifit system  and advertise that an account with or without  a subscription is required for the features you would expect perhaps i have missed something  but they took a good basic touch activated system and stripped all options to funnel you into using ifit   maybe the software will be changed to do this  but i doubt it update   i realized that when i started it a      am  i had mistakenly hit the larger  log in  button when i was trying to press the smaller   point font that says  continue without signing in    at the log in screen there was no back button   i had to enter the android operating system and force the app to stop   when i restarted the app i was able to operate the treadmill using ifit in manual mode   this only worked because i had earlier learned how to access the operating system

pros   works  can walk  jog  incline  and run  nice water bottle holders  keeps track of time  possibly distance  and maybe calories   for the price and brand  very satisfied   if the treadmill last    years with belt maintenance and lubrication  will have no complaints   nordictrack sells a lubrication kit separately cons   needed    people  meaning   the rock johnsons to build  took   people to build  a challenge to build  took time and effort  it has been a month so far and every week have had to adjust treadmill belt right or left  easy to fix but then it moves the other way  folding is very heavy and wonder if mechanism is safe  nordictrack customer service referred me to you tube videos on other treadmills to do routine maintenance  but manual is vague and states not to use silicone to lubricate not important   oversized console feel like i am at worf s station on next generation  heartrate monitors only work      times  speakers are basic but work  do not need to fold  nice if needed to move it though

i was hesitant with the mixed reviews on reliability and some being broken upon arrival  but we have had great luck so far  it was delivered on time and was easy to set up and everything works great so far  we purchased the    s so it doesn t have a large screen but very easily syncs  a push button  with the ifit app on our ipads  which have large excellent screens  which play awesome videos and control our speed and incline   it also has a perfect little holder for the ipad  we have really enjoyed this machine and hope it is durable and lasts us a while  we are loving ifit and all of the videos  they have so many from walking tours of places around the world to   k running training series  we actually both look forward to running on the treadmill

does not work properly and it is all but impossible to get technical assistance from nordic track the treadmill works nice  love the easy lift and soft close feature for lowering  the problem is the incline does not work  i went thru the calibration steps and it does not even calibrate  called the tech support line and was on hold for    minutes and then the call was disconnected be anyone answered  then tried online chat  they could not help me with this type of issue  refer me to another website that only offers to sell you replacement part  what  it is brand new and never been used and you already pushing replacement parts    well as you can tell this one was not a good experience for me     after   weeks  we actually spoke with a person today   however  we were on hold    minutes to get to that person   she pushed us through several hoops  including an app that allowed her to see what we were doing on our end   she then determined that it probably could not be resolved and placed us on hold   after an additional    minute the called was terminated from her end   i guess this is going to have to go back   very disappointed and frustrated

this treadmill has never worked correctly   from day   the incline function did not work   i contacted amazon who passed me to the companies customer service  icon    they were great on the first phone call to try and diagnose the problem   then they started shipping parts   not much substance just a package in the mail with a motherboard or a cord to replace with hard to understand instructions   i had someone to email back if it did t work and when i did that i randomly received a part a few days later   i have changed out almost every part and still   nothing   it does not work   this is a very very expensive lemon at this point   i just called amazon again to assist and they are trying to get the company to help  but they will not do anything as it is outside of the return window bottom line   buyer beware here   i wouldn t buy this treadmill again also  read up on ifit   it basically requires a subscription to work   that should have been disclosed   it isn t free   it is one of those monthly subscription services   there is a work around  but it is not straightforward

from the day we received and assembled our treadmill the incline setting did not work   we immediately submitted a support request online and went back and forth over several months with support until they requested info to have a service technician come out   ever since then all communication has ceased even after repeated requests for updates   why would support be so responsive until it s time for a service request to come onsite a few months in the motor started making a squeaking sound and has been getting progressively louder   we submitted another support ticket  and after going back and forth a couple of times gathering issue details their support disappeared again and stopped responding even after repeated requests for updates so here we are stuck with a    lb faulty treadmill with a broken incline and a gradually failing motor  and two support tickets  one of which is almost   months old and support has gone silent until they get their support act together i would recommend steering clear of this brand

so lets start with the bad  the assembly  getting the packaging off alone kind of sucked  it took forever and getting the deck out of the box was hard  i had no problems with damage from shipping though so for that i am happy to deal with the unpacking   i did assemble this beast myself  it would have been a piece of cake if the majority of my assembly time wasn t spent fighting improperly pre drilled holes  the grounding screw was a nightmare  i tried and tried but couldn t get it to find any threads  i think it was overly powdered coated  i finally forced it through with an assist by the place holder screw  which i could barely get out to begin with   then on the other side one of the   bolts on the base would not go through  the o was shaped like a d so no amount of force was going to make that work  anyway  after all my frustration and struggle to assemble it started right up and runs like a dream  it is wide and comfy  very stable  it is more like a machine i would use in the gym than other home treadmills i have tried  i think the heart rate monitor is way off though  it was         bpm s away in both directions from what my apple watch said each time i check but i don t really need it so i don t really care  i had no trouble bypassing ifit at all  thanks for the tip to hold down the button for    seconds  it cleared the ifit stuff and it didn t come back even after unplugging the machine for a while edited to add photo of the grounding screw that wouldn t fit  it just kept spining and collecting shards of metal  i did eventually get it in there by pushing the place holder screw through first but it took a lot of work and fustration

the delivery was near perfect  the dudes should have had masks on  but it was on time  well communicated through the chat feature in the app it s a lot to put together and you need a pal  but it is totally doable  some screws and bolts need a lot of elbow grease  but it comes together solidly   it was well packaged and not a scratch or scrape   i think maybe they ve improved the packaging since so many were received damaged holding down the ifit button bypassed that nonsense just fine   we use it every day and it is an excellent value for us   we are shocked by how quiet it is

excited about the treadmill at first   i had paid an experience service to put the treadmill together for me   i am so glad i did as it took this couple exactly   hour to put it together and this what they do  so i am sure if i would have done it myself  it would have took longer   paying     was well worth it   the next step  is where it went down hill   in order to activate your product  warranty   you have to take a picture in order to photo register within    days to extend your warranty by    days  my treadmill had the wrong serial number as it kept saying i had a different treadmill then the one that i had purchased   trying to get ahold of customer service at nordic track is a joke   nobody picks up the phone  if you email them  they do not respond   maybe that is their intention   to get you all worked up so you will get on the treadmill to run all your frustrations out   i have no issues with the machine at all   you can manually do your own work out or you can use the programs designed by the trainers  the programs are fun with different courses so you do not get bored   the product itself is made well and sturdy   i love my treadmill and would recommend this product   i just hope you never have to call nordictrack because you will be disappointed

no owners guide  inside the box or anywhere  tried calling nordic track but  their  recording i must  register the treadmill first on their website did that and no one called or  respond to my requests   and after    days of waiting i called them and i was put on hold for    minuets to no  solution to my problem     i think nordic track is one of the worst company to do deal with

i did my homework like i do before all my larger purchases and i was skeptical at first with this treadmill  not because of the name  but because it has ifit built in  many if not most treadmills do today  the problem is out of the box after assembly it tells you an online registration is required before it will even turn on  this is a ploy to get you to sign up for the ifit program at     month so you can use the online features of running to scenery or to work along with others  hey all i wanted was a treadmill  not a subscription to a service i didn t want  well it takes a solid   hours to setup unless you re a pro installer and you will swear a few times  holes don t line up  screws won t go in and you ll struggle a bit but unless you pay the     setup fee expect that  mind you this thing is heavy     lbs in the box so you ll need help  got mine set up and works like a charm  now  the jewel of this review  how to unlock the treadmill without registering  after setup install the red key on the console  then power it up  after you see the  registration required before use  on the screen  hold down the ifit button for       seconds  it will then unlock your machine forever  i also like this treadmill because it has a    lb capacity and with most treadmills having a    lb limit this one suited me best  it s solid and has a good warranty on the motor and parts  and nordictrack must get a kickback from ifit because i hear even installers won t tell you how to unlock the machine without registration and it s certainly not in the manual  they must make millions off ifit so of course they won t tell you how to disable it

been using it for about a few months now  so far so good  its delivered with motor and belt assembled already  you only have the handrails  console and hydraulic latch to put together  it s sturdy and no louder than any other treadmill  you can t find a nortictrack for this price  only problem i found so far is the quality of the speakers  which are not that loud and the sound quality is not that great  but other than that  this treadmill it s a good buy  one person can assemble this on their own  it will take a few hours and you will need a stool or chair to hold treadmill up while you install the hydraulic latch to make your job easier  oh and once installed  hold the ifit button for   sec to skip the whole activation process

i purchased the nordictrack ntl      t     s treadmill for       so far very pleased with it  but there are a few issues to be aware of when ordering and setting it up i had it delivered to work and used a dolly  a medium size suv  and then carried it in pieces with my son to an upstairs room where it was set up  the box is about    x   x    and weighs     lb   not light for two people to move  even in pieces  the largest  main unit is well over     lb and requires a strap  not included  to keep the folding base from opening  to carry  the set up instructions are sufficient but not ikea level of hand holding  also  in addition to the tools listed on the instruction manual  it is useful to have a       socket wrench  and based on other reviews and my experience  you will likely need to open up a hole with a        drill bit  which usually requires a drill with the larger       chuck  i used a drill press i am very impressed with the engineering of this machine  it was designed to be at the upper weight limit of what can be handled in a home  took me about an hour to assemble  but most of the time spent was reading the instructions ahead to understand how it all comes together and drilling out that one undersized hole  i give an a to the engineering and value  c to manufacturing because it is unforgivable to have an important structural bolt hole too small  b  to the assembly instructions and f to some genius business executive who decided to plaster all over the box and the manual that it cannot be turned on before activating ifit   with your credit card of course      ignore all those warnings     as many other reviewers have pointed out  after it is assembled and powered  you just have to hold down the blue ifit logo on the panel for about    sec to get past the initial registration block  our unit is quiet and so far works great

i bought this to work out  mostly walk at home  the quality is excellent and very sturdy  it did take   people to drag it in pieces up the stairs to the room it was going into  take everything out of the box and transport in pieces  the track is very heavy but easier that way  once together  it was easy to set up and run  i like the larger screen and would not want smaller  everything works great  but the hand heart rate sensor is poor at best  it only works on the right hand  and is never close to accurate  so i ordered the ifit chest strap heart monitor  that works excellent and usually in the first minute of a workout it is recognized and giving your heart rate  the machine is fairly quiet  though the fan if you use it is a little loud  i love the ifit and its worth every penny  and the first year is free  i am           lbs and this takes everything i can throw at it  i wanted to walk  but i m now running intervals and working up to a half hour of running with the help of an ifit workout trainer  i am very happy with this  i did purchase a   year service because i m putting in about    min a day     days a week  so things will wear out  all in all  excellent machine for the price and quality

after searching for a good price point on a treadmill  on amazon prime day  july            i finally pulled the trigger and purchased a nordictrack    si  which i had delivered to my home  i m an older guy who works in an office and previously could never seem to get enough cardio  though i ve heard stories about how the average treadmill becomes a coat hanger after six months  i was determined to never let this happen to me  i looked at several pre owned units that were for sale on various classified ad websites and also a number of new units on the major reseller websites  after carefully considering all the collective info  i eventually decided on the nordictrack    si as the best value for the money to meet my goals deliverythe unit was delivered on time and no parts were missing upon receipt  i m super glad i had the unit delivered because there is a small set of cement steps leading to the entrance to my home and the shipping carton was very long     feet  and extremely heavy  two large men took a fairly long time to negotiate the cement steps doorway area into my home and were greatly relieved to finally be able to set the unit down once inside my home assemblythough i m fairly mechanically inclined  it took   hours with only a few breaks  far longer than expected  from the time i slit open the carton to the time i tightened the last bolt on the treadmill for use with only a few breaks  so plan your full saturday or sunday accordingly  the project wasn t technically difficult  and instructions were clear just a significant number of time consuming steps involved in the assembly process  also  there s a point toward the end of assembly in which you will definitely require a second person to assist for a few minutes  no human can simultaneously bear the weight of the entire treadmill deck  belt area  while tightening the underneath bolts that are attached to the frame  unless  of course  your arms happen to be five feet long and you can also bench press     lbs  trust me  i tried to accomplish this alone for a long time beyond what i can describe and still failed workoutthe next day  though i was still pretty sore from assembling the treadmill  i changed my routine to include getting up   hour earlier for my treadmill workout  bio break  two glasses of water w a handful of raw spinach  then force myself onto the treadmill regardless if i m tired sick lazy  as part of this  i also made a stalwart commitment to never miss a treadmill day no matter what  for the first couple months  my treadmill routine strictly comprised  manual  mode in which i manually shifted between treadmill speed   with the incline feature on level    then to speed   w no incline  then to speed     w no incline  and repeat this cycle for    minutes  after a while  my body adjusted to running on the treadmill five times p week  and i started to mix it up twice a week or so with the available on demand workouts to prevent boredom  these modules are interesting to watch and run the gamut from fairly easy novice to insanely challenging expert level  though i also purchased the upgrade for a personal trainer package  i have not yet tapped this function to date  since i m still not ready for that high intensity level of cardio  suspect some of these pro trainers must be t     model cyborgs   astonishingly  between following mark wahlberg s diet  older ripped guy  right     along with a very light weight training push ups sit ups regimen  i m actually starting to get ripped despite in my ever multiplying     years   doesn t matter if it s raining or     degrees outside  every day i get my cardio  never thought i d see my abs again  but right now i can probably squeeze out a four pack  i m convinced the treadmill is the key to this  since nothing else has really changed in my routine  save for the treadmill portion treadmill operationoverall  the nordictrack    si is a great little unit and i m super happy with the investment  precise and well crafted  the unit smoothly folds upright to reduce the footprint in my living space  the console immediately synced with my home wifi  graphics audio on the    inch monitor are crystal clear  however  the console s operating controls must have been designed by a millennial or someone else with       vision  because i can t see the   point font displayed in white on the control buttons without reading glasses  which i don t like to wear when i m running on a treadmill  moreover  the issue is exacerbated by tiny control buttons that are way too small on the touch screen  it s like trying to hit a tiny moving target while running  inevitably  i ll hit the wrong speed or incline button  which is a distraction from my workout  it would be great if some day nordictrack can add a voice activation function  so users don t have to push buttons whatsoever while working out the on demand modules are interesting  and the aesthetics are breathtaking  sometimes  it kind of takes the sting out of a challenging run  since the vibe feels like you re running next to a pro trainer on a beach or through the woods in some exotic location  there are countless varieties workouts levels to choose from  that said  i wish there were a few in which the trainers didn t speak at all  most of them won t stop yacking  which is disruptive when i m trying to get my head in the zone  also  it could just be me  but i was unable to find a headphone jack or any way whatsoever to sync my sony xm wireless headphones to the treadmill  the only option i could find was to play audio or my own music through the treadmill s built in speaker system  this is not a plausible option for me  since i m not confident other people in my home would like to listen to slipknot or the equivalent cranked for a     hour every morning  as a work around i usually listed to music on my iphone with headphones and turn the sound off on the on demand modules the motor belt have worked perfectly with plenty of power under constant change  however  the console software frequently gets  hung up  while updating and i have to reboot at least once a week  in fact  a couple weeks ago i had to perform a  hard reset   which was a hassle because it seriously delayed my only window to work out in the morning and killed my routine overall  i couldn t be happier with the nordictrack    si  for me  selecting a treadmill was a big investment decision  which  fortunately  turned out to be the right one

i wish i could rate this machine but i have been unable to use it at all  i received the machine on december       the box was a little beat up but i decided to inspect it further before sending it back  i did not see any further immediate evidence of damage from shipping  i began to assemble the machine until i got to assembling the heart beat monitor cross bracket  the bracket was bent on one side  not due to shipping but rather a factory defect  it would not fit on the machine  no problem  i got an extended warranty from nordictrack  i sent them a picture and asked for a replacement  i was contacted that day and the replacement part was ordered  it is now february         and i have not received the part  i called customer service and inquired about three weeks ago and was told the part was on back order  the tracking number they gave me just says   in progress  as the order status  they told me that the part was going to get to the factory on february  nd  i am not inflexible and can understand that the part is on back order and i just have to wait  today  february          i still cannot use the machine because i have not received the replacement part to make the machine operable  the tracking status still says  in progress   i am beyond frustrated at this point  if i have a customer that has been waiting for over a month for a replacement part i would make sure to expedite that order because that is unacceptable under any metric  i wish i was hopeful to receive the part before spring but i am not  i am going to give them the benefit of a couple more weeks and then try to send the machine back to amazon

picked this up due to covid gym closures in my area  it s a nice basic model with everything i wanted  minus the fan  but no biggie  i have a standing one near by  assembly was easy  and i was able to put it together in about   hour max  instructions suggests   people to assemble  but i was able to do it myself taking extra caution when needed  when attaching the folding spring under the unit  i used a chair to prop it up as i saw someone in another review  it worked great the treadmill is super heavy  so if you re moving it upstairs  you ll def need two people  it s pretty sturdy  though not as solid as a commercial treadmill i don t care for the ifit programs and was able to set this up and bypass the sign up prompt by pressing the ifit button for    seconds  as mentioned in other reviews   contrary to the unit saying it s locked and can only be started by using the ifit program  you can get around it with no problem it has nice size cup holders that can hold   lb  dumbbells  i use these intermittently when i power walk   and it has a good size ledge that can hold a iphone  ipad  remote and skinny water bottle all at once all in all    stars from me  i do recommend this for anyone looking for a decent basic treadmill with horsepower to run  jog or walk  along with a push button incline  and i believe it s made in the usa

this treadmill works  the belt moves  the speeds change and the elevation also changes  if youre looking for something that will measure your heart rate or accurately account for how many calories you have burned or the distance you ve gone then pass on by  none of those features work properly  not to mention the frustration with the ifit program that several other people warned about in prior reviews  the trick with holding the button down did not work for mine  i had to sign up for the free trial and then go into my account and cancel it right after to make sure i was not charged later on  i m very disappointed that the heart rate monitors are way off  telling me my heart rate is    after running for    minutes even when trying it standing completely still  it also will tell me i have burned almost      calories in    minutes  i am in shape but i m no olympic runner  its completely off  buyers beware

important  you do not need to sign up with ifit to use this machine  you have to use the treadmill key  the small red rectangular shaped piece of plastic attached to the black string with clip on the end  to bypass ifit and workout on the machine  manually  access wise  or  old school   i registered and signed up for ifit because i was interested to see what they have going on but it is not for me  i like to hear my own music when i m running and not someone talking in my head ears  it s cool though but not for me machine  absolutely love this machine  this is perfect for busy parents with little to no time to workout during the day so we can put in the work after the children goes to bed  assembly took about     hours maximum    person plus some help here and there   it is very heavy    it is very easy to fold and unfold too  it is not very noisy so that s good  the   inch screen is small but it s budget friendly and we manage  nothing too fancy but it s okay  i would recommend getting a treadmill mat to protect your machine and floor  delivery was good to so i highly recommend

this was professionally assembled by amazon services  the control console with screen and handles wobbles sideways very severely when walking  even worse at higher speeds when running  the amazon assembly man said this happened on all of these nordic track treadmills and could not be fixed  even at   mph  the whole top that you hold onto swings sideways  left right left   with every step you take  this made me quite seasick when watching the workout progress screen and i have never been seasick in my life before  i have worked out on treadmills for    years and never had this issue before  my wife had same problem  saying even walking on this treadmill was like being in a small boat during a storm  the faster you go  the more severe the side swaying wobbling  going to have to return this to amazon

i think it s important to leave reviews for others on a purchase of this size   especially considering there are so many negative reviews   my package was delivered without any issues   no damage  and it even sat out in the frigid upstate ny air for over    hours before being brought inside   i also opted for the free service which meant it was delivered to my front porch   it s heavy  don t get me wrong  but two people can easily carry it up a flight of stairs   when i say  two people   i mean two women  one of which has zero upper body strength   talking about myself here   anyway  assembly is certainly complicated  but not impossible   the hardware is all labeled by each step of installation   i think it s important to read each step carefully  and even jump ahead     steps to get more information   some of the parts has screws already attached that were discarded before assembly   just pay attention and you ll be good to go   you only need a second person for installation of the hydraulic leg for folding by the way   everything else can easily be managed on your own enough about this ifit nonsense   get your phone out  indicate that you have the standard screen  not color touch screen   and select the option to skip set up using your smart phone tablet   it unlocks the treadmill practically in an instant   anyone with a healthy set of eyes should be able to figure that out no problem so far so good on the operation of the machine   it s not any louder than any other treadmill and the flex step definitely absorbs a significant amount of shock   no wobbling  squeaking  shaking or anything else that shouldn t be happening   i m a bit confused by the way it tracks distance by the    th of a mile instead of   th  but i can get used to that i prefer to run outdoors  hate the gym setting   however  i ve still got my planet fitness membership when a feel the need to run with a buddy while the sidewalks are covered in snow   really excited to have this treadmill for those quick morning or evening workouts that don t require driving  let alone changing in a smelly locker room   i ll update this review if i find any issues with continued operation

i ve been wheelchair bound for   years  then used a walker  remain unstable on a cane  this treadmill can be set to     speed setting  warning always start the warmup and trail with feet straddling the track  the video gives me focus to keep going  a mirror in front helps with foot placement  started doing just the warmup  now up to    minutes at speed     for me i see my feet work better going up hill  taught me to add stretches to improve walking on level ground  i may walk again normally with practice

i ve had my t     si treadmill for a month and have used it every day  i m so incredibly happy with this purchase  i assembled the treadmill by myself without difficulty and have had zero problems with it so far  the only issue i had is that there was no code for my year of free ifit included in the box  but i called ifit support and they immediately activated my membership over the phone  i cannot recommend the ifit program enough  the quality of the videos is outstanding  the trainers are fantastic  and the workouts are incredibly fun  i enjoy them so much that i have to talk myself  out  of working out several times a day so i don t overdo it  my only complaint with ifit is that the user interface leaves a bit to be desired  difficult to search sort through available workouts  etc    but everything else about it is so great that it makes up for this inconvenience  i m a very happy nordictrack ifit customer

the assembly of this treadmill is easy and straight forward while following the directions  once i finished assembly and turned it on i was immediately impressed with how solid it was when i ran on it  i haven t used the ifit programs yet  but i have used the basic run program  it s great to see the run time  speed  and distance all at the same time on the display  it s easy to connect to my wireless gateway  the bluetooth is great to connect to my phone  the speakers and display are awesome  and the fan works great   i love the space saving option by locking the treadmill in the upward position  i can t think of any negative things  this is simply an outstanding treadmill

i recently bought my nordic track t series      i love it  even my husband loves it  it took me a morning to put together  yes i needed a little help from my husband but was able to accomplish most of it on my own  caution on step one  i had to take the monitor off to get the bolt covers for the feet on  my fault i didnt read the instructions thoroughly  the instructions were easy though  a few questions but you also get a  d aid if you use bilt app to help you put it together   i didnt know this before i put it together  again i should read the papers that came with the machine better  as for needing to use the ifit machine to get it to work  no you don t  there is an over ride  press the ifit button for    seconds  you can you the treadmill just fine without using the ifit  i was scared of some reviews that complained about this  ignore them   free month trial with ifit  ifit offers it regardless  although i am doing the      free trial and am really enjoying it  even contemplating buying a subscription  it really motivates me and keeps me on my workout routine   you do not have to pay  just do not put in payment information  i have a receipt that says       for my month of ifit subscription  using caution i also used a throw away email in case they asked for to much info  they dont  bare bones  height  weight  sex  email  that s it  again you do not have to put
