first off this thing is big   two men carried it from the truck   it stayed right where it was until the assembly team showed up a few days later   the thing i love the most is the i fit integration   this takes my workouts to a entire different level   the trainers really push me   when the workout is over i am really sweating    something that seldom happens when i  simply spend       minutes on a treadmill   the i fit combo is what takes everything about this to the next level  it seems there is a workout for wherever you are on your fitness journey   i am a    year old man    and they  have a lot for me to choose from   buy the machine    sign up for the i fit   it will take you where you want to go   a great value   rock solid machine   my only negatives     heart rate monitor is wildly inaccurate    it sure deserves a fan   note to all treadmill designers     why is the on off switch always in an awkward place typically at the floor    come on

amazon freight shipping guys dropped it in our garage for us took     hours for us to assemble  probably if you know exactly what you are doing  can be done in    mins have had it for   months  so far so good  use for     mins  x a week we were looking for something relatively affordable  sturdy  didn t care too much for features beside incline and speed seems sturdy enough when running  no wobbling unless the ground is uneven will update if anything changes in the next few years some things to keep in mind   hold down bluetooth ifit to bypass ifit subscription when you turn on for the first time   walking belt slows down with every step on slow speeds     mph    can run fine  tried up to  mph  maxes at   mph   a little loud  have to turn up music when running   speakers not good for music   bluetooth is only used for ifit  not music connection   heavy  fold up function is nice and helps when you need to move it  on its   tiny wheels  also appreciate how generous icon fitness was  by offering me a small giftof either a maintenance kit or floor mat in exchange for a positive review

nothing special of a treadmill  based on the reviews i was hoping it was better quality assembly was easy  just follow directions  i see other people saying how unsafe this machine is  it is a treadmill people  it has moving parts  learn how to walk in real life and you can navigate this machine i will say it is really loud compared to what i expected if this is near a bedroom  you will not be able to sleep if someone is on it this thing is loud at  am  when sound travels through the house  i installed wall to wall foam gym floor in the room  and i just ordered foam acoustic panels to place under and around this thing  hoping it helps absorb some sound  definitely wouldn t be able to use in an apartment complex  i will see how the panels work in a few weeks i am     pounds and  ft  it can handle my weight easy  i can t run on it while others are sleeping due to the noise  even walking on it seems to be loud if someone is sleeping better than nothing when it comes to the closed gyms due to covid    but kinda wish i dropped another couple hundred of my trump bucks for a better  quieter  machine i expect this to hold up to the miles i plan to put on it  so i would recommend  just know it is not as quiet as i hoped expected

took me    days to get this product out of my door when i tried to return it  i spent hours and hours on the phone with amazon and the pick up service they use  the pick up service was terrible  they wouldn t call me back  they would schedule a day without telling me  they would come to my house and refuse to take it  etc  it was a freaking nightmare about the treadmill though i am quite short so my legs are quite short       but they would always hit the top cover that hides the motor when i ran  i could scoot back but then i d practically be off the treadmill  and it is hard to scoot back when you have it all the way inclined  that being said  the incline worked fine  the screen was quite good  the folding up wasn t very good  when you go to fold the track up  it always rubbed against one of the handles  left one   the ifit is annoying  we accidentally subscribed so i had to call them directly and cancel our subscription  which thankfully was very easy and the guy made it a breeze   the treadmill was just not worth the price

the machine itself id great  after i bypassed the ifit thing   there are other apps or youtube channels that provide similar if wanting a virtual trail walk or something  if you really want the ifit option  go for it  im sure its fine ordering was fast and easy  not prime  but it was sold by amazon so there was a delivery option  i chose the earliest available which was   days after purchasing  delivery was set for sunday excitedly waiting the item to arrive but let down hard when the time passed and nothing  contacted amazon and assurances were made and credits provided  for amazon items of course    days after it was first ordered    days after original delivery date the treadmill finally arrived   just in time too  expected to snow for   days   the guys that delivered were nice however so i appreciate that but the whole   day fiasco was ridiculous  i have never had this bad of an experience from amazon in the    years i ve been ordering from them  one of the support people even had the gall to tell me  its not prime you know as for the device itself   assembly was not bad at all  went up in about an hour  like some purchasing the machine i bypassed the ifit by holding the ifit button down till the screen activated  make sure the magnetic stop key is inserted first lol  device worked great  cant wait to start using it on a regular basis  note to fitbit users   doesn t seem to register steps so keep those arms swinging youtube has some virtual trails  or other apps in the app stores   check them out so far  i recommend buying this device  i just hope shipping doesn t effect you as it did me

scheduled service to assemble track    days ago   the appointment was for today at  pm  got a call at   am saying earliest date technician could assembles oct     that s five weeks out person on phone was very nice  very apologetic buts that s not what amazon promised just lost   weeks off my warranty first time i have used amazon s service calls and it s not a good start will keep you posted but if you are buying this for near term use    don t count on amazon assemblyupdate no     spent a few hours putting it together  instructions are very clear   the unit is securely packed to prevent damage  small parts are packaged to coordinate with the steps in the instructions  large parts are well identified very well engineered  clear instructions  easy to follow   i feel the two fit peopler are required to unpack and position the track

first off  pay for professional installation  it took me three hours by myself and they don t even give you tools to screw in the bolts  luckily  i had a mini wrench that i found but it wasn t strong enough to make the bolts flush  i will have to go out and get a socket wrench  i researched many treadmills with the ifit model  i definitely need motivation and i get bored on machines  this was the cheapest one  brand name  with ifit  i wear a fitbit so i wasn t concerned at all about the machines heart rate monitor which was completely inaccurate  additionally  the calories burned on these preset programs on ifit was also inaccurate  do yourself a favor  get a fitbit watch or something similar to track these yourself  this treadmill is very flippin heavy  there is absolutely no way one person can move it by themselves  it is well built  it is quite it has the same quality of the treadmills at the gym  i have not tried the speakers yet so i cannot review them at this time  you do not have to get the ifit as others have stated  but again  nowhere does it say that  at     a month  if you need the motivation and you like to see the world  get the ifit  you can cancel at any time  the trainers that take you around the world are immersive  and takes your mind off of what you are doing at the time   working out  overall  i think this was a great buy considering i was looking at other treadmills from            more  this thing works  i was sore for a couple of days after my very first workout with i fit which was a simple    minute walking tour through london  the last couple of minutes had me going up a hill  the incline and speed adjusts automatically  i did not have to press any buttons myself  i was quite shocked that i was even sore as i walk at least        steps a day and walk all day long for    hours at my job  i do not regret this purchase

i had great hopes when i bought a nordic track  great well known name  what could be better unfortunately  that became what could be worse assembling was difficult b c the bolts and holes weren t smooth and easy to thread  usually  threads are cleaned out by machine during manufacturing  they must have skipped this step  most bolts were hard to start and tighten  which i ve read in other reviews after assembly  spouse got on it and found it squeaks while in use  i tried several lubricating steps recommended in other reviews without success  not a bad squeak  but annoying on a new machine we contacted nordic track via phone and on website  no response  i also contacted amazon  and amazon left a voice mail with my number  i got no response  finally got a case opened via facebook  their response   your feet are probably dragging on the belt  please take care not to do that  because of the significant cost  we decided to return it due to an unresolved noise and poor no response from manufacturer  the only way to return it is to have it disassembled and packed in the original box  in the end  i m out     hours assembly disassembly and moving this up down stairs so  yeah  not worth the hassle  if you find this review helpful  please click on the helpful button so that others may avoid the pain

treadmill arrived with damage to some of the cosmetic plastic pieces that cover the electronics and mechanical parts  no big deal  i had purchased the extended warranty just in case  so nordic track agreed to ship replacement parts    for me to install  the bigger problem was that when i first turned the treadmill on  and by passed their attempt to  up sell  you into their online workouts which involve a  monthly  fee  the instructions directed me to calibrate the incline motor  when i started the calibration process  the incline motor immediately jammed and would not function at all  the belt would turn but the deck was inclined and would not adjust  i contacted nordic track and after a half hour wait to talk to someone and another half hour of troubleshooting  they agreed to send me a new motor  they offered to send a technician to install the motor  but said it might take weeks to schedule  so  i waited   weeks for the new motor to arrive  installed it myself and the new motor immediately jammed as soon as i powered up the treadmill   when i contacted nordic track again  re another hour on the phone  they agreed to send more parts and a technician   a few days later  i received an email from nordic track threatening to void my warranty because the treadmill was located in a garage   they demanded photographic evidence of the treadmill s location   i sent a photo of the unit in my finished  insulated  climate controlled garage along with the large flat screen tv and home gym set up that are located there   nordic track did not respond  so i arranged a return and refund thru amazon  amazon s customer  service was amazing   i highly recommend that if you do decide to take a chance and buy this questionable product  do it thru amazon  because amazon will take care of you when nordic track inevitably screws you over

so nordic track decided to try to get people to pay a gym membership to them from their homes with this ifit scam nonsense   this seems to be the norm with a lot of these treadmill companies   so you sign up for ifit  and then cancel it immediately   that s fine   i d spend the     bucks to get some poor soul to install it at your house   i chose to do it myself to save money and it was a huge pain in the neck   folding this machine is some what easy  but it s definitely not portable or easy to move   there are wheels that are less than    in diameter that you re suppose to pull it with again  when using it as a treadmill  it works great   just look out for the ifit scam

i wish this treadmill had a fan built in like my previous treadmill the fact that you are forced to sign up with ifit com before being able to use it is very annoying and not very fair to the consumer  i should not be forced to do anything by a seller or product however  as someone else described the procedure to bypass the mandatory registration with ifit  simply    attach the safety cord   press and hold the ifit button for    seconds this procedure will allow you to use the treadmill without having to register  you only have to do this one time on the positive side  the treadmill feels comfortable during its intended use  it is not very noisy except when changing the inclination  folding and un folding is done easily and quietly

first off i want to tell you that i did not even try the ifit trial  so i can not speak to that  i was looking for a good treadmill to use with zwift and have found this treadmill works perfectly for that  i needed to be able to pair it with the zwift program and found that the zwift runn paired with this treadmill and the speeds matched exactly with no calibration of the runn needed  i had first tried the zwift running pod  but found the speeds it recorded were not accurate  i highly recommend this treadmill for indoor running  especially for pairing with the zwift platform

i ve had this for about a month now  i m a    year old that is trying to get back into jogging again assembly  took about two hours by myself now   i m not counting the hour i took looking for another screw  step     because the supplied screw did not fit after that   things went smooth i love this machine  i bypassed the ifit like every one said and held the button down about    seconds  i may consider it in the future but just starting out i just figured out this morning that you can adjust the cushion on the track  looking forward to running on that tonight i was honestly looking at the           price range but after reading soooo many reviews   mostly bad in that price range in reliability   this one seemed like a worthwhile gamble to spend the extra money  i use it about       min every other day  for the price i really think it would be hard to beat

we have had this treadmill for a month now  my husband and i both use it a few times a week  he is the runner and i like to do inclined power walking  we are both very happy with this treadmill it s by no means  gym quality  but it fits the bill for an average home user looking to get or stay in shape it has plenty of features that make it impressive for the price point  we love the folding feature because it gives us a bit more space when it s not in use  the belt is plenty wide and long and the motor keeps up with my husband s runs the only couple things that are slightly disappointing are there is no fan but that s easily resolved by placing one nearby and the speakers in the console are not good quality  but we have a bluetooth speaker in our workout room  neither of these are deal breakers for us especially considering the price tag as other reviews have mentioned  the ifit membership can be bypassed by holing fown the ifit button for a few seconds  then you re ready to go if youre looking for a good value treadmill with lots of features i would recommend this one

i had my eye on this treadmill for a while and i m happy i pulled the trigger  my treadmill did arrive damaged  but nordic s customer service was excellent and they had a replacement piece sent out to my house as soon as possible  i did see a few reviews say that the ifit membership was required in order to use the treadmill  but that s definitely not the case  once the treadmill is powered on  hold down the ifit button for    seconds and then your treadmill is ready to be used without having to pay for the membership fee

this is a good quality treadmill for the money  easy to assemble  and easy to use   i don t need any features other than some simple numbers for speed  time  and distance  and this machine is fine for that without anything else   it comes with a large red stop sign that says the machine will not work until you go to ifit and activate  whatever that is   i called the phone number instead  nobody home   so i went to ifit and the only option was to type in a credit card   i did  and then and only then found that if i would just hold the ifit button down for    seconds or so  that would activate the machine without whatever ifit might be   so i logged onto my new ifit account and set the status to cancel whatever it was that i signed up for   this is pretty shady and if i would have known about their methods in advance i would have looked for a different machine or company

i ve been using this machine for a little under a month  so far  i have no complaints  except for some intermittent connectivity issues  you don t have to sign up for ifit  there are instructions in the reviews and q   a section for activating without it  however  i m using ifit just to test out the different workouts  and i m enjoying it so far  i only did a little bit of research to find a treadmill  it can get overwhelming  but this brand and model seemed to meet all of my requirements and reliability  my husband moved and assembled it for me  it fits well into the corner of our fitness room  and it folds up conveniently so my husband can pull his bench out  there haven t been any noise issues  and i haven t used the speakers  since i normally use my headphones  overall  i m happy with my purchase

i was going crazy  being locked in the house during covid  i have two children  the youngest still being a bit of a loose cannon and we live on a busy road  i didn t feel like i could safely go for a walk with her and even my oldest isn t old enough by legal standards to stay at home with her  i m working from home  sitting all day  at least at the office  i d walk the building  around the building  but at home      it was just sitting  this machine gives has been a god send  best     bucks i ve spent in a while  i use it daily to get my exercise  burn off steam and get the endorphins going  so far so good  it gives me a good quality work out every time  i will say assembly was a challenge at  times  as was moving the package  i had to open the box in my foyer where they left it and carry the pieces to the living room for assembly  it says you need two people and you re probably better off   it is heavy and cumbersome  i didn t have that option though  so me and my    dollar tool kit that i keep around the house got this thing assembled in about   hours  i did follow the instructions  but i also followed a video on youtube and i had no issues with having to disassemble or redo anything  even managed to adjust the belt and felt very accomplished afterwards  i love it  best thing i could have done for myself  the only thing i did not like was ifit  so i couldn t bypass it and it sounded cool  i did the trial  i signed up for a bunch of classes that sounded awesome  walk through the pyramids of egypt  yes please  i started the first  only to have my treadmill literally take off under neath me  i had to pull th cord and shut it down  the instructor wasn t even moving yet  ifit would have been great if it didn t control my machine  i need to control my pace and incline  i cancelled it that night

the delivery drivers notified me when they were on the way  the box was in pristine condition  it was on time  and the instructions were very straight forward  it runs perfectly and is exactly what i wanted there are two cons    you must have a second person to put this together    nordictrack makes you think you have to register for their ifit program for your treadmill to even turn on  this is not true  you can bypass the registration process by just turning the machine on  putting the safety stopper fab into its place and holding down the ifit button

i did not realize when i purchased this nordictrack t   s treadmill that it is considered a  smart treadmill   the nordictrack t   s treadmill is locked and in order to unlock it you must set up an account with if it com to activate the treadmill  give credit card information  personal information  etc   you get a free    day trial but if you not cancel there is a monthly yearly charge of          you can join a gym for as little as    per month  after setting up my treadmill i attempted to cancel the free membership and i am unable to do so  i am so pissed off that i would recommend to anyone who would listen not to purchase this treadmill and amazon should warn you before purchase  i am filing a complaint with the better business bureau  beware  don t purchase treadmill

hey all i brought this treadmill because all of my gyms closed down on the post i work for in the military  i have to stay ready at all times  there were a lot of treadmills i researched to get to my final destination  i wanted the high end ones but this works fantastically  i have no complaints  the screen works clearly and the touch configurations work great even when you re covered in sweat  i can see and touch my buttons even with my glasses off  i had to build this alone because i brought some new shoes with this purchase  and my spouse was at work  i was too excited to start back running  it took me a couple of hours  i was watching law and order and eating lunch   the delivery team brought it to right to my doorstep that helped a lot  this treadmill is worth the money especially the ifit that comes with  the coaches keep me engaged and ready to go  the stats are saved by my wifi too  overall dreams come true

i just got into a workout routine before covid  but thankfully when the weather turned  i was happy to get outside  my parents bought this treadmill on prime day and i realized that i wanted one  it is great to be able to walk whenever  day or night  or even in this cold weather  two things though  the ground hole needs drilled a bit more when assembling and the ifit can be bypassed when first turning on  by holding the ifit button down for over    seconds  i haven t used ifit  but it seems like an unnecessary monthly membership fee  i d totally recommend this item

i didn t want to sign up for the ifit program so all you have to do to get around that is press and hold the ifit bluetooth symbol next to the phone and ipad symbol  it doesn t look like an actually button to press but that s what you have to touch   and it went to the home screen  super easy to assemble i do have a complaint tho  my delivery wasn t the best experience  they scuffed up my trim when they put it into the room and the box was damaged and dented in multiple places  definitely not professional

first  i was disappointed to discover this treadmill was made in china   delivery was quite fast  but the box was damaged and the treadmill suffered minor scratches   moving the treadmill from the front porch to the assembly location was thought  it s very heavy   i removed the parts from the box to move them easier   assembly was ok  fit of the parts was ok  we ll see how durable it is   activation is a pain   eventually we figured out by holding the bluetooth button down for       seconds  the online activation is not necessary   the treadmill work fine  as expected   it seems powerful enough for walking  jogging  maybe a slowish runner   not sure a sprint would be supported   but  it does feel powerful   several workout programs are offered   the display is nice too  easy to read track graphic   overall  it seems ok so far   wish it was made anywhere but china   probably wouldn t have bought something else had i known

everything but the delivery was good  the assembly  although it had annoying terrible instructions  wasn t too bad  the delivery was just hell  it seemed like they were delivering to the room of choice and assembling the thing but they just dropped it off on our hallway and pretty much said good luck  over     pound product and we had to get it to our basement  back corner gym  while trying not to scratch up the walls  everything else was fine though  they can definitely use a pointer or two from ikea on how to create assembly instructions  luckily we had the tools necessary to make the job a bit easier but if you have no tools  good luck so far the machine seems to working pretty well also  do not sign up for their fit thing  turn on the machine  put the key in it s spot and just hold down the blue fit icon  you can bypass their stupid registration and just use the treadmill as intended

the good   solid  well built machine   excellent motor warranty   the not so good   tracking adjustment access is horrible   aligning the hex wrench with the roller screw is difficult because there is about        space between the hex wrench access hole and the roller screw head   the area is covered by a trim piece with limited visual access from the side   even using a flashlight  it was difficult to get the hex wrench fitted into the roller screw head the worst   the owner s manual does not tell you that the treadmill can be unlocked without signing up for ifit   the ifit deal wants you to sign up for specialized programs for a monthly fee   guess what   the same company owns both nordictrack and ifit   you can unlock the machine by pressing and holding the ifit logo on the console for    seconds thankfully  a prior reviewer made that information available   if you just want the basics with out paying for the extra frills  you don t need to subscribe to ifit

do not buy   i purchased this treadmill and the belt never stayed where it was supposed to be   i purchased an extended warranty and asked them to repair   they said it was a known problem and sent me two screws to put into the treadmill  there are no screw holes where these are supposed to fit   as if today  i have made many requests for warranty repair service but they have not responded  total ripoff and appalling customer service

missing a whole row of buttons     machine looks great lets make that clear but    assembly isn t that complicated    its horribly calibrated    theres dents and scratches everywhere   ifit code locked  you must purchase ifit subscription    the one that comes with the machine is not valid  also the machine i got    the model and serial numbers on the box do not match the ones listed on the machine  therefor you must be careful before activating  it will not unlock so its useless  i contacted customer service and refused a replacement was asked to ship back and pay shipping out of my own pocket for this huge box    its expensive  horrible experience  i do pay for prime  so why do i have to pay for return shipping on a useless product    amazon cs responded  contact us after    hrs  seriously    ive contacted them   days and they keep asking for tracking number    or i will not keep my refund  crazy

i use this without the app by pushing the connect button for    seconds i like this machine sort of   it works  the price was good  but it shuts off several times per  work out  i detach the emergency stop tassel pull and put it back in and it starts back up  but it continues my timer distance while it s paused   makes zero sense for whatever reason  it was impossible ago assemble  my husband made it work but in some areas they did not bore the holes alarge enough for the screws and it explicitly says  do not use power tools   well  we had to  the screws were too big to fit through      overall it s a good ish machine  i like the one touch speed and incline buttons  i like that you don t have to use the app with it  the app was terrible for runners tbh   it fits in my large closet  it s super quiet    it s very stable with no shaking even while running  displays are confusing  no idea what half the buttons do  and i can t for the life of me figure out why my machine is stopping every      minutes  are all treadmills like this

when looking for a treadmill i was looking for a dependable brand that was as low cost as possible   and then i learned about ifit and decided to make that a requirement and i m glad i did   this one is perfect because its low cost so it doesn t have its own screen and we just use our ipad which works great   the ifit software is pretty awesome as it has training series where the trainer will run through thailand or greece or wherever and then the machine s speed and incline will automatically change with the trainer as she   he goes through the run   walk   hike   we love it   only downside is that the treadmill now makes some more squeaking noise as it moves so i m going to check into oil and the like but i m not worried as it seems to be well constructed   all in all   we d recommend

does not come with ifit code free trial as it states  it came with a card with an authorization code that has already been used ifit was no help they said this is a scam  it s been months of trying to get a hold of a real person that i can even get this sorted out with    the treadmill itself is sturdy and does the job but it would ve been nice to actually get what is advertised on the amazon listing as that is what swayed me to buy this over another brand    disappointed to say the least in the seller

replacing a   yr old treadmill by another manufacture  that machine worked well for a long time   wanted a basic treadmill for the wife and i to walk on with some slow paced running   bought this product   assembly was okay  had to disassemble some shipping screws and re assemble with correct screws as part of the assembly process   all in all the fit and finish is what i expected   the belt seems to work just fine thought i wish it had a system where the belt will self adjust as it wears or an indicator that will show when the belt needs tightening   hello  ever hear of a constant tension spring use  you must sign up with ifit to get it to work  if we were hard core workout people then ifit is something that we will use  and maybe we will grow into it   did not like that we could not assemble and turn it on and have it just work  now i have to go back and remember the username and password  as if i don t have enough of those already  to discontinue the ifit subscription   wife used the most basic program to start and that was soon too much for her as it went from an incline of   to     she is using it now mostly on manual mode where she has to input her own selections as she works out   really this machine is made for a more advanced runner than a light walker  jogger   time will tell if we use it more or less than our old machine   we don t fold it and unfold it as it is part of the gym so it just stays in use position

why in the world would you have some many different types of screws and bolts  i had three different size bolts just for the side rails  when you install the side rails  do not tighten them up just leave them a bit loose or you will never get the pulsebar installed   as for the ifit  amazon should be ashamed of itself to allow nordictrack  ifit to hold an expensive piece of equipment hostage until you provide ifit with your credit card in order to turn the damn thing on all three of you can do better on this   the bypass trick of holding the ifit logo down for    sec does not seem to work in the newer purchased units  i know you don t want the average joe to assemble these machines  when you can have a service person do it for another fee  there are assemble videos available on utube take a look at a couple before you start

once we got it working  it is a nice machine   it is big and heavy so plan your location  including proximity to power   get your mat  surge protector   before you start assembly   it does fold easily but it still will not go through most doorways assembled as luck would have it  ours came damaged during the pandemic   we did not unbox for a while  time  procrastination  and thus missed some options like return although that would have been challenging during the pandemic as well   the damage was a dead center hit of one of the poles in the box with the electronic console knocking a crippling indentation on the display   we were sent to nordictrack for resolution and they agreed to replace the console upon appropriate documentation   it was quite a wait for the part   i suspect replacement part fulfillment was competing with new production but don t know   anyway  after   months we got the replacement part  figured out how to do the repair  and things are now great

i was    yrs old        and     pounds when i bought this treadmill i am very pleased with this after a couple months of daily use  i find this treadmill to be very comfortable to run on  the track is large  and very fast  i have yet to go past halfway on the speed what i like the best is that i only bought a treadmill  not a computer station with it  i don t need anything beyond how fast and how far  that s what this offers very easy to fold and unfold  i am very happy with this machine overall i had no issues with the assembly  it was easy and the instructions were simple the one issue i had was with the ifit connection  the treadmill comes with giant warnings saying that it is  locked  and that you have to make an ifit account to unlock it i did that to only find out that i never needed to do so  all i had to do was hold down the ifit button for    seconds and the machine was unlocked  this was in the way back of the assembly instructions that really upset me because i had already opened the ifit account and put in my credit card info why lie to me nordictrack  i don t care what ifit is paying you  that is simply unethical to make me think that i needed to open an ifit account with a credit card to use the treadmill that i bought  then recant this at the end of the instructions so if you buy this  and i would definitely recommend it  please be aware that if you don t want the ifit account  you don t have to make one

i happened to find this treadmill for about      and quickly researched and then purchased  i m glad i did because the price immediately went back up to almost         although i don t remember the description mentioning the machine folding  i m glad that it does  the deck is long and comfortable to run or walk on  and the incline feature works great  by the numbers the deck might not be quite as wide as what you may use at the gym  but i can t feel the difference  my one and only gripe is that the front of the deck ends too close to the controls for my liking  so i m constantly feeling like i m too far back compared to machines that i m used to   the ifit nonsense is easy enough to bypass and at this point it s obvious that it s there  the whole number speed and incline buttons are nice and work well  but i wish the     and     buttons felt a bit more responsive on the display  the start to  mph and stop ramp up down a bit faster than what i m used to  but i ll get used to that  overall  the quality feels solid and the machine isn t overly loud   i have it in my living room for reference  the additional cushioning for the running deck is nice too  lastly  you really don t need a media screen for double the normal price of this machine  the phone tablet ledge works great and i can watch shows on tv or a device while running just fine on this machine

i d like to start by saying this thing was terribly frustrating to put together  the instructions are simple  but you have to fight the bolts to get them in place  it took me    minutes just to get the handles attached because the bolts catch so frequently two parts of it were damaged upon arrival  that i have noticed this far   a metal bar along the bottom and the top of the arm where the handles attach  i have yet to reach out to customer service i have ran on it four times so far  and one of those times the screen was stuck on a loading screen image  but i was still able to control it manually and run  but it did not save my workout data it feels great to run on  but i ve been a little nervous considering the cost

we moved and the club we belonged to just no longer worked   we debated and opted to purchase a treadmill   we got the ifit included and wow what an experience   my knees are not allowing be to run but with the ifit and various walking trails  it s terific   the speed and incline are automatically adjusted to keep you going   my wife uses for running and she has been all over the world   highly recommend   i am not the greatest mechanic but was able to assemble after delivery put in place i wanted       rating for me

i was worried about the negative reviews  where the product arrived damaged  mine arrived fine  although i m slightly unhappy that amazon lets you  choose  a drop off time window and ups unilaterally changed it  i chose           on saturday and ups said            however  ups delivered it in the original amazon time window  at approximately   a m    and not during the ups updated window as for the product  i don t plan to use the fitness app  and i was able to disable the prompts immediately by pressing the ifit app button for several seconds  as another reviewer noted as for the treadmill  i was able to set it up by myself  with a bit of difficulty  it is probably far easier to set it up with two people  as another reviewer noted  it is probably better to set it up in the room in which you intend to use it  it is fairly heavy  but the track lifts easily for storage  the cup holders kinda suck for most things other than cups  but there is a ledge you can use for phones tv remotes the functions are suitable for my purposes  i mostly intend to walk with it to increase my exercise while i watch tv  i tried the faster speeds  and this thing is fast  i find walking to be most comfortable between     and      you can increase speeds and incline incrementally by     of a unit  i do not really use the incline  but it s a neat feature i might explore if i advance in skill  i disabled the sound beeps  and it is now fairly quiet to operate  i can walk  at a fast clip  and watch my shows without disturbing my housemates one room over  i m happy i went with this model over the cheaper budget units  although i m not ready to use all the features of this model  i m glad i have that option for the future solid device  and about the only model at this price point with the features i wanted

my biggest complaint with this equipment is the ability to play music  it has   large speakers but if you don t subscribe to ifit then they are useless  they have a port which the instructions state you can insert your ipod in   i think i stopped using an ipod back in the    s  at this price range you should be able to use any of the modern devices to play your music  but they have seen fit to partner with ifit and limit your music choice to only them   i hate it when a company tries to force you to use a product that you don t want and certaintly don t want to pay monthly for it folds easily but still leaves a big footprint in the folded position because it doesn t fold up even close to vertical i paid to have this assembled for me  i m glad i did because it looked like a difficult task

this company is scamming people into registering for ifit and paying extra for a treadmill that s already not worth the price  they mislead you into believing it won t work without ifit  they should be sued for that alone also they give you the wrong screws which make it impossible to put together yourself  i had some extra in the house so i used them instead  if i m paying over      for something i expect to have the correct items to put it together update  treadmill is still trash  the belt always moves to the left side and rubs against the side rails  i hope this company is happy with the money they stole for a terrible product

just simply screwed into the lid as they should be  however  on the side that was broken the company put a brace or a stint in the screw that holds it together because without it it wouldn t go in at all  this causes the entire right side of the machine to buckle and now and not stay together  if you lift the machine up in its storage function you can see a giant crack down the base of the machine in order for me to stand on the machine at all i have to use wooden blocks to that it is balanced  it doesn t make me  a pregnant person feel safe  it makes me extremely sad because i feel like i m in prison and i have no way to move around in my tiny apartment and i had to wait a month for this almost      machine that i had to pay for on unemployment to arrive broken    i m trying to be optimistic  i m trying to keep the moral alive  i want to use this machine even though it s broken  because even though i ordered front door delivery amazon wouldn t bring it up the   flights of stairs to my apartment and i m pregnant and i could have miscarried walking this over   thousand pound box  i don t want to return it because i spent   hours putting it together  so i m trying to find bypassed this by holding down the  ifit  button for    seconds  not documented anywhere  but found other reviewers who discovered this   none of the    programmed workouts  work when you do this  but i have always been a straight run for    minutes at a constant pace and constant incline person  the treadmill has nice   to    mph buttons so you can adjust course speed  then get your   ths of an mph for fine tuning with the     buttons   the heart rate monitor does not work for me  it always reads way low and takes a long time to get a reading  by holding the handles on the top console   this when i want to monitor my heart rate   the display features are busy  it is hard to see progress of your run with the bar graph that is trying to look  d  i ignore it now   you cannot enter your weight so the calories expended i assume is based on a constant weight  for me    lbs  the calories seem higher compared to more expensive treadmills i have used in gyms   the documentation requires you to use a ul      transient voltage surge suppressor      joules or more      volt or less compliant power strip     amp   i could find only one power strip that said on amazon that it was ul treadmill would probably be ok if it would work as expected this treadmill was delivered on december    and assembled on january    the incline would not work you can only walk at level zero first amazon customer service has been amazing  when i could not reach nordic track through their customer service number i used option on amazon website to help with troubleshooting issues  amazon was able to cut through all the red tape and wait time on a phone tree with nordic track  the amazon rep did the waiting and called me back once a live person was on the phone  what a difference  when i had not doing that  nordictrack   most all exercise machines now come with a option to join ifit  which is a subscription service for personal work outs  i don t know if this is just nordic track  but you cannot even start your machine until you sign up for ifit  once your ifit account is activated it will send a signal to the machine and it will unlock  for me  it was about    minutes before i could turn on the treadmill  basically you re being blackmailed to sign up whether you want ifit or not   on the ifit website there is no option that says i do not wish to join  i just kept pushing through the screens  once you get to the screen that s asking for how many months you want to join and payment information just don t select anything  again there is no option for  no thanks     no incline   once i was able to speak with a representative at nordic track the representative did some troubleshooting over the phone and ordered two parts that should repair the machine under warranty and that the repair rep would contact me within a week on delivery  nordic track said that they would be tracking those shipments and a repair technician will be in contact me once they were delivered  i gave them five days and had to reach out to nordic track again  it would be another week before the repair person could get here  the repair technician was at my home on february    and installed the parts that have been ordered  the technician told  me there were some bad wiring on the motor and replaced it  however that did not fix the incline  the console also has electrical issues and does not send the signal to the motor to engage the incline  additional parts were ordered  and nordic track now tells me that the console is on back order for another   to   weeks   i m really wondering how long this machine is going to last because it seems like the whole thing has a lot of electrical issues  i have asked nordic track to simply replace the machine but i m now outside of the    day return window   i m trying to be optimistic that once all repairs are made i will basically have a whole new machine but i won t buy nordicctrack again and cannot recommend

we researched over    treadmills suited for an at home beginner   we paid for the assembly technician   the product arrived on schedule from nordic trac   and the amazon com assembly arrived on time with tools in hand and seemed very competent   the problem was  we live in an apartment and the item was delivered to the front door   he was able to bring the treadmill in the house and fortunately  there was a construction crew next door who helped him bring in into the office where we wanted it   the problem occurred soon after when he discovered nordic trac sent two left arm rails  rather than a left and a right   he had to leave   i had to register the treadmill with nordic trac  chat with their customer service and get a replacement right arm rail and then reschedule the assembly   while everyone did their job in getting everything fixed  it s a shame so many people had to spend so much time fixing something one person in the warehouse caused by not paying attention to what is called the  pick list  when putting parts in a box update  nordic trac sent a replacement part for the missing right arm   it was not the right part   i had to contact them and start the replacement part all over again   the second  right arm  arrived and is was also the wrong one   i examined the part and saw that it would fit into the panel display even though it was longer than the left arm and did not come with the silicon arm sleeve as the left ones did the assembly tech came out as scheduled and i just hope he could make it work   he did   he removed the silicon sweat cover from the extra left arm that was originally in the box  put it on the right arm which was too long   my machine is finally up and running thanks to the cleverness of the assembly tech   no thanks to nordic trac   no
