overall seems like a great treadmill for the price  has everything i need and none of the junk i don t  love the  speed dial  buttons to quickly set a preset speed and get going immediately without having to tap an inordinate number of touchscreen controls  assembly requires two people why it s not   stars    the silver screw was damaged on delivery  based on reviews comments it seems others have also had this issue  contacted nordictrack and waiting for a response  meanwhile  using screw that was originally screwed in    ifit activation could not be bypassed on this model  maybe it s been updated  but there s a free trial with no commitment and manual mode can continue to be used afterwards  still  would have been ideal to be able to use the treadmill with no activation    there is no perfect place to put my phone on this treadmill  the cupholders are large but not in a way where i can place my phone flat  which seems to exacerbate the rattling of my phone during a run    a top speed higher than    mph would have been nice    there doesn t seem to be a way to set weight  resulting in an inaccurate calories burned count

i like to run outside but when the weather is bad or i m on call for work its nice to get my workout at home so i can quickly grab my things and go  i wanted to stick with a reputable brand so i checked out nordick track  based on my running i thought the t    would work perfectly price was ok  assembly was fine  folds easily enough  i bought the   year service plan  not long into having it  all the issues started  not being a treadmill technician i wasn t sure what was going on but the display was not controlling the speed incline  i worked with a nordick track and they determined it was a computer board issue  they refused to send a technician but did send a new computer board  after installing  the treadmill didnt work right  a few more back and forth phone calls and the nordic track tech now says its the motor  so they sent a new motor  again  wouldn t send a technician   after installing the new motor it still didn t work right i didnt have time to be on the phone all day to figure out the issues so the treadmill sat collecting dust  then the  your warranty is expiring  calls started  i explained my situation and nothing ever came of it  eventually the emails and phone calls stopped not the best experience  try another brand

i bought this product based upon the name of the company  nordicktrack   my assumption that this would be a high quality product as evidenced by the fact they advertise it with a three years parts warranty  however  after owning the nordicktrack for    months  the running plate under the belt cracked while i was running  i twisted my ankle and could have hurt myself more  when i contacted the company  they are refusing to stand behind the product  they are telling me that i should have bought an extended warranty when it is marketed as a three year parts warranty  that seems like a bait and switch to me  i keep reaching out the the company but they refuse to do the right thing  buyer beware

my husband and i are both tall people              respectively  and i big concern about purchasing a treadmill for home use was that it would be too small for our long legs  we researched  read hundreds of reviews and bit the bullet  we could not be happier with this treadmill  it s a good size for the home but is still plenty long enough for a full stride  it folds up well and takes up minimal space when not in use  overall  an excellent machine and one we both would recommend

they treadmill is locked and can not be used until you sign up for their silly app  the app is laggy and worthless  the installation instruction are ok but fail to mention to put on the covers on the posts before installing them  you won t know this until the end when it would require dismantling the whole thing to put the covers on   once you get it working its ok up to  mph  past that if you step wrong it feels too wobbly for me      lb    the cover upfront is too close to your feet when you are running as well  so if you like being close to the handles when you run your are going to step on the cover and that s also unsafe imo   over all its ok for the price  and perfect if you will be doing light running at lower speeds  and it s just barely acceptable if you are doing any sort of medium intensity running  anything serious i would look somewhere else

a bit too much weak plastic so the plastic tends to be broken  biggest issue is there is no suppot from nordictrack  they use icon company in their warranty and i emailed to reach out to them  x so far  no response  my treadmill is left broken  one of the screw at the rear that meant to attack the platform to the rear plastic is broken  the screw is screwed in some plastic where the plastic broke off completely  so when i run the plastic vibrate and bang against each other making load noises  i also read from facebook nordictrack page that they barely reply and also no parts to fix  so don t even bother with purchasing warranty  matter of fact  stay away from nordictrack and get a peloton if you like to avoid unsatisfied customer support

the treadmill was relatively easy to assemble  but to my chagrin the unit does not work   all the displays work  set time and date etc   but the belt motor and incline motor do not operate   working with nautilus to try and get something working  they are sending parts as problem is diagnosed   first attempt was to send a third party tech to work on it  but that fell through after two weeks   getting more parts and will replace them myself   it looks good but this problem is really annoying

well the item arrived earlier then expected and i felt this was a positive sign  however assembly was much harder then expected  screws do not line up accurately so i spent half an hour just getting the control mounted  after assembly i proceeded to activate the machine  the instructions for this are not real clear  once activated i found out the machine has a bad mainboard so it doesn t work at all  called the customer service spent half a day troubleshooting and now i m waiting on a new main board  i can only hope this works once installed  the shipping box is gone so shipping it back is not possible   the entire experience frankly has left me with a bad taste for nordic track products  lots of hype and glitz but inferior products  wont make this mistake again  its probably a thousand dollars down the drain

we purchased treadmill  not understanding that a     hp won t handle repeated heavy running sessions  it will only handle light walking and maybe jogging or not depending on how much you weigh  that was not clearly presented in the ad  this was first issue   the two guys that delivered it were very big men and could barely get it upstairs  it was that heavy  we finally got an  assembly  person to come out today  do not go with amazon home services     you need to have two people do the assembly  the guy that was sent out was rude and nasty  snapping at us  could barely stand and his hands shook violently  he got out a razorblade  we don t know why  as he had finished cutting the ties with scissors   and then he cut his finger  there was blood and i went to get a bandaid  and after he lost a screw and could barely screw in the post  i asked him politely to leave  he became argumentative and demanded to know why  i finally had to threaten to call the police  it was a horrible experience and we are returning the item after making numerous attempts to resolve the situation and get two people out here to assembly  which home services does not understand is needed or the item  to safely hold and support while the other person threads and connects    i hope this helps others

this thing was a nightmare to assemble  there simply must be a better way to package this thing  you most definitely need two people  maybe even three  and you have to spend a good bit of time deciphering the instructions   i still don t know what all the numbers are for associated with the parts   go ahead and pay extra for assembly if you can  however  once assembled  it is a decent treadmill and gets the job done  our unit has an inaccurate heart rate sensor  but it is not important for us to have this feature in the treadmill itself  everything else seems to work fine our only  complaint  is that the  up  position for this treadmill leaves it leaning quite a bit on a short hydraulic bar  this is very different from other treadmills we have had that raised up completely and then locked in place  it seems to be steady  but the look of it leaning makes us a little uneasy and worried it might fall  however  there haven t been any functional problems with it and it does let down nice and smoothly about the ifit lock  other reviews are correct  you can hold down the ifit button for thirty seconds to bypass the lock with no problem at all  your treadmill will then start right up  there is no need to sign up for ifit if you don t want that service

i ve been using treadmills for the past    year  this is my  rd one in that time  i was hesitant to purchase this because it was a tad under     dollars and i m used to paying at least a grand  i figured it would be flimsy but i was way wrong  this treadmill so far  after   months  is rock solid  the wife and i have been using it in total for   hours a day   days a week assembly i have to be honest  the assembly was a little bit tough but if you get stuck just walk away for a few minutes and come back with a clear head  some of the bolts and screws were really hard to start off but just take your time  also use some wd    i love that this treadmill uses real bolts for the main connection points  arms attaching to base   my last treadmill used bolts that you needed an allen key to tighten and of course we all know those strip after a while first use of course we all know from previous reviews to bypass ifit hold down the ifit button for    seconds with the safety key plugged in  during the first use i noticed it was really noisy  not clanking but when you walked on the belt it was making a swishing noise  i called nordictrack and after some troubleshooting i found my belt was too tight  you should be able to lift the belt at the center   inches or so  i loosened the belt and the noise definitely got better  the nordictrack person heard the swishing and send me some lube which fixed the problem i was hesitant because it only has a    hp motor but it really is solid  i notice no whining when increasing speed  it takes right off overall i love this treadmill and learned that you don t have to pay over a grand to get a quality treadmill

so far  so good  my husband and i set this up in a little less than an hour  there are a lot of reviews that reference being duped into paying for ifit  but i think they must be doing something wrong  this treadmill came with a card that has a code for a year of free ifit membership  i followed the very clearly laid out instructions and had no problem  i am using the membership now and was not charged  i will be charged for another year once this year is up if i don t cancel in time  cancellation instructions also seem really clear  you just have to read other than that  i really like that you can quickly select a change in speed on the right side of the panel   i was not expecting that to make any difference for me  but i m realizing it s way better than sitting there and holding down a button when going between sprinting and walking   the treadmill is relatively quiet and the display is great   it s a little slow to load when initially turned on and when going between programs  but i have not had any lagging problems in the middle of workouts   so far  no complaints

this is nordictrack product but it s locked by ifit   it s not only very challenging to activate  it s very not user friendly   grandma or grandpa for sure cannot operate   below are issues i had with this product    delivery  amazon took forever to deliver the product   it was delivered    weeks later    the plastic cover with nordictrack logo was cracked    installation      metal screw that holds the handle bar does not fit   supposed to be    metal screw instead   i had to buy    screw from home depot to get the job done   and      inch length is not okay      inch is correct spec    activation  unless you login and activate through ifit  it will not start   not sure why nordictrack did this   this is very bad user experience   certainly a big pain in the butt   and it s not straight forward either       usage  after activation treadmill started but when you  stop  you can t  start  unless it s turn off   very annoying   i suspect it has something to do with ifit activation synchronization    in summary   not sure why i can t plug in and enjoy my treadmill after long tedious installation without going through ifit activation   for sure it wasn t my best amazon delivery experience    i will not recommend this product due to many installation and activation related issues

i love my nordictrack treadmill  it s perfect for what i need and i love the ifit subscription too  since not going to the gym  investing in my own home equipment was the best thing i could ve done for myself  so far this treadmill has worked really well with no problems and i did purchase the extended warranty through nordictrack if any unforeseen issues come up in the future

i tried the free    day trial for ifit out of curiosity and have fully bought into the program  there s more than just running or walking in the app    also strength training  hiit and yoga pilates  the treadmill was easy to assemble by the instructions  i only needed help holding it up for me to put the storage bar in  as expected in the instructions and the other reviews   very smooth motors for incline and speed progression  great machine  delivery was via a box truck and he helped push it into the house even though he couldn t enter due to covid  when i called to confirm delivery dates they even gave me the option to move my delivery date up which i jumped on  great money saver in this unit if you already have a tablet to run ifit on if you re going to use that feature

i hate exercise with a white hot passion  but i m ok with walking  i got this treadmill because i wasn t getting in enough steps since covid hit as i ve been teleworking  i did my research and this one fit my budget  and independent reviews were good the instructions said it would take two people about two hours to set it up  this is accurate initial operation was easy  i just logged into the website  entered the particulars and off i went my ipad easily connected via bluetooth  so i ve been using the ifit program  i m not a fan of listening to a trainer yelling at me so i go along on the walks and listen to music or podcasts  the progressively more difficult programs work very well i have a small house  and while the treadmill isn t small  it fit into a small room  folding it up us easy although rarely necessary the varying incline adds a nice dimension to my workouts  if the walk is flat  sometimes i ll increase the incline to make the workout more effective  similarly  if the walk is too slow i can increase the speed this is very good for people who are out of shape who want to do something about it  i ve only missed a couple days since i received it in early january  and unlike most workouts  i m sticking with it a friend ordered one on my recommendation so i have a sort of virtual  work out buddy   and we recommend workouts to each other   it s surfy  relatively quiet  and i haven t had any problems with it thus far my only issue isn t the treadmill  but the delivery  i paid a bit extra for delivery  to a room    it was left on a pallet in my garage  which isn t  a room    it weighs     pounds  so it isn t like you can just haul it into the house  make sure you have someone who can help you get it where you want it

this treadmill is an absolute steal under  k  the quality is far superior than what i was expecting  the only word of warning is when i received it a month ago i put it together by myself  i would not recommend that  make sure you have someone helping you assemble the treadmill  there are some steps where an extra person really helps out  anyways now that it is assembled i use it to walk run use the ifit interactive workouts are awesome too  the membership is optional but really makes you feel like you have a trainer working with you  since i have started noticing myself get in shape i really could not be doing it without such a quality treadmill  at the price they have it at now it is an absolute steal  period

dislikes  too many little screws during assembly  auto makers learned the lesson of build it in  don t tack it on years ago  the instructions tell you to run the wire for the screen through the bottom  wrong  the hole the wire is secured to with a screw about   inches from the bottom of the inside upright during shipping is the hole for the wiring  during operation the undercarriage squeaks alot  like an old car needing a lube job  there were two plastic covers for the bottom of the uprights that had holes predrilled for screws  but didn t come with any  they just rest on top of the inside uprights loosely likes  the motor is fairly quiet  i m glad i got the bigger belt size  both length and width  it helps keep you centered should you misstep  the software did require a credit card to use  supposedly if you cancel before renewal you get a credit  i wasn t able to find a training video that went more than about    minutes max  playing the same route over and over until you reach your time limit is not optimal and would require you to restart which means stopping in the middle of your workout  being able to que a couple videos to start when one ends would be better  why not provide an hdmi output so people can connect to their tv s    that dinky little screen is for the birds  i only used the machine for about   weeks till the good weather broke and the covid outbreak had leveled off  but will use it on rainy days and when the cold weather comes again so i can t speak to longevity or durability but i did purchase the   year extended warranty just in case  overall initial quality feels good

unbelievable   it worked great for   weeks and dies   triggered circuit breaker and now won t turn on   called local equipment repair person and he laughed when i said it was nordictrack    they keep me in business   he said i might consider updating this review but for now  stay away   it s fantastic while it works   too bad it last    days

we bought this recently and spent a lot of time looking for the right one  my wife and i are used to the quality treadmills at the gym  but covid is a mean mean thing  since gyms are off limits we bought this with hesitation as we re not sure it could hold up to running or that it would t few sturdy  after a solid week of use  i can tell you i do not regret the purchase one bit  it is solid  it is sturdy  it has everything we need and feels almost as good as the gym  we now have   of us using it daily and it holds up well  i had no intention of using ifit as that seems like garbage to me  just hold the ifit button for    seconds and you never have to register nor think of it again  highly recommend

i was super excited but had the worst experience ever  it was delivered broken parts and missing nuts  just the bolts were present on one side   which shows their low qc  i called them which promptly shipped those but asked me not to use this expensive piece of equipment  so there went another week  when i finally received the parts  i noticed the nuts were old  still tried to make it work but turns out  to put these missing nuts in place i need access to the bolts  to access the bolts i need to pop the top open which voids warranty    so spoke with amazon and tried to return it but even that is huge hassle  it s just unbearable with such a big equipment like that so now back to trying to get nordictrack to fix this thing  most expensive headache i ever had

as many people have been doing  my wife and decided to cancel our gym memberships and invest in our own workout equipment  this nordictrack has proven to be worth the investment  we both feel much more motivated to go for a walk or run knowing we can go downstairs and hop on the treadmill  it is easy to use and many different pre set workouts  it was easy to put together  definitely requires two people  and easy to fold up if required  if you re looking to cancel your gym memberships and workout at home  this is a great product for you

had the product   weeks  and it died         screen reflects everything fine but the treadmill doesn t move   after talking with the nordic track help desk  took   hours to get to a live person  chat was just as bad   they quickly identified that the motor control board fried due to an update they sent out   it doesn t happen on all treadmills but it s a known issue thats been around for months  they were debating on issuing a recall    it sounds like my  new  treadmill tried to apply the update and it fried the control board       weeks for a replacement part to be sent out  backordered  update after    weeks  the replacement motor control board arrived and it was doa   the vendor is clueless and there warranty is useless   additionally  the   year extended warranty was useless because  the fine print  indicates that they don t cover any defects that the manufacturer should cover     nordic track customer service  phone or chat  is under staffed  to give you an idea of how under staffed they are  their online chat service has a    hour and    minute wait   i could understand the issue if this was month   of covid  however  this is an online service and this is not month   of covid   nordic track just doesn t care about the customer after the purchase  buyer beware  buyer beware   nordictrack is selling products with known defects

assembly was annoying but not terrible   the engineering design and manufacturing of the treadmill is poor at best after assembly we attempted to log onto the ifit website to register and unlock the treadmill   the web page keeps reverting back to canada while we live in the us so we were unable to register   was not using a vpn   if this happens to you  hold down the ifit sync button for about    seconds and the machine will enable   once the machine was on we started the motor and   nothing   i could hear the motor running but the belt was not moving   pulled the front cover off  your toes point to it while running  by removing   small screws to access the motor and discovered that the belt was not tensioned properly as seen in the pic   also  and more importantly  the motor sits at about a      degree angle to the tread belt arbor  pic      this will cause the belt to prematurely wear and potentially create thrust against the bearings causing them to fail   the bracket that holds the motor to the frame is welded so there is no way to rotate the motor around the z axis on the x plane this machine seems to be designed with planned engineered obsolescence to ensure that it fails at a expedited rate

i decided to wait a few months to write a review  i ve had this treadmill for about   months now and i feel i can give an adequate review  for quick review  go to bottom  the treadmill itself is nice  however  it has a weird feeling under foot that i have never experienced on commercial treadmills before  almost as if you can feel the belt rubbing against the surface of the machine as you put pressure from your feet down  annoying  yes  does it affect the workout  not really  just a minor agitation in sound and in the feeling for the first few rounds  going under     speed makes it almost unbearable though  running on it is nice  it has a nice bounce so i don t feel like my knees are dying quite as badly the biggest frustration is the ifit program  i find ifit to be the most annoying app to work with  i like treadmills to have the pre programmed training exercises so that i can do a good incline workout without having to figure out the incline myself  ifit only offers fitness trainers directing your workout which also triggers the speed  i am okay with a random unknown incline  i am not okay with watching tv and all of the sudden my treadmill is pushing  mph when i was hoping for a brisk walk overall   the treadmill isn t bad  but the program in it is  so  unless you want to be bound to either always manually adjusting speed and inclines or having a trainer have full control of what you re doing   i d go with something different  i do warn that i ve noticed a lot of treadmills have the ifit program so i d check that first simplified version pros  treadmill is sturdy touch screen is well lit and has good response incline and speed very easy to usecons  belt feels like its dragging   especially under     speeds ifit is awful the manual option is very limited no pre programmed workouts that don t involve an annoying traineroverall  i think the price is way too much for how strict it is with the ifit program and google maps is pretty lacking  a regular treadmill could get the job done a lot better and would probably cost around

i purchased this treadmill for home use  i m not a super avid runner  and i only usually go as fast as      but this treadmill does go up to    for both incline and speed  i was worried at first that the belt was a little narrow  but after running several times on it i have had no problems  the buttons are responsive and the belt speed is accurate  the heart monitor  as they usually are  does not appear to be super accurate  but i don t rely on the built in one on the treadmill anyway  it does also come with built in workouts  which i haven t yet explored as i mostly use this for running and rucking  when you purchase this  it does try to make you feel like you have to sign up for the ifit trial   you do not have to do that  if you simply hold the down the ifit button on the console  it will let you bypass that  finally  this treadmill is a beast to put together  the housings for the bolts are not great  and often you have to torque the bolts pretty hard to get them in  it took my husband and i about three hours to fully assemble  i would recommend having a marriage counsellor on call if you want to make it through the assembly phase still happily married  seriously  it was incredibly difficult  and the treadmill is remarkably heavy to boot  however  i still rate this little beauty five stars  because the performance of the machine has been stellar   i would highly recommend

i ve upped my stars from   to   now that i ve used it a few times  it works well with just a few caveats  i had to adjust the belt again on my first usage which i did and it now seems to track pretty good  note that the adjustment turn is the opposite of what is described in the manual   the only other issue is the built in heart beat monitor  its sketchy at best but i m comparing it to the       cardiac unit i had been using  i will investigate the chest monitor from nordic track to see if it might be more accurate  lastly  the incline does not retract when its stopped so if you don t want to damage the unit when its lifted out of the way  one needs to remember to set the incline to

as mentioned in a review earlier  you do not need to sign up for ifit  just hold down the ifit sync button for    seconds and it works fine it was easy to put together with   people  i should have read the instructions instead of my husband because we made it all the way to the end and realized we never put the protective covers on the front legs    whatever not the end of the world works great  i purchased a mat to go under the treadmill however if you are planning to use it at full incline the mat scrunch up under it  so we may take it out from under the treadmill all in all i m extremely happy with my purchase

got it today and i am in love  exactly what i was looking for  it s sturdy  the incline is great and the speed  it s pretty quite and comfortable walking on it  it does cushion nicely on walking and running  this treadmill is close to what you will find in a gym  believe it or not but my    year old son put it all together    took about   hrs so plan for some time  thanks to another reviewer on here  you can use the treadmill without subscribing to ifit  the package and the stickers said the treadmill is locked and you need to register and subscribe but that s not true  i turned it on and held the ifit button down for over    sec  and it worked  now all i do is turn the switch on and start my work out  i would say the only negative item so far is that the on off button is so far down  but that s really all i can complain about it  delivery was fast and it came in one piece and not damaged  since it is quite heavy  if you don t have muscle and a heavy duty cart you might want to opt for indoor delivery

i despised  trying to register to no avail    internet site extremely complicated with a  trap  to keep you signed up for over      a year even with   year free trial   mega page of legalese  fine print     impossible to comprehend   see above   get professional set up   took over    hours  huge boxes  to get rid of   several bolts and screws left over after construction    because of extreme signup and registration complications   phone calls end in dead end   can t talk to any one  because  i m not registered            hello     requires a smart phone  in the process   i have a flip flop    extreme frustration with nordic track and all concerned     don t  buy   see all above   no real contact by phone or internet     extreme sorry i bought it rather than another brand    come and get it get professional

i ve had the nordic track for   months and i tried to plug my tablet into the machine and all of a sudden it went dark and it won t power on  well i ve called nordic track a few times and it s been an awful experience  the first person i talked to was quite nasty and i couldn t believe the things she was telling me over the phone  she asked me if i heard about the  maskless protesters  in my state and called them a bunch of  karens   i honestly didn t even know what to say back to her  but the good news is she did her job and mailed the part to me that i needed and gave me the number to the technician who was supposed to install it  the only problem is i cannot reach the technician  i have been trying to get ahold of the technician for over   weeks now with no success  i ve literally called him at least    times   so i have called nordic track back twice to ask them to reach out to the technician for me and they write in their notes that they will reach out but it s becoming pretty clear that i m going to have to try and figure out how to install the lcd screen myself  the machine comes with   year warranty on labor and   year warranty on parts so to be clear  the parts warranty was honored but not the labor  it doesn t surprise me that the product failed seeing as how nordic track has weird people working for their company

putting the treadmill together was difficult due to several screw holes not compatible   after fully assembling and inspecting the treadmill  we found that there were two large cracks   one on teh back of the display assembly and one at the bottom left rear  foot    we do not want to try to disassemble and return the beast but we are extremely disappointed to spend this much money to have a broken piece of machinery  and we hope the broken foot doesn t impact safety or stability    the treadmill works well and we are happy with it s function  but having it cracked is not acceptable

i am extremely satisfied and proud of my decision to go ahead with the purchase of this treadmill  it s been close to   months since we bought this and my teenage kids are addicted to it and haven t missed a day running on the treadmill  they are glued to the challenging programs that i fit programs provide and in due course have become good long distance runners  it s just a perfect treadmill with a boatload of capabilities that can be tweaked for seniors  young adults  and teenage kids  i just love the engineering behind it and it doesn t make a squeak even when a heavy weight like me runs on it the assembling took a little effort and once done it was worth it  i would recommend this treadmill to anyone who is planning to have themselves or their kids have a good workout routine or start on a good habit of incorporating work out in to their daily life and i promise this wont disappoint you as it has done wonders to my family

i had difficulties with assembling treadmill in couple of areas    with the ground wire having self drilling screw   the given screw was not a right fit for the hole in treadmill  i had to struggle a lot to identify the correct one    with the hydrallic bars   the bar had a small plastic to hold the lever inside the bar but the lever came out as soon as the plastic holder was taken off which made the alignment fall off and complicated the fixtures as for as the treadmill is concerned  the product is good and sturdy   i have had few walk jog in the last few days and all the time it was perfect  pretty good product  overall its good but little bit of difficulty with the assembly

i love my nordictrack treadmill  i was very sceptical and searched all around the web to find a really good machine that would fit my budget after searching for quite some time i came across my new nordictrack treadmill and read nothing but great things about it first and foremost the money is worth it  of you go for anything less than      to      on a treadmill  most likely you are going to get a cheap device that will work for you but won t last  my nordictrack t series     has sensors for you to place your hands and see your heart rate like you do at the gym  the same is pretty neat  it is as if i was at the gym  not to mention i was concerned about the weight limit capacity and it is able to withstand up to     lbs  the width of the belt is wide enough for running  something you can t do on other treadmills that are around the      range  another thing i love is being able to fold the treadmill by raising the belt mechanism  i also have the option of connecting using a     mm jack any decive to play music to the integrated speakers the treadmill has  another thing to love is the two empty sections it has that will allow you to place your bottle of water or thermo  it s just great i wish it was able to connect the speakers via bluetooth  but things like that cost more money   i just needed a machine that would allow me to work out and get into the shape a need to stay healthy  this nordictrack t     does exactly that  i have presets for workouts and if you are willing to pay extra for a personal coach the treadmill has the capability to connect to your account and get ifit  there is a membership involved and i read you get great workouts by subscribing  at this point i won t do this but maybe in the future i will  i am happy with my treadmill  if i had to plan on buying a treadmill again i would definitely go with nordictrack without any regrets thank you nordictrack  i hope you guys keep up the good work with your equipment

i didn t know that you could bypass registering the treadmill for        a month and even though i was incredibly frustrated   it took me   weeks to put it together all by myself and there was no way i was sending it back  if you don t register it will literally beep at you basically torturing you until you sign up  i have yet to try the bypass or cancelling my membership but i do feel incredibly frustrated with how nordictrack is marketing this product and forcing people to sign up  for a membership  also  don t be further scammed and make sure that if you purchase you only pay the      because they like to raise the price to over        in high demand  i had to order twice and they cancelled my first order in order to sell it to someone else for a higher price speaking to the actual treadmill  i think that it works very well and the shock absorption makes the running experience a lot smoother than the nordictrack that i got    years ago  i really enjoyed it once i got running on it but due to the bad business practices ad blatant deception  i cannot recommend that you get this product from this site

we have had this treadmill a week now  i have done two ifit classes every night and have been so much more motivated to use my treadmill   this treadmill lowers and lofts very easy  the treadmill itself is very heavy when it is delivered  the treadmill is made of very durable material and is a great value if you don t care for all the tablet stuff they try selling you on these days  this one does have a spot you can place a tablet if you wish that being said   on another note don t expect amazon to follow their own delivery instructions  our delivery was supposed to be delivered inside and they blocked our garage trapping me inside all day until my husband was home  amazon basically stated they can t control what their own drivers do

i got the    s with the   in display  in my initial research  i was very skeptical about getting a  smart  treadmill  i thought that all i need was just a mechanically sound machine and the ifit  or any other digital connectivity  online classes  doesn t worth the cost  after using the guided run workout sessions with ifit i m left very impressed  and i totally understand now the benefits of really large displays  like a   in screen on peloton thread    that immersive experience makes all the difference few small comments   bluetooth speakers work great  with plenty of sound volume   built in fan has good airflow   it doesn t look like it will be easy to disassemble the rails control panel from the thread part in case you decide to move your treadmill from one floor to another  there is a cable that runs from the control panel to the motor and once you connect it during assembly  it s in it for good

i bought this for my wife to use but i will be using it also   the bottom line is  i was impressed with this treadmill it arrived on time and was moved in the house  this is a heavy unit around     lbs so if you are going to use it in a upstairs room i would pay the extra charge to have it delivered to a specific room  if the engineering on the treadmill is as good and the engineering  they used for the packaging it is going to be a great machine the assembly is straight forward and very simple  i started in the afternoon and finished it the next day but it could be done in   hrs or less  all the parts are labeled right of left and the hardware is plastic sealed on a card with each item labeled and and what step on the instructions to use them  the instructions call for a crescent wrench but it is better to use a     inch ratchet wrench  i m not sure it is a      or       but is give you more room to work to tighten the nuts this came with one year of ifit and you can add   other persons to the account  it is a nice add on to use trainers and different location to run of hike  when the free time is up i will be extending the account we have been using the treadmill for   weeks and the only thing that seems to be a negative it the touch screen unit is slow to boot up i don t see how you could go wrong buying this treadmill   good value for the price

so far  this treadmill hasn t lived up to expectations  upon opening the box  i discovered it was missing parts  the packaging is a cardboard sheet  heat sealed  so this is an issue from the manufacturer  once i finally received the parts from the company  i realized how difficult of an assembly it truly is  don t try to assemble this by yourself  after i finally got the treadmill assembled  it was a hassle just getting the basic  manual  mode on  because nothing works until you set up the  ifit  program  and finally  after all that  the treadmill is up and running  but it wobbles  because one side of the unit has a rubber block on the bottom and one doesn t   not part of the assembly  from the manufacturer   does it belong there or not  still waiting on a response from the company  overall  not a good experience  i could ve gotten a lemon  but i will be very hesitant to buy a nordictrack again

have had treadmill for over a month so far and can t complain  it does what a treadmill should do  speed goes plenty fast for my household and incline goes high enough to get a strong burn going  of course  they don t tell you in the manual that you don t have to sign up for ifit  but it can be bypassed by holding the ifit button for    seconds  all stickers and indicators say you have to sign up to active the treadmill  and if it s something you d like to try go for it  however  don t think you have to sign up to use the treadmill  the only negative i ve had so far is that every know and then it trips by arc flash breaker  i ve noticed that it usually does it if a person is standing on the belt when trying to start  if standing to the side until moving it doesn t seem to happen

this is a great home treadmill   it took me about an hour to assemble   instructions are straight forward  you will need someone to assist when installing the locking bar  speakers are adequate  you will need an aux cord  you will find that there is a lot of literature indicating the treadmill is locked until the ifit app is activated  fear not  after you assemble it  just press the ifit button for about    seconds

i love this treadmill   it is very comfortable to walk on because it has shock absorbers   i paid amazon to put it together  for        it was well worth it  i know that it has been adjusted properly and ready to go   very great treadmill for the money

ordered the     after trying a less expensive treadmill from xterra  this is definitely worth the money if you are looking to make an investment in your health  it s first of all a great treadmill  the shock absorbers work well and it s great to be able to fold up if necessary  the     chp motor makes for a smooth run  the     incline adds a serious challenge  the ifit subscription is quite fun so far  though it remains to be seen if we will resubscribe after the free year  the fact that it can control the speed and incline is honestly really cool  i recommend the     esp because the slight increase in price over the     is worth it for the larger motor  five stars
