my old treadmill go sick in the pandemic   probably wasn t covid but it was probably old age   i saw the nordictrack t series treadmill on amazon and it seemed to fit my  simple needs    package arrived damaged but the treadmill largely survived   i had some broken plastic pieces  console tray  but after minor rigamarole nordictrac  sent me replacement parts and the installation went relatively smoothly   for some reason one of the bolts for the arm was too short but i got another from home depot that sufficed   instructions were straightforward   my wife helped when i needed four hands and everything worked when we fired it up   i have used it for several weeks and have had no problems   it is a little noisy at low speed but not so much that it is a bother   folds up well and is just right for my basement room   the delivery manipulated it down smoothy and efficiently   i bought the third party  uts  maintenance service for three years   nordictrac offers their own and i am still debating whether that might be worthwhile   does anybody have any input    all in all i am satisfied and enjoying     the treadmill   i am no longer an athlete and just want to have a nice workout and i think this will do the trick

of   screws for the cross bar do not fit making the treadmill un usable   see photos   even with the cross bar removed  these   screws do not fit   it really would be easy for nordictrack to figure out standard bolts or screws for the entire machine rather than unique screws and bolts for each section   be ready to find alternative screws that fit for the cross bar regarding the instructions  it is passable but nordictrack should hire a person from lego or even ikea that knows how to write instructions very disappointing

this treadmill is professional quality but extremely heavy and difficult to maneuver  thank heavens i had the prudence of paying extra     for delivery to a room of choice  i ended up giving the delivery guys another     as a tip   and it was completely worth it  my husbsnd is extremely handy with tools  it still took him a solid   hours to assemble it  we did it over multiple days  the manual booklet is     pages long  i advise watching instructional videos in you tube  lastly the trick to bypass ifit as advised by several users came handy  put the emergency stop key in place and keep holding the ifit logo   it will work  it is a really good treadmill hopefully the effort we put in will be worth it

i ordered this treadmill after the one i had for years broke   it arrived and i had no difficulty assembling it the same day  possibly because of covid  delivery was to the door or garage  so it took two of us to get it to the den  i used it once before i myself came down with covid and ended up in the hospital for    days   when i came out i didn t have strength or lung capacity to walk down the hall   after a couple of weeks back at home  i start using this treadmill for recovery   i started out slow  no incline for    minutes and increased   minute per day until i got to    minutes at the same time gradually increasing my max speed and incline   i have now used it for    days in a row the treadmill comes with a year family membership to ifit   both my daughters and i have started using it and love it   this treadmill has a large screen and doing an ifit walking program lets you follow the trainer and see all the scenery  currently working a costa rica walking on program    the program includes beach walks and mountain hikes   the treadmill automatically adjusts speed and incline as the program starts climbing hills mountains  max incline of    is higher than i want to go  but i ve done it on this treadmill as part of the costa rica program  i have not fully recovered and because of lung scaring i may never get back to where i was pre covid  but this treadmill is helping me get there faster than i expected

purchased this treadmill a few months ago on amazon  arrived within the expected time frame and wasn t damaged  we decided on a lighter treadmill since we would be placing it in an upstairs bonus room  glad we did after we got it upstairs  assembly was easy  only needed an extra hand for a couple steps  had no issues with the instructions  treadmill started out working great  after about a week  we had some issues  the incline no longer worked and the unit would just stop running after approximately one quarter mile   i reached out to amazon for assistance and was only told it could be replaced after i disassembled  repackaged  re palletized  and shipped the old unit back  at least they offered to replace but this was out of the question  so i reached out to the manufacturer  i used the on line  chat option  was able to identify the issue and a replacement part was immediately shipped out to me  i replaced  i offered to replace the part  wasn t asked  the part and the treadmill works great  typically i would be upset  but after receiving such  prompt service as i did from the manufacturer with the issue  any purchase you make may have issues  but not every provider will stand behind their product  nt did and they ve earned my future business

i received the treadmill with   broken parts and after a quick phone call to nordictrack  they quickly sent me the new parts  the parts took   days  business days  to arrive and the assembly began  the hardest part for me was getting my daughter to hold the rails correctly so i could put the   bolts into them  it was the hardest part due to her not wanting to put her cell phone down and pay attention to what she was doing  lol  it took me about   hours to assemble  but that included replacing a broken foot rail and several trips to the basement for more tools  overall we are very happy with the product and bypassed the ifit registration by pressing the ifit button for a few seconds and it turns on  just remember to put the  safety key  on the machine first  we forgot that part and it took a few tries to bypass it  until we had the  ah haa  moment and put the key on the treadmill  it then quickly turned on   i m very happy with the treadmill  i was going to buy a much cheaper one  but i am very happy and pleased that i decided to buy a brand that i ve heard of and one that offers more features

this was very easy to assemble   instructions were straight forward   it folds very easy and fits well to take up as little space as possible   it s still a good size for running with lenght and width   if you re a hardcore runner running at  mph for    minutes or longer might want the next level up  but for any average running pace with sprints and walking intervals it s perfect  has a nice incline  but might not be as steep as some people want  but when you can t run outside or are short on time this is a great treadmill to cover you  controls are easy to use and see while running down side is it s a little loud like most treadmills and there isn t anything to really see on the small display screen  it ll show calorie counts and laps but isn t that accurate as you can t put in your weight   but for just a nice work out it works out well

when the gym that i had been going for over    years closed due to covid    pandemic i did not know what i was going to do to continue exercising  a month went by and one day my friend said why don t you buy a treadmill  i thought about it and by the next day i had ordered a nordictrack treadmill   i received it within a week   my son assembled it  the same day it was delivered  i did my first workout that day  for two hours  and since then  i use the treadmill six days a week   the machine is very sturdy with a high end motor very similar to a treadmill at the gym  this machine though has added features such as a screen to watch the ifit videos  a built in fan  an extra long wide deck to put weights  bottles of water  towel  cell phone  ipad  etc  it also has a bluetooth feature to listen to music or plug in a device  it starts right away  the speed picks up very quick  incline and decline work excellent  the noise level is very low  i alternate workouts between manual and the ifit videos  the machine is very strong and i feel really safe whether i m running  inclining  jogging  or simply walking  it keeps track of my workouts and this helps to see my progress  purchasing a nordictrack treadmill is one of the best decisions i have made

i just received and had my machine installed yesterday  haven t quite used it but can t wait to  when i tried it  it s everything i was hoping for  again  i haven t fully used it so nothing has gone wrong  one thing i will point out is that it s noisy  you will hear it from one room to another to another  unless you have a huge home  i am going to say thiat if you have it in the home  and you try to workout in the morning  whomever is sleeping will definately hear it other than that  so far so good

i left a four for ease of assembly but to be clear  we had the expert installation done  it won t let me not select a rating first time treadmill owner and not much of a gym runner before this  so i don t have a ton to compare it to  it s easy to fold up if need be  and seems nice and padded when running  the ifit workouts are a nice distraction from the pain of running although i m not sure if we ll be renewing when it s time to pay my annoyances with this product are   no way to export treadmill audio to headphones  this was confirmed by a nordictrack live chat  yes  of course running on a treadmill is noisy in and of itself but it would be great to have the ifit audio in my ears   both so i can hear it better and so i m making less racket  short of loading the same workout on your phone and trying to play it at the same time  i don t have another solution  the sound is decent coming out of the treadmill but it s hard to not constantly fiddle with the volume if you re doing intervals  there s bluetooth connectivity  but only for streaming audio from that device through the treadmill  there s an aux jack  but again it s for playing your device s music through the treadmill which again seems really stupid  i m going to go ahead and say my headphones are better quality than these treadmill speakers   i don t know how to touch the speed incline buttons or anything on that horizontal bar without getting shocked  and it sucks lol  doesn t matter if i deaden myself on something else first all told  this definitely meets our needs and we re satisfied with the product  the headphone issue is a big disappointment though and given the fact this advertises bluetooth connectivity and an aux jack  i never would have guessed i couldn t use headphones

this is a very nice machine  however  it s huge  it s definitely a size you would expect to see in a gym   i wanted a mid range treadmill that would have a good width and good weight limit   this definitely meets those expectations  but you need to have a big spot for it in your house   it s too big for a small bedroom or small office   it won t be inconspicuous in a living area  that being said  it s a good  sturdy machine with lots of features also  bonus info       you do not have to sign up for the fit app program they claim you need in order to activate   just hold the fit button that is right on the front of the machine face for    seconds and it will bypass the need to register and join   apparently this is a membership  but it s not necessary to run this treadmill

i opened the box and could hear flying insects buzzing  trying to escape the plastic wrapper around the treadmill  i few began to escape and i had to step on them  it freaked my wife out  i closed it back up and contacted amazon  ordered a new one  the sad bad thing is that i was told that since it was a friday  the truck would not be able to pick up the bug infested treadmill until the following monday  that was a nightmare  the package is extremely heavy and i could not move it alone  a package full of insects had to lay in my garage for days before it could be retrieved  bad  finally  the package was picked up  a new treadmill was dropped off  and now it works great  we love it just wish we had not been subjected to a possible infestation or unknown origin the amazon associate who i spoke with to organize the return was very professional and helpful

you will need to put in your patience pants to assemble  it s not hard  just need to pay attention and take your time  the directions are good and the nuts   bolts package are labeled by steps to make it super easy  i was very happy to figure out how to bypass the ifit sign up  activate  the treadmill comes with a big red sticker that says you won t be able to unlock the treadmill w out registering the treadmill   bs   that s so misleading and not necessary  to get around it all you need to do is put the key in place hold down the ifit bluetooth symbol for    seconds or so and it gets rid of the locked screen and you are ready to go  it s really very sneaky of nordic track  not everyone had      or more when they ve bought the product  you should be able to choose if you d like to sign up for ifit workouts or go on your own  i didn t rate the treadmill too high bc i want to try it for week or so  i did start it up and walked for a bit and it seemed good  overall i say it was easy to assemble   i did it alone    it s priced great   it looks nice and i like that the bed fold up for easy storage and the wheels at the end make it super easy to move around

even though the screen says  your treadmill won t activate until you register at ifit com   this is not true  make sure the red stop key is on  then press the ifit button on the screen and hold down for       seconds  until the screen unlocks  just assembled mine  some screws wouldn t screw all the way  but i am too tired now  will try again later  first impression  looks very sturdy and well made

i have a small ish apartment but i wanted a treadmill i could use to make cardio a bit more manageable instead of spending a huge chunk of time at the gym  it s sturdy and a decent size but not obtrusive  my boyfriend put it together in about    minutes  i did have to help a bit to hold up the top part  you can get around registering it on ifit  it goes to an incline of    and both the incline and speed increase smoothly  my only complaint about this product is the stopping function  there is no cool down button which is totally fine but the other problem is that when you push stop  it just stops  so do not stop when you are going fast and i can imagine if you accidentally pulled off the emergency shutdown button  you d literally faceplant into the console or fly backwards

we embarked on purchasing a treadmill to keep relatively in shape during this time of covid   i was honestly skeptical of having such a large heavy item shipped and assembling it   it arrived right on time and the amazon delivery guys placed it exactly where needed   be careful  it is heavy  so assemble with care   it went together easily and i took their advice of plugging it into a surge protector since it is an expensive purchase   i enjoy how smooth it works  both the belt motor and the incline motor   the controls are intuitive and you can use this with or without the nordic track app   we use it almost daily and am glad we purchased it

we d been searching for an affordable treadmill since the pandemic began  but things continued to be pretty much sold out everywhere  so happy we were able to finally land this one  assembly is very tricky  not gonna lie   it took my fianc  and i about   days to get it up and running  it comes in a very large  very heavy box  but the delivery guys were great  they were on time and brought the box inside for us  i like to do inclines and was skeptical about what this machine could handle  but let me tell you   i get just as good or better of a workout on this treadmill than i did on the machines at our local gym  thank you to all the reviewers who posted the cheat code on bypassing the ifit activation  once we got it assembled  we held the ifit button down for about    seconds and everything was good to go  highly recommend

this review is not about working out with the machine  i bought this product with the professional installer option in late december  the installer came around the second week of january  put it together and the belt came off and broke two days later  i found a bunch of bolts and pieces that the installer just flat out didn t use  i called to get replacement part  that took two weeks to get here  the technician was supposed to call after the part came but did not  i called to get in touch with technician and was just told its going to be three weeks until they can come out  at that point i will have paid for this product two months prior and been able to use it once before it broke

i have gone to the gym for the last six years and was use to the commercial grades there  covid    came around  and i stopped going to the gym for safety concerns  overall  really like this treadmill and the quality  with the ifit compatibility i didn t feel like i lost anything from leaving the gym  i did    miles on it in    days  and feel that it will last  i hadn t used the ifit before and like it i am          when i got this and feel it is sturdy and will hold up  the speakers are not the best  but i normally run with headphones anyways  i have used my aftershokz  the adjustment on incline going up is the loudest part  doesn t cause a problem for me  the emergency cord is a good length  but doesn t stay well on my workout shirts  again not the end of the world  i would recommend taking the emergency stop off when done  otherwise the screen will stay lit up you do not need to do the ifit  but i like it and will keep it as it reminds me of classes at the gym  i also like the scenic walking hiking paths  to bypass ifit just hold the button down for until it turns green  and you are in manual mode intervals can be done by the whole number and the plus or minus signs  or by hitting the numbers quickly  ie     by hitting   than   quickly i do not feel that it is noisy  nor does my roommate  single floor house  tile throughout and he is down the hallway and doesn t hear me running awake or when he is asleep  very light sleeper  if his door is shut  he can hear my tv for reference you will need two people to help you assemble  do not tighten too much when putting the console on  wait until its all together than tighten  either wise you will have trouble with it pulling to one side or the other and folding will be problematic the feet are able to be adjusted  which is great because floors are rarely even  do a couple of test miles to see if you have this right

nordictrack t   s  treadmill did not work  icon fitness charged me         for work covered by both factory warranty and extended warranty   i called icon fitness for technical assistance and ms  brittney baker insisted that no on site technical assistance would be forth coming unless  i provided my credit card number   the treadmill was delivered on january          and was finally repaired on april            the extended warranty cost        and that should have covered necessary replacement of the  pulse bar

like many reviews  the screw holes were not properly drilled  cross threading is easy to do with some holes  i do suggest paying a little extra to have the treadmill placed in the location you want it  it s very heavy  as far as the performance  i have been using it every day since i bought it  i did subscribe to ifit  and i am enjoying it so far  i like the various workouts they have available  i think this was a smart purchase since i don t feel comfortable going to the gym at this time  i would recommend the product  hopefully i will have it around for awhile

first of all  the delivery guys were great   initially they were going to leave on the porch but i asked them to put in my garage   on the second floor   took a bit of persuasion but i would not have been able to move it up there myself so grateful for the assist   the box was beat up and had visible holes and tears   however  the packaging on the inside was really amazing   no damage at all to the treadmill   i did have several problems assembling   my lack of paying attention to the ground wire when i put the wire harness on caused the first issue   if you don t keep the ground wire on the outside of the hole  you will find out how sharp the holes are in the metal   it took me a good    minutes to fish out the wire and i also cut my fingers up pretty good   i did ultimately get the ground wire out and connected   however  the screw hole wasn t tapped completely so i had a hard time getting it tight enough to actually function as a grounding wire   i also had a lot of trouble getting the front bar to align properly   the left side was simple but the right side was difficult   the tab on the upper side did not fit neatly into the lower part   i was concerned that it would break if i put too much pressure on it so i went very slowly and worked the piece from the far left across and finally got it to go into place   the belt was misaligned out of the box but the website has clear instructions on how to adjust   i have used every day since i purchased and am very happy with the product itself   i read the reviews about problems with ifit   since i am just using it for walking i don t need the subscription   i  cancelled on line probably on the third day   no issues and very simple for me to cancel   i wouldn t let that stop you from purchasing and i thought a few of the programs would have worked well for me    years ago   just not my thing

this saved my sanity during covid      the world stopped in march when gyms were closed and for a mama of   young kids  i don t have the time to schedule baby sitters to run and workout outside  i am also one that likes to workout in peace with no kids and i like to be distracted while running  so this treadmill is perfect and checks all my boxes for that  you can choose between hundreds of different kinds of workouts  beginner level all the way to advanced   i love the warm up and cool down features  i just got this treadmill at the first of august so i haven t had it long enough to give a thorough review  but so far i love it and it gets me excited to run every morning by choosing a different workout each day pros perfect size for a in home treadmill and folds up nice to save space  we have it in our bedroom and it doesn t bother me too badhas   nice sized cup holdersspeakers are loud and you can adjust the sound of the music  trainer and background noise    s of different workouts to choose fromi love that the trainers adjust the incline automatically so you get a better workoutconsno fans   i read reviews before buying and some were saying it had fans  this model does not if you want the feature with the fans with a little better motor spend the extra    and get the     s model with the      or     screen motor is a little louder than i thought it would be for the price  but not worth dropping stars overtouch screen is sometimes hard to use  the features just need to be updated a bit for a more modern better experience to find workouts  fitness level

i am addicted  i love the bluetooth capability  i love that loud speaker it has and the fan that blows air in your face when you re sweating and the fancy touch screen with workouts  i opted not to do the ifit  the machine works great so far  i have no complaints

i m loving my treadmill  i think it s the best for the price  i walk or light jog here and there at home  nothing crazy   it s a perfect size  not the huge machines from the gym but not the tiny      walmart tread i originally ordered that was so small i felt like a giant walking on it  i have had it for about a month now for me  it was extremely important to get something that would feel sturdy and support my weight  give me good range of speed and incline and not feel like i was heavier than the machine  i weight     and am      it was disheartening to see so many machines max out at    lbs  i didn t want to break the bank buying a tread  but i couldn t buy anything that wouldn t support me either  i don t think the assembly is easy  my husband did it and thankfully he is quite handy  but for me it wouldve taken me days  the only thing that really bothered me about this tread is that they want to force you to purchase a monthly service and you technically can t turn it on without providing your credit card info to even turn on the machine  i am so grateful to everyone in the comments who posted about how to avoid that   it s really unthinkable to me that i would have to purchase more to use a machine that i have already fully paid for  so shame on the company for that  definetly don t do that and just follow all the advise on herw on how to go around it  other than that  i really couldn t be happier  it s sturdy  great range of levels  good motor  i love it  especially during the pandemic  i ve been walking    minutes a day and it s been great

i writing this as i m assembling the machine right now and i m borderline losing my mind  some of the screws don t fit and i actually had to find alternate screws to fit  thank god i actually had some screws lying around the house that actually fit  particularly steps   and    the ground screw wouldn t fit and the screws for the crossbar to the handles wouldn t fit   i ll update my review once i use it once assembled

you do need to register first on ifit and download the app  but after the first month  you can cancel the membership and use it with any problems  the speed is from      and believe me  i had been to the gym and on their treadmill the speed   will be a     on this one  you can easily lower and increase the speed as you need it  the incline is amazing  this treadmill is very solid  no shaking or sturdy   the settings are very easy to use  the cup holders are wide and large enough  it has space for your phone   i had put my laptop on top of it and is perfectly fine   my kids used them too and is very easy for them as well  great product  you won t regret it after you understand you don t need the app after the first month

this treadmill had only    minutes on it when the belt moved to one side and would not adjust with the instructions in the product manual   after almost   hours waiting on chat  i find out it is a known issue   they are sending me   screws to replace the failing ones  the problem is the placement of these   screws is behind a preassembled unit on the back of the unit   i have a   month warrantee  plus another   month warrantee for registering it online  plus i bought a   year extended warrantee   yet they want me to do the labor to replace   screws that i cannot possibly reach and that could affect the performance of the product   i had to fight with them to send out a repair tech to do the job   only when i threatened to dispute the charge on my credit card did they schedule a tech to do the repair   really      what s wrong with this picture   now i m in a waiting mode  unable to use the treadmill for what could be     weeks until the parts are received and the repair done   i have a nordictrack elliptical and a nordictrack recumbent bike and have been happy with both which is why i went with nordictrack treadmill

you do need help to attach the safety bar on the bottom of the track but you don t need it for operation  but other than that  you can put it together yourself  i m a not so handy single mom and i did it  took me all morning lol  and be sure to put in the red magnet lock to turn on the treadmill and hold that ifit icon for like a minute  until it turns the machine on  dont fall for the  required  ifit subscription  just hold the button down and it works  heavy as all get out btw  put them little slider disks under it so you can drag it around the house and it will be fine though  even for a heavy  out of shape girl

this dumb company makes you give them your credit card number and sign up for a free trial before telling you how to unlock the treadmill  hold the blue button for    seconds  there  now you can use your treadmill

the treadmill is very heavy so try to get it delivered as close to where you want it as possible   after you destroy the box to open it you will find the instructions that state you need to save the packaging material in case there is a problem  the instructions are very well put together and the hardware is clearly marked the actual assembly is fairly easy except for the fact that the bolts that hold the uprights to the bottom frame are cheaply made   they are not tapered for easy thread engagement   on top of the problem with the bolts  some of the built in retaining nuts have coating on the threads making screwing in the bolts an unnecessary challenge  after struggling with the first four bolts  i found a spare bolt i had on hand and ran it into the threads clearing the coating before installing the other four   this may sound trivial  but the bolts are not high quality and i seriously thought i was going to break one off in the frame thankfully there are reviews the state how to bypass the built in lock by pressing the ifit button for    seconds we were up and running after about an hour of assembly   so far the treadmill works as it should   i will update if there are any changes

stars because what they didn t tell you is that you are getting either a returned item  used item  or refurbished item  that s why they can sell it at such a mark down from retail  just look at the pictures i took when i got the machine out of the box  there were a few more scuff marks then just that  machine worked though and everything running okay til this day  kind of false advertisement that this is brand new  i waited a few months to put out this review for that reason  to make sure it was still functioning and it is

i have had this for about   months now  which is long enough to know  that i really love it  it pretty much checks all the boxes  it works flawlessly  is built tough  and is good looking too  the only thing i would recommend is to pay a few extra bucks and get the in home assembly  it is a bit of a long and complicated assembly  so spare yourself the hassle  two of the holes in one of my brackets were not large enough to fit the screws through  so i had to go to lowe s and get a metal drill bit in order to make the holes slightly bigger  not an ideal scenario  but it all worked out  again  pay to get the in home assembly  otherwise  this is a really nice unit

this thing has changed my covid life  i use it     hours a day  i am a female  i live in a climate that s freezing cold for many months out of the year and while i love to walk alone  i won t do it after dark  i walk fast   occasionally i run in bursts for a minute or   and i use the incline a lot  this treadmill is solid and quiet  my boyfriend is      pounds and also walks on it and feels supported  get the delivery option to have it left where you want it  the box is big and heavy and it doesn t have wheels to move it around from room to room  the lift feature for space saving works really well but don t get this if you need to move it around

i waited to write a review until i had some time to get used to my new nordictrack   i had a treadmill previously but after two weeks of walking a dog in the hills of oakland  ca i decided i wanted a treadmill with an incline and greater speed  this has both  i am    years old and the treadmill gives me a great workout and the incline is great for losing weight and building nice glutes   it came with a free month of ifit  which you are required to sign up for to get the thing to work   i didn t like that but i did enjoy the free month   i was able to map the walk i had taken in oakland and walk it again   i could see the path and the treadmill would automatically incline where it should on the walk   i didn t continue the ifit due to the price but i do love the treadmill   i have it in front of my tv  put on a series and go for an hour with entertainment   this was a great investment for me

disclaimer  i have never worked out at home or at gym for any meaningful period  i can t remember in my whole life if i had an occasion of outside jogging bought this while it s on sale at       great price  couldn t be more happier  mine has a small display with the monotone blue background color that i don t think has the capability to cast movies  but i don t care  the front panel has a small stand area where i can put a laptop before purchasing  i did my research and figured out that you can activate  or i should say unlock  and use the treadmill without buying the ifit subscription  as others said  i just pressed the blue ifit button for     seconds  some people say    seconds   and it unlocked itself installation  i had a little issue with running a wire during assembling  made a mistake to run a wire below a metal bar whereas i should have run the wire over the bar   so i had to disassemble almost everything after i completed assembling  i m pretty infirm  so having to disassemble all the way back felt like a total disaster  the manual could have been improved to stress how the wire should run  but once i ve done installation  that s it  i am very satisfied with the product

i have been shopping for exercise equipment since covid so i can do some cardio from home  i was super excited to find an affordable nordictrack treadmill on amazon  i opted for the delivery option to have the driver bring the treadmill inside the doorway  they never knocked and just left it outside  this is the only complaint i had about the amazon service  one bolt was not able to thread during assembly of the arms that support the console but we continued without it  the ifit registration was a bit confusing but after looking up videos on youtube i was able to figure it out  total assembly time was about   hours with two people  it is very heavy so definitely bring a strong friend to help move assemble

good treadmill  i really like the ifit training  assembly was difficult and i am a person that likes to assemble things  some of the predefined holes didn t line up perfectly so the plastic has uneven gaps from one side to the other and some of the plastic doesn t lay flat or fitted as i would think it would  sometimes there is weird noises when it is adjusting incline  incline numbers go to like    or    can t remember from my couch  but the incline doesn t seem that high  overall i really like it and use it daily  i am glad i bought it  it came with one year free trial of ifit for on the treadmill and i even downloaded it on my phone to do ifit workouts while traveling for work

it started off bad due to the poor delivery     the delivery company wedges the giant heavy box on a little side porch i have and it was extremely hard to remove and take to my actual door  the box was ripped in many places and practically falling to pieces   then began the process of putting it together  i m a handy person and this still took me about  hrs to do  i had many problems due to poor instructions and design  but eventually got through it luckily i read prior reviews before use and knew to hold in the ifit button for   seconds to bypass that crap and just use the treadmill like normal i then noticed the belt was severely off track to the left  after some quick youtube videos i was able to adjust the bolts to fix this and align it to center    you think they would have had alignment and tightness set on a new treadmill but i guess not i also notice that the belt slows when you step on it to begin walking  i have tried adjusting tightness and the problem still persists after going through the initial hell of the shipping and getting everything set up  the treadmill seems decent and seems to work fine besides the belt slowing issue mentioned above  if i can solve that issue it will actually be a overall nice unit  i expected alittle more quality out of the box given the price  but oh well

this was good while it lasted  which wasn t long at all   two months of   user     minutes of walking  x a week  the belt bent over and is now useless we purchased the warranty extended coverage and they told us they would fix the belt  we ve waited   months  no help  we ve called the company and they told us they d ship the belt and we can replace it ourselves after a      machine plus      on the warranty  we were compleltey ripped off  its been out of use since june and they have no plans on fixing it  or helping  so its just a huge  heavy  item that i need to dispose of do your research and get something that is more reliable and not built so cheaply and save your money   don t get the warranty

i had a life one for    years worked forever sold it to buy this which stopped working  in   months   i called and they were unhelpful  the part is on back  order going on   months seems it s a problem for a lot of clients   i call i get out on an indefinite hold  and then it hangs up  i m frustrated why amazon would allow this vimos y yo do business with them   i bought extended warranty and nothing happens because there is no part there is no help  nothing  dont buy this seriously a waste of money

we received our treadmill yesterday and built it from top to bottom  to our disappointment  when we turned on the treadmill  the belt would not move no matter what speed we put it on  the next day  we had a friend who is a technician look at the treadmill and he told us that the motor is defective  even though the incline on the device works and the screen turns on  the belt still does not seem to move  we spent    hours setting this treadmill up from top to bottom  we are certain we did not skip any steps or install it incorrectly as we used the instruction manual religiously throughout the entire process  it is downright egregious that we would drop over     dollars to receive a product that is defective  we are disappointed in nordic and would not recommend this product to any customers  there are many other customers including myself who are experiencing several failures with this product  listen to us and stay away  you should rather buy your treadmills from sole or proform as they have better products and way better customer service

okay first of all i read the review about holding the ifit button down for    seconds so i was prepared to do that and thank you for your advice but surprisingly mine came with the screen already operational nevertheless thank you i love this treadmill it is perfect for me the capacity is     and it s one of the reasons i got it because i weigh     it doesn t squeak or make weird noises  it s super heavy  i would recommend when ordering you ask they bring it indoors for you that was a huge mistake i made because it was soooo heavy and they put it by my neighbors apartment not mine so you can imagine my struggle during the time putting it together there was only a few issues   was the bar the is holding the screen panel part was not lining up this alone took my husband and i almost    minutes because it would not line up nor would it screw in  we even broke a screwdriver that s how hard it was  i would have got an assembler to come out but he didn t want me to  anyways i used it for    mins this morning and it worked flawlessly  i will update if any problems i haven t noticed yet show up

this treadmill is everything i wanted for the price   the layout of the controls is really nice with large  responsive buttons   the digital readout is clear and gives all of the information i was looking for   the build quality seems really quite nice and solid   it s generally pretty quiet for a treadmill  similar in noise level to what you d use as a gym   my wife and i got it   months ago and we ve put a lot of miles on it so far   it s been great for us as we don t like running outside in the winter rain snow   you could spend       more and get basically the same treadmill with a large  tablet like touchscreen display but we didn t need this   i d suggest saving the money and getting this model instead   we didn t see much value with the ifit app so we didn t keep it beyond the free trial period   overall a great treadmill for the price and i highly recommend it

i ve been using this machine for a while now  and so far   no complaints  it does what it s supposed to do  and while it is relatively new  it seems to function as a reliable piece of equipment  i ve not owned any other treadmill before this one  but i ve used a few in the gym  the comfort level on this one is pretty similar to the gym ones  it has enough room for a tall person no to feel confined  the only comment that i d have for the manufacturer is that the heart rate monitor is located not on the side bars that you d use to put your hands on  but on the bar that s right under the control panel  and  at least  for a tall person they aren t located conveniently  but rather too low  i don t really use it for this reason  although i would if they were located on side bars  other than that   it seems like a very solid piece of exercising equipment  and i do enjoy using it so far

serves it s purpose  easy enough to set up and adjust as needed  follow all the directions  they are there for a reason   despite it being delivered with the box beat up in parts  the contents were luckily protected well enough  if you re expected a gym quality beast with all the bells and whistles  this isn t it  but for a simple at home option that allows you to get a run walk in  it s great  to repeat what others seem to still be missing   if you hold the ifit button down  it allows you to bypass the subscription option   i m      and my hubby is      and neither of us have a problem using it  inclined or not  so please take those not picky  complaints  with a grain of salt  jury is out on the accuracy of the speed distance  it s constantly at odds with my garmin watch  but no biggie for me because i m not super serious about that  the fold feature works  but personally i don t trust it and it doesn t fold up enough to make any space saving difference  so i leave it down  there are no clear instructions on lubricating the track though  unless i missed it   other than pushing their extended warranty  so that was kind of irritating

i purchased this to replace a    year old proform treadmill i paid  k for  that had a safety latch  and went all the way up  not just    rds of the way up   that finally bit the dust about two weeks ago   i ordered this treadmill the morning the old one died  it arrived on friday and we put it together saturday   it took a few hours because getting some of the screws in the holes  was difficult   it also doesn t have the wheels like the proform did so it made it a little hard to move once we got it together   unless you want to purchase the nordic track training  just hold down the blue button for    seconds and it will unlock regardless of what the manual says   i ve used it twice now   and while i wish i had spent a little more and got the one with the fan  like the ones at the gym have  it does get the job done   i have a gym membership so i have cardio training on the ap while the gym is closed and it worked well  smooth incline and decline   you can adjust the speed or just push the numbers and it will take you to that speed  and then you can go the       in that speed zone   i haven t tried to synch it with my iphone yet so not sure what the stereo sounds like  but for now that s not something i m going crazy about getting done   would i buy it again  probably not and i ve only used it sunday  and this morning   i don t like the fact that it doesn t go all the way up  and more importantly there is no safety latch   i have a disabled daughter who i am afraid would kick the mechanism by mistake and it would come down on her   she s like a toddler  and i could also see a toddler going over to the pump  kicking where the foot is  and while it does come down slowly maybe wouldn t move in time and get seriously hurt

machine won t start unless you sign up for a free trial of ifit com  since i love dealing with a communist company  i did sign up to activate the machine  the is the reason for one star  i have yet to use the machine  you cannot exercise at home without giving your email address and name and weight and age to ifit com  i am loving it but i might return this machine because of these strings i downloaded the app but i can t figure out how to use the treadmill from the console without going through the app  i have to do some reading  so far  i have to use the app in order for the treadmill to function which means i have to consent to share my location i am sure i can cancel the trial after a month and use the machine without paying a monthly fee for ifit com  i am keeping my fingers crossed until i read or call

this expensive piece of crap came with wrong screws for the front pillars  just impossible to assemble  had to call the atrocious customer care  which wasted a lot of my time to be able to talk to   and got the correct screws in about    days  for    days the junk was just taking space doing nothing     freaking days    then finally when the screws arrived and i finished the assembly  and gave it a try  at the very first attempt of trying the incline decline feature  inclining was ok  albeit painfully slow and noisy   but declining resulted in a loud clang when going down  i looked under the belt to see if something broke  no  everything looked ok  turned off and on and tried again  same result tried to reach customer care again but due to long hold times every single time  i just gave up and returned this nightmare  thanks to amazon for making the return smooth then   about a month after this return  i get an email from nordictrack  who apparently have no idea that i have returned their piece of crap   that i will get a free treadmill mat if i leave a positive review here nordictrack  here is your positive review which is what all you care about  now i know why this product is so highly reviewed  this company bribes the customers i now use horizon fitness t    treadmill and it took    mins to assemble and is amazing  please return sell your nordictrack pos devices and switch to horizon fitness  you will thank me

i received my treadmill delivered yesterday  very heavy box  for lifting it requires at least   people  unfortunately due to covi   they are not offering home install service  user manual is very confusing  my husband usually is very good for assembling and building any type of thing but this equipment is a pain  specially setting up the side bar with the proper screws  after a few hours for figuring things out  we found out that the pulse crossbar and the console is not wider enough to be attached to both side of the machine     it needs at least   more inches  i checked the norditrack website and we had the right console which is a little smaller for the model    s but it was manufactured wrong   amazon customer service for heavy items was very helpful and they re picking up the machine in a few days

first off  let me say that maybe the best thing about my experience with the nordictrack t     s treadmill was the amazon delivery   although i requested  any room delivery  i received a text from the shipping company saying they would deliver it to my front door   but  to my relief  the two young delivery men carried it to the second floor of my home   they were also extremely careful to not mar the walls   exceptional my wife and i proceeded to assemble the treadmill   this would have only been a moderately difficult task  except that one of the wheels that is supposed to bolt to the front of the frame for maneuverability  wouldn t go into place   this is because there was a protruding excess weld globule that extended about     inch from the frame   i called nordictrack and they said they would process a replacement  which is ridiculous   if i had purchased assembly  no doubt they would have attempted to fix it on the spot   nevertheless  i did not dissuade them for initiating this   it s been   weeks and i have as yet to be contacted by nordictrack  although they acknowledge that they need to correct the issue   in the meantime  i purchased a die grinder attachment for a drill and after a significant amount of grinding the very hard weld material  i was able to get the wheel to fit into place   this added a trip to the hardware plus an extra hour or so to the assembly process once the wheel could be attached  the entire assembly was pretty straightforward and took my wife and i about   hours   the fit of the plastic pieces is mediocre in several places   i ve included a photo of the worst offender where the control panel attaches to the base i was under the impression that it would be possible to connect an ipad via bluetooth to the treadmill for viewing the ifit videos on a larger screen   unfortunately  that is not the case   a significant disappointment   nevertheless  although the screen is small it is sufficient for viewing the videos   and i must say  i was not intending to subscribe to ifit after the   year subscription ran out  but the quality of the content is exceptional  including hiking around several different countries with entertaining and informative trainers   the treadmill speed and incline adjust along with the trainer and the terrain being traversed   those can be overridden if more or less effort is desired and then return to the ifit intended speed and incline when desired the     chp motor is barely sufficient when attempting a cool down walk at less than     mi h   i weigh     lb and the treadmill slows significantly with each step   it also seems to labor when changing the incline   although it isn t too loud to hear the ifit videos through the speakers  the treadmill isn t as quiet as i expected  especially when the incline is changing  which is fairly frequent when hiking through hills and mountains   but  it s tolerable when shopping for a treadmill nowadays  you will see the lifetime warranties of yore are rare   i have a suspicion that due to ifit commanding frequent incline and speed changes  the life of the motors isn t what they would otherwise be so  in all  i am generally happy with the purchase and function of the treadmill   it makes exercising on a daily basis easy and enjoyable

item arrived on time  no problems with the delivery   so far  it exceeds expectations   the assembly definitely requires two people  it is very heavy  approx     lbs   we were able to assemble the treadmill in about   hours  using the instructions and youtube videos to clarify a few of the drawings in the instructions  overall no problems     step assembly process   the treadmill itself is fantastic  better in my opinion  than the ones at la fitness   i like the bluetooth  and the display  touchscreen is amazing  with the ability to participate in various courses via internet   subscription req    or manual mode   would definitely recommend this treadmill  will have to update my review once i have used it a little more update   purchased in may   now sept   product is still excellent   highly recommended

i enjoy the ease of use of the treadmill  it is quiet and works extremely well  with the current health risks  this is a great option for exercise at home to maintain fitness at any time  no exposure to sick people  weather not an issue and i can get a good work out  the assembly is a little annoying at times but not particularly difficult  i am happy with my purchase and can easily recommend the product

i was supposed to get a   year membership with my purchase   the card code must be invalid as the ifit app was not functioning until i provided my cc information and paid      for a one year membership  that is not free  i think it s false advertising    so i chatted with amazon rep and was informed my question was being pass along to nordictrack  it s been   days and not a word from anyone   very sad customer service on another note  the amazon assembly was difficult to schedule  had to reschedule   times  although the final assembly looks fine so  beware   the nordictrack seems ok  the membership is a cheat  and the assembly is frustrating

amazon made a good delivery of      pounds treadmill  assemble was ok  i did it by myself most of it in   hours  at the end i found out that the belt wasn t moving  which turned out it was the motor controller board  i contacted amazon for return  but amazon said they will take some time to investigate  i contacted nordictrack for support  it wasn t easy  but i made it through  their customer service was good  they agreed to send the part to me  i m still sitting here and waiting for the part  amazon still hasn t gotten back to me  overall  it was bad experience with the product  also with amazon  i wouldn t recommend this treadmill to anyone

first treadmill that was delivered was either damaged in shipping or it was a return that they tried pawning off on me  the bottom cover for the motor was cracked and the clips that hold the top of the cover on were all snapped   second one was perfect  if you receive a damaged one do not put up with that  you re paying over a grand for it  it should be in brand new condition assembly was easy enough but i can see the directions being confusing to some  in the pack of paperwork with the directions and bolts you ll find a gift card for your free one year of ifit  even though you get a free one year of ifit youll need a credit card to set up your account  that is if you wish to use it  you can bypass ifit all together if you want it but if you re getting a free year might as well use it  you can always remove card info after setup anyways after using it a couple of time i m very satisfied with my purchase  ifit seems cool but i don t know if the yearly renewal will be worth it  it s a little pricey  i have a year to figure it out though

the treadmill itself is pretty nice  wide   long belt gives plenty of room to move quickly  the assembly was pretty straight forward and can mostly be done by one person  need a bit of help to hold things in place while screwing   and the larger screen on the     model i think was worth the additional expense  though i wish you could turn off the screen without having to power down the whole machine  the real standout is the combination of ifit with the interactive motor  classes are pretty engaging  taking you to international destinations    and it helps a lot that you don t have to adjust the motor along the way because it automatically follows along with the class you re taking  i m not really a class person but this system changed my mind  for half of my workouts  at least   my one gripe is that the android based system is really slow so you have to be patient with the machine when getting set up

regarding the  easy to fold  evaluation  i am an    year old female recovering from severe anemia   if i were a decade younger and at full strength age wise   easy to fold  might be rated    my son in law assembled the treadmill readily  except for the need to adjust out a few squeaks  which he was able to do  other than its being noisier than anticipated  i have only positive things to say  i appreciate the range of selections for speed and incline  and i think i will like ifit  which i am now learning to use  it seems straightforward  i just had to acquire  a device  ipad  to use it  the screen of my iphone was too small to be helpful my strength and endurance goals that center around walking were set in collaboration with my pt   i now live where there are long  cold winters  so having the treadmill means that walking is no longer weather dependent   i can think of many incentives for meeting these goals  primarily the desire for better overall health  in and of itself  at the same time  who wants to miss a good trip whenever covid allows for it  have stamina  will travel  lord willing

the treadmill came damaged and inoperable  doesn t operate  not like a surgeon  it just doesn t work  and when they came to return the product  i was told they could not take it back because it was partially assembled  which i paid for through the professional assembly option and now i have a treadmill that doesn t work that they won t take back and i seemingly can t get my money back  i guess it s going to be cat food for supper for a little while  not really update  i contacted amazon about the problem and they stated that i had to disassemble the product and put it in the box it came in so it can be returned  the problem is it took two people to take it out of the box and it was professionally assembled  i don t have neither the tools nor the ability to take it apart and place it in the box  i m going to have to pay to disassemble it and the place it in the box  i just spent over      on nothing if i go that route  a product that was delivered damaged  i do have a louisville slugger  that should disassemble it

problem is with manufacturing  delivery and assembly personnel were great   once treadmill was assembled  there was a cut and dent on the motor hood  we tested the machine and discovered that the incline doesn t work  customer service was fairly easy to reach  contacted icon and arrangements were made to ship me a new hood and board part for the incline feature  i am waiting for a technician to replace the parts  it is sad that the brand new equipment already requires a repair visit in order for it to work properly  i was planning to purchase a stationary bike in the near future but will be looking at other brands

never actually got to use it  i got it fairly quickly but it was delivered broken which was very disappointing  they said they couldn t get a new one delivered for another couple weeks  i m assuming since it was out of stock  so i just went out and bought one from the store  the amazon people i chatted with online we re very kind and helpful  well minus the first person  he told me i could keep the broken treadmill or throw it away and i would have my new one in     days which was not true   the whole process was rather annoying and it s inconvenient for me to move this thing around again so they can pick it up  it looked like it would ve been a nice treadmill but i never want to deal with this ever again

for this price  i m not sure you could get something much better  has a good range of speed up to   mph which is plenty for my purposes  also  you do not need to subscribe to ifit to use this  once plugged in and turned on  simply press and hold the ifit button until the screen comes on and it s ready for use  maybe        seconds  feels very sturdy and the cup holders are large enough to put a   oz water bottle  overall a great purchase  especially with payment installment options

i would have given this a   or   star review  however it s cheaply with lots of plastic parts and i m super annoyed with the fact that the cover above the motor was broken out of the box   see picture  the machine works fine and does the job well so far  however it s not pleasant seeing your brand new product having broken parts right out of the box  a treadmill is a big and heavy machine and so unless it stops working i do not want to go through the trouble of returning it over a broken cover which makes me more annoyed that now i have to see it all cricked to the side and know that if i want this fixed it ll be a pain in my     to pack it again  return it  wait for a new one  unpack  and reassemble again  plus it s super heavy   anyway  off to the actual review pros belt size   i m         and the size of the belt is perfect for my stride foldable   it s pretty easy and simple to fold and unfold  also has a very nice feature that it unfolds slowly and you don t have to use strength to pull it down and fear of slamming into the floor preset workouts   if you want to use the preset workouts provided or create your own it s as simple as click of a button cup holders and heart pulse monitor features included cons speakers   weak speakers and if you are running on anything over a speed of   you are better off using headphones or different speakers vs the built in ones ifit activation   seems like there s a lot of treadmill companies who have a contract with ifit or similar companies in order to force you to sign up for their bs plans  the treadmill cannot be used
