put treadmill together and found that in order to start it  we were required to set up with ifit and were to give credit card info for monthly payments of      like what   i purchased the darn thing shouldn t have to pay monthly for it to run   thank god we looked at the reviews here and the help from another disgruntled buyer found that all you need to to is hold down on the ifit logo for    seconds  and it worked

this is a great treadmill  i am really enjoying it  i have recommended this treadmill to many friends and family  with my recommendation i suggest paying for the installation  the packaging is extremely heavy  as other s said  the box was beat up upon arrival and it was not the shipper s fault  i thoroughly inspected each piece and found everything to be in good and safe condition  i am generally able to assemble big items together on my own and move heavy furniture on my own  getting this down into my basement and assembling it on my own really made me question my life choices  i should have had another adult around for safety reasons  if you have to guide it up or down stairs  or cannot lift items   lbs or heavier on your own you should really pay someone to help you put this together   even if it is friend  pay them some how because this thing is a job  very worth the hassle because it works great

when researching portable treadmills  i decided to spend more and get one with a wider     tread belt than the less expensive     belt of the other popular model   i also splurged and paid for the installation  boy am i glad  this is a big  solid piece of equipment  not much smaller than what s in my condo  gym  even though it folds easily  it s not really portable and isn t going to fit in a close  but it s fantastic   as far was  the negative reviews about the ifit  scam  in which the machine won t start without an ifit subscription   yes   the machine comes with red warning signs saying  your treadmill is currently locked  it will not start until you go to ifit com actvate   but the wonderful amazon servicemen who delivered it just showed me to hold down the sync button for    seconds and it was good to go  it feels solid and roomy and is quieter than i thought

i had bought a different treadmill and it wasn t quite what i wanted so i saw this nordictrack one and at the time was at a great price  it does everything i want and i love it  easy to use setting with the speed settings and automatic incline  i have not hooked up to the fitness programs yet but i wanted a treadmill since i am not entirely comfortable going to the gym  instillation does take a bit more time with this one but works great  it is heavy and big so you will need some help with this  there was a damaged piece with delivery but i submitted to them and they replaced it quickly  great service

most certainly works  love the motor   generally smooth and quiet to run on  settings let you incline to    degrees and speed to    mph  no decrease in angle which would have been nice mostly concerned with the software platform  looks like it s based on android   which is hopelessly out of date and rife with security concerns  wifi only   no ethernet also the treadmill s instructions clearly state not to incline the treadmill when folded   twice now when i left the treadmill on it went through a full up down cycle and made some awful noises in the folded position  the bluetooth speakers also like to go a ghostly beep when a connected device is out of range or some other complaint   which essentially means you need to flip this treadmill completely off when you re not using it   and therefore the power button should not be on the bottom front of the treadmill assembly was not difficult but the parts did not fit well together  a couple of the plastic pieces came with broken tabs  the packaging was secure and nothing arrived damaged in shipping   took a huge dump run to get rid of the massive pallet and cardboard   every piece was individually wrapped in thin film plastic when you run on the treadmill just about everything in the trays bounces and rattles around   so i suppose they re good for a soft towel or two   but that s about that i m torn on ifit  compared with the competition it s a cheap alternative  the instructors and enthusiastic  the programs are well filmed and edited and it s great that the treadmill automatically adjusts to their program  the issue i have is the i am in no way in good shape and the programs are all ridiculously easy  which means i have to manually turn everything up   slightly annoying  i wish there was a plus            percent or some other setting to turn up all the programs globally  ifit shows my weekly stats   but they re my weekly stats from my first week and it s locked up and stuck on those stats  i probably need to factory reset it  it also continues to prompt to update even through you select it and it doesn t do anything

i ve seen that this is a walking treadmill  but i use it to run on every day  i m not a world record holding sprinter or anything  but it does the job  it only goes up to   mph  but i definitely don t need it to really go any faster  i run      miles a day on it and it holds up  it folds super easily  its on hydraulics  there s a ledge to hold my phone ipad and lots of cupholder space

treadmill was delivered           rd party assembler  ordered through amazon  put treadmill together monday         treadmill was loud from day one  i thought it needed time to quiet down  maybe like a breaking in period  by that saturday  my son said that the track was sliding off to the side  i called amazon on two different occasions for help on both occasions  they put me on hold and returned saying they were unable to get in touch with nordictrack  after the second failed attempt  i told them to come get the treadmill  now i am waiting for a refund that can take weeks and on top of that  i cannot get a refund for the assembly that i paid almost      for because they said that the assemblers job was complete so no refund is warranted

your browser does not support html  video                          i have had this for a little over   months now and have been using it   to   times a week  there was a software update done recently and it has free video  walks  and runs with trainers in hd that make this an awesome treadmill   i said  walk  in parenthesis because speeds of    are runs for me  lol  you don t have to subscribe to anything to use this or see the videos  i also love the graphs that show you the speed and incline path that is coming up

honestly  with covid around and gyms closed  this has been my go to for indoor running  i love the programs  the style and size  the price is amazing  the only thing is you need to register to their program  i d you re looking to save money  this program will help you save more money than a la fitness membership i have recommended this machine to others and i recommend it to everyone  specially to those missing the treadmill and those who are in their weight loss journey another note if you re a outdoor runner  i recommend this for you  mainly because of the bad air quality from the wildfires

it s been about almost    days since we received product and the first thing i need to state is that even though it says you have to have ifit you don t  just hold the ifit button down for a few seconds and tada ready to use putting it together was a bit of a challenge but i had read enough reviews to know this could happen but that i would be happy i did  it took about       to put it all together  we the quality of treadmill we are receiving it is well worth it  our did come with a broken cup holder but reached out to amazon and they took care of it we love that the incline works perfect and it s not so noisy  we felt it was like when you go to the gym and use those treadmills  just the same amount  we like the    in width belt and it was one of the things we were looking for so this was just right our ally  it was shorter than we wanted    inches  but still perfect for the price when it comes to the belt  you may have to adjust from time to time so it won t rub on the sides  it comes with a tool and it s super easy to do  we use the incline a lot and notice the difference of the belt and how it is very important to keep that tool so if it does need adjustment  we have only adjusted twice the first time using and haven t since  again we are very happy with the product excellent but for the price and great for a runner and walker  we do interval running but usually run about   and it is an awesome feel to our steps  it doesn t have long side rails but it just a matter of getting use to it  no big deal about that highly recommend you buy the product and as stated before you do not need ifit  if it s your kind of things well you can always get the subscription  oh and it doesn t have a fan but still worth the buy loving and enjoy the treadmill

where i failed  don t tighten anything until you have the whole thing assembled  not just at the end of each step  i was able to get it together though it took some rather strong language and a call to customer service to figure out what had gone wrong  i still managed to get it together without help  but the difficulty i faced in assembly was of my own making that said  it s a great machine  it feels completely solid and the ease of moving it even once it s setup is thoroughly impressive  the menus are intuitive and easy to navigate  and the presence of the quick shutoff chain is minimal and easy to use when wanted  the only physical things i would like to see different would mostly be with the app functionality  eg the complete lack of integration for iphone s health stats app  the lack of a search function in the guided workouts  the inability  to my knowledge  to map out custom workouts ahead of time with sliders or some form of paragraphic interface  and that it can t turn the unit s display screen when the app is in use  the incline works beautifully and smoothly  plus is gradual enough to not risk a fall or injury if you aren t paying attention very satisfied with my purchase

man  i love this machine  it s great because it s a common household name for treadmills  top notch  a friend came to visit and said  oh you got a nordictrack  a real treadmill   as they proceeded to test it out  they loved it  i love it  nice and sturdy machine and i like the fact that you can run on it and it goes to   mph  happy with product and with times like this it s nice to be able to walk if i don t want to go outside

let me start off by saying that i used a treadmill from walmart for over   years before i purchased this  so i was ready for any improvement i am not a runner or an avid work out person  i wanted a nice treadmill for walking   light jogging  and incline training i have used this treadmill for a month now and i absolutely love it  i actually forward to working on it it s easy to use and comfortable to walk on  no issues at all i did choose the trial ifit membership and not sure why so many other reviewers have opted out  it s a fantastic feature  and it s free for a year  why would you pass it up yes  you have to give them your credit card information  that s typical of any trial product or membership you choose so far  i have hiked along the grand canyon  around niagara falls  and scotland   the ifit offers activities for all levels  all over the world  workouts go by quickly because you re so in to the scenery  and the trainers keep you motivated and offer great training tips what i really like is that i can manually adjust the speed and incline  if the trainers are going too fast and still follow along for example  i chose a run across the grand canyon   but the trainer was going at speed of      i can t go that fast   so i set it to a lower speed and was still able to enjoy the scenery and inclines i know there are other treadmills that offer fans and a nice sound system and such  but this fits my needs perfectly i would recommend this and the ifit wholeheartedly on a side note  it took my wife about three hours to put together i also paid a little extra for delivery person to carry it downstairs for me  worth every penny

my husband   i use it daily   specially my husband  runing   reg and uphill  i use it for walking also flat   uphill was easy to assemble if you follow the directions a the video  how to   i recommend to have   persons for assembling even if one is there to help with the steps this was a god send especially during these times of covid      gym is not a healthy option

pro  the treadmill is very substantial  heavy  and doesn t move at all on our cement floor  once we familiarized ourselves with all the steps to activate ifit and started working out  absolutely no problems  i enjoy using ifit  my husband prefers just walking on the oval track and listening to his own music with headphones  it s possible to use it without ifit  but worth trying it for the free trial period  i find it makes the exercise time pass quickly  walking in london  hawaii  new zealand  petra  etc cons   we are over     so maybe should have expected we couldn t assemble this without help   it took nearly an hour to unpack it  that said  we gamely tried  got as far as step    the bolts holding all this steel together just wouldn t go in  did we have the wrong tools  not enough muscle  who knows  we hired someone who got it up and running in   hours  the heart rate handles you hold onto with both hands weren t accurate     bpm  really    in no universe am i an elite athlete  lol bottom line   definitely a good purchase and is perfect for this epidemic lockdown when leaving the house to exercise is not an option for us

i see all the commercials with the twenty year old athletes running on their treadmills with intense trainers engaged with them   i am too old for that and did not need that   what i needed was a good quality simple treadmill so i could walk at a good pace comfortably   i am recovering from triple bypass surgery and my old treadmill of    years gave out   the treadmill market is confusing and saturated  but i feel the nordictrack t    is exactly what i need   i have been using it almost daily for a month and am pleased with the quality  performance  comfort  ease of use and appearance   the one thing i absolutely did not like is the ifit situation   per the treadmill instructions  you have to setup a free    day membership trial in order to activate the treadmill   as i stated before  i am recovering from heart surgery and just needed a treadmill and subsequently forgot about the free trial   i was charged an annual membership of        i called ifit customer service and they cancelled my membership but will only refund      i paid      for one day of membership   i would rate the treadmill itself higher than i did  but since nordictrack wants to bundle ifit into the purchase  then my rating will reflect what i think of that scam

bolts and screws an absolute nightmare to get in during assembly  won t line up properly and feels like you re stripping the threads    days running on it and the belt slides to the left and or right  followed instructions and it seems to hold for a while then slips again  then heard a squeaking noise coming from front end  called icon customer service and after a video call it was determined that i need a new roller  attached are pics of the old roller  this is obviously a refurbish  or they just beat the heck out of it during assembly  they offered to send me the roller  a pretty major part  and have me install it myself  i declined and asked to send a tech or i was returning  good customer service i ll say  but absolutely horrible quality  pretty unimpressed with nordic track and their       treadmill

this treadmill was the biggest mistake ever  it arrived smash to pieces  with the screws and plastic pieces everywhere  assembly was a pain and definitely requires two people  instructions were unclear looked rushed  customer service is nonexistent and requires preregistration of product just to get  assistance   it was an ordeal just to get replacement parts for the damaged good that is this treadmill  which took     weeks to arrive  so i have this smashed hunk of junk just sitting there collecting dust  once the smashed parts were replaced  the product requires you to purchase an exercise plan just to operate  but that can be bypassed by pressing and holding the blue button on the panel  the treading feels loose and has too much slack  the display is awkwardly low especially when incline is changed  and worst of all  the buttons are not very responsive and slippery  its always a guess trying to change the speed or incline this product arrived defective as well  every time the incline is lowered  there s a horrendous snapping sound that rocks the machine  clearly not normal and the company refuses to fix or replace this defective part  do not buy this product or anything sold by nordic track  avoid like the plague

amazon was great on this delivery  the first one was damaged before i got it  it was returned before it even made it to me and i was notified via email  i contacted amazon support  the lady was great  she had a new one on the way the same day the delivery company was great as well  the two delivery guys brought it in the house and down to my family room  please tip your delivery guys  this thing weighs a ton took about an hour to unbox  lay it out  build and cleanup  no need to use a professional setup person if you can read some basic instructions and use a screwdriver and turn a wrench once together  it works great  the big reason i went with this over a few of the others that were less expensive was to be able to adjust the incline while using it versus manually setting it  that was worth the extra      alone the only negative  the heart rate monitor seems to read my heart rate at about      of what it really is      of the time  i have a message out to nordic tracks customer service so we ll see if there is a fix  could be user error but i don t think so no need to join the ifit program that comes with it unless you want to pay the yearly fee for it  hold down the ifit  sync button  while powering it on the first time and it bypasses it  look below a few reviews  there s one that walks you through it  you only have to do this once  the speakers aren t very good  but i didn t expect much there overall  great purchase and i d recommend it highly  if you re on the fence buy it

there s a reason why nordic track has a reputation for high quality   i wanted a decent treadmill but like most folks on a budget  i figured i d have to compromise as low price and decent quality is sometimes an impossible match   this treadmill is everything i was hoping for   it is sturdy  roomy and well built  the ifit membership is a nice feature if you re interested in special training programs but you can still use the treadmill if you are not  ignore the decals that state that you have to register the machine in order for it to work  simply hold down the ifit logo for    seconds and the treadmill will start right up   no credit card info or registration required   i love this machine   mega value for the price   has all the features i want   very happy with this purchase

great tred for the money  amazon brought it in and we did the rest  set aside a couple of hours to get it done  does not hurt to search youtube for assembly vids  cause the included instructions to build are a bit hard to get  girlfriend is down on this guy cause she is ready to fly  luckily  no broken parts or missing bolts and  skip the ifit subscription if you want by holding the ifit button after powering it on  for        seconds  it is  yours without the bs  will give a more thorough review of the machine after using it for a few weeks

i love it  it was pretty easy to assemble  only took me about an hour or so if you have the right tools  it says that you need to go to ifit com activate to use it but you really don t  you can bypass that requirement easy by holding down the fitbit icon for    secs and the treadmill will unlock  make sure you have the emergency key attached once you do it  overall  i am completely satisfied

amazon prime delivery was on time and efficient  no shipping damage  all the bits and pieces that were supposed to be in the box were in the box  you do need a phillips head screwdriver and adjustable wrench for assembly i    f and the only one in the house who reads instructions and makes sure all the pieces are there first  decided to put it together myself  it didn t feel like     hours but that s how long it took  did i complain  a little  in step   i carefully loosened tightened four pre attached screws in the handrails to get the larger screws washers in place  turn the page for step   to read  if there are four screws pre attached inside     remove and discard them     grumble  it s recommended you have a person help you hold to attach the console assembly but it s doable by yourself if you re flexible  i did need the second person for steps        of     to hold the belt frame up while i attached the crossbar and storage latch yes  there are stickers and  warnings  stating that the treadmill is locked and will not start until activated at ifit com  you do not need to enter your credit card information  find the small font that says skip or no thank you   you will still get the one month free trial  i do not like that i cannot input individual stats  height  weight  etc   into the treadmill directly  those fancy features come with the ifit app subscription  i did poke around the ifit programs a bit   would have been nice for it to limit what i could see to this particular machine  in other words there were plenty of programs that incline to     or     automatically   useless for this machine as it only goes to      but  the walks runs that take you on tours of places are neat  would i buy into the subscription  not unless it synchs with my fitbit which it does not  speaking of which  the treadmill pulse bar monitor and my fitbit read are fairly close  i m not sure about distance steps because i keep forgetting to check   which is why synching would be nice the machine lifts out of the way and lowers easily  not a feature we use regularly but it s there if needed   as with every other piece of exercise equipment we ve ever owned  the built in speakers are not awesome  the lip at the bottom of the console holds phone tablet admirably  if i could design it myself i would have it at the top so that i didn t have to look down to see my phone  as the ifit trainer is telling me to keep my head up  note  none of the assembly steps in the manual indicate to attach the safety key  it s just pictured hanging off the pulse bar in the final step  it did not come attached  it s wrapped in a small bag with the screws etc    you do need to have the red safety key in place on the pulse bar to make the machine work  there s a small indented area with a key logo   the important emergency information on how the  safety  part of the key works  if the clip is attached to you  is highlighted in the manual under how to turn on the power  be safe so far  we ve had four family members of varying sizes use the machine on full workouts   walkers and runners  haven t wanted to adjust cushioning  there s been no belt slippage and there have been no weird noises  for the price  we recommend it update   months later  after browsing the ifit programs for a few days i found the functionality between the app and the treadmill to be what i needed in my life  i have an annual subscription  still don t need to leave your cc info with them permanently   because i m not just staring at the wall while using the machine i look forward to hopping on     days a week faithfully  traveling around the world   heck  i ve even done a few virtual  k races  machine is still solid   i use it the most  but my husband is on it    x week and a teenager too  no squeaks or issues thus far

bought this   years ago along with a service agreement that had a free lube maintenance service call as part of the agreement   they call to renew my agreement which reminds me to ask for the free service   the service guy comes out does his thing and leaves   two days later i go to use it for the first time   it turns on and shuts off again   call nordik track and she says sounds like the circuit board went out since he was there and you still have    days to renew the agreement which runs out in   weeks   i said let s let the service guy come back since it worked before he came and now it doesn t   she says if he can t get back in   weeks you won t be covered   why would i renew an agreement with a company that doesn t do right by their customers   better to just put it against a new treadmill from a different company since the console was outdated when i got it three years ago   update  while the lady on the nordic track  help line  was only interested in selling me an extension to my warranty the  rd party service guy called me back and was able to help me trouble shoot the problem over the phone   you would think nordic track would offer technical support   further update  the machine still works well  looks like they jacked the price since covid hit tho   this was a good purchase but the warranty and the company support is worthless

i started walking and using stepbet to challenge myself during covid quarantine   as we approached the cooler  wetter weather i was worried that i would have trouble keeping up with my step challenges  so i was happy to find this treadmill   reviews here and in other places are great and it is exactly what i needed to keep up with my challenges   i love that i can put my ipad on the ledge and watch something while i walk  or set my phone there while i listen to a podcast or audiobook  i can walk at a pretty fast pace with no major noise or vibration   my daughter runs on it and i can hardly tell she is running from the other room i ll admit it was a challenge to put together    definitely need   people  but soo worth it   i have not activated the ifit membership but i am considering it overall  this is a great treadmill to use at home when the weather makes it tough to get outside

i received my treadmill on august      the delivery company was great and was willing to place it anywhere in the house that i wanted it   i opened the box and was able to put it together by myself   i wanted one that could fold up so that i didn t lose a lot of floor space when not using it   my only complaint is that the tiny wheels used to move it are located in the wrong place   i feel they should be on the front where most of the weight of the machine is so that when i fold it and try to roll it i do not have to use a lot of muscle to get it moved   with the wheels on the back i have to pull the weight of the machine towards me to roll it   my previous folding treadmill  different brand  had the wheels on the front

if you watch the prices  you can get this on great sales at certain times of the year  particularly around holidays   the motor is plenty powerful for what i need it for  jogging and power walking   and the running surface is comfortable  i am pleased that i can continue my workouts in the colder weather months  you do not have to subscribe to ifit to use the machine  you can always click on manual workout  but connecting the treadmill to wifi is still worthwhile without the ifit subscription  as you do get access to some free  included workouts   also  i paid for the delivery to room of choice  but the carrier that delivers it will only deliver to doorstep or garage currently because of covid     but amazon refunded me the     that i paid for delivery to room of choice  can t speak to the ease of assembly  as i paid someone locally to do it  and they ended up taking it to the room of choice for me

nordic trac shame on you      suffered for two days trying to figure out how to get this thing running   finally i read another customer s review   he she figured out how to bypass this whole rigamarole by holding ifit button down for    seconds   it bypasses all the ifit membership bs and starts the treadmill   i hope it works and is not the dud that other customers say it is   amazon s choice       really

i am so not good at working out  that is before i got this great machine  it was soooo easy to assemble right out of the box and has made workouts a fun thing  even for someone who tries to avoid exercise   it has so many wonderful features that you would probably only find in a much more expensive machine  or at your local gym   if you re someone who needs a push to get started with any exercise  i highly recommend this product

after lugging the     box to hour  nd floor then delaying the assembly for   months we finally opened it up and spent a couple of hours assembling it  one of the last steps was to mount the display control panel  we carefully opened the box that i was in  placed it  screwed it in and i was going online to activate the ser ice i pealed of the  wait  you must first activate      to begin using the machine  i was shocked at what i saw under the sticker  a smashed display screen  i know that we did not cause it and now i am almost    days past the return deadline  i hope amazon or nordic trak will make this right  and soon

it was a long winter and if i was going to look decent in a bikini  i needed some extra help   due to this coronavirus  i should be working out after work  but alas here we are  for the money  this was a steal at      with tax  i m not going to be doing anything more than fast walking  won t be jogging or running because i don t want to die just yet  it folds up nicely and putting it together wasn t too horrible  this is why i have a boyfriend

at the beginning of installation the manual says to register your device at a third party webpage  which requires the submission of payment information  if you skip this step and complete assembly installation you ll unfortunately find your unit is locked and you ll be prompted go back to the webpage and fork over tour credit card yet again  with your newly purchased machine as hostage  this is deceptive and i d even go as far as to call it an outright scam  nordic track should be ashamed of themselves  do not put payment info into ifit  you can circumvent this step by holding down the ifit button for    seconds  for free   the treadmill is actually ok otherwise but it really rubbed me the wrong way that nordic track tries to take advantage of new customers in such a dishonest way

am i to understand that the only way to operate the machine is to buy into an additional piece of software that will bill me every month  why didn t the installers show me how to operate the machine  as in do more than say  read the pink sheet and log in to get the treadmill to work  isn t this an operating treadmill not only was the treadmill delivered   days late  but the installers were in a rush  they were polite and kept a social distance  but  they did not start the machine   this needs to be corrected without delay  the dispatcher for this crew is named  sharon   she called each time there was a postponement of the delivery date part    after one week  i must state that i did manage to start the machine  after seeking information on youtube  however  after one week  i wasn t prepared for the belt to begin to fold on one side  my request for customer assistance has gone unanswered really not what i expect from amazon  if it cannot be adjusted  just come get it

really enjoying this treadmill  this is not a reflection of treadmill itself  but there was some not superior service with the delivery company in terms of miscommunication on delivery dates and finding the delivery location  that aside it did take me a few hours to assemble  by myself with hubby helping when i needed parts held   watching some youtube videos and googling spots i was stumbled at along the way  a few of the screws were hard to fit in the holes but were able to make it work  assembly was the thing i was most worried about  but once that was complete it s been a great tread  i ve used it so far for running classes on an app and enjoy the quick jump buttons for speed and incline  this model works perfect for what i need it for  will continue to see how the tread holds up as well an any maintenance needed  hopefully minimal to none

this is a good  solid home treadmill  great value for the price  stable with plenty of power for walking and running pros  easy to assemble  simple to use   and easy to bypass the ifit  if  you don t want to subscribe   nordictrack customer support is fantastic  we had some issues and their response was superior  note  due to the pandemic  the phone wait  and wait for an online chat  was over an hour  so i just put the call on speaker and went about my business until they were able to answer cons  front motor hood accent sticks out too far onto the walking belt and is easy to get your feet caught on and trip  side handrails are only     long so they do not provide good support  since you have to walk pretty far back  due to the hood accent  the heart rate monitor is very inaccurate and does not work much of the time  additionally  because the hood accent sticks out so far  it is dangerous to hold onto that for stability  while walking or running  this is not a major issue as i have a pulse oximeter that i use  when i want  the  key clip   that you hook to your clothes to shut off power  in case you fall  is made of plastic and breaks easily we purchased the extended warranty  but have yet to use that  our current issues were all covered under the basic nordictrack warranty

first of all the size of the box is     x     x     and weighs about     lbs   the delivery company was terrible and i had to work directly with amazon to resolve issues with them   it took two people to move the platform to the room where it was to stay   i m   years old and was able to put all of it together but the fold bar by myself although i will admit having another person to help with the console would have been nice   it would also have been helpful if it was noted in the order description that a surge protector was required so it could have been ordered at the same time   once i got it altogether i did get it connected to ifit easy enough with my phone but ended up getting an android tablet to use a bigger screen with it   i like how quiet the treadmill is  i like that the ifit program automatically adjusts speed and elevation   i wasn t planning to continue ifit after the free month but i ve decided that i like the program   i think it s a great treadmill that does everything i need and the price was great   i m glad i didn t pay extra for the bigger screen version because the tablet was a better buy to work with it and more versatile too  i would recommend this to anyone that is not into aggressive training  you d probably want a more expensive and powerful device

i paid for the assembly  but it took   people approximately an hour to deliver  assemble and say their goodbyes  the equipment works wonderfully  i typically use it     times each week for up to an hour

i like it  it s good  it works  my only negative is i really would like to know minutes per mile pace and apparently it does not do this although it is promised in the manual and at least one online description  here is the manual quote  the upper half of the display can also show the elapsed time  the distance you have walked or run  the speed of the walking belt  the approximate number of calories you have burned  your pace  and the incline of the treadmill  press the display button repeatedly until the desired workout information appears  did you see that  your pace  in the quote above  miles per hour is not a pace for a runner or walker  i need minutes per mile  i did press the display button repeatedly and the pace never appeared now if someone can show me where i missed it  i will happily change my review to   stars  maybe i can rig it somehow with a smart phone

let s start by saying  this treadmill is b o m b    i got it delevered and had to pay extra     bucks to have it taken to a specific area which was the basement  the equipment was super heavy even for the two husky men that dropped it off  then the next day a guy came to put it together  it was brutal to watch him with all those screws  and i had to assist because you need two people  especially when putting the electrical frame together  anyways  it came with the one year i fit sub  and let me tell you how geeked i was after activation  o m g   you can run  walk anywhere in the world and it plays music as your coach is talkin which you can adjust  it has a create button that give you live gps routes to any place in the world  i create a walk through israel  like really    you mean i can walk anywhere in the world   you know how much money i can save   i walked down the streets and inclined pass shops  this is some real live  jetson livin   i love it  this is hands down the best investment  worth every penny

i had reservations about buying a treadmill online without trying it first  i ve never owned one and only used commercial grade treads in gyms and hotels  i was thrilled that this one feels just as solid and no louder  assembled by one person  except for one step  it s really heavy but drug and slid down the stairs easily  ha  i love the ifit app and connecting it via bluetooth  the speed and incline is controlled via the app  even if i decide to change the speed manually the app still changes the incline and vice versa  i set my ipad in the console and run through newport beach  germany and montana  the bed is nice and long  i m     and     and run anywhere from an      to       mile depending on the day

the product itself is nice  the problem is that once you purchase the treadmill you should just be able to assemble it and use it  the assembly is tricky at times  especially alone  but do able  when the setup is complete you then need to get on to a computer and register it with ifit  which will require a credit card  then you have to download an app  watch an introductory video  create a profile  connect your phone to your machine and activate it  i have seen some videos showing people how to unlock the machine by holding the ifit button  that must have been corrected on nordic track because that did not work for me  fortunately  the cancellation process is not very difficult  ifit com  hover over your name  settings  membership  end benefits and then end benefits through about   more  please stay  menus here s the reason for     i don t appreciate being held hostage in the use of the machine that i just shelled out nearly      for  who are you guys  the american government selling insurance  when this machine gets older and breaks down  i can assure nordic track and ifit that i will not be going through their circus again  i don t need to pay     a month to be told how to run on a treadmill the features are nice though  aux in  ipod compatible  speakers  a shelf for my ipad so i can watch basketball or whatever  nice machine  just feels like a scam when you can t turn it out and run

i was very excited to get this  but when it arrived it was heavily damaged  one of the foot rails sitting next to the treadmill in the image  was completely broken off and the motor hood has a crack in it along with a very ugly scuff   strangely   the shock absorptions looked like they were in bad shape as well  but i think that was caused by whatever caused the rail to break off the treadmill  one of the foot covers seen sitting on top of the machine  was damaged so bad that i was finding  pieces of broken plastic throughout the box   there were also minor damaged areas throughout like the motor hood was warped due to the crack making so the hood no longer fit as it should onto the frame of the treadmill  the holes were certain bolts were screwed in were warped  the underside of the treadmill looked like it may have been damaged as well  i have no idea if it had any mechanical issues  so i really cant comment on that considering i did not even get past simply opening the box  this is going to be returned to amazon

overall great buy  the machine functions well and was pretty simple for myself and my fiance to put together  took about an hour  instructions were clear and simple to follow i ve been using the machine on all levels  sometimes doing intervals at max speed and then decreasing it  sometimes longer moderate paced runs  sometimes just walking  never have had any issues at any specific speed or setting speakers work well  not gonna be of a surround sound quality but for music while running works good enough my only issue with the entire device is you have to sign up for ifit in order to turn the device on  this requires a credit card to start the free trial  at least mine required it   i immediately cancelled the plan so it wouldn t charge me but i hate being forced to do stuff like that  especially when it s to just turn on a treadmill device good  speakers good  overall i d buy again

i ran   miles a day on my previous c    and if needed could pause at any time and resume a run  i just called customer service to see if i was missing something as i can t resume my runs when i pause them and i was informed you can only do this if you have ifit  having a feature like this intentionally disabled for an avid runner is abhorrent  i cannot stress how much i do not recommend this treadmill for this reason alone  especially if you do long distance runs

my wife is a gym rat  and with the quarantine going to the gym is an impossibility  she decided she wanted a treadmill and wanted to cheap out with one of the really cheap treadmills on amazon  but i did some research and decided it d be better to not cheap out so much and get this nordictrack instead i m happy we did  i wasn t exercising at all prior to getting the nordictrack but now that we ve got one in the apartment we both use it every day to run a couple miles  so far so good  honestly i can t really tell the difference between this machine and ones i used to use at the gym  so i think it s pretty great i hear people talking about wanting more expensive treadmills that are quieter  and  sure  this one is a bit loud  but it s not really a big deal at all  if i m in the bedroom and she s running in the living room  i mostly just hear her foot falls and not the treadmill  if she s in the living room watching tv while i m running  she just turns up the tv a bit  my airpod pros also silence it  so if you re concerned about noise  i don t think you should be too worried about it  plus we haven t had any complaints from neighbors or similar this treadmill will be getting a lot of use from us  it definitely won t be turning into a coat hanger  i ll end up purchasing the extended warranty for sure  and we ll see how well it can keep up with two dedicated runners hammering away at it

i purchased this treadmill just after all of the covid lock downs began almost a year ago   i figured going into this whole situation that i d either gain    pounds or lose    pounds   ha   i was about     lbs at that time and can confirm at this time i m about    lbs less due to alot of walking on this treadmill   when i purchased  i knew i d need a solid machine just because of my current weight at the time   while there have been plenty of cheat days between then and now    i can confirm this treadmill is solid and well powered for my needs   i m not a runner but maybe someday   so  i mainly use for very long walks at a faster pace   i will toss in a little incline from time to time   my main focus had been keeping myself in fat burning heart rate  you can look that up    easy to calculate    i started at just a few miles a day  usually       days a week    now  i m up to        miles a day   i did purchase the added   year extended warrantee because the price was good and i will take them up on their preventative maintenance once i hit the   year mark of ownership   having used extensively  i can very much confirm it s a solid machine and i feel very good about this purchase   good luck to you    just keep walking    or running

first the product came with dents and some breakage   i called amazon and they offered me partial refund we thought the damage just looks cosmetic so product might not still works   so we moved the    lb trade mill to basement   after hours of assembly we have to know that treadmill just does not start amazon tried calling the manufacturer but did not get any response back  now we had to return the treadmill and the issue is its very heavy and taking it out from basement is just not possible for me amazon is saying you have to put it to front porch to get it picked up by carrier i would recommend not to buy this and buy one from somewhere else that offer free assembly   so it the treadmill does not work you can just ask them to take it back

we like the treadmill  it works well and having it at home is very convenient  first of all  the product is heavy  if you are going to assemble it yourselves  make sure     people who can lift     lbs available to help  the assembly is hard if you don t get the angles right  it took us almost   hours to get everything right as the screws won t tighten and console won t fit between the bars unless you get the  angles right  folding is easy  it is worth buying the assembly for      or     if there is a deal   you don t need ifit but the instruction makes you think you need it  press on the ifit logo for       seconds and you can use the manual mode with no issues  overall except for assembly  we like this treadmill

along with the nordictrack s  i bike  i purchased the t series     treadmill from nordictrack   just like the bike  i am super impressed with this treadmill   prior to purchase  i reviewed a lot of different types models of indoor equipment   i wanted to have an interactive experience that will keep me both entertained and focused on goals while i exercise   this treadmill does just that   the screen is large  but not massive in size   that is okay  though   it is plenty big to take in the scenery as you follow your trainer   there are hundreds of training sessions  with more added all the time   feel like walking   have a historian walk you around the pyramids of egypt   ready for a run   train for a marathon in utah   feeling challenged   hike up a mountainside trail   the trainers encourage you along the way  and when their terrain changes  so does the incline   decline resistance on this equipment   onboard stats are right at the top  so you know how you are performing   i especially like the addition of google maps   i can create my own trail and see the sights in places i have never been   the equipment has a solid frame  and the overall footprint is not so massive   great price for this equipment   highly recommend

this treadmill was delivered promptly   i arranged for the assembly through amazon and i m glad i did   the technician knew exactly what to do and it was pretty complicated   i usually do my own assembly but was glad i didn t this time   the treadmill is a very solid and serious machine   nothing flimsy or cheap about it   it has basic functions  which was all i wanted   i just get on and walk for a while   the incline feature is a bonus   i have it placed in front of a tv in my office  so i watch  my shows  while i walk   the only negative is that it is quite loud   it makes a loud whining sound   enough that i couldn t hear my tv   i solved the problem by purchasing a set of bluetooth headphones for the tv   solution works great   i m very motivated to use this machine and am enjoying it a lot

as we move into the winter months i wanted to have a treadmill that i could run on instead of running in the dark   i ve never been much of a treadmill runner  but with covid    i thought this would be a good addition to my  fitness room   aka my basement    it arrived a day later than scheduled and i was very worried that it wouldn t be placed in my basement   so worried that i called the company   thankfully they still provide this service in va and three guys carried it to my basement   the box was damaged and i took a bunch of pictures in case the treadmill was damaged as well   i was able to unpack and put together     of the treadmill by myself   i watched a youtube video to get an idea on what i needed to do   best advice was to lay out everything  watch the video  although it wasn t the exact same model  and then the written instructions made a lot of sense   i needed another set of hands for the console and the hydraulic lift   i received it on       finished putting it together by       that evening and have used it three times since  both running and walking   the right hand cup holder seems to be the only part that was damaged   otherwise it works great  for me    i have a portable fan set up and i can access online classes either through my phone or tv   it s basic  the tread is wide and long enough for me  i m        and it feels very sturdy   nothing fancy  but i m happy with the purchase   no buyers remorse

update  icon fitness promised that i d get a free treadmill maintenance kit if i left a review for this treadmill  the treadmill itself is definitely   stars  but the company gets   star for lying  i never received what i was promised  it s been over   months and i haven t received the treadmill maintenance kit original review i rarely write reviews for products  but i made an exception for this treadmill  it s everything i could have ever wanted in a treadmill assembly   with the exception of one step  attaching the folding lever   i was able to assemble the treadmill on my own  the instructions were clear and easy to follow  no parts were missing and everything was labeled appropriately screen and touch keys   the    inch screen has a crisp and clear picture  excellent touch response  and is very easy to use  all controls on the treadmill are easy to use and well laid out mechanical   the treadmill is nice and smooth  i especially love the cushion adjustment which helps reduce or decrease treadmill firmness  it s great for me since i have knee issues  walking and running on the treadmill feels akin to commercial machines at a gym  my mom even said the quality and size reminded her of something at a gym ifit   the ifit software is awesome  i will definitely renew my membership after the free year concludes that was included in the treadmill order  two of my favorite workouts are the mt  fuji hike and easter island tour  ifit trainers are incredibly engaging and make working out fun and educational  there are tons of other workout options to choose from  including running   k training  strength workouts  etc  plus  new workouts are routinely added i m really glad i decided to make this purchase  you will too

it s a nice treadmill and i like the ifit trainer options  but  serious screen program issuesif your internet is down it is terribly slow at starting up the screen     minutes no way to turn off the screen  other than to turn off the entire unit does not have a local sign in option  like it should  so if the internet is down you can still sign in does not store login names  this should at least of a drop down list of sign in names to pick from afteradding a user wifi  is not very good  seems like they could have put a better chip in it no bluetooth  this is an obvious add on that it should have   the    s does  but this    si  a more expensive model does not  my guess this is disable  the wifi chip probably supports wifi and bluetooth like most chipsets do these days  please enable via an update  if possible

i have only used this once  but the product is great  i love the touch screen  it doesn t seem any louder than other treadmills  i like how you can select a speed      and include on the side without toggling up using the arrow  i don t like that you have to sign up for an ifit subscription in order to activate the machine   it gives    day trial free  but i didn t want to sign up because i ll just have to cancel before the free trial expires i also had an issue with amazon not initially shipping my item on time  i had scheduled assembly for the day after arrival  but i didn t get a notification that the item was delayed   then for some reason the extra shipping i paid to have the treadmill delivered to another room in my house got removed from the order  when the delivery people came  they told me i didn t pay for extra shipping but i told them i did without knowing it had been cancelled  they were super rude about it  and i went back and looked after ward and saw that it was removed  i wasn t looking to get something for free  but that shouldn t have been an issue in the first place when i had already paid i have   stars not because of the product  but because the process with amazon wasn t very smooth

the treadmill is heavy  and i needed the help of a friend to assemble it  took about   hours to assemble  and the instructions were pretty easy to follow  when properly assembled  it s very sturdy  because of its weight  i don t often move it  the little wheels might work on a harder surface  but we have it on an treadmill mat on carpet   so i placed it in a location where it can stay there for a long time  it folds easily  and storing it folded does save some space  overall  i am extremely satisfied  the tread surface is wide and it s long enough to jog or run comfortably  the speed and incline controls work smoothly  i tend to use my own headphones rather than connecting to the unit s speakers  and i rarely use the pre programmed workouts  so can t really comment on those  but they are there if you want them  the tread does make some noise when in use  but i would say it s relatively quiet  the time speed miles calories readouts seem to be accurate  the  pulse heart rate  readout jumps around a bit  but it still gives me a fairly accurate idea of my maximum heart rate  bottom line is  this treadmill suits me just fine  it s a gym quality piece of exercise equipment at an affordable price  i ve owned treadmills that cost   or   times what this one cost         usd   and i would rate this one as good as or better than the more expensive ones i ve owned   i m a    ish female ex athlete who is trying to get back into shape  and this treadmill suits my needs as well as those of my ultra fit housemate  would recommend it for beginners as well as seasoned treadmill users

being said  i felt safer purchasing from amazon and   day delivery hell yeah i gotta get some of this quarantine thick off lol  paid     for a treadmill with auto incline up to    miles per hour and bar gave me grief did not align properly  even tho i had not tightened the bottom legs and could freely move them  other than that it was pretty easy to do alone expect the safety bar drop system but
