this is the perfect treadmill  it is exactly what i was looking for  i haven t set up ifit  but so far it s very smooth and it works well  the speed and incline levels are great with many options  assembling it wasn t too difficult  but of course  it takes patience  i did have a hard time with the console  but customer service was able to video chat with me  they found the problem and a solution for it right away   i really love how it folds up easily and unfolds on its own  if you re thinking of buying it  just do it  you won t regret it

i really like this treadmill a lot   i d done my research so my expectations were high  but when i got this assembled it was even nicer than i d anticipated   it looks great  closer to a gym treadmill than a personal treadmill  and is very comfortable to walk on for long stretches   and i would definitely recommend getting ifit along with it as i m really enjoying those workouts   the only minor complaint i have is assembly   i m not technically inclined so after taking a quick look at all the parts and the instructions  i quickly made an appointment with someone from task rabbit to come assemble this for me   however if you are technically inclined  assembly probably won t be a problem for you

so far i m enjoying the treadmill  it s louder than i expected but with headphones or the tv on it s not noticeable for me  this is my first in home treadmill  i think the noise is probably the same as you d expect in a gym but they re generally noisy so it s probably just me i m      and when i try to hold the hand rail heart monitors my feet graze the front cover on the track when walking  not an issue for me because i plan to use a chest heart rate monitor i do love the large monitor tablet and the ease of selecting speed and incline i did need assistance assembling when it came to the raise lower mechanism  otherwise i assembled the rest by myself

this treadmill model is not a luxury model  but it works very well for its purpose  as i am not a professional runner i personally did not want to spend more than      for a treadmill  but i wanted a reliable treadmill  so after spending hours comparing different brands  i  decided to buy this model as it was on sale with good reviews and honestly i love it the fact it has ifit made a difference  even though at the beginning i was quite reluctant to subscribe  after i tried it  i really enjoy it  so i enrolled

great treadmill  love it  love the incline  love the fold up feature  and love how sturdy it feels  it s a treadmill so it s not whisper quiet but it doesn t sound like a giant motor running either so win hated putting it together  wrong screws  bent parts  and horrible diagrams to follow  assembly took     hours with another person  if we were not strong people  idk if we could gave gotten the display bar installed  it had to be forced we used another screw for the ground  it has worked perfectly  don t spend an hour trying to figure out how to make the screw they provide fit  it doesn t  we found a youtube video finally that addressed the missing screw issue one thing i don t like is that the belt slides too easily from left to right  it hasnt caused any problems yet  i just worry the side to side movement may wear it down faster

terrific treadmill for this price point  is it a       gym treadmill  no  can you run on it at      mph  no  does it give a great walking or jogging workout   absolutely  don t want prerecorded people on a screen yelling at you to go faster and push through it  don t want to pay         a month for that privilege  just need    preset programs or none  up to     incline and    mph with a nice sturdy machine  then this is for you  like it s for me  assembly took a while by myself  pay careful attention to the   different size volts used to attach the arms  very quiet treadmill  oh and if you don t want to pay for ifit  just depress the ifit logo for    seconds or so after you turn on the on switch at the front bottom of the machine  lastly  only thing i d like is a little more treadmill space at the front as sometime my foot catches the plastic in the front  enjoy

the treadmill is good and i like it  but customer support is a nightmare to deal with  i contacted them on june   th for support as my treadmill is starting to break down and the belt has started to rip  i have gotten replies for more information shortly after but nothing came of it  its july   th over a month later and i didn t get any more replies or any other information about fixing my machine either in short if it starts to break down like mine then that s it your on your own  the machine is under full warranty but they simply wont reply so what s the point of buying warranty if they will ignore you  they don t have a customer support phone number so your only way is by email  my warranty ends in august and my fear is they will wait till after my warranty end date to say its not under warranty anymore beware if you plan on having this for a long time or a heavy user  might be a better idea to go with another brand if warranty and customer support matter to you

i bought this on prime day with professional installation and   year warranty delivery delivered on time  i live on  rd floor of an apartment and two guys dragged the shipment on stairs to deliver us  looking at it i was afraid it had any damage and it turned out to be okay assembly amazon asked for   date time slots for assembly and they chose my  nd preference  i got an email of the assembly time and contact details  he came on time and the assembly took    hr  out time   in time   he also trashed the box  he didn t show me how to skip ifit and make it up   running  he told me to call customer service and they could help  i am glad that i read comment on amazon and was able to skip ifit by pressing it for    seconds with red safety button on treadmill i have used it for   days now and i am not liking it much  it makes lot of noise  i never had knee pain before  i am only    lb and i walk   miles everyday in downtown to and from work and i had used lot of other treadmills in gym and i never had this problem  after using this  i was feeling uncomfortable from day    i was only walking at           miles hour and didn t run at all  i wasn t sure if this is a faulty one or problem with all  i use manual workout and i didn t find any pause button  touching other buttons accidentally also stops the workout  it is frustrating pros wide belteasy to foldnot so difficult to move for its sizegood   big consolecons loud noisebad for your knees no pausetouching other buttons might stop the workout finally  i am at a point that i would never want to rely solely on amazon reviews to buy anything as it looks like some of the reviews might be paid  i am very much disappointed with this  i am wondering how these kind of products are approved  i will try for another week and see if there will be any change and update it

assembly        this was a pita to put together   it s the only piece of workout equipment that we ve had that truly required two people for assembly  and it took about two hours to finish assembly machine   amazing  i searched and searched for a treadmill  which during covid is nearly impossible to come by one that s in stock and costs less than   k  i finally found this one and was so impressed with the ifit screen set up  i want an effortless walking routine where i don t have to pay attention to time  incline  speed  etc  i just want the machine to do it for me  sort of like a natural walk  i m happy that a one year ifit membership came with this  and plan to continue that membership after the first year  i am also incredibly happy with the quick responses of the buttons  the clarity of the screen and sound  and the size  it s also pretty quiet for a treadmill

so for me it arrived on time and they broung it to my apartment which was awesome the instructions were slightly hard but not too much  i put the whole thing together practically myself besides tightening the bolts or screws then my husband did that part it took a couple of days for me to put it together given kids and working as well but also i did not have a regular screw driver i had a drill and i did not have a wrench  even though the instructions told me i needed this i thought i could get by without it but no you cant  the alignment of things is what also became frustrating at times and wouldnt fit so i would have to take a break and come back to it  however all of the parts were there and did fit but it just wasnt as quickly as most have mentioned the treadmill itself is awesome i use it every other day  i m      and    lbs and my son uses it as well he is         lbs  i have used it all the way to a speed of   and an incline of    but mostly speeds of     with inclines varying and my son have tried at a    speed but not a high incline  so it endures and it is steady  it is not that loud i thought it would fold all the way up but it cant due to the dash board and the cup holders so i just put it up against the wall  however it does fold up and stays up overall awesome equipment

the treadmill is not that great  i broke my treadmill by accidently hitting the stop button in the middle of a run  i then hit the speed button before the belt came to a complete stop and now my treadmill doesn t work  the belt doesn t run but the display s distance readout counts up  the worst part about this is the support for this machine  i tried calling the support number but gave up after being on hold for over an hour  then i tried to use email with support and that took up a week with no results  support asked for all of my details like name  address  phone  email  machine serial number and i thought we were getting somewhere so i replied within minutes of getting the email  two days goes by and then they ask for a video of the problem  no worries i sent them a      second video link   two days later they tell me the requirements of the video and i have to send it again with      resolution and no longer than   seconds long  i send the video again as per their requirements  the next day they email back asking for my name  address  phone number  machine serial number and so  i decided to try calling support again  on hold for    minutes  finally talk to somebody and they send me to a the non warranty department which is where i am currently stuck on hold while i write this review i m about to throw this treadmill out and buy one that doesn t use icon for their support the issue with the treadmill press start on the display and the belt jerks then stops  display says the belt is running and increments the distance display  i don t think the treadmill should have let me stop and start the treadmill the way that i did   the software should have protected the machine from the user  me

wow   it s impossible for me to write a full review because i ve been trying to assemble this product for the past five hours   i m a reasonably smart guy   i have an advanced degree and i spent more then a decade turning wrenches as an enlisted soldier in the army so i thought this would be no problem to assemble   couldn t have been more wrong   this device has the worst assembly instructions i ve ever seen   absolutely incomprehensible diagrams   do not buy this if you plan on assembling it yourself

my wife and i love this treadmill even after having to put it together ourselves  the instructions were easy to follow  just make sure you do not tighten the bolts where stated in the instructions or you ll have problems lining things up later  thanks to another reviewer we activated it without having to register with ifit and giving them our credit card info  just hold down the ifit button for    seconds then everything works took off one star due to the useless ahs assembly that was included in the purchase price  it took    days to get an appointment  then no call no show after waiting all day at home for them  i called ahs and after an apology was assured they would get back to us with an appointment date  after another    days with no appointment date  we put it together ourselves ahs states  handpicked pros  upfront prices  happiness guarantee  hmmm  how does this guarantee work  we re not happy anyways         we do really like this treadmill and all the features it has

the product is fine but a part will break after a few months    then it is on back order for   plus weeks   i can not stress this enough this company does not care about existing customers  the customer service is nonexistent  also you will continue to pay for ifit while you wait for this part i asked if this sensor issue is common and the customer service person replied  yeah it happens all the time what       please do not buy this       dollar paperweight  get yourself a treadmill with an actual customer service team    please take my warning  i haven t been able to use this in   weeks and still haven t gotten an answer when this part will arrive do not buy

ordered this to replace an old  dead treadmill  the first unit arrived damaged in shipping  the replacement process was easier than i expected  but the shipping companies  pilot and expo  seemed to not have any idea what they were doing  on the first  damaged  delivery by pilot  the delivery was late  and when i called she said it wasn t even on the truck  then  it showed up an hour later  on the replacement  expo was a bit better but showed up way early  and caused some trouble however  as far as the product  we really like it  a bit of a chore to assemble  as expected  but it went together with no fitment problems  it s very sturdily built  decent sound capabilities for a treadmill  we use an aux cord from the tv   buttons respond well when pressed  so speed incline changes are quick  two manual settings for flex  we use the softest  feels good  folds up easily for cleaning underneath  and releases with the press of a foot to float back down my only complaint is that when you  stop  to answer a phone call  hit the bathroom  etc   in the middle of a workout  the timer will reset to zero in about   minutes  so if you are meticulous about keeping track of workout times  you need to remember or make note of your time  i find this annoying an completely unnecessary  and  there is no way i can find to fix that  my last treadmill had an option in  settings  to allow you to pause indefinitely  except for that  i recommend this unit

first off    assembly was such a nightmare  some of the screw placements are in so deep places that you will need a head torch to ensure they are going straight  some of the screws are in places where it s so difficult to tighten it  i can t believe engineers designed it so poorly  on the flip side  there were not too many parts to put together  once screw was broken so we ended up putting back a screw which was a throwaway one      let s talk performance   in lower speed  you always feel jerk  in higher speed  it moves so much  it says it has capacity of     lbs  but i guess it s actual weight capacity is only     lbs    i don t know if there s a way you can set weight to get actual calories burn  if there is  then i couldn t find it and it s not intuitive  again  if it s there      cheap material  i paid      for this and i don t even think it s half of it  even after tightening the screws  the handle is not firm

the treadmill arrived bent and cut  the replacement was sent and that was electrically faulty  both were returned via their method xpo  with all pics proof receipts by the deadlines  amazon keeps trying to charge my card  which is in dispute now  despite having an email from them saying they received treadmills and won t bill it  advice  don t buy always keep all proof pics return receipts  their scam is that when they receive items back in their facility  they don t scan them in upon arrival  and then try to say you didn t send in time  and try to keep your money  i plan on holding them accountable for their fraud  so much wasted time on calls to them to address  with no credit to account as they promised  not to mention the amex points i used on some of this that they are trying to steal which

first i am so so impressed with this treadmill  i love everything about it  it is quiet  easy on the joint  inclines nicely  and   year of ifit is a sweet deal the assembly was a bit hard and it takes about   hours for one person with the help of another for the steps that requires lifting and adjusting i had a delivery issue since i live in small city  so it took forever to get a delivery schedule and it was not flexible because the delivery company only comes once a week in our area and they had an issue the first time and  they left me waiting and they did not call or show up   it was disappointing but i was able to get hold of them next day and reschedule for a week later and this time they were on time  other than that the machine works great and i am very impressed with it so far  love ifit and it is worth every penny for me

easy to assemble  but you may need two people   it s the quality you would expect from nordic track   one point on the ifit activation that was not mentioned   you must engage the key  turn on machine  hold the ifit logo down for    seconds and you can easily by pass registering for the ifit training program   you can always sign up later   we want to use it first to have a better understanding of our needs

i usually run about       miles per week and needed a treadmill since going to a public gym isn t an option for me right now  assembly took a couple of hours but it has held up well during my runs  it bangs a little bit when i hit speeds   mph and i weigh less than    lbs so i can see where it might make noise if you run faster or are heavier than that  that being said  i don t have a mat underneath it and that might make a difference  overall  it s absolutely been worth the cost   also  you do not need to activate the trial to start it up  just hold the bluetooth button down until it starts

love this treadmill  had some issues with the belt when i first used the treadmill but after a couple annoying phone calls they sent someone out   i will say they have a great video app so you can show them exactly what s going on instead of trying to explain it   belt is great now  very comfortable walk jog  decent incline  smeven with the belt issue i still give it   stars  the ifit is awesome  it came with a free year and it was very simple to set up  i read in another review it was difficult  but that is not my experience  they send a gift card with a promo code that you enter when setting it up  also read in a review the treadmill doesn t work without an ifit membership  this is not true  i feel this is a great treadmill for the price  i would definitely buy this treadmill again and will probably only buy nordictrack because of the ifit  it just changes the whole treadmill experience  love it

bought this after comparing quite a few different models   it s got a few ato workouts programmed into it  and the part which i am enjoying most   no having to stop every hour   i usually walk   hours after work since i sit and drive all day  and was getting annoyed with the machines at the gym forcing you to cool down and stop every hour ifit bypass   held the blue ifit button for around    seconds  and it unlocks to use   no submitting the credit card to sign up for anything treadmill was easy enough to set up  only had to borrow a second set of hands for assembling the folding mechanism  and the control panel the control panel has   item bins with flat bases which can hold a decent sized water bottle  amongst other things   there is also a ledge for a cellphone or mp  player to be placed for music   ledge can also hold an e reader too since i saw that bit on the questions asked noise level is pretty equivalent to one at the gym  so it s not excessive and shouldn t bother anyone around

this was easy to assemble and it is easy to fold as well  i like that this has pre set programs to use however it is annoying that if you don t purchase the optional package that comes with it you won t have access to everything and it is not cheap to buy the extra package as it is a monthly fee  it will also ask you every time you try to use it to buy the extra package so that s kinda annoying  the updates are long and serve me no use as i don t plan to buy that package as stated  i am also not a fan of the scenery it offers as i was under the impression it would be better quality than what it is  the buttons are easy to use and you can change the speed and incline easily if i could go back and purchase it again i probably would have bought a cheaper version as the functions i was excited for are what costs extra  sometimes spending more isn t the smarter route but if you intend to buy the extra monthly fee to use it then you will love it

i am lucky to have a husband who is very handy and savvy about putting things together   in reviews we read  someone mentioned putting the treadmill together in half an hour   i would say that was pretty optimistic   we spent the better part of the day on assembly once the nordic track was working  it was squeaking very loudly   we contacted the service number and received timely help from a representative   within a few days we had received a replacement roller and silicon lubricant   the annoying squeaking has all but disappeared i use the the treadmill for a walking program and it is perfect for the days when outside weather is inclement  all winter in idaho    no excuses for not keeping on track   i enjoy being able to raise the incline to increase the benefit of the walk   i use the nordic track for an hour and twenty minutes every day to accomplish four miles of walking as a supplement to the nordic track  i joined prime unlimited music and have dowloaded my favorites into an awesome workout playlist   i am very pleased with amazon prime unlimited and recommend it highly i am also very pleased that i can lift the treadmill into the storage position to open up the space where it sits   for anyone like me who has to deal with weather problems that keep you indoors  i highly recommend the nordic track treadmill

okay  here s the deal  we re in a global pandemic  our y opens and shuts according to whatever the county says is prudent at any given moment  my wife decides she wants a treadmill  i order this thing  i assemble the thing  i register the thing  i don t give my credit card info  i still can t use the thing there is no reason whatsoever that we should be hamstrung by the fact that we can t just plug this stupid thing in and use it  instead  i m forced to register  okay  fair enough   asked to shell out     month for some bozo to coach me  i know how to walk  thank you very much   and after all is said and done  the thing doesn t work here s the deal  when i shell out this much money for anything  there s no reason for me to have to think about using it  other than to plug it in  press the program i want  and proceed to use the product  i don t want to think  i just want to use the thing  but now  instead of working out  i m typing this review  because  i m not able to just turn the thing on and use it i m sure this will be  resolved  within a day or so  and my wife will be happily strolling along but there shouldn t be an issue like this in the first place  i buy an apple computer  and it works out of the box buy a nordictrack  and you have to jump through hoops  completely unacceptable nordictrack  you ve gained and lost a customer in one fell swoop

solid quality treadmill at a reasonable price  setup was easy  no harder than assembling a tricky piece of ikea furniture  having two people helps   it s been easy to use  has a variety of speeds  speakers aren t bad  heart rate monitor seems accurate  and has overall been a quality treadmill that has been a lifesaver right now

i m          lbs  i bought the nordictrack t     s treadmill  it says it has a     pound user capacity  so i m pushing the upper end  i tried walking at   miles per hour and it didn t feel great  belt had a little stutter  as i went up to  mph it was smoother  i didn t go above  mph with me on the belt yet  i felt okay walking at  mph  slightly fast walk for me   good enough  for sure  i was surprised by how fast the belt stopped when i pressed  stop   like  it immediately stopped the overall feel of the base is fine  but the console is a bit wobbly  just a bit   i suspect it feels more sturdy for anyone under    lbs  i got the   inch screen and the display is super rudimentary  like     s sci fi rudimentary i followed the ifit workaround and just held the ifit button for about    seconds and it started  you do not need to activate the ifit membership fyi  i had it professionally assembled  note  i first scheduled through amazon  those guys never showed  left garbled messages from different phone numbers  super sketchy  so i cancelled and chose a local handyman service   assembly took almost exactly one hour noise  i used a sound meter app on my phone to record noise level  without me standing on it  phone at hand rail height    mph     dbs   mph     dbs   mph     dbs  it was never that loud  in my opinion  for context  my microwave was   dbs and my blender on ice crush mode was   dbs

we really wanted to love this treadmill  it is small enough to fit in many areas  it looks like it will withstand for quite some time and it isn t too noisy when it works properly  however  it started to make a weird sound when we started to use it inclined on the first level and the sound gets worse when you put it down to ground level  also  the motor hood came broken  we contacted the company several times and received an email asking us about the exact part of the machine that was broken  we replied   times and no answer  as you can see in the picture  very bad customer service and we even bought the extended warranty for it  really wanted to love this machine since it was affordable and we believed nordictrack was an amazing company    this is our honest review and hopefully the company listen more to its customers

do not buy this item  terrible treadmill  the heart monitor does not work  when i called customer service  they said the heart monitors are never accurate  mine is off by         i said if it was off     i can live with it  the rep told me they are not even that accurate  if the heart monitor does not function well  why does nordictract  advertise the unit having heart monitor  everytime i have called nordictract customer service  i am on hold for at least    minutes  finally they said they will send me a new heart monitor grip  when the package arrived  it was the handle but not the heart monitor grip  i am        and when i incline the treadmill     my hands will not reach the hand grip unless i bend down  not a proper posture for walking  i suggest buying another brand besides nordictract

been using the this treadmill for about a month and do enjoy it   we have had no issues with it so far   still trying to use the track  dampeners  to make your step softer when you step down  but to me it feels about the same when they are in use and not in use   gave it four out of five stars due to the display seeming a bit out of date  big blue screen with big square dots for the characters    also  the grab handles seem a bit short for us   you have to stand a bit close to the front of the machine in order to utilize these handles   if you wish to stand back a bit  so you do not step off the tread and onto the front cover on the machine   the grab handles are a bit in front of you assembly was not a problem for me   it does take about an hour or so to complete and there are a few steps to go through   there are a couple steps where you will need two people for the price  the above  issues  are minor and would not hesitate to purchase this treadmill

edit  so i would like to update the product to a   star  and that is due to the wonderful support that i received from the chat support and will receive a new upright at part of the    day warranty within     days   i will update further once i can actually use the device   well  i want to be excited about working out  and would like to make this treadmill not become the dreaded close hanging device  but it looks like i am well on my way to that day    putting the item together and i get to the grounding screw hole  not large enough for the screw they want you to use  but you know what  who cares i will use the original screw they said to replace   couple steps later and it has me try to screw the hand rails to the uprights   the left side worked  but the holes on the right side were not large enough for the bolts to screw in  so here i am  with a treadmill that cannot even be screwed together   day    what do you know  still no treadmill because i cannot make the hole larger

you can lose about    lbs just assembling this  machine  it s no easy tasks but well worth it once it s done  the advertising of faraway places you see where the pretty blonde is running on the beach or through cobblestone flower lined streets is bunk  so far the only areas on the workouts are  rd world slums     if you want to see some of the poorest populations on the globe while you run then this has the app for you  as for me it s depressing  there is also a gimmick to sell you a fitness coach for either     monthly or about      annually  the treadmill itself works fine but you ll be extremely disappointed in the app that takes you to exotic places as you run  take your own  tablet and tune into some good music and cover the nordic track screen

absolutely love  only gave it   stars because assembly was a bit difficult but with patience doable  so don t let that scare you  the size isn t huge so it fits well in my space and folds and unfolds very easily   the wheels also make it easier to move to another location to hide away  it s very smooth to walk on and cushioned for less stress on the knees  i prefer to watch tv during my work out so i dont use the ifit  to get your treadmill going you don t need to subscribe   hold the little blue ifit square for a few seconds   you ll hear it beep and your display will light up  this way you can by pass signing up for ifit  i did register my treadmill

i would have given this treadmill   stars except the install process was highly frustrating  i am fairly handy so i figured i d do the install myself  it s certainly easy to do  except for the fact that one little screw that probably cost about     th of a penny arrived broken  unfortunately it was an essential screw  connected to a ground wire  so i couldn t go without  i looked it up online and it sounds like a fairly common issue  i had to hunt thru my assorted box of loose screws to find something that would fit   there were other areas of the install where the pre drilled screw holes weren t big enough and i had to get my drill to loosen up the holes a bit and power the screws in  trying to do by hand would be next to impossible   despite these annoyances  i was able to setup the treadmill by myself in about     hours the treadmill itself is high quality  it s sturdy  the belt is quiet ish  and when in use  it feels comparable to a commercial gym caliber treadmill   i was also pleasantly surprised how easy the lift storage feature operated  i was expecting it to be really heavy and cumbersome to lift the base deck up for storage  but with the pneumatic lift arm  it s surprisingly light the whole ifit thing is misleading and annoying  the trick to hold down the ifit button for    sec didn t work at first for me  i had to power off the treadmill and try it again for it to work aside from all that  it s a good sturdy treadmill for an affordable price

what a pain to put together  took   hours with two people to get the thing assembled  some holes were the size of pinholes which required light drilling to open just enough for the corresponding screws  however it s a great treadmill  just hold the ifit button for   s and you can bypass all that junk and get to the good stuff  and by good stuff i mean running  or i m my case  walking for a couple hours while playing dungeons and dragons over my tablet i can conveniently set on the treadmill and plug in via aux for some surround sound   happy it s finally here

i bought this treadmill at the end of september and it arrived in early october  after almost exactly   months the screen console does not work  seriously      days in and it doesn t work at all  of course if the console doesn t work that means the treadmill doesn t move so i can t even manually use it all in all this has been a very painful purchase that i regret  after some issues with the amazon  rd party delivery and installation it has worked as expected until last night  after having not used the treadmill for the past week and a half  it was sunny out so i went outside instead  the console does not work  after trying to re set it per the instructions in the manual it did nothing  after googling other suggestions on how to re set the console failed i called customer service  they were very nice but oddly enough she immediately said she was submitting for a new console and would expedite shipping  of course shipping is delayed due to covid so the piece won t be here for two weeks and then i have to schedule the technician  so for a brand new   k treadmill the technology broke after    days  this now requires a month of downtime  during winter months which was the main reason for the purchase      minutes with customer service and then the actual technician appointment i am very disappointed given i had a nordic track for    years before this and never had a single issue  i regret not spending more and going with pelton

there is nothing wrong with the equipment  it works well so far but i made the mistake of buying a   year service plan   don t do that  when i registered the treadmill with nordictrac i couldn t find the way on their website to associate the service plan with the treadmill i registered  so i wrote a customer service request to please help take care of that  the service representative who responded didn t even read my request  just sent a template mail requesting that i make a video of the problem with the equipment  i responded that there is no problem  just update the database please  i got back another email from him demanding a video of the problem  they don t even read what you write them  just send back template responses wasting their customers  time  i can t imagine how bad it d be to deal with them if i had an actual problem

so  we were looking at treadmills and various other exercise equipment options to get us back on track to getting into shape  given the non stop nature of our jobs right now  going to the gym really isn t an option  it was decided to give a treadmill a shot  it is the perfect addition to the home gym i put together  assembly wasn t to difficult  and i was able to do most of it myself  i would suggest not fully tightening the uprights until after you get the arms and the screen on and adjusted properly  it needs that little bit of flex  also  unlike all of the warning labels you do not need an ifit membership  all you have to do is put the emergency stop key in  turn it on  and press and hold the ifit button on the screen for up to    seconds  it will beep and the screen will come up and you are ready to go  the incline is awesome  and the speed controls are right there  right now we are averaging    minutes each a day  and it is a joy to use

a handy person with good tools assembled it for me   he worked non stop for three hours following the directions and not wasting any time   i couldn t have done it   too complicated and required too much physical strength   it had three red signs that said  stop call if you are having problems rather than to send it back   once assembled  it requires connecting to the internet to unlock it   that makes no sense   on the positive side  it functions well and is a good size for a home treadmill and while not quiet  it was quieter operating than other home treadmills i have used

threads are the wrong type for the bolts  i m seeing metal shavings from them when i tighten the bolts  haven t had a chance to actually use the machine yet disappointed in this poor quality i bought a name brand to avoid this cheap chinese made crap  but i feel like i d have been better off buying the cheap chinese made crap  at least it wouldn t have costed as much

taking it to   stars because the company emails the buyers and tries to  bribe  them to write a good review with promises of free floor mats of maintenance kits overall  i like this treadmill a lot it s very sturdy  seems like it will take a beating and keep on ticking packaging was very good  no way was it being damaged in transit  worked first time out of the box  there was no pressure to buy an extended fitness program membership which i liked changes speed and incline very quickly when i need it to  and good selection of preset programs couple of minor issue    not sure calorie count is correct  seems to be higher  maybe the health app i use on phone when walking outside is lower  not sure who to blame but not a big deal    it is very heavy  so make sure the room you assemble it in is the room in which you want it to stay   also  you will need   people to put it together

i tried to wait at least    days before reviewing this but i didnt want to forget so here goes  i strongly suggest getting the workout mat for exercise equipment whether you have carpet or not  or at lease put those foam sliders on the bottom to protect your floor  assembling this thing wasnt hard but i dont recommend anyone try to do it alone  also  most electronic equipment recommends that power tools not be used  if you want the machine assembly to be tight  use the power tools but with caution bc that lil tool they include will start to hurt your hand after a while  once its assembled things run pretty smoothly  the fold up is a great feature  works well  the ifit membership is hit and miss  if you already have workout goals  its not necessary to sign up for it  its just nice to have something on the screen

this unit came with a half dozen bonus screws that you re supposed to remove and throw away  that s odd  but not a deal breaker  or it wasn t until i found that   of them were in there so tightly that i couldn t remove them  i can t budge them by hand  with an electric screwdriver  or with a cordless drill  wd    makes no difference the bonus screws are all in critically important connections  so the unit can t be assembled without removing all of them  so if even one is stuck like three of mine are  the unit is useless  i wouldn t gamble with this treadmill

living in midwest means at least   months snow and icy road  this is a very basic treadmill  which i m looking for  i don t want pay a lot more for added big touch screen and etc  my basic economy is that i can do workout  if i want fancy feature  i can just pay separately to buy a tablet  as a matter of fact  you can control this piece of equipment through ifit some part of installation do need two persons  the instruction is reasonably accurate  one suggestion is that  don t tight all nuts until you assemble the screen and so on  or you may need to redo it the speed is quite accurate when i compare to my garmin folding is very smooth  though i don t really need it  for those living in small apartments  it could be a nice feature one suggestion is that you may need to pay additional     let amazon guys to put it where you want in your house  the box is about    long  over    lb

best dust collector and clothes holder i ve ever seen  dust and clothes are literally attracted to it like a moth to a flame  i bought  it for my wife who claimed she d use it all the time  i knew better but still bought it  it has been used exactly   times in   months   it does seem durable if it ever were to be used

delivery was scheduled prior because it s such a big and heavy delivery  amazon driver delivered it to our garage  assembly was the hardest part  we are not a handy household   lol  we tried at first by watching youtube videos and following directions  we quit after   hours  we ended up using a handy man app  and paid someone to do it  that was the best      i ever spent lol  treadmill runs great  bypassed the fit by holding down the ifit button for    secs   as described in other amazon reviews  so far we re satisfied   hopefully i ll lose some of this quarantine weight lol

like the treadmill so far  the super easy lowering and folding are great  however  although i was aware i would need an ifit subscription to use the ifit feature  i was surprised and disappointed that the ifit feature also requires an ifit module  which is sold separately for an additional       i definitely recommend the amazon assembly  the guy that came out was quick  personable and knowledgeable as he had assembled several before

took about    mins to set up and was easy   it does have the blue ifit button   just push down in the button for    seconds or so and you can use it without registering   it feels solid and well made   it s not quiet and not noisy   sounds like a treadmill should i guess   the speakers are not very useful   can barely hear music when maxed out but i didn t plan on using them anyways   belt adjustment is easy   folds up with little effort and easy to move around   overall i m very pleased with my purchase

i have been doing the same workout for over    years on many different machines at different gyms  etc   so i have a pretty good idea of treadmill speed   my new t     s felt like it was going too fast and i was having a hard time keeping up   most nordictracks had an  advanced calibration  mode to determine speed calibration  but no longer with the new models   so i determined how many rotations per minute a properly calibrated machine would have at   and    mph        rotations at  mph  and       rotations at   mph    sure enough my brand new t     s was running more than     mph faster than the readout   it s possible to adjust the belt speed  search youtube   so it s fixed now   but otherwise i m not impressed with the apparent lack of qc out of the factory  or elimination of the advanced calibration mode    a proper belt speed is important   otherwise  decent machine

it s actually very nice product and the ifit is totally worth the money our first order got lost and it was such a nightmare to track  at the end we cancelled the order and bought a new one that came the next day needs two people to assemble we will update the review after using the machine for some time but so far we just tried it and it was a wonderful experience

the treadmill looks nice  feels solid  as much of the support is constructed of steel  however  it seems like they just disassembled one and wrote up a partially complete assembly guide  and decided that was adequate for the average consumer to put this thing together   it s not   the parts aren t always consistently labeled in the text and diagrams  some of the bolts are extremely difficult to attach unless you lift each side of treadmill  and other screws need to be removed in order for some bolts to go in  but that s not mentioned until two steps later   when you should already have put those bolts in  and even though the assembly process doesn t mention adding the safety key to the console  it won t work unless that key is in place   the single most frustrating experience i ve had in the past year

we reviewed features prices   and decided to go with this model as a solid model from a known brand   we didn t care about a large screen   basically just wanted it to  go  and provide some basic incline   this model does that well this unit is heavy    plan to have a delivery service take it upstairs  if that s your plan    assembly is not terribly difficult  depending on how handy you are   took us about   hours with a proper tool set if you are not handy  i would pay for delivery and assembly unit is surprisingly large  a good thing  and very sturdy nordictrack s  activation  is ridiculously complex   instructions are not good   you have to activate through  ifit    but we are not planning to use ifit   you have to connect to a mobile device to  activate  the treadmill  which is probably just a ploy to get you enrolled in ifit  even if you don t plan to use it  after  activating   which the instructions don t adequately explain   your mobile device is connected  via bluetooth  and the treadmill won t work independently until you disconnect from your mobile device once we figured that out  which was very frustrating for about an hour or so   the treadmill works perfectly as a basic  on off  faster slower  increase grade decrease grade treadmill

i ordered this treadmill because of the weight capacity  don t judge  you re looking at treadmills too  and name brand for the price   originally i was worried that we would be locked into an ifit membership but holding down the ifit button for    seconds unlocked it and we ve been able to use it with no issues  this wouldn t be my first choice for an ifit treadmill unless you re planning to use your own screen anyway  the assembly wasn t bad  i feared it would be worse based on other reviews i ve read  all of the parts feel substantial and it certainly weighs enough that it shouldn t fall apart easily  my wife has used it several times and i tried it last night for the first time  although it would benefit from a fan  i found a pedestal fan for     that works well enough  it s fine for home use

my wife and i purchased the nordictrack t series treadmill to get a little exercise at home given the covid pandemic  the delivery through amazon worked great  i set up a time and two delivery guys dropped off the package  assembly took a little longer than expected  about    minutes  but i will note that i have never assembled one before so i had nothing to really base my expectations on  i am now at the   month mark of using the treadmill  the speed and incline functions have worked well  the unit is also pretty quiet which is nice since me and my wife are both working at home  there is nothing more that i really need in a treadmill  i would purchase again

product was really easy to put together   instructions call for   people to put together but it is doable with just   person  but much more difficult and time consuming especially attaching the console and the drop bar underneath  it is also very heavy all together   once it is all assembled   you do need to activate it online at ifit com and create an account before you can start using it  however  unlike some other reviews i ve read  you do not have to provide a credit card in order to use it  it does have a spot to enter your credit card as you are setting up the account but right next to  credit card  it specifically says that entering that is optional  i simply skipped that part and finished registering without it  once my account was created   i was able to sync my treadmill with the app via bluetooth and was then able to start using it  as some reviewers have commented   the belt is slightly noisy as you walk on it  however   i wear headphones on the treadmill so that is not an issue for me at all  i also only walk on the treadmill  not run  so it may be more less noisy at higher speeds

i have had this treadmill for two years and i adore it   i assembled it myself   fold it and roll it away with ease and enjoy all the ifit features   i highly recommend it   the negative reviews that i have seen seem to be about the person who came to assemble the unit for people  and customer service   i personally cannot relate i also have had   back surgeries    foot  one knee  three hand   so working out and staying fit is important to me and this treadmill has been a great option for me   i have to be careful about high impact workouts but the suspension of this treadmill has been great as long as i build up my workouts and listen to my body i really enjoy it and the ifit features oh   and there is an emergency stop feature for those who are worried about a few negative reviews   so if you follow all the user suggestions you ll be safe and sound

it s a great machine and the ensemble was fairly easy  the only process i found unlikable was the ifit that s incorporated with it  before you can use the treadmill they try to get you to subscribe to ifit  it is not needed  seems like a little trickery on nordictrack and ifit

i just got this treadmill and love it already  this treadmill is pretty solid  i was worried that it might be wobbly but it felt totally balanced  it folds up nicely too  it s definitely not commercial grade but it s the next best thing  especially for the price  it took my husband and a friend about    minutes to put it together amazon does not make it easy to activate your free   year membership and still have not gotten that figured out yet  also  you do not need to get ifit to activate  just hold the ifit bluetooth button for about    seconds and that unlocks your tread

the cons are  the frame is poorly made  a bolt on each side of the arms did not thread at all  luckily there is   bolts and   of them hold well on each side  not impressed about parts not threading  also  they place screws into parts that need to be removed before putting it together  this was an issue as one of the screws was so locked inside that even a power tool wouldnt remove it  i had to use wd   along with different pliers to remove it  took   hours to put together start to finish the pros  it works really well  i had no issue with the motor  no skips  and i ran for an hour straight  i read reviews prior to purchasing  and i was able to avoid the ifit sign up nonsense by holding the ifit button for a few seconds in order to turn on the machine   i will say though  they had about   warning labels to sign up or you cant turn it on  however i ignored them all and held the button to avoid it and had no issue  the motor worked great  the elevation worked perfect as well as speeding up and slowing down  as long as the arms hold  i dont care that   bolt isnt seating correctly  however it s pretty sad that this expensive machine isnt built correctly  pretty sad coming from a name brand like nortic  so i wont be giving a great review  not impressed

we got our treadmill and prior to purchasing it were skeptical about the     length of t   si   i can tell you that it is not an issue at all  i am       and don t ever feel like i will go off the back edge while running or walking  the treadmill is very sturdy  comfortable to run on  and we love the ifit  it makes a treadmill fun and keeps workouts fresh each and every time that we get on it for a run or a trail hike  the ifit trainers on screen are informative and offer tips while the workout plays on screen we really enjoy the treadmill automatically making incline and speed changes to match the on screen workout  as you go along  this treadmill makes the old  boring  mundane workouts fun as time passes quickly with the interactive on screen trainer guiding you through the workouts i did a lot of research  and if you want a solid treadmill with some nice technology features you can t go wrong with this one  it doesn t have a     peloton screen  but in my opinion the     screen is plenty big for what you need to follow along with the trainers

do not buy this   it took four hours to build and the belt was off center from day one  tried to adjust it and the holes for the allen wrench don t line up with opening  i suspect this is part of the problem   not happy about feeling like i am running on ice with a new treadmill and then it won t fix itself  following the directions both in the manual and on numerous websites

the treadmill itself is okay now that its assembled    it isn t too noisy  the bottom feels solid  and i like the fan in the front  that said  it was super confusing and frustrating to assemble    and i usually like assembling things  to be specific  the box treadmill itself is very heavy and the screws flimsy plastic pieces are hard to align  the instructions say not to use power tools but there were some screws we just couldn t turn without them  we finally forced it together after    hours if you do purchase this  make sure you have a big space to assemble  at least two people  and a ton of patience

i been thinking about purchasing a treadmill for a longtime   finally i decided to get one now cause the coronavirus  we have to stay at home all day  it take us  two people  about two hours to set up during the time four screws can not match the holes so we have to use electric drill to make one   last thing to activate the treadmill the website ask your credit card  name  billing information then tell you how to activate i don t suggest you do so cause they gonna charge the fee from your credit card very month until you cancel the ifit service  just hold the blue ifit button for    seconds then you can use your treadmill

i was very excited for this product  i can t rate the ease of assembly since i used the amazon service  the package arrived fine but when i was watching the guy put it together some of the parts appeared to already have been used  i m wondering if i received one that someone sent back  the quality of the parts are the same of a treadmill half the price  i bought one in college for      and the only upgrade from that one to this one is the screen  it does that job but isn t worth the mark up

it was great the first   months  the last month the belt slowly began scooting to one side making a weird noise  the belt is now running on the side plastic on top of the treadmill and under the treadmill it is on top of the bar that is supposed to hold it in place  disappointed  at this point i m afraid to keep using it  not sure how safe it is with the belt rubbing on the machine side

i did research many treadmills and ended up purchasing this one among others here are reasons   width and length are wider and longer than others  within my budget   auto incline feature  i did not want any fitness subscription service  foldable treadmill  at least speed up to    and more and more incline feature than other treadmillsi am an avid runner and run outside most of the time  living in seattle area  during winter season  it is hard to run outside during rainy days  so i decided to purchase a treadmill  some people commented this treadmill is for entry level or mid level runners or walkers  it really depends on what people need i normally set the speed for   or    and incline level from   to     alternate  during my running for    mins to an hour  that is more than good enough exercise for me  this treadmill responses quickly when i want to incline and speed up  number blinks until the desire set incline level or   and speed level is met which is a nice feature to let me know ifit  i got the help from many people s comment  pushing ifit button for    second to bypass  one thing  i ve noticed is the inaccurate number for calories that i burn during running or walking  it is quite off from my smart watch  probably  it is a mix of unable to factor into my weight  height and age plus more also some people mentioned about the treadmill s noise level  i don t think it is noisy putting this treadmill into a room or even in a garage  yes it does make some noise comparing to treadmills in a spacious healthclub  it is rather a room size making sound louder in my opinon  my health club treadmills might be equally noisier if you put one in a small room  knowing health culb treadmills are being used many hours per day and nearly   days a week  assembling this treadmill will take a while  about   to   hours depending on your skill   it is a heavy equipment here are tips unless you place the treadmill box on the exact spot where you want to work out  even then you will have to take it out and assemble   you will have to move it after taking it out from the box and assembling it assembling a folding up rod first will help you because now you can fold up the treadmill and moving the treadmill with pre attached two rollers on the bottom of the frame  i was able to roll the treadmill to the location where i want it to be without lifting it up   this method does not work if your treadmill is deliver to one area and you will have to move it to a different floor i purchased a cheap bluetooth receiver  which connected to my treadmills aux   now my treadmill is a bluetooth enabled device  listening sound from the treadmill s speakers is better than from my phone one thing that i commonly saw from the reviews  not limited to amazon   there might be some broken pieces during shipping and handling  or even during packing   mine also came with a broken cup holder screw housing which i had to modify  it was so minor and i did not want to call either amazon or nordictrack  in short  this treadmill is for anyone unless you compete for professional level of running  noise level is similar to my health club commercial ones  and assembly is not hard but time consuming with a well written instruction

nice treadmill my first  i was able to put it together mostly  i could not install the spring loaded stop under the treadmill which is needed to fold it up  the reason being the treadmill is too heavy for me to lift up and install that part build quality is a meh  there are frayed cables under the treadmill which is worrisome  but i have not had any issues so far  i will update this as i have more input  but this is something i will use pretty much only during the winter months here in new england and oh  ifit app i don t care about and it is quite annoying to go through that step

we ordered this treadmill at the beginning of the covid shut down and i m so glad we did  assembly took the better part of an afternoon  though it was not difficult  we followed the steps carefully and found the instructions easy to follow after several months of near daily use by myself and my husband  who is      it shows no signs on wear and still performs like new  it is smooth and doesn t jerk like some other treadmills  folding the running platform up and down is super easy  too the only thing to note  and this isn t really a bad thing  is that once you pair your phone with it  it automatically pairs when the machine turns on  this is obviously a great feature for convenience  however  if two people are going to use it  be aware that if the other person s phone is paired and the paired phone is out of range  it will beep loudly until it is unpaired  now when my husband wants to use it  i have to unpair my phone  it s not a big deal at all  just something to be aware of

this treadmill does everything you want  sturdy  fairly quiet  good size  runs smooth  fun to assemble  arrived on time  all great when you turn it on  however  it wants you to  activate  and subscribe  to some jokers at ifit com  ummm  no  in fact hells to the no  if it had actually made me subscribe just to make it run  i would have returned it  but  some clever person on a review found out that if you just hold the ifit button for    seconds on the consol  it skips over the activation nonsense   if the app schmozzle from iowa teaches us anything it is that machines and systems do not need to be connected to apps to work or work better  take a lesson out of commander adama and dont network devices  be they voting apps of even treadmills

i bought this nordic track model  i spent       with takes on it  the specifications says it would support someone weighing     lbs  i weight     lbs and in the first year of use the treadmill broke i bought amazon extended warranty for this  i called nordic track service department a week ago  i called again today to find out the status of the repair order and they said the walking board is not in stock   they said it may take another   or   weeks for them to receive it i am frustrated with the treadmill

it took me about   hours to take the treadmill out of the shipping carton  read the assembly  instructions  and put it together   it requires a   mm socket wrench  an   mm box wrench  a number   phillips screwdriver  and an included hex wrench   the provided hex wrench was inadequate given the number of bolts requiring it then once it was together  one of the wiring connectors hadn t seated properly and the inclination controls didn t work   after speaking with their customer service department  i disassembled the control panel again  reseated all of the wiring connectors  and then everything worked properly if i were to repeat this  i would make certain i had a hex head socket so that i could use a ratchet to install the bolts   just that simple tool might have saved one hour once it was assembled and working it proved to be a very nice product   we use it daily  it is quiet and works well in our home

i did a lot of research and read a lot of reviews before purchasing this treadmill and i was not disappointed  i love it  i love that there are programs to choose from  as i m not motivated to push myself on my own  and the automatic incline is very smooth  the option to use ifit is nice too  although i personally don t use it  the buttons are very simple and straightforward  i do wish that it had a speaker to play my music through  but overall i m happy  the running track is very large and it feels smooth when in use  the display is a little simplistic  but  again  the track and the programs were more what i was looking for and i m very happy with them  and the warranty is great too  would definitely recommend

ok  well    my wife took like     hours to put together and it was driving us crazy  that s mainly because the manual doesn t mention anything about the use of tools  and  the installation video we saw on youtube recommended hand tightening the screws  do not attempt this  having a socket wrench or power tools will make the installation much easier some people mentioned something about not being able to log on without activating the ifit free trial  that is true  it is not true that if you hold down the ifit button for    seconds that it will bypass this  it asks for a cc for autobilling afterwards  but that s optional the treadmill seems to be working fine  it has a wide belt and feels sturdy  doesn t shake at all  i had to request a replacement part for the rod that lets you fold up the treadmill  it s been a bit of a nightmare putting this thing together in entirety  but hopefully it s worth it  because it feels like a good quality machine otherwise

keeping in mind that this is not a  pro  level or gym caliber model  this unit has no trouble keeping up in terms of speed   incline motor has some difficulty keeping up with some of the workout programs and requires some manual re setting to work   the quality of the programming on ifit is superb  and it comes as a great surprise given the affordability   the training is top notch and covers all types of fitness  combining weight training with treadmill exercises and an excellent logging system   live workouts are excellent and allow interaction with the trainers   the programming is so effective you will find yourself staying on the treadmill for double or triple the time you would normally exercise   unlike trendy workouts and fitness trends in the  insanity  or the  crossfit  mindset  trainers push you hard but also utlize ample rest and recovery techniques   this results in greater long term improvement and prevents injury

received this today and i love it      it took me and my husband about an hour and a half to put it together   i tried using the bilt app it suggests however  i understood the printed instructions easier   i did receive the   year ifit   a gift card came with the machine   i used it tonight and the ifit is awesome   the machine is not too loud  it is smooth to use and  the incline is smooth   i would highly recommend this treadmill

i ve had my treadmill since the end of march without any issues   it was a covid quarantine purchase and i use it almost daily   assembly was not difficult  but i did require my wife s assistance at the end to install the rods so the treadmill can fold up   i ended up purchasing another nt studio cycle that came with a year of ifit  so i use my treadmill with the ifit program too   the t     s does not have a built in tablet  so i connect my ipad via bluetooth and screen mirror to a tv   although  i did not think i would enjoy the automated  resistance and speed changes with the ifit programming  i have found those features enhance my workouts   the treadmill is very responsive to the automated changes   the treadmill is quiet and folds easily for space saving capabilities as well   the incline       and speed    mph  are adequate for me  but i know my wife would prefer a higher incline for the ifit hiking programs   overall  i am more than satisfied with my purchase  and will likely purchase more equipment from nt in the future

after using it for around   year before my warranty expired  i had problem with my treadmill belt  console and side bars  i contacted the customer support  they took the photos of the damages  they put me on hold and checked with the support technicians and informed me that they would be sending me the treadmill walking mat alone  the rusted side bars and the console won t be replaced  they claimed it is because of misuse like placing the treadmill in open or water   also when i asked about a technician to be sent for the treadmill walking mat  they informed that they cannot send a technician because of the  gross  condition of the treadmill and i have to pay for the technician i could not understand what would one expect the condition of the treadmill when it is used for an year  i doubt the quality of the components used in the product  it could not withstand the usage not even   year  but the support claims that the equipment used for    years is still in a good condition i am totally dissatisfied with the quality of the product and the support

i owned a schwinn     p treadmill for the last    years  but it got old and kind of wore out  so i decide to purchase a new treadmill and decided on the nordictrack ntl     t     s  as soon as the treadmill was set up i tried it out and it s a beautiful piece of equipment  i feel i ll get my moneys worth out of it many times more than what i paid for it  beautiful piece of equipment  the delivery of the treadmill was fantastic  it was delivered exactly the hour they said it would be and delivered right to my front door wonderful job amazon  and the  technician came out two days later exactly on time very wonderful person and put my treadmill together like a pro  i could ve done it myself but having him do it was well worth the money  very nice guy  amazon your company is getting better every day and thank you  fred

it took me   hour to unlock this machine    kind of felt like a scam      assembly instruction graphics are difficult to make out see unless you have perfect vision this machine that i already paid several hundred dollars for  can only be activated by not going to nordictrack s website  but instead to ifit com which requires you to sign up for their     mo membership   what the heck   ok  yes there is a    day free trial but you still want my credit card and remember to cancel it after a month   it all feels shady   seriously   tell me its an option not a requirement to just use what i already paid for   nordictrack should be the one to unlock my machine as part of the warranty registration process   let me use it first before you start asking for more money   i was so annoyed after putting it together  that all i wanted to do was run off some steam   it took me   hour to get this machine to start working   two different phone numbers  both of which are ifit  and all recordings insist you must register with ifit com before anyone can talk to you   finally i pressed the correct button combo that told me to hold down on a  bluetooth  button until it turned green and it would unlock   first off the button was not the bluetooth icon or even that name   it was the ifit button   oh and i tried that several times  and once it turned green  i let go just as the recorded message instructed   nope that didn t do it either   holding the button down for almost a minute did the trick  surprise   and i was able to use the treadmill   so easy and simple once you figure that out on your own

for it s price  it s really great  i have it on my  nd floor on my house  and the noise and shaking is very minimal  it runs pretty smooth  i typically do     mph for    minutes and haven t run into many problems  it s very easy to change speeds  has strong supports  and a great display  you can even open a browser and use it like any other device when connected to internet  assembly was super easy  all materials were delivered on time and instructions were super clear and easy to understand  definitely recommend as a reasonably priced treadmill

we love this treadmill  my husband and i have had this for close to   months now  i researched different brands  models  sizes  and technologies and this one is really blowing us out of the water  the deck itself is very sturdy  we have also been very impressed with the options coming from ifit across different programs  the only wish we have is that the screen was a little more mobile  it only has the ability to shift up and down a small amount  but not a huge issue  if you have been overwhelmed with all of the options out there  just give this one a shot  it isn t a commercial grade treadmill  but it has all the little bells and whistles that make you feel like you are on one

this is a very basic treadmill that will get to a steep incline  and speed up to a pace that gets you to a moderate job  i and my wife are of average height and it s good enough for us  it is not for people are in good shape and want to do hiit trainings  or want to get to sprints also  i have to say this is a terribly designed product for assembly  when delivered it has four basic parts   running base  console  two  sturdy  metal legs to connect the base to the console   this should not require    hours to assemble  however the treadmill is plagued with bad design which makes assembly a real pain  i assembled it  it wouldn t turn on and i had to partially disassemble to fix a disconnected power supply cable  joining the base to the console requires used   different screws   washers for the same joining part with the metal legs  and the holes are in the most awkward places   all of which makes the assembly process unnecessarily frustrating and could have been avoided if designers had taken more care also  as others have pointed out   you do not need ifit activation to use the treadmill  it s all false advertising to force you into a trial ifit subscription  terrible customer centric design  please stop nordictrack    god help me if i have to call in for support
