i love love my treadmill its very comfortable to walk on its easy to operate manually i enjoy the music while i am walking i love the ifit i choose the intensity of my workout accordung to my ability or mood that day i love the trainers  they explain everything as they walk i have virtually visited many countries it helped me plan my trip to turkey lol i love how to can control the sound of the trainers the only thing i wish it had was a pause button so i can goo back later to finish the workout i love how the y control the incline and the speed i need that control love it love it and love it

i bought this treadmill eleven months ago and have experienced nonstop issues with it  the belt came out of the box uncentered which a professional had to fix after it caused a tear within two months  then a few months later  the belt folded over while i was using it  i contacted customer support since it s under warranty for twelve months  well  they outsource that to a third party and they re very hard to get a hold of  i wonder why   after a month of not being able to use it  i got the new belt installed and it still has issues  i know this is a  cheaper  treadmill relative to the multi thousand dollar ones out there  but for        it should be a serviceable product  this is not  avoid nordic altogether

it took a little while  almost   hours  to get it set up but it was worth the effort  the feature i like most about it is  i can see the trainers walking ahead of me and if they go too fast  i can adjust the speed to my convenience  what i also like is the volume  i can turn the sound off or on  while off  i can watch tv without getting distracted  the areas which the trainers show around the world are very exciting and interesting to view  they show me places where i have never been but would like to visit  the free ifit membership does wonders for me because they have training programs that suit every need  even live  especially for me to lose weight while walking  jogging or running which is much healthier than going outside to do the same

writing this    days after having this unit   there are so many units to choose today all with plenty of features and capabilities   to put this review in context  i have a gym membership and go four times a week and use their commercial equipment    by far i am not a health nut or exercise fanatic    i mostly go to stay in basic shape   what i realized is i was spending the majority my time at the gym  and driving back and forth  just to hit the treadmill and bicycles for cardio   so i opted to purchase this unit and a schwinn cardio bike for home  both for less than      happy with my choice  saves me time in the morning  kids use it  can just hop on it anytime   that said if you re looking for a solid treadmill that does most everything you need that feels very close to the weight and stature of a gym model this unit has really impressed me   it s heavy duty  belt is lighter than a gym model but still solid  cushions are just right for aggressive runs  deck it a good thickness  i weigh    lbs  and it feels much like a commercial unit without the   k and north price   i would suggest that you not overspend and buy a unit tauting a bunch of bells and whistle s that you ultimately will not use   the t   s has all of the core features every treadmill offers   it has ifit  don t use it  and solid program options to vary the work out   what it lacks is a lot of hi tech features that i personally think are what most of us really don t use because we have better alternatives at home   example is bluetooth   no bt on this unit   it has an    th jack and speakers in the console   to be honest no treadmill can out perform my little      bose sounddock mobile speaker or bt headphones connected to my phone   so why pay for subpar audio equipment   no cooling fan   i use a far more functional vornado fan when it gets warm that circulates air throughout the room   i would have liked to have it polar compatible so my pulse chest strap would feed the console   i have to wear the watch   btw  the console is great  simple  easy to read and has several modes and rotations to monitor different aspects of your run   ok  so no complaints on this unit at all and i am pleased that it was extremely inexpensive   highly recommend for a near commercial home unit

we had a very very old sears treadmill that didn t have any bells and whistles  we wanted something with programs and ability to incline   i love that it does this automatically  i went with this unit after doing a lot of research on different models and ultimately the warranty and brand name had something to do with our decision the unit arrived by carrier and we paid for the extra so they would put it in our basement  delivery service was very nice and professional  the unit arrived well packed and in great condition  it took about   hours to put together  having a second person helped a lot   especially when attaching the bar to support for folding  i would suggest having a socket wrench to make the installation of bolts quicker and easier  i loved how the screws  bolts  washers and nuts came on a card with the step numbers  so when your looking in the manual to put together you look at what step your on  say step    and you look at the card for step   and there are the screws or bolts you need  i think we will be very pleased

my husband and i gifted this to each other for our new years resolution of getting healthy  i am in love with it  i searched high and low and did so much research to end up back here  it is affordable and does not feel cheap at all  assembly takes   people no doubt about that  it is heavy so having the delivery people place it in the home and assemble is probably the best bet if you dont have any extra hands  i read all the negative reviews about ifit  first of all you can bypass it by holding the button down for    seconds  second of all i would not use this without my ifit app  i love it  i do not work out i hate running so having an app that can control my workout keeps me motivated  plus on days i dont want to run or climb i can do yoga or weight training with it  it s     month  cheaper than the gym member ship i wasted for   years and never went  the box was damaged upon delivery however the product inside was not  if you re actually serious about using it  this is an amazing option  if not you ll have an expensive place to hang your laundry

this treadmill is great  folds easily and it has a slow release when you let it down  really like that  the belt is wide enough you don t feel closed in and it is a smooth ride  the incline is amazing and the speed seems to be right on track to what i was doing outside  i love it as for the ifit subscription  you do get a    free trial  but all you have to do is hold down the ifit button until it beeps and your on manual with    preset workouts or you can manually go from there as you prefer don t hesitate  buy it   it s wonderful

the first treadmill was delivered  everything was going smoothly tech showed up next day to assemble and took notice the motor housing tabs were cracked i decided to do an exchange and a week later the men came picked up the broken dropped off the new the next day the tech came in and assembled let us know the ins and outs then left never actually starting the machine for me  i was having a crazy day and didn t think of it  but he should have offered to do that the machine is not working and will have to send it back      again what a horrible and stressful experience i mean c mon   machines in a row  i d say the manufacturer better look into quality control a little more closer wow i am still in disbelief what a worthless piece of junk this treadmill is now i m going to have to take time off work to meet someone between a certain window of time to have them come and pick this already assembled machine up  and get it the heck out of my house lovely just what i wanted to do

fairly easy to assemble  onboard workouts don t function the way i was expecting  if you re planning on signing up for ifit i would not recommend this machine  first of all  it is really not accessible on the machine as you have to use either your phone or ipad to select your workouts and then download them to the machine  i couldn t get this process to complete even after being on the phone with ifit for over   hours  i have had machines with ifit before and an ifit membership so i know what it is and what i expected from this machine  i wish i had waited and got a better treadmill from costco for the same price that did have ifit actually on it as well as a free full year of ifit membership  which became available after i already had this one  the treadmill is more basic but works for just getting my daily steps in during this pandemic  just disappointing

i love this treadmill  nordictrack    s  i jog about   times per week and walk very fast the other days about   miles per day  after my first attempt in getting this treadmill with very poor delivery people  i paid extra to have it delivered to my exercise room and the delivery people were in no way prepared to even get it out of the truck  and a broken treadmill  our second attempt produced great  strong delivery people with an intact treadmill  yay  my husband and i put it together in about an hour  it went together pretty smoothly and then i adjusted the track to center before getting on it  it works great  like other reviews  i bypassed the ifit by pressing the ifit button for    seconds  the    programs are more than enough for me  i am able to plug in my ipad to the accessory cable and watch whatever tv show or listen to whatever podcast i want through the treadmill stereo which is great  overall  i m very happy and will continue to love the usa made nordictrack

quality is fine  nothing fabulous but good for home use  a little noisy but nothing that isn t easily drowned out by headphones or a tv with the volume slightly turned up  my biggest issue was with the instructions  there were definitely a few steps missing but with a little common sense you can figure it out  however the one step that s missing something that could result in a bigger issue is around the hydraulic stand  there s a small metal piece holding the hydraulic pole down in place and if you remove it at the wrong time you can t install the pole  which is what happened to me  the treadmill still runs fine but i m not able to fold it which really sucks because it takes up half of my workout room  also just to echo what most other reviews say you don t have to sign up for ifit to use it  that s just an illegal marketing tactic that amazon should honestly make the company remove

for those of you who get to step    putting the cross bar on  and think huh   yes the bar does fit and screws do fit but you do need a power tool to get them in  even though the instructions tell you not to use one   the cross bar also looks as though it fits awkwardly  but it all comes together once screwed in  after that  its plain sailing    but it is for sure a two person job   and yes  if you press and hold the button it will turn on without  activation   but you do need the red magnet on first i havent used it much yet so i will update if something goes wrong  overall seems very sturdy and not noisy bottom line   if you generally hate assembling things or are not a  handy  person  this one is tricky  so pay to have it done

great quality treadmill once you get it up and running  but that s the rub  assembly is difficult with bolts in difficult to reach places and takes quite a bit of fiddling to line up bolts with thread holes   and don t even talk to me about activating the treadmill   the website is very user unfriendly and you can t talk to an actual person until you register online which is constantly interrupted by solicitations for protection plans   the final insult is after you get through all the registration stuff you are told to  press the bluetooth button until a green light comes on    they don t mention that you have to hold until the screen changes to the treadmill menu   prefer the old days when you just plugged the treadmill in and worked out

i ve used this treadmill almost every day for   months   it s a decent machine  but very basic   the set up was not easy  but no treadmill set up is easy  it was on par with other treadmill assembly procedures   i didn t want the ifit so i bypassed that by putting the key on and then pushing the ifit button and holding until it disabled it this treadmill works fine for how i use it  which is to get on manual mode and walk with incline for    minutes   i wish it had a better  calories burned  calculator  it doesn t ask for body weight  so it s not accurate    i also wish that the incline went higher than      also there is no fan on this model  which i didn t think i would mind  but occasionally i wish it was there   all in all  its a fine treadmill  but i do wish i had spent another     to get the features i am missing

it is impossible to plug this treadmill in an just start working out  you must wait for the ifit stuff to load before you can choose manual workout  that sometimes takes multiple touches of the  convenient  touch screen  then you have to cancel the warm up  it is only after all this hassle that you can select a speed and incline  i would think very carefully before purchasing this treadmill because of this  it s very inconvenient this treadmill is a really great piece of equipment  heavy duty and works great  however  think long and hard about where you will place it in your home  i expected amazon to provide inside delivery and assembly  but because of covid     they did not provide that service  and amazon didnt tell me this   it was the delivery driver  to say i was disappointed and a bit irritated  is an understatement i planned to install this upstairs in my home and the deck  or base if you will  to this treadmill is extremely heavy  as you might expect   it took two of us to haul it up the stairs and that was just the beginning  the design is good  but assembly is not easy for one person  some of the crevices that you have to get a socket wrench into are pretty small and the control panel is very tricky for one person to install  in retrospect  you really need a two person team to put this together  unfortunately  i was on my own the ifit guided workouts are pretty much overly talkative people on videos   really not worth the money or time  you ll need a    amp dedicated circuit with this beast or you will trip the breaker

we purchased our nordictrack t series    si treadmill to stay healthy during covid      it was the best decision we could have made   i love the ifit membership and all the programs it has for the treadmill   since i cannot travel to other countries right now i use the programs to visit many different locations   the treadmill follows the program in speed and incline   and is a great work out   the only issue i had was that the belt kept shifting to the right past the guide markers   after contacting nordictrack support and following their instruction the adjustment was made and all is good i would recommend this treadmill hands down

got the machine on time  put it together with patience  if you follow directions no big issues  ready to turn on and      is asking me to register at ifit com  its sunday night and after adding all my info  ifit com wants  to force me into adding my credit card for a  free     day trial or it won t let me try my new threadmill because i have to enter some code to start it  and since it s sunday night no one is available to talk at ifit com i am livid that i cannot use this machine review will continue once i resolve this dust collector as of now

the nordictrack t series treadmill is a high quality treadmill  reasonably priced  and the delivery was coordinated very well with amazon s delivery subcontractor  it is a challenge to assemble  but the directions and easy to follow  my wife and daughter use the treadmill a fair amount  and expect when winter of      sets in  the usage will increase  i would highly recommend the nordictrack t series treadmill

i can t quite give this treadmill a   star rating simply because it represents a basic design element that seems to be typical of most  if not all nordictrack treadmills   the front edge of the tread is far too close to the edge of the frame platform structure  such that it is virtually impossible to hold the bar to check the heart rate without kicking or stepping onto the frame platform forward of the actual moving tread while walking in a normal upright manner   other brands have designed the tread to travel at least   additional inches forward of the bar so that it does not require one to lean forward in an unnatural position to reach the bar   it has taken a while to adjust to this awkward stance  so i check my heart rate less frequently   otherwise  this model has a smooth tread run and supports a comfortable impact   since i purchased this model as heavily discounted on cyber monday       i feel it is still not a bad buy

i am very happy so far with this treadmill  i was looking for a few months before finally pulling trigger on this one  its super quiet and has automatic incline which for this price is hard to find  i trust the brand nordictrack and am really liking using this treadmill people said you have to pay a monthly fee in the app but you don t unless you use their workout plans  you only need to sign up for the account once and don t need to have the app open while using my only qualm is the completely inaccurate heartbeat pulse reader  its awful

orientation when you move it to wherever you want it  it also requires careful reading of instructions  a few of your own tools  and about   hours to assemble  but it s not impossible to figure out and i have assembled much more frustrating things in my life  and it definitely was nowhere near that  getting the ifit to sync with the treadmill was frustrating  it was not straight forward and took several attempts  after   hours of assembly i was so excited to turn this thing on aaaand i couldn t for another   hours trying to get the dang ifit to sync  i almost gave up at about   pm  my partner was miffed  i was disappointed  and if you don t get ifit for at least a try  which is a separate purchase and not cheap   your machine is locked and will not turn on  which was not clear when i made my purchase but luckily i decided i wanted to try it when i purchased it    other people may have found this a particularly unpleasant surprise  i mostly blame the seller for not making this detail clear about this unit  just please  please for your own sanity and time  do your homework before you get it on your front door step  you ll have plenty of time  it took almost   months to get here  that was the other frustration  when i checked out  i was asked to schedule a time for it to get here  i said some day in june  when i went back to my orders  it said it was delayed a whole extra however  i don t understand why you have to schedule a drop off when they are going to just leave it outside your door like they do with all of my other deliveries that i don t have to schedule  i was almost expecting someone to come in and set it up  no such luck  now for the positive side  because ending on a high note is good  and ido actually love my treadmill after the rocky start     i am            lbs and my partner is           lbs  and we both use it all the time  i got this one because of how sturdily built it was and how well backed it is by nordick track  i wanted something that could be used regularly by multiple people of varying heights and weights  it does this job very well and with all things considered  i would make the purchase again

so i waited a whole month to see how it feels before i post a review  i love this treadmill together with the ifit plan it comes with  i respect the decision for some users who don t want use ifit but for me it is just what i needed  i love the way the incline automatically adjusts with ifit  something i never used to touch in the gym treadmills  i love the different challenges that come with ifit  the delivery of the treadmill was great and so far i have not had any problem with the treadmill

absolute garbage  had i known that some random trash company called ifit would hold this hostage i never would have spent      on it  knew it was going to be a nightmare once i opened the box and saw   different things saying  product locked visit trash website to active   went to the website where you have to give your credit card info for a monthly subscription to continue  i don t want a monthly subscription  i just want my treadmill to work  there s a phone number listed on one of the warnings which going through call tree options states  hold the bluetooth button to activate   small problem with that  there s no bluetooth on my treadmill  just a an ifit button that does nothing no matter how long you hold it

i love running and walking  but i never wanted to invest in a treadmill because if the weather is crappy  i would just go to the gym and run or walk there  well  thanks to covid     i can no longer rely on that option because it s really hard to run with a cotton mask draped across your face  so  one rainy morning this summer  i bit the bullet and bought one  i found this model on amazon because it was the highest rated for the price range  and i can see why  this is an excellent machine  it is sturdy and reliable  it has great features  like one touch speed and incline buttons  i m sure there are a bunch of features i don t even know about because i haven t really explored yet  but it definitely serves my purposes  and it doesn t make that much noise  either  my only regret is not buying this sooner  i would recommend this treadmill to anyone in the market for an exceptional piece of workout equipment the only thing that wasn t so good is i was not able to secure the kickstand thingy to the bottom so it can fold and absorb shock when it unfolds  but that s not a big deal to me  i just leave it unfolded all the time  and i m guessing it s user error more than anything  i ve never assembled something like this before

my bf and i moved into our dtla studio last year and had researched treadmills for   months before finally pulling the trigger on this one  we decided on this one because it s compact  and it truly is   has all the basic buttons we need  no big screens  no fans  no extra nothing   and the price point could not be beat  amazon delivered it in no more than    days after purchase and it was delivered inside our home  we don t fold the treadmill up as we don t have much furniture but i would definitely see someone with need of more space or people with children to find this option useful and easy  the treadmill is a bit on the heavy side so rolling this treadmill around from one room to another would be quite difficult  we have ours stationary  so definitely imagine where you d place this baby before your purchase and read the dimensions  the screen is definitely one touch and buttons are nice and big so very legible  we knew we wouldn t need the ifit program since there are hundreds of yt videos to help with your workout routine at home  but the membership gave us a scope of what great workouts they offer  if you re into one on one trainers  this might be a great option for you  this treadmill does have bluetooth capacity  however it does not connect to your phone tablet for music on say spotify or yt  it only connects to the ifit app and you can only use this app if you re paying for it after the   month trial  this treadmill also has an aux input with built in speakers for your ipod  you may also use this input with your phone if you buy a separate adapter  the flex select feature on this treadmill is by far my favorite  when running on this treadmill  you can choose to exercise as if you were running outdoors  on concrete  or run indoors  sorta gliding  as you would at an indoor gym so intensity is an option and you can change it by turning the orange silicone knobs at the bottom of the treadmill  the belt is sturdy and if properly maintained this treadmill will not disappoint you  lastly  you have options of up to     incline with intervals of    and up to    mph  if you need assistance with assembly  usage  or just workouts don t be afraid to use yt

customer service is horrible    machine is very difficult to set up     you have to jump through hoops after it is assembled   you cant just get on it and go   it wont even turn on until you  activate it  so they can up sell you more programs apps etc    worst purchase i nave ever made

the treadmill is great  it s sturdy  runs pretty quiet and doesn t have a large footprint   great shock absorber system  i m very happy with it  highly recommended   notice that there is no assembly service in norman oklahoma  as well as other places i assume   however the most frustrating thing is that they tell you that in order to use the treadmill for the first time you must unlock it by logging in to the ifit website and activate it   this requires creating a user name and putting in your credit card info which they say they will not use     you then have to cancel your membership before    days so they won t charge you   i don t want the ifit service   i am a certified trainer  i just want to run and i certainly don t want to give you my credit card info   after some time trying to find how to bypass this  i contacted nordictrack customer service and they told me that you don t need to activate it online if you don t want the ifit service  just hold the ifit button for    sec and it will unlock your machine  it worked like a charm  i wish this info would have appeared on amazon  maybe included in the product info

there are some warranty issues  electrical  at times trips circuit breaker  and belt won t stay centered also there sending me a repair kit for the roller adjuster and they expect me to install it  they had me install a apc plug in unit in the outlet plug and this did nothing to help the breaker tripping issue  so after   weeks i am still at square one  their hesitant to send a technician to the house  i had a electrician on my own come to check out the house outlets and he found no problem and he won t touch the tread mill machined  i expect to receive the roller adjuster this week and will call them back and request  serviceman came to the house to address both problems  other wise it s a good machine as i am able to use it

great treadmill for the price  one thing i want to point out is that  compared to my apple watch  i would absolutely not recommend going by the heart rate or calories burned  it claims my heart rate was    when my apple watch had me at      the calories could be off anywhere from        calories off on any given workout  as in it tells you that you burned more than you actually did   also  listen to top review  hold the ifut button to bipass the sign in junk

overall   i had bought a nordictrack treadmill similar to this years ago and got a lot of great use out of it  the only reason i sold it is because we were moving and the rental we were moving in to didn t have space for it  we bought a new home recently and i have a big workout space now and tracked down a similar model from amazon and got it in january when they were running some discounts  overall it s been a great machine and i ve already put    hours and about     miles on it     assembly   i bought the package deal where an installer comes to assemble it  so all i can say is that he didn t have any issues and it took him less than an hour  been solid since     general use   it s a mid range treadmill but it gives me most of what i need  i do run some of the ifit programs that vary speed and elevation and every once in a while it would be nice to have more than a     incline  but not very often  when it comes to speed  i m rarely sprinting even at the max speed of   mph  so it s plenty fast  speed and incline controls are decently responsive but there are times you have to hit the button more than once to get it to react  transitions to a higher or lower speed or incline are just fine  wouldn t want them any faster or slower   the width and length of the treadmill are great and i m       and never feel crowded   i have some suggestions for improvement  but i ll write those below     ifit   i ve used some of the ifit programs and enjoyed them  probably a lot more to get out of them  but the screen on the treadmill isn t huge so not as engaging as i d like  it s more about the automatic program control of the speed and incline that s valuable to me   the buttons on the touchscreen are kind of small and not super responsive  they work and i get around fine on it  but it can be sluggish and often requires multiple attempts to get a button to respond  kind of like a smartphone ten years ago  not perfect   the other big issue is that i have not found a way to sync the ifit program to a computer screen or tv in any way  my old nordictrack with ifit allowed you to use the ifit website and sync what was going on with the treadmill on the computer screen  i think that feature has been removed as far as i can tell and there s no way to use an appletv  roku  computer  or anything else to see a larger picture of the screen so you re left with a small screen only  i called support multiple times on this  but it seems this isn t available and only high end models have an hdmi out  probably a    part  that would work perfectly   oh well  i m living with it  but it was a surprise to find out that this treadmill couldn t do what a similar nordictrack treadmill    years ago could do     suggestions   don t want these suggestions for improvement imply that i m not happy with the treadmill  i am   it can just get better in a few key ways     see my ifit comments above  it s really been crippled in order to convince you to buy a much more expensive version just for the bigger screen  that s too bad     there no great place to put a water bottle  there are spots on the side  but they don t work like a drink holder at all and are kind of awkwardly placed  there s a shelf down below the controls  but i m not quite sure why it s there except to store stuff like a hrm or other gear  not a good spot for a water bottle while you re walking running     noises  overall i m happy with the noise level of the machine  but it makes a strange noise ever time as the incline goes down around    my other treadmill did the same thing  so i guess it s normal  but still kind of strange     like i mentioned above  buttons could be more responsive  when you re sprinting above  mph and you re ready to end your interval you reach for a slower speed and it would be great if it responded the first time every time   again  overall i m very pleased with the machine and it gets me through idaho winters without gaining     lbs  don t know what i d do without it

this is a fantastic treadmill  especially given the price  complaining about this treadmill is truly a first world problem  for starters  it is very reasonably priced considering most treadmills start around        additionally  some have mentioned that it s loud  we ll yes it s a treadmill   it s literally supporting your full bouncing weight as you run on it  so of course it makes noise  the machine itself isn t really all that noisy even when the belt is at full speed  lastly and most importantly  you do not have to register for ifit    to bypass  simply hold down the ifit button for    seconds and the treadmill will work  if you re looking for a basic treadmill with multiple speeds  inclines  and the option for ifit  this is for you

i started with an el  cheapo   this one works you harder   don t know how  but it does   manual says do not add silicone   that seems weird to me  i will find out as time goes on the leg uprights didnt like to fit on the cowling very well   seemed like a lot of stress on the plastic to get metal legs lined up but it did line up   i do have a wobble   a shim fixed that   could be from my garage floor unlevel   i did get it together by myself   some rope helped in the spots where you did need two people you do not need to sign up for ifit then cancel    unless you want ifit   just press the ifit button for      seconds and machine will bypass the online enrollment    you only need to do it once love the auto incline   i am tallish  the length and width is good for my stride   distance and time seem accurate  fairly identical to my last treadmill   the onboard display has a track graphic  wish that was bigger

great treadmill  but the other things first i would definitely recommend having a professional set it up  if i didn t have my husband helping me  i wouldn t have been able to do it alone because it s very heavy and awkward luckily  i read the other reviews saying you don t have to subscribe  which would have been a dealbreaker  but it s true  you don t have to subscribe this treadmill is great  i love it  it s exactly what i was looking for  it folds up nicely  but heavy duty enough to actually run  not just walk  on

this treadmill was perfect for us  the size fits just right in the room and we are completely satisfied with the quality of the product  i would recommend this purchase to anyone looking for home fitness

i had amazon assemble  less stress  i did a lot of research and bought this model  it does what it s intended to do and i love it  i knew how to bypass the ifit so i wasn t concerned with most of the negative reviews  after using ifit for a month i actually love it and will continue to pay the    a month  i ve always gotten bored quickly and don t consistently exercise because of that  the ifit keeps me engaged and controls the treadmill settings  i can always cancel if it gets old  hopefully they ll keep up to date on the workouts and keep it interesting  bottom line great treadmill for the price and ifit is a great accompaniment

months in and it seems to be working ok  while i appreciate the use of the ifit app i couldn t find workouts that fit exactly what i was looking for  the treadmill on it s own is great  side note for anyone who purchases one the comment that a two person assembly team is needed is not a suggestion  i am very capable of putting together anything that comes with instructions but due to the weight of the pieces you should definitely have help  also with the instruction not to used power tools when assembling the treadmill i had to use my drill on the hand rails to make them sufficiently tight  i simply did it little by little but without it there was no way i could get the screws tight enough to not wobble or seem loose

i have been using this for the past few months  its really nice to use and very useful exercise equipment for home  the quality of the product is really nice  no noticeable noise and smooth running  has that professions feel to the product  wish i did buy the one with the bigger display but the tablet mobile stand was useful had a bit of difficulty to assemble  could have designed it better for assembling  but worth the effort to get it assembled

easy to assemble   even though instructions call for two people i was able to assemble it myself   the treadmill is very stable and well built   the main thing i dislike is the mobility   to move the instructions tell you to grab the handles and use your foot to secure the leg and then tilt the treadmill back on the wheels   i feel this is dangerous   my old proform had the wheels in front so that all you had to do was lift the handles and move it into position   hopefully they will improve follow on models   there is no fan so i purchased a clip on from amazon   bypassed ifit   if they had offered it free for     months i would have signed up and tried it out   could not find data in ifit and how it would help me on the treadmill    maybe later they will offer it free for   months to see if it works for you before since you have to give them a credit card   one assembly problem   the silver ground screw would not work per instructions so i had to use a substitute   i have a case number but response is very slow   consider this a minor problem   bottom line is i love the treadmill and happy with my purchase

this treadmill truly surprised me with the size and how well it works  i ve been able to run pretty fast on it and the incline is pretty legit  it s like a knock off treadmill from orange theory  it s not too big  and not too loud  i have it in my room in my tiny nyc apartment and my roommates can t ever hear me using it  i m very happy with this purchase  i was skeptical because of how cheap it was  but soo worth it  also  to skip the ifit subscription when turning on  just hold down the ifit button until the subscription screen goes away also  semi easy to assemble  i had my boyfriend help me put it together  and it took us maybe an hour because he was making me actually help him

for the love of god pay to have it assembled  unpacking alone took me    min then two hours to assemble  and it s heavy   and don t fall for the ifit scam  if i wanted to pay        per month i would have joined a gym  one other reviewer said to hold down the ifit button for    seconds and you can start the treadmill without going to ifit com at all and signing up for something you may not want   worked for me and so far i m happy with the treadmill

weeks after purchase i still have one broken treadmill  incredibly difficult to assemble and then you discover the unit is broken  have spent hours on the phone and weeks waiting for parts  i just received my second repair part yet again the wrong one

i hate the fact that the treadmill is locked and it forces you to get this subscription  like the treadmill isn t enough to pay for geez  but other than that the treadmill is amazing  after skipping the subscription and testing the machine out it really works good

we ordered this treadmill when gyms closed in       it took quite some time to be delivered  but that s what happens these days   now that it s here  we really love the quality   it s stable  quiet  and can be used both in simple form or with  bells and whistles    two key things keeping it from   stars    it s an effort to get it put together   takes two people and some patience    the ifit requirement is a pain as other reviewers have mentioned   ifit is required to activate your machine  i could not find a way around it   i now have to go through and cancel the membership to ensure we are not charged after the   month trial  we have no interest in the ifit features  but if the live classes  etc  are of interest to you they do look good  and have quite a bit of variety

first off this treadmill is not easy to assemble  i am an engineer so i can put things together but the manufacturing of this is poor  two bolt holes were not threaded well and i could never get the bolts to thread in  one bolt hole was so far off i couldn t install that bolt  every bolt felt like it was going to strip if i tried to install it after i finally got it installed i was very disappointed  it claims that it can be used without the subscription  well  yes  but only in manual mode  the product description says it has    built in workouts but you still have to have a subscription to use them    this is very deceiving and in my opinion wrong  if they are built in then they should work without a subscription  very disappointed in this but how are you supposed to return a treadmill after it is assembled and the box was destroyed trying to get the pieces out  this is wrong

first tio   you do want to get a ratchet set if you don t have one  recommend the dewalt one from costco  the bottom bolt nearer to the middle is particularly difficult that s not the reason for my   star review though  sure  it s not the easiest to assemble and it s kinda weird to adjust it so that it s completely stable  it s the amazon pricing and price matching policy    days after i bought this item  amazon sold the t   s for      less  i called and they won t price match  take your business elsewhere if you re expecting good customer service   i m now going to activate wilibuy which i get from capital one to get alerted when amazon is not the best option if you do end up getting this  there is one thing i liked   the     delivery to any room  the fellas were easy to work with

when i saw the treadmill on line and realized it had to be assembled  i wondered   can an    year old put together        parts and make a whole machine   when the package arrived and i convinced the strong delivery men to lug it inside  i opened it and sure enough          parts   or so it seemed   but i set to work and  over two days  labored for about   hours   voila   my very own treadmill   it works just as well as the one i remember from that expensive gym i no longer belong to   my wife and i use it daily   it s a gem   already paid for itself in saved gym fees

you don t have to go to ifit com to activate the treadmill  the treadmill is not locked  this is very deceiving and nordic trac should not allow the wording  as a previous reviewer said  you can activate the machine by simply push and hold for    seconds or so the blue ifit button on the control board  make sure you put the key into the proper slot first  safe yourself the fee because they want your credit card  if you pay extra for installation when ordering  the mechanic should know this  but they don t  i am    years old and i don t need to fold it  but folding works if you need to

we enjoy our long walks outside along lake michigan when weather permits  but chicago weather doesn t always allow for that  especially during the cold months  so  we decided to get a treadmill so we could continue walking running indoors when needed  build quality is good and sturdy  and it doesn t feel like my      lbs is going to make it fall apart like most cheaper products  i did have to replace a part that was broken when i unpacked it  it s really heavy and bulky and the delivery guys really struggled to get it up to our second floor walkup apartment  so i was surprised not more was damaged  the part was replaced very quickly once i supplied the necessary info assembly took a while but the directions are clear and easy to follow  this model has a huge screen and came with a   year subscription of ifit included  both features are awesome  following behind a hot trainer on screen as they guide you through all sorts of workouts all over the world is like dangling a carrot in front of a donkey  it s motivating and you get to  visit  some really cool places  plus  you don t have to change any of the speed incline settings because it happens automatically while you re following the trainer  it s like being right there with them   very happy overall with our purchase

i got this treadmill for casual running and walking on my path to losing weight and not having to go to the gym every single time i wanted to hop on a treadmill  i didn t need bells and whistles or a fan so this treadmill was what i needed  this treadmill is great but after about   miles  it starts to squeak a bit  also  the belt is not completely lined up in the middle and we ve tried to move it over but to no avail  we even asked our installer to see if he could move it over so it didn t rub on the right side of the platform but he couldn t move it over i m still very happy with my purchase though

upon assembling this treadmill  the ground screw  not the throw away screw  did not fit into the frame as the hole was too small   i was able to simply use a smaller screw   unfortunately  when i was attaching the crossbar on the top by the console  the four screw holes were again too small for the frame and would not be able to screw completely in   i quadruple checked that i was using the correct screws   i am having this treadmill returned which is a huge hassle to me in terms of time wasted   this is a poorly built product in terms of the machining   i could not say if the treadmill is good in terms of the motor display etc  as i could not get past the problems   sure i could have drilled out the holes but who would want to have to do that for a      item   the parts fit imprecisely and overall this treadmill is a joke   perhaps it was manufactured during the pandemic peak in china   truly this is one of the worst product experiences i ve had in some time   i actually give it zero stars

your browser does not support html  video                          this is my screen after    mins  reboot or amazon won t help  i have to contact manufacturer myself  the phone can never get through  requested on their super difficult website support  no response either shipping was a disaster too  i rescheduled   times  took an additional month for my  room of choice  service due to this item is too heavy  they need arrange   persons to carry it upstairs btw the belt has a patch too  i am not sure if that s normal

i ve only has this for a day  so i ll focus on assembly and can update the user experience after using it for awhile longer unpacking  this thing is heavy af  required two adults and a dolly to get into the house  nothing was missing or damaged  be careful when removing the base from the box as the console  including the touchscreen monitor  is stored under the base during shipment  the base is by far the heaviest component in the box  i suspect that most of the complaints on here about broken consoles are a result of crushing the console while removing the base from the box  so be careful there assembly  this thing is harder to assemble than your standard ikea shelf  but no so hard that you need to hire a professional  you will  however  need a second adult to help you out as some steps require a second set of hands  you will also need a phillips head screwdriver and a socket wrench  everything else is included  as far as instructions  i would have preferred better illustrations  there are youtube videos with folks assembling these and i strongly recommend watching those along with reading nordictrack s instructions  it would have been extremely frustrating trying to assemble this thing on those instructions alone without those helpful youtubers ifit  i ll update once i ve had a chance to really explore the software  signing up for my free year was super easy  i read another review indicating that you need to pay for a year upfront with the free trial and then get reimbursed later  that is not my experience  there was a card in the box with an activation code  that code set me up for a year free  i paid nothing on activation  zero  however  it did require credit card info because  after a year  if i do not cancel  it will automatically charge my account for the next year  this auto renew feature sucks and they are clearly banking on people forgetting to cancel before the year is up  i will be taping a reminder to my machine to cancel before the year is up so i am not charged audio  there is audio input  but not audio output  so you can plug your phone in and listen to music through the treadmill s speakers  but the reverse is not true  you cannot plug in headphones to the treadmill to listen to workouts through headphones  there is also no bluetooth on this    si  that s a total bummer as my machine is in my living room and everyone in the room now has to hear my ifit videos because there is no way to listen through headphones touchscreen  the screen is not as sensitive as i would have liked  i find that i have to press buttons several times to have it recognized  that s a bit annoying fan  because it was brought up in other reviews   no  there is not fan on the    si  i was able able to get a cheap clip on fan off amazon for ten bucks  so the lack of fan is definately not a deal breaker for me overall  i m giving this one   stars  so far  i feel like i got what i paid for  but will update again when i ve had a chance to wear it in

after doing my research i chose the    s nortic track treadmill to purchase for my home   it is easy to assemble and one of the better treadmills for the price   i ultimately purchased a nordic track treadmill because of their reputation and reliability   very happy with my decision and happy with my daily workouts   it has been especially useful during this trying time we are going through and having to give up my gym workouts  i use it everyday and highly recommend this product

the treadmill assembly was pretty involved but it s worth it for such a steady  and i hope  durable  unit   only drawback is the ifit membership required to activate the machine the first time   ifit software is buggy and unreliable and their customer service is weak   i just quit it but i m happy to be left with a very good treadmill update   treadmill stopped working all of a sudden   the machine would power up and make a grinding noise but the console controls wouldn t do anything   frustrating getting service due to long waits on the phone and needing to be near the machine with the motor cover removed   finally had everything lined up and the technician could see nothing mechanically wrong with the unit   told me to hold the ifit button down for    seconds   i counted down and told the tech that it wasn t doing anything after    seconds but kept my finger on the button when all of a sudden the console reset and all was well   moral   if your machine stops working  try holding the ifit button down for a long time before calling support

in comparing all the options that the different products had with what was important to me  this was my best choice  and i ve been very happy with it  my compromise in getting this one was that the display area has more buttons and functions and is bulkier than i was looking for  but i m sure that helps with it s stability  other things i was looking for that it does have is that it is solid  sturdy  wide  the weight capacity that i wanted  is quieter than my last machine  a price within my budget and speed  which the walking machines i was looking at didn t have the feature i love is ifit  which i didn t buy it for and didn t think i d use  but i m hooked but for the machine  i gave it all   in ratings  because it is true to it s description  what you read and see is what you get  it was easy to assemble  i m a   yr women and did it myself  i had a brace to use to hold it up  but after realizing this was only for the hydraulic lift  which i don t plan on using  you wouldn t need the brace or second person if you re just leaving it in place  but i m impressed  it s easy to lift  feels safe after using the machine  the only suggestions for improvement is if you are using the ifit option  the machine doesn t have a decline  so when they are going downhill  i just increase the speed to try and offset that and get a better workout  to use ifit  you need a tablet or phone  it s not on the screen  it has a ledge at the bottom of the display area to hold it but i bought an flexible phone attachment to hook it to the top so it s more eye level and then sometimes when doing a crossfit where you hop off the machine i can just flip the direction of the phone and continue following along

i contemplated to buy this treadmill and its newer sibling  t     but i eventually reasoned that i wouldn t need a screen or  ifit software   i need a basic treadmill that is well built  quiet  and just easy to use maintain   also  i thought about a trade off of signing up for a gym  or buying a treadmill   at this price point  i think this treadmill was a great deal that checked all the boxes that i cared for   it came in a big and hefty   x   box that you would need another person to carry   assembly wasn t so difficult  but i recommend building this with another person to help you hold the treadmill handles  front console  etc   a cross bar that connects two handles and a front console was challenging to install   you would have to push hard two vertical arms and handles inwardly to place the cross bar and screw it down   you may even think that the cross bar would be too short and it took two people to install this   besides this part  the assembly was easy if you faithfully follow the instruction manual included   there are other reviews here about bypassing ifit  but i didn t bother to look for that   i just quickly signed up on my phone  then cancelled the membership right away   i do agree that this is a nuisance and i don t approve nordic track is making people to sign up for ifit just to activate this treadmill   if ifit is as awesome and effective as they advertised it to be  then i don t think that they have to force consumers to sign up  i think this rather displayed ifit s insecurity and failure in marketing   of course this is my opinion    using this treadmill was as easy as using a treadmill at a gym   once you can look past this ifit annoyance  i think this treadmill is a great buy   it is sturdy  slick looking  quiet enough to hear your wife  or too quiet   and super easy to use   you simply hit start  set speed incline  then run   i think if you are average joe like me who just want to run without thinking much about advanced features  though it still comes with several presets and workout options    then i think this treadmill would be a great option for you

i bought this treadmill four months age and i have used it less than five times and it broke i called nordictrack tech service several times and they had me on the phone for over an hour and they had me do the troubleshoot for them  send the picture  video of the issue and they agree to send me parts  but i received nothing no parts  had to call them every week until i got the parts in the third week  now i am on the call with their customer service to schedule a tech appointment to replace the bad parts this is been going for too long and no results do not buy this product it is cheap and not worth it  with horrible customer service  it is not worth the time and the stress you will go thought if you have any issue with this treadmill  be smart and invest your money wisely  this is the second month  my treadmill is still sitting in the garage waiting for their tech to get fixed
wife and daughter love it  hold the ifit button for    seconds to bypass signing up on line for the monthly payments

i ve had this treadmill for a couple of weeks now  and have used it regularly for walking and running assembly took two people  but wasn t too bad at all  no issues the treadmill is sturdy and sound  great for running  the controls are easy to use  easy to access  easy to read and very responsive  i bypassed the ifit boondoggle and use it in manual mode so far  i am very happy with it  my last treadmill was a much more expensive sole treadmill  and i am just as happy with this treadmill as i was with the sole if you re on the fence  i recommend this treadmill

great price and super assembly service   this treadmill is so modern to me  my last treadmill i bought was over    years ago   i love the fit feature   syncs with phone app and keeps track of how far you walk  calories and heart rate   i find that some of the walking running features on the app are too much for a senior like me  so i put it on manual work out and it shows walking laps on an oval track   like that a lot   belt is wide enough to be comfortable and i don t have to worry about stepping off either side while walking

i m sure the product was fine but delivery was garbage the product came damaged and dented and when i opened it you can see the giant cracks on the base  when i first called amazons customer service they wanted to know if it was still usable even though it was cracked  or if i wanted to keep it even though it was cracked  what they were not able to come and pick it up until three days later wasting more time or window that i needed to be around for  this will make a total of seven hours i will need to make myself available for a piece of damaged equipment they were also not able to issue me a new one right away and that i would have to wait for my refund to be processed in four days not waiting around to order a new one  garbage customer service amazon   update  a new one could not be reissued because they didn t have any more at what i paid  everything is now          more  not ever ordering something of this size from amazon ever again

i bought my first nordictrack in        it s been a great machine but it was time for a new one because the display panel was failing   i did a lot of research and decided to stick with nordictrack   i purchased delivery  setup  and an extended warranty with my purchase   i was so excited when it came   the machine doesn t seem as well built as the previous one but the display and ifit are amazing   after a few uses  the machine started making a clunking sound   i went onto the web and submitted an online form for service   i received a confirmation email but never heard from anyone   i called about    days later and was trapped in their ivr   it kept wanting me to go to their website to find helpful videos on fixing my treadmill   i spent a lot of money  i have a mfg warranty  and an extended warranty so i don t want to fix the machine myself   i called back a  nd time and got to a customer service rep   they seemed nice enough but couldn t help me because i needed to be at home with the treadmill so they could help me isolate the sound and then  fix it myself     a few days later i removed the hood and found a loose screw that was causing the clunking sound   i tightened it and it was fixed        until i walked on the treadmill again and there was some other sound   i don t really use the treadmill now because the sound drives me nuts and i haven t had time to call customer service again   nordictrack   just come and fix the damn thing since i paid for that service   i am very disappointed

i really hope people are reading these reviews  the product itself is okay  delivery was quick and i was able to assemble it by myself with no issue and it does what it needs to do  it s a well built treadmill and looks sleek my issue is with this ifit subscription they are pushing  all over the packaging  instructions  and the product itself are these little warning labels saying the product won t turn on until you ve activated your ifit subscription which of course costs money  what they don t tell you  anywhere  is that you can activate your product by holding down the  ifit sync  button for    seconds without having to sign up for ifit  the only reason i knew about the bypass is because i read the reviews of all the people who figured that out after the fact  completely deceptive business practice  would buy again  the product is very nice  but the company does not deserve a positive review

been using it for   days  so far  an excellent treadmill   quieter than my old pro form treadmill  though volume has to be turned up  i d say it s better than normal   changing speeds is smooth  and elevation is smooth  too   you need   people for assembly   it takes about   hours   shame on noric trac for pushing the ifit connection   thanks to other reviewers  by pressing the ifit button for     seconds you avoid the hassle of  you must sign up with ifit to unlock the treadmill

i received the treadmill today and took about   hrs to put together   if you can  please the extra     to have the box delivered in the room of your choice since the box is very heavy   there were two large cracks on the bottom of the machine and after i called customer service   they gave me a discount   one thing i don t like is that each time you start the treadmill you have to go through the ifit screen and select start manual   you can start the membership and cancel it but you have to do it from your computer   tablet or phone  not from the treadmill  it s a pretty good exercise machine but i wish there were no scatches cracks considering the  price you pay for it

we used an amazon installation service along with the purchase of this treadmill  the gentleman that came to install the treadmill was great and gave me some information during the set up  once the treadmill was put together he said it looks re furbished and not new  he showed me a few parts are loose and when folding  the treadmill isn t closing the same way a new one does  this is very disappointing  at this point  i don t know if they sent me a refurbished one but i paid for a new one  i am a true amazon prime member and have ordered tons of items through out the year varying in prices  i would expect that when buying an expensive new treadmill i would receive just that  at this point what can i do  i have it  it works just fine   its been a week or so oh and also  you can bypass the ifit subscription     my service technician was able to do it  i appreciated it a lot

i was hesitant buying this treadmill due to the negative reviews but took a chance anyway  as for the ifit the only way to contact them is thru email they don t answer the phone  when i purchased the treadmill it came with a one year membership and when signing up it gave me only one month  i had to threaten to file a complaint with amazon and the govt for false advertising to get what i was promised  they quickly responded with correct   yr membership  ifit doesn t ask for a cc for signing up as for the treadmill it does everything i needed it s reliable and i ve had no problems  for the price it s a great buy  not noisy  size a little smaller then some  i recommend this item

we have had this treadmill less than one week  the first time my husband used it it worked perfectly fine  the very next day he started using it it completely shut off after   minutes of running the treadmill completely shut off and wouldn t turn back on  this is possible the biggest waste of money  we did purchase the protection plan and are currently trying to get a refund  replacement and it is definitely a huge hassle for a product that is brand new
you do need two people to put this together  that being said  i am very happy with this treadmill  i was looking for a basic treadmill  did not need all the bells and whistles  this fits my needs

star but really a     star because the machine will cause your circuit breaker to trip  you will have to get a good surge protector because it is definitely needed  i do see it as a fire hazard but the only way you can return it is keeping the huge box after it s set up  which i didn t because theres not enough space in my condo for it  i see as as a way to keep people from returning it  the box shouldnt matter and if the freight company is providong you with the return sticker then they should also provide you with the box even if it cost  it was installed a month ago but didnt use it right away which is my choice  no one keep boxes that big just sitting around especially since so many reviews say that the warranty department is no help  i can see a class action in the near future if this continues  sometimes it will override me and incline when i turn it on  il have to wait till it goes all the way up and back down before i can do anything   not sure if it s some kind of mechanical glitch or not  works fine when i m walking and jogging but it does make a sound  the sound isnt too loud but it s not quiet so playing music will help override that problem

i did quite a bit of research on treadmills before christmas with the features i wanted  but not too expensive  if i end up not using it as planned  and i wanted it delivered asap  this has not disappointed  i have used it almost everyday since it arrived  it did take two of us to put it together because of the size of it  but wasn t too complicated  i did to the   month trial of ifit and i really liked the walking tours and various other walking workouts  i really like that the ifit workouts vary the speed and incline for you  i have not renewed the ifit subscription since it expired and the treadmill has also worked perfectly fine starting it manually  i m very happy with this purchase

so far  it s amazing  i was able to assemble by myself in about   hours  the coolest part  it comes with a year of family ifit  i had a few questions getting all set up  and activated  and was able to use the tablet built into it to chat with nordictrack support  right from the treadmill    love it  love it  love it  one piece of advice  skip the amazon offered maintenance package  and buy from the nordictrack website when you registered  you get better choices  for a better price my only complaint  the delivery crew brought the box to me upside down  even thought the box clearly said   this side op   nothing was damaged  but it still left a bit of unease for such a heavy  expensive item

i ve read some not so good reviews  but i m very happy with this treadmill  first let me say  you do not have to sign up for ifit to get it to work  just hold down the ifit button for    seconds to unlock it my husband   i were able to put it together ourselves in about    minutes  directions were easy to follow  i didn t need anything fancy as i mostly walk but i wanted an incline   this works great  lots of speed   incline settings  has   very large cup holders  a ledge to put my ipad on if i want to watch something  walking on it feels great  doesn t hurt my knees like some treadmills can

good treadmill for the price  not top of the line but very good for the home  many people crying about the ifit thing  i agree that it is shady to try to get someone to think that they must sign up for a service to use their physical product  but it s even stated somewhere on this product listing that it is not required  maybe if people read things through a little better they would not be so surprised when they think they ve hit a dead end  it is quiet enough for a treadmill  haven t used the speakers so can t comment on that but i just set up a tv in front of it so didn t matter to me    stars from me

delivery people left it on a pallet in my front yard not an awesome start   heavy as sin took two of us strong men to get it inside   parts i received were not drilled properly at the factory so i had to get replacement parts which was pretty simple from nordic track they came fast and free   once you are up and running like other reviews say you have to sign up for this bs monthly package to even start using the treadmill  you can cancel right after but its a sneaky shady tactic   the tread mill as far as use is ok it s a treadmill with incline  speed and etc   it squeaks a little but after awhile you learn to ignore it   once it was all put together and i used it i ve not had issues since then   it s my only treadmill purchase so i don t know how to compare it to others but for the money i paid i would not say i m overly satisfied with the experience

we just received this today   it definitely take two people to handle   the delivery driver was supposed to deliver this to our entrance way  instead he dropped it off in front of our garage and took off before i could even get out the door   my husband and i had to unbox it and carry it in in pieces   thank goodness it wasn t raining the assembly was relatively simple   it took two people to strong arm some of the pieces into place   it runs   it s quiet   i am super impressed with how easily and softly it folds up and down   i m not sure how i feel about the ifit app yet   i am a walker  not  runner  but we ll see     i ll add to my review once i ve had time to put the treadmill and app through its paces

i assembled the machine and when i went to the ifit com  they required that you subscribe to a monthly membership of       per month   you can not even use the machine  when you call the number for customer service they won t even let you talk to customer support until you register your account   you can not register your account unless you provide a credit card number and they charge you a subscription fee   there is no way to use this machine at all until you pay then  and if you cancel subscription they will lock your machine out   amazon should ban this company from doing business
