this has been a lifesaver during the covid quarantine living in the desert during the summer  shipping was not great but that doesn t apply to the treadmill  assembly was easy  use is intuitive  push and hold the ifit button to bypass the membership portion  i did not have to enter a credit card number at all  i mostly walk on it but i have run a few times and i have had no knee pain  which usually happens with treadmills

when this product first arrived it wouldn t turn on  after     months of going back and forth with tech support  the treadmill would turn on and function at a snails pace  at the time  i didn t care  as i felt it was a good price to deal with its  slow response  as time went on  less and less functions would work  i am now   months out from buying this treadmill and     of the time it won t turn on  when it does turn on  the buttons don t work  needless to say  this is not a good buy  for your sanity  and the health of your body  don t buy this tredmill

i bought the original nordictrack walkfit in      and have regretted selling it for years  well  nordictrack has come a long way  baby  this treadmill has saved us this dreary and cold winter and helped us cope during quarantine  no one had to walk on treacherous  ice covered sidewalks or wade through knee high snow that tom on the next block over didn t shovel yet  instead  we were able to hop on the nordictrack and work off the stress of the workday  the monotony of being inside for a whole fricking year  and  oh  work on our fitness too    i don t use all the bells and whistles that come with the nordictrack  and i don t use ifit  i did a trial run of ifit without giving cc info as some reviewers have mentioned is required  just hold down the ifit logo for    seconds and manual mode is activated   i m happy to manually adjust my speed and incline rather than using any of the pre programmed workouts built into the machine too  i m short and have asthma  so what most people consider a leisurely walk has me huffing and puffing  i m able to hop on for ten minutes for a quick metal break from editing all day  or i can do a full workout  it s my choice  which i love delivery was smooth  setting the thing up took us a few hours  so plan for that  it s a large machine  so make sure you measure your space before you order the t series  it works great for us in our family room  overall  i m really glad we took the plunge and invited nordictrack back into our home

this was a great purchase  it was assembled quickly and easily  everyone in our family of   uses it  including our   year old  with a spotter   we really like the easy fold stand underneath for storage  the ifit app that pairs via bluetooth is really great and well worth the fee after the free month  i love how it seamlessly changes the settings on the treadmill without having to touch it  because i would have no clue how to build a  proper  work out  it takes the guessing out  it runs very smoothly and is easy on my bad knees  would highly recommend

besides the assembly  let s face it   anything this large is difficult to put together  this has been an amazing experience  deliver showed up on time  box was well put together to be able to find parts  i wish putting the tread to it s up position was more assisted  meaning that i wished it wasn t so heavy the ifit is absolutely awesome  trainer talk to you all the way through your workout  there are also    day programs as well  much different than my last machine that would only turn on and off  great product and customer service as well

highly highly overpriced garbage first of all it says it s portable that is absolutely false but that s not the issue the issue is that i hired someone to assemble it it took him four hours and still the hydraulics or whatever bs we re not going to please so it s too dangerous for me to run on so after spending       it s shakes violently the warranty team upon which i have purchased the   warranty has not helped at all and amazon will not help at all basically i got robbed of all the money i spent on the treadmill which was       plus the four hours of labor to get it up to my sixth floor apartment  i m so very glad that i can work out safely in my own home after working long hours as a researcher is on vaccine trials  thanks nordic track

the treadmill overall seems decent for at home moderate use   i would not buy this if i was a serious runner the numbers of the screws on the instructions were different than what the screws were labeled  so trying to figure it out added at least    minutes to the assembly  which you need   people for lastly  the reviews about ifit are correct   there is a label that says that your treadmill is locked and you need to activate it at ifit com  but that is not true   all you need to do is press and hold the ifit button and the treadmill starts up  i read that you can do this in another review so i purchased this item  but  i find this labeling to be misleading hopefully the treadmill lasts

updateicon updated the software to allow manual use of the treadmill so i have increased the stars from one to three while i am still concerned by the actions noted below  i have increased the stars since that issue was resolved   i had a previous nordictrack treadmill for almost ten years  it felt sturdy and while it did need a couple of repairs over the years i would give that previous model     stars   our new t     s works  but feels less sturdy and less well made    a number of the pieces do not cleanly fit together  we had to have the belt replaced a couple of months after we received the treadmill  and there is a squeak from the deck when we run even after the service to replace the belt    we paid for setup with the treadmill  so these are not due to us improperly setting up the treadmill    overall the t     s is ok  but does not feel like the same quality as our previous nordictrack       original submission      i purchased the treadmill in september      after confirming that i was not required to sign up for the ifit service  as we prefer to just use the manual settings   for the past nine months we have been able to use the treadmill in manual mode  skipping the ifit logon  it took a few extra steps and some delays to get out of the ifit sign on screens each time  but it could be done    this morning the screen looked different and would not let us use the treadmill   i submitted a support request on their website and eventually received an email informing me that i am required to create and ifit account to use the treadmill that the company can simply prevent us from using our treadmill until we provide them with additional personal information is very concerning since it has been nine months since i purchased the treadmill i cannot even return it to amazon for a refund   i am following up with the company and hope they will fit the issue  but given this deceptive and unethical behavior i recommend looking for a different brand

okay    this is a solid treadmill  i love it so far    it has an auto incline and loud speakers     you can totally override the ifit activation and use the treadmill without it  the build part was a little tough      people are suggested  this machine is heavy  i think it weighs around    lbs but it is still compact compared to other treads  when building the tread  the grounding screw provided was the wrong width and screwing in the console bar was a little tough without the use of a drill  even though it suggests not to use one   the bluetooth function only works through the ifit app but you can still connect your phone and listen to music via the aux connection  it is pretty quiet and no squeaking like other reviews   so far so good    i am very pleased and the delivery via prime was super smooth and fast

i was a bit nervous buying what seems  by price  to be a lower end treadmill   i m    lbs and between my wife and i  we like to run  but running outdoors can be challenging in va so we decided to enter at the lower price point   we couldn t be happier with our purchase and are easily putting       miles a week on our nordictrack t    s   the thing was delivered on time  actually a day early  i believe  and was pretty simple to put together   the box and base are heavy and awkward   definitely a   person job   directions were easy to follow an everything was in perfect shape coming out of the packages really enjoyed the ifit trial we recieved with our purchase  but we haven t renewed   there are enough workouts built into this treadmill that i can simply use them while watching a show on my     tablet that fits nicely on the control  shelf    i ve even set my open laptop on it  but it covers the controls completely regarding the  ride  of the treadmill   very impressed   it s really smooth with no jerky motions like i ve experienced on some older gym systems   it s not a quiet machine  but probably similar to any other   when done  the treadmill folds up very easily to give you a bit more room and keep cats and dogs from walking over it overall  very happy with nordictrack  recommend that they provide some basic maintenance tips with assembly instructions  but found them easily enough online

i ve owned this for a little bit now   it s done it s purpose thus far   it took a bit to put it together by myself but it is not something you need two people even though it s recommended   directions are pretty straight forward and easy to read using the treadmill i opted to use ifit just because i think it s a fantastic program with oodles of resources and trainers i recommend tommy rivs puzey  iberian portugal  to start running   i only wish i would have gotten the bigger screen instead of the    because some of the runs i have been on are just beautiful in location and a bigger screen would immerse you more   it s still suits and i m ok with the smaller screen   the cushion adjustments are fantastic and you can tell the difference while running from soft or hard   it s super quiet and out of the last   treadmills i have owned  i am very pleased with this product and highly recommend

this was a pandemic purchase  overall satisfied with the operation of the treadmill  beware that installation can be tricky and you will need a  nd person to help you assemble it  i was able to select my delivery time for the treadmill  they came on time and place it in the room where i would be assembling the treadmill  the treadmill is huge    it takes up     of a small office  once assembled operation was easy  i skipped the ifit membership setup  you don t need it to enjoy the treadmill  the treadmill is very quiet compared to other models i ve purchased in the past  it s also very stable if you decide to run at top speed  my only gripe is with the sheer size of the treadmill and installation

i have had this t series treadmill for about   weeks   i am really enjoying that i can workout when my   year old is playing or after all the kids go to bed  i signed up for the ifit website online only to find out that it s a scam and cancel it  the treadmill doesn t have a screen that works for ifit  overall after some belt tweaks this is exactly what were looking for   we live in michigan and with the winter fastly approaching i wanted to keep active without spending alot of   but still getting a quality product that didn t have an itty bitty belt since im     tall i have a long stride  it also has a     pound limit which is helpful if my father wanted to use this machine   its not as great as what you get at the gym but i wasn t looking for that  overall i would recommend this product

my first treadmill  trying not to fall into the well known track of using the treadmill as a coatrack  and having some success so far  it has the right size for my house  runs quite smoothly  the noise level is low  a must for us with a toddler in the house and sleeps a lot   and the library of the guided runs have plenty to work through  we will see how i feel in another year  but so far so good

this treadmill is a great value for the price   it states that it won t start unless you activate and subscribe to the ifit app but that is false   all you have to do is make sure it s plugged in  the emergency pull plug is attached and hold the ifit button down for a few seconds and it turns right on be mindful that the treadmill comes in a huge box it s heavy and lots of pieces to remove out of the box  make sure you move the box to the room you want it assembled in  it definitely takes two people to put together  it took about   hours for me and a friend to put together over all i m happy with it  runs great and it s a great size

have been using this for about a month and it works well   i use it for running   even though some professional reviews say that the horsepower is not sufficient for running  there is no problem with running if you dont want the ifit subscription just follow the advice of some other reviews  just hold the ifit button down for    seconds  and make sure the key is installed when you do this   after you do that once  you don t have to do it ever again the box it comes in is very large and very heavy   assembly is a royal pain  even if you are handy   some steps require   people   so either pay to have it assembled or be prepared to spend   to   hours on assembly   i assembled it and am happy with the finished product but it was a lot of work to assemble

the treadmill works just fine   it has a large number of settings   both speed and incline that makes it easier to challenge myself   however  there were two problems   you must sign up for ifit in order to initially start the electronic on the machine  and you get one month of ifit free  but it is very very very difficult to get in touch with anyone to stop the ifit monthly charge   the only way we were able to get in touch with them was from the telephone number listed with the ifit charge on our credit card  and when we called  they were extremely rude   i will not buy anything else that has to go through ifit   this pairing is with nordic track  so they are at fault also

the ifit setup is a mess  can t seem to register to activate the code  can t add secondary users on the family membership  and then get an email congratulation me on the first workout  on the plan that i couldn t register    no technical support from ifit to speak of if you want a solid treadmill with some basic workouts  this one will do the job  if you want the enhanced features of ifit  plan to pay for them

it was slightly more complicated assembly than anticipated    needed a helping hand to hold vertical parts in place  and one of the lag screws don t engage treadmill works as intended mostly  but i find that it misses achieving the set incline  half the time e g  ifit or manually set to    and the treadmill attempts to raise incline for a few seconds and stops   it reads as    but i can tell it s clearly not there  almost      this is usually fixed if i brings down the incline manually to   and manually  using   button  to the right setting   kind of annoying  but not a show stopper

i m a fan of norditrack  first time owning one   i will and have recommended buying a treadmill to others who are looking to lose weight or maintain weight loss if unable to go back to the gym  i was so pleased with my    day trial ifit app that i purchased a membership to keep my goal if losing weight going i would give it   stars but   the only advice i will offer  is to get a surge protector  several times it tripped my circuit when connecting to wifi  no sure if others have experienced this issue

this has been a great investment  i have been able to get the exercise i need and walk run though new zealand  scotland and more thanks to the ifit program  would definitely recommend to anyone  i put this together myself   did need someone holding a couple of pieces so it isn t a completely one person job but had no issues figuring it out  may look at other norditrack products in the future

original review very nicely packaged to protect the components during shipping  expect to spend ten minutes or more just unpacking and laying out the components  assembly was straightforward and easy enough though the supplied allen wrench was a bit short handled to make torquing down the bolts easy   you will need a good grip or a small cheater bar to get them tight without a struggle   all of the bolts had locktite applied to them so they aren t going to wiggle loose any time soon  the assembly instructions were very clear   it took me two hours to assemble it  there are a couple of points in the process that will be made easier and safer with two people and that might cut your assembly time the unit powered up easily enough but popped the ground fault outlet in the circuit immediately when the motor started   if you are going to plug this unit into an outlet on a gfi protected circuit you are going to either need to remove the gfi outlet from the circuit or buy an arc filter  the instructions state that the treadmill will perform on a   a circuit  which is a typical lighting circuit  but a   a circuit might prove to be better in the long run so that you aren t popping the circuit breaker every time something else on the circuit turns on while the treadmill is running    like a vacuum cleaner or space heater the motor is relatively quiet and definitely smooth and strong enough to handle a    lb load   the goal being to drop the load down from there  i ve only tried walking on it so far   i m going to have to work my way back up to jogging as i haven t done much of that in years and i ve had surgery on both knees   walking at speeds   or    even without upping the incline  provides a great workout   the incline controls are easy to reach and operate smoothly  the unit is rock solid on our floor   the tread is long enough for jogging  no doubt  the controls are ergonomic and clearly labeled  the screen isn t huge but it is clear and provides all the data i need   the heart rate monitor matches my apple watch exactly so far  so good  couldn t be happier with the quality of this machine for the price that i paid update my wife noticed that the left hand pulse sensor didn t work when she tried it for the very first time    the same day we completed the first review set up the treadmill   the product is registered and i followed a link to customer support on nordictrack s site  i reported that the left pulse sensor didn t work  and that the track was squeaking with every step when my wife sped up the track to jog on it   i received an email reply with a case number and was told that i would be contacted by email or phone with next steps  shortly  bottom line  works fine for me as i m just walking fast  track lube cured the squeaking problem  amazon s customer service did respond and took care of us  thank you amazon

the treadmill itself runs great  smooth  long belt with lots of cushion and i never get shin splints  aches in my feet  or any other pains i ve gotten previously from running but the operating system is horrific  it s some ancient form of android used by neanderthals  everything is slow  even with bluetooth and location services turned off  it saves my workouts half the time  rarely can connect to ifit  and most of the programs run only with an ifit subscription  so you have to pay to use most of the built in programs  and then get to watch them not work at the end of the day  i don t really care about the touch screen and programming  the treadmill itself runs great  and if that s all that matters to you like it does to me  then maybe get it  but if you care at all about your programs  recording your stats  or having a fully functional product that doesn t aggravate you  don t get it

i ll admit  i was very skeptical of this treadmill because of the price and issues i d heard with nordictrack in general  so i ll start from the beginning  i initially ordered this treadmill and the technician assistance in october  the technician discovered damage as he was putting it together  amazon refunded me for everything because they did not have it in stock to replace  days later  the treadmill was in stock again so they sent the replacement  the replacement arrived in the morning and technician in the afternoon  it took maybe    mins for him to complete the set up  he tested it out for me and showed me the workaround for ifit my skepticism was the price compared to quality  i thought me being    lbs would have me feel like i was going to break the equipment  that is not the case  i ve run at the highest speed     mph  and highest incline       and it felt safe and stable  now if you re jumping up and down at     grade you should expect to break the hydraulics  i love this treadmill  it is used at least every other day with no issues

the treadmill is good  the work outs are nice the yearly cost after your   yr membership to ifit is up is         a year l and you have to put in credit card to even begin your workouts  it isnt worth that a year  there are some nice work outs but it is nothing like the virtual reality one  easy set up  very smooth running quiet machine  just expected more from ifit

my teenage kids begged for a treadmill at the start of lockdown and my daughter selected this nordictrack model because she wanted the ifit classes and large screen to watch them on  i was skeptical   i like to run outdoors   but i agreed and a couple of weeks later a truck dropped it off at our house  assembly was a a pain point for sure  but after a trip to the hardware store i managed it  the good part is that the whole household has been using it  even as the weather has warmed up and we can exercise outdoors again  i actually like the steep incline hikes and runs a lot as we live in a fairly flat area  and it s fun to go up mt kilimanjaro or mt baldy with a guide  good buy

i ve never liked treadmills with massive screens that i m forced to stare at  so this one was perfect  my husband and i assembled it together  however it is very heavy and definitely a little difficult to assemble  if you can afford to have a professional do it  i would recommend that  and wish that we had hired someone to do it for us  i say this because the heart rate sensor bar doesn t work very well  and at times it was difficult to figure out which screws to use  it was extremely time consuming and just difficult  aside from assembly  the treadmill works great  we ve both used it for running and walking  if you re ok with not having super fancy tech on a treadmill  then this is a good one to choose  it does a good job of measuring distance  my fitbit is usually recording the same distance or something within a tenth of a mile

i ve only had it for   months but so far so good  it seems like a quality treadmill for the price  larger than i had expected it to be too  which is a good thing  normally a treadmill in this price range would be much smaller  this isn t much smaller than the treadmills at my gym  it did take my husband quite a while to put it together by himself  around   hours but overall it was still a great buy update  it s been    months since i purchased this   it s now making a weird noise  possibly the motor or belt  i m not sure yet  it s still working perfectly fine but i m a little nervous now that it s making a noise  i have put a lot of use into it with quarantine last year but i had hoped it would last much long than this so hopefully it s nothing major

first  it s heavy  it took me  my wife and college student son to lift the belt section upstairs  consider paying extra to have it delivered to the room where it ll be used  second  follow the assembly instructions carefully  you ll need someone to help for a few parts  third  you do need to activate ifit but no credit card is required  however  you can bypass the activation if you look it up online  i did have a problem with the treadmill tripping my gfci circuit breaker  i bought a heavy duty appliance     extension cord to plug into another non gfci outlet  it also holds your clothes nicely over the console when you re too lazy to hang them in the closet

i wish i could tell you about how the product performs however i can t even get passed the assembly process due to the screws that were provided being damaged and unable to fit appropriately in the base  contacted customer service as i purchased the   year warranty and they provided new screws however the screw that was sent was the incorrect one  didn t even match any of the screws that come with the hardware kit provided    contacted customer service again which this time around i encountered very rude sales reps who didn t seem to know about the product or bring up my account info  i finally was transferred for the  th time and was told they will send me a new hardware kit replacing all the screws and tools needed  when i asked for a technician to help service i was told it would depend on their discretion if they can make house services  still waiting for a tech to call    it s been a little over a month and now i cant even return this product

i purchased this treadmill  my family s first  to overcome our over sedentary lifestyle during the corona virus work from home times and in anticipation of reducing outdoor walking during the winter months  the treadmill was particularly attractive vs  the  no name  competition when offered at       off and finding online videos to explain the trivial was to bypass the ifit subscription service  the treadmill is very solid  but amazingly easy to fold up  the control console is basic and cheap components  but so far    weeks of constant use  reliable and functional  the assembly was more complicated than it needed to be because the instructions in the first few steps contained several errors and some improvisation was required   quite frustrating  if not for the assembly issues i would have given this a   star rating

bought the treadmill so that we wouldn t be dependent on the weather and to save our joints  been using it for a little over a month  there are multiple settings on the treadmill to workout without using the ifit app  but they re not very customizable or give you the option to create profiles  which is why i m putting a lower rating than   stars  the only way to personalize it is through the app  which requires a pricey subscription  the other issue is the treadmill is really large even folded up  the pictures make it look really slim but the handles and legs stick out a lot so just be mindful it won t be neatly tucked away  the performance  however is great and i love having this piece of workout equipment at home  especially now that gyms are really not all that safe with covid

i personally am thankful for the people who left reviews saying that you do not need an ifit membership  they re right  but you do need to know how to  google and read help forums  if you are not comfortable doing this  then you will not be able to even use the treadmill unless you provide a credit card to nordictrack the treadmill works fine for me  i do walking  it does what i want from it assembly was mostly easy and clear instructions  you can tell they had to do a lot of re work on the product after it left the assembly line  because there are a lot of instructions that say something like  remove and discard these screws  and use these other ones we supplied   i did about     of the assembly by myself  i needed help when it came to the headboard  i just didn t have a way to balance the headboard while working to attach it  if you can move it on your own  and yes  it is heavy  i mean really heavy  if you don t lift and move    lbs  regularly  don t expect to be able to move it on your own   you should be able to assemble most of it on your own

my nordic t series treadmill was a great investment  especially since the gyms are currently closed in my area because of the pandemic  i use it   days a week  more features than alot of treadmills in some gyms  it is built to last the auto incline is a great feature  just like treadmills at the gym

just got it delivered today  it takes a bit to assemble  but it s not as difficult as i expected  very sturdy  solid treadmill from the first time using  ifit seems to include a ton of different options with all level  and although you have to acclimate to the placement and navigation of the system  it s set up fairly intuitively  the speakers are louder than i expected with pretty good sound via bluetooth  i am     the wife is       and it s large enough for my stride without being too large for her to reach the controls  it is also much more quiet than i expected  if i m going to be super picky  the fan is not very strong  again  that s being picky and not a complaint  off to a great start so far

i am so happy i bought this treadmill  nordictrack has a great reputation and they did not disappoint  assembling the treadmill was not too difficult   directions were easy to follow  the weight is what was difficult to deal with  lifting it out of the box was not easy  but other than that  i had it together fairly fast  the bottom of the treadmill comes intact  all you have to attach is the front legs  arms and console  i was able to do a workout once it was all together  i love the way the treadmill speed and incline will go up or down with the trainer   but you can also choose to do your own pace  i had a blast  not only does ifit offer treadmill workouts  but it does a ton of other workouts  i m looking forward to getting fit

the treadmill was exactly what i was looking for   works with ifit app which allows the speed and incline settings to automatically adjust with the trainer in the app   i use the app on my phone and screen share to a separate tv screen while running treadmill was delivered on time   there was a little assembly but nothing difficult   my wife and i use it almost every day

we paid the extra to have  room delivery   and i m glad we did it is very heavy  my husband and i assembled the treadmill  i can t remember how long it took i d guess     hrs  i was so worried it wouldn t work    assembling the electric panel stuff was intimidating but actually pretty easy  best part   it works    this is the perfect mid grade treadmill  definitely not flimsy  my husband runs     miles     times a week on it and i walk or jog on it     days per week  my husband is about     lbs and i m      so it s proving durable  we have not tried to fold it so i can t speak to that  i would recommend this treadmill to others

you can t find a better treadmill for the price  the assembly is very complicated  it took my husband four hours to put it together  ifit is used to activate it but you do not have to purchase it  you don t even need to enter your credit card on the app  i m not crazy over the ifit app for a few reasons  it s far too focused on the trainer and workout and not on the location  feel and experience  you are really paying to workout with the trainer  which means you would be following his pace  incline and time  thus  should you want to slow down  you have to manually do so the machine itself is great  i m addicted to it  the folding mechanism isn t great but it works well enough  it s not huge  so it s not in the way really anyway  there are ten incline levels to the left and ten speeds to the right  despite it s size  it is very sturdy  me and my husband are pretty stout individuals and it stays put as you run  i ve tested it up to the   speed and it holds together well  for some reason  i do feel like it is a bit faster than the time speed marks  for example  in the gym i can typically do   miles in    minutes if i start at     and increase in two minute increments  on this machine i had to start off at      with the same increase increments and i barely finish   miles in    minutes  either way  it s a really good workout this treadmill is a very worthy investment during covid    and i suggest it for anyone

i love my nordictrack    si  it has great screen quality for my ifit workouts  its smooth and i love the impact reduction  i used to walk    min miles and now i do    min in just   months  i love the ifit and it makes a huge difference  it seems really good quality and i use it everyday  with covid i needed a workout from home  this is my first treadmill and i am very happy  the    incline is high enough and i ve only made it up to  mph but i m sure it can handle

this treadmill has proven perfect for the entire family  mom  dad  and   teens  it came quickly from amazon and was delivered on time via amazon freight   assembly was straight forward and took approx   mins from start the treadmill is sturdy for walking  hiking and running  and has plenty of incline    deg  and speed for everyone the best part  however  is the ifit   i was a little dubious at first  but these workouts have proven a favorite not only for our family  but for out of town guests and family as well   it is simply amazing that you can hike the scottish highlands or run the boston marathon in the comfort of your home   additionally  the machine keeps track of all your workouts so you can compare past performance in sum   we are all very pleased with the nordictrack   highly recommended

day to day use is perfect   fantastic treadmill   the only negative is the assembly   it is not too bad but some bolts feel too tight after starting them   they almost felt cross threaded but were not   it took my wife  daughter  and me about   hrs   you must carefully read the directions because there are screw numbers and step numbers on the screw package   the deck is completely assembled which is great   be sure to adjust the tracking per instructions   to unlock from ifit without signing up  hold in the ifit button    seconds   worked for me   some say to press ifit on the screen  but this treadmill is not a touch screen   well worth the price

bought this treadmill for casual running and exercising  my kids love it as well  my oldest    yo  runs on it to keep in shape for soccer season  if you are handy you can assemble it alone but i would recommend two people for a much easier assembly  after much research i found this one to be the best value for the money spent  there are a lot of options but i didn t want to spend     for a treadmill but i also didn t want to get something very cheap that may break easily  so far so good

this has nothing to do with the product    if you want this product be sure you want it    it will take weeks for you to get your money back    we are in our  rd week and   calls to amazon telling us to wait a few more weeks   a few more weeks foe what   while the charge sits on your card and you get charged interest fees   yes   that is what is happening  again make sure you really want this product

i received this a few days ago   my  husband set it up for me and only took about an hour in a half   after using it for the first time i loved it   i work out   days a week but when it s raining i can t go out  this is exactly what i needed to not miss a work out day    easy  on my knees  incline is great  speed is perfect   if you are thinking about getting this you won t regret it   it s a great investment if you are committed i don t need or will i be using the ifit  get free videos on you tube  so this doesn t affect my purchase   and yes you can bypass the set up   press and hold the ifit button until the machine starts right up  enjoy  i know i am

this is my first big purchase on amazon and was a little hesitant after reading some reviews  however  i gave it a chance  the treadmill was delivered timely  kuddos  assembly was included and the technician did a fine job  upon assembly  it was discovered that the digital display is damaged from within  the treadmill motor and everything works so it s still usable  my low rating is for    being delivered a damaged product and    amazon customer service  i ve been bounced around and spoken to several different departments and representatives  each telling me different information about how to resolve my broken digital display  initially  i chose a full refund which would require another technician to come out and disassemble the treadmill and pack it up  then i would need to schedule a pick up time  all before receiving a refund and interest keeps on accruing on my credit card  yes i m aware i could pay cash but i like my amazon points  after much thought  i decided to have the broken display swapped out since everything else seems fine  simple process right  ha  i asked the amazon rep what the process was three different times and he brushed me off stating  please hold while i call the manufacturer  and finally i pointed out to him that i ve asked the same question three times and he s not answering it  i m fine if someone doesn t know the answer   it really is okay but find someone who does  don t just steamroll the customer who is trying to understand the process in hopes that they will give up asking  really      i m told that i will receive a call to talk about my options tomorrow  when i asked about the options  they were different than the other three amazon reps told me prior  how frustrating for the customer and i ve been super patient thru this process  if you only knew all the different things i ve been told in such a short period of time  you would be super confused too  do i think i m really getting a call tomorrow to talk options  nope  i m pretty sure i ll need to call amazon customer service again and go over everything again especially since the  notes  they are reading are selectively including only bits and pieces of the conversation  would i order a large item from amazon again  nope  i should ve gone with my instinct but i ll try anything once  my suggestion to amazon  in situations such as this  do not put the burden on your customer to fix the problem  as i stated to the amazon reps  i paid for a fully functioning treadmill  not a damaged one so the burden should not fall on the customer to fix it  cross train the different departments so they are educated and empowered to respond to customer issues  rather than bounce your customer to multiple departments  there is a breakdown in knowledge  skills  and communication within amazon s customer service department   easily fixed  for now  i guess i m waiting for a call

with gyms closed due to the pandemic  and the weather less hospitable to outdoor activities  our family decided to bite the bullet and get a treadmill for our basement  so glad we went with this model  its sturdy frame  pared down screen and incline features are exactly the experience we were looking for  and at a very reasonable price  not a day goes by without one of us on the machine  note  and this is impoirtant    you do not have to register with ifit    luckily i followed the instructions of a previous purchaser  push the ifit button for    seconds to skip the ifit registration process and start using the treadmill immediately   the ifit registration is a feature that will lock you into a membership  and it s not clear anywhere in the paperwork you get that you can bypass this registration  they ask for a credit card and you are locked into a several month contract   other than that irritating ifit scam  the treadmill is a dream

i ve been frustrated during covid because i don t trust the gym and the temperature  here in southern nevada  has been over     every day since june  now i can walk all over the world with a trainer and the time passes quickly  easy software setup  plenty of places to store thing  water  towel  ipad  used service to assemble  i don t usually fold it as i have room in my garage to leave it open  but the one time i tried  it was not easy

i live in the boondocks and when the treadmill arrived the packaging was in rough shape  after assembly  the treadmill would not run  i called the service number and the technician helped me troubleshoot the problem over the phone  she had the necessary parts fedex d to me and also offered an extended warranty at reduced cost  once the new parts were installed it runs like a champ  i waited a few months to write a review to verify all was well   it is a smooth running machine and i enjoy it much more than my previous not nordictrack treadmill

the carton is very heavy so have the delivery folks place the carton in the room where it will be located  assembly is easy but really is a two person job  no need to subscribe to ifit to activate the treadmill  hold the ifit button down until the screen clears  bluetooth works with ifit only  fit  finish and controls are excellent  relatively quiet and easy to operate in manual of one of    routines  heart monitor not always accurate  while gripping the monitor handles  great walking running tread     speeds and inclines  will need a phillips screwdriver and            inch wrenches or sockets for assemblyvery happy with the machine

my local gym has been closed since february due to the covid    pandemic and i ve been working from home since mid march  assembly was done by my brother since amazon is not currently offering the service  he said it wasn t hard to do  he s a carpenter so putting things together comes easy for him  this machine is helping me to keep moving especially in the daytime  the speed is ok   actually faster than the treadmills at my local gym  was not too keen on ifit at first after reading the reviews from people who felt pressured into using it to start up the treadmill  i m starting to like it and may sign for the subscription after the   month trial ends

i absolutely love the treadmill  easy to operate  has so many programs  is bluetooth compatible  even is able to be adjusted so the walk or run is soft or hard   who would have thought    and to be honest  i am still learning about it   it has a lip for my tablet   it works with programs or manually   i have not had any issues and was surprised to read some of the poor reviews because the things they said were incongrous with how any treadmill works i love it i didn t rate assembly because the seller offered a terrific price on having someone to come out and assemble the machine   he was professional  on time and it took less than an hour   i also purchased the maintenance agreement from nordictrack

buggy android software and underpowered chipset defies the purpose of buying this otherwise decent treadmill  hire experienced programmers engineers and develop a system that works  or just invest in your datacenter that can handle traffic requests from treadmills instead of blaming people s wi fi routers

so as you see in this photo is the sign that was on my treadmill  this is a total scam  simply hold in the ifit button for    seconds and it will work  great treadmill mechanically and has no issues  i just question nordictrack s ethics

so far so good  my husband is great with putting things together so this wasn t too hard for him to do alone  the box was very heavy so the both of us had to bring it inside once it was set up i registered the warranty and i saw i had to use ifit to start the machine  thankfully after all the review reading i realizes another helpful review mentioned how to bypass that  so if you don t want ifit and don t even want to be bothered with the    day free trial  hold down the bluetooth button until the machine beeps and basically it ll bring you to the start of using the treadmill i ve only used it twice and i like it so far  can t complain about anything

i was disappointed in the quality of this treadmill  i bought this one to replace an older more expensive norditrack treadmill that was very old  i can definitely tell this difference in the cheaper model not just in features  but in the smoothness of how it runs when you walk  if you can afford the next series up  i would definitely suggest purchasing that

treadmill works  but the settings are all off  in english mode  the speeds act as though they are in metric mode and vice versa  i spent over an hour on the phone with customer support and they told me that there is nothing wrong with the treadmill and the issue is that i just  feel  like the speeds are off  i have used a lot of treadmills  i still belong to a gym  for now  and use the treadmills there  and i know my running speed  i run  a lot    the issue is that support s tests only test the display on the screen  but the issue i am experiencing is a disconnect between the displayed speed on the screen and the actual speed of the belt  i am quite irritated that they are not trying to fix the issue and basically blaming it on me   i mean  i  can  use on the treadmill and get to a running speed  but the displayed mph is so off that i have to guess what my speed needs to be on this machine  i have never had this  guessing  issue on any other treadmill

this has done everything i wanted   prior to purchasing this  i was going to the gym  but with covid  and the cold weather decided to get this for my personal use at home and it has not disappointed   the belt does tend to slip to the left after a bit  but my husband has been able to center it without problem   have recommended this to others and a friend has also purchase it   if you get it when it s sold and shipped through amazon  the price is really good

i like this product because is it very comfortable to run and it is up to date with technology  it uses wifi and it has touch screen  something i dislike is very minimum  but it is the fact that i have to create an account with ifit in order to use all the beautiful scenery on the screen  i use this product to run and work out at home every single day  it is one of the best investments i have done so far

love this treadmill  works great for speed and elevation  has tons of pre set workouts but i generally just manually adjust to custom fit my runs  the ifit subscription can be bypassed by holding the ifit icon for       seconds immediately after the first power on  otherwise they ll con you into a subscription  this is shady and underhanded but from what i ve learned most all exercise equipment like this is in cahoots with ifit  come at me  illuminati   construction took a little while so be patient and follow the plans exactly  especially the part where it tells you not to torque down the bolts until later  and you ll be happy with the outcome  haven t gone through every mode or all the functions but i love this thing

great value  great unit  we ve been using this treadmill everyday since it arrived two months ago  not a single issue to report  unit is well built  it s sturdy  good materials quality and rather easy to assemble  the  folding  feature should actually be called  partial folding   the track belt conveyor lifts up approx  four feet from the floor at a     angle both my wife and i were a bit reluctant to subscribe to ifit at first   not a requirement  however after the first few days we both realized that it s actually a great tool  makes boring work outs vastly more interesting and also serves as a great motivator  we mounted an ipad air   to the treadmill use that to interface with the ifit training app features  worth the        monthly fee great machine and great value

bought this in january and so far so good  me and my daughter getting good use of it  i wouldn t say it s hard to assemble  but it did take my husband with some help from me at times at least     hours to assemble it  lots of parts and it s quite heavy too

after    months of moderate use  our treadmill belt developed a tear  expecting to be out of warranty for covering labor  i contacted nordictrack to have them send me a replacement belt under the   year parts warranty terms  they refuse to honor the terms listed on amazon from their last reply  we honor the warranty information that is in the manual not on the amazon website  if you wish to have someone come for maintenance on your machine  the cost of the first visit would be       if additional parts are needed after this visit you will need to pay for them  then pay an additional     for the technician to come back and install the parts  if the information presented at the point of sale is wrong  correct it  by not correcting it  you are intentionally misleading customers  with lots of options in the exercise equipment market  i will not be purchasing nordictrack or related products in the future  fine machine  shameful customer service and support

there are several huge signs in the box  stating that you must register with ifit in order for the treadmill to work  and they want your credit card info but thanks to a few helpful reviews  i was able to bypass the ifit section and use treadmill as normal otherwise it is an amazing treadmill  feels as sturdy as the gym treadmills

this treadmill is awesome  i was going to buy the assembly service but then decided to try it myself first  i was able to assemble the treadmill in about   min  i was pleasantly surprised by the size of the running surface as it s full size like what i have at my local gym  also the hydraulic lift drop is super cool as it is very easy to lift and even more easy when it lowers my treadmill for me  also  the amazon delivery was great and then brought the treadmill into my house for me  all in all  very happy with my treadmill and the service provided

the treadmill is exactly what we were looking for   love that the incline goes to    as well as the speed  works seamlessly with the ifit app  and you also don t have to use the program  it took two people to assemble and a few hours  but we anticipated that  it arrived with damage to the hood  but nordictrack was easy to work with and sent us a replacement hood within a few days   our only constructive feedback is  my husband is   foot two and wished the handles were longer so his feet don t hit the front   we are very satisfied with our purchase and use it daily

we were looking for a basic treadmill and this one is perfect  i was able to assemble it without any issues  even without all the added features of other models  the t series does the job  the shelf provides ample room for an ipad  we love the extra large beverage holders on each side and the control buttons are big enough to easily use during a workout

i received the treadmill on august   and after i assembled it i realize that the incline motor wasn t working and there was a plastic cover damaged  after many e mails and phone calls with icon fitness and almost a month later i received the incline motor replacement with one sheet instructions  i had to install the motor by myself and wasn t easy to do it because of the poor instructions  but i did it  the inclination is working good now but there is a loud sound when goes up and down  i sent a new email to iconfitness com reporting this issue and requesting a technician to solve the problem  and i  didn t have any answer  finally i did a claim to amazon

firstly  this seems like a good  solid  smooth working machine   i was able to put it together by myself  although having a helper would have been nice at a few points  in an hour or so   love the pneumatic track lift the annoyances started upon opening the box to find an attached sheet  picture shown  that says the treadmill is locked and will not start until you activate at ifit com  which of course requires you subscribe to their services   they offer a free month  but of course you have to give them your credit card anyway   in my opinion  that s really bad after i spent      to purchase it   that s my main beef  but there are a few minor things that i think they could have and should have done   a usb power outlet to keep your cell phone charged  allowing your cell phone to output audio through the treadmill speakers via bluetooth  it connects to it with bluetooth anyway  why not allow audio as well    a separate volume control for the beeps and the audio  if connected via cable    if you have your music playing pretty loudly the beeps are just ear piercing   also  i used to have an older nordictrack treadmill that allowed you to select a pre programmed track  but then also use the up and down keys to adjust the overall speed of that track  it was great because you could dial it in to exactly the workout you wanted   that feature no longer exists  you re just stuck with the pre programmed tracks period    and none of them are geared towards a nice relaxing stroll  they are all aimed at people who are already in reasonably good shape and want a good brisk workout   if you are an elderly person who decided he she better get back in shape or someone who s doctor told him her to lose some pounds and get in shape or else  you will have to stick with the manual mode  at least for a while

i am so happy i bought this  i have a smartphone  so i didn t really need the treadmill with the built in screen  though i can see how that would be nice   the ifit membership i thought would be superfluous is probably one of my favorite things about this treadmill  i love being able to select the workouts and the interactive platform   app   will prob continue to use once my free trial is up lol   my husband likes using the preprogrammed setups and is very happy with them too so if your deadset on not using ifit  it s got you covered  sound system is decent  treadmill is quiet ish   i mean   your running indoors      half the time we can t even hear it from the other room  setup was intimidating  but once i started it was pretty easy and i was able to finish it within a couple of hours  used   kids to hold pieces in place at times  but other then that did it solo   yes  would happily buy it again  absolutely  very happy  it is making quarantine bearable

don t get this system  they have horrible customer service  my treadmill stopped working after a year  light use   this product is supposed to have a   yr warranty  but beware  nothing will be replaced unless you spend      to call out a technician  now  the technician arrived  gave a wrong diagnosis  i had to shell out another s   load of money to get a control board  which was bad according to the tech   the new board arrived after three weeks  i swapped it out with the  faulty one  and guess what  the same issue persists  the system does not work  so  all that money is down the drain  i ll be reaching out to my credit card company to challenge all these charges  please stay away

the reviews on this treadmill really made it hard to buy  it was a little difficult to put together but now i have had it a week and absolutely love it  it does not make any noises that it shouldn t and works perfectly  my husband and and i work out on it daily and are completely satisfied with our purchase  don t be afraid to take a chance on a good deal

loved the huge variety of runs  walks  hikes etc   always different   sometimes they talk to much  however     for example  during a  k run  the trainer was constantly talking and as a result the camera was always on her   never saw much of the halloween race   would have loved to see the costumes     another example    sometimes  in a run  the trainer again never stops talking and is always in front   no one wants to continually watch someones behind while running   customer service is atrocious   emails  calls    never seem to work   machine was bent and they sent a part to fix but that was it   no instructions  no follow up   if if comes to you wrong  i shouldn t have the responsibility to fix it   they should send a repair person   always nice on the phone  but never any followup     terrible customer service   finally gave up   machine works but is unstable when cranked up and at high speeds but works for an old man like me at my lower speeds

great price   check   amazon  choose your room  delivery   check   in home assembly   check  the pro they sent was very knowledgeable  and said he is setting up a lot of treadmills of this model  and never seen a damaged package  sometimes not all parts are there  but typically he hadn t experienced any problems    ifit bypass   check  just press    seconds on ifit button and the treadmill is ready to go    noise level   check  as any treadmill there is a motor noise  but i can t say the treadmill is noisy   the noise level is very reasonable it s been just several days  so if anything changes i ll update this review

everything was fine for the first couple of weeks  it took about   hours to assemble and its very heavy  but it worked great up until the  rd week  it stopped working  i called nordic and they sent replacement wires and contol board  they didnt help with replacing these  i had to do it on my own  they said it was eash and there are youtube videos i could watch for it  it was not as easy as they said and one of the screws was stripped  not my doing  i dont use power tools and this screw was already screwed in upon arrival  so i had to buy other tools just to get this screw out  it was a very frustrating process  i wish they could have fixed the issue for me especially because i only had it for   weeks

when assembling  be very attentive to where the wiring cable should be located  it must not run on top of the half round bracket that holds the console hand rail assembly because that sits on top of the bracket and will squish the wiring cable  once connected the wiring cable is very difficult do disconnect  especially when the console has to be held aloft by a  nd person while you re disconnecting and re positioning the wiring cable  otherwise  assembly was straightforward  i did need to move the treadmill belt a bit to the left because it was rubbing along one edge  it s a solid  well functioning unit  although it has several pre programmed routines  i prefer the manual option  i recommend this item

the screen size     in  is perfect and the picture is crystal clear   i worried about both of these before buying  but i was blown away by the screen s clarity  also  ifit has been great and a few updates have made it even better   you re able to choose a ton of workouts  walking  running  hiking  hiit  etc   from various trainers  choosing to run without an ifit trainer is also a great option   the bluetooth speakers are decent quality and pretty loud and i usually either listen to music  which you can also play in the background of your ifit workout  or put my tablet on the console and watch something using the machine s speakers the treadmill itself is pretty quiet compared to an old nordictrack i had and it feels a lot sturdier   no shaking or rattling around  the only complaint is perhaps my own fault as i opted to assemble it myself   there were only a few really difficult steps but the right side of the console is not as seamless as the left side  which is only slightly ascetically annoying overall  this treadmill has made early morning runs a lot easier and a lot more fun

this is an affordable treadmill that works great to workout at home  i use it in my garage  i am     lb and i have no issues sprinting in it  it is very sturdy and stylish  the only thing that i would change to make it perfect is to place the on off button in the actual display area  however  everything else is great  the display is very nice and it even has speakers built in  overall  this is probably one of the best treadmills that you are going to find at this price range   great value for the money  as far as the assembly goes  it wasn t too bad  i do recommend having a second person to help out with it  it makes it a lot easier and faster than if you do it on your own

it is a great treadmill  very sturdy  the assembly part is a fun part  it took my husband   hours to assemble and get ready to use  but it is worth  i saw some comments about ifit activation  if you want to skip activation part  just put the red button to the middle of handle first  and then tear off the ifit sticker from the screen and hit and hold the ifit button a few seconds  it is ready to use without activation through ifit

this treadmill is great for walking and jogging  my  race pace  is   to    minute miles  so this is really all the treadmill i need assembly was a little finicky  i had to contact nordic trac service about a faulty screw  i received a replacement in about    days  total assembly took me maybe an hour  i watched a youtube video which helped i ve been using the treadmill about     times weekly since january and it is still performing well  it was noisy for a couple days and suddenly quieter back down  i assume this was the belt rubbing a bit overall i m happy with my purchase  for less than a year s gym membership i can run at home to my heart s content

i previously had the lifespan treadmill which i loved and ran on until it literally died under my feet after    years  thought i would try something new  as nordictrak has such a good rep  i really like this treadmill  works well  quick speed up and down and same with incline  something my prior one was a bit slow about my biggest problem is with the preset programs  my lifespan had in the manual what each preset looked like including speeds and heights based on level  none of these have a way to view the whole rundown  if you go to a preset and wait  after a few seconds the bottom of the screen will list a speed and incline but is that for the first interval  the hardest interval or what   and how come none are speed only or incline only  they all seem to be a combination of both  something i don t always want  i also can t make a customized program as i could with my own treadmill  this is my main complaint but otherwise i am happy with the quality of this treadmill

update  needed to order a new control board  free through the warranty but i have to install it myself  customer service was easy to work with and helpful in running tests to see exactly what the issue was  i used the chat option through the website  whole thing took maybe    minutes  will update again after i get the new part control panel turned on for about    seconds and now won t turn on at all  currently waiting for nordictrack support to call me assembly was easy enough  took me about  hour to assemble by myself requested specific time frame for    pm   weeks in advance based on my availability  received an email the night before that my time frame was changed to    am  woke up at     am to ensure i didn t miss them  they showed up at       i did not get a    minute heads up call as stated i would  i received a text   minutes before they showed up  delivery guys were amazing and very nice though so that helped  just be prepared for time frames to change last minute

background  avg runner that recently finished my first marathon  probably running       miles per week now with the majority of them being outside  i use the treadmill to sneak in a few miles while being somewhat accessible to family  i have not really tested the full functionality of this treadmill as i am currently doing low heart rate training so  not going faster than speed   first impression  good  i paid for someone to assemble it so no comment on that part  i actually have it in my garage  it looks nice  doesn t take up a ton of space  ok screen size  stop button doesn t work   that is really the only issue for me  i end up just pulling out the safety stop every time    a bit annoying for a        treadmill  everything else seem to work well so i m just rolling with it rather than dealing with customer service  part swapping  delays  and no treadmill pros  gets the job done  space saving  nice button lay outcons  small screen size   screen is vertically low meaning if you practice good running form who will not be able to look at the screen unless you are under  ft  stop button doesn t work  speakers could be louder

solid hardware  cushioning keeps noise level down and motor runs smooth  online registration with ifit to activate the treadmill is actually not required  the treadmill is not an internet connected device  so it cannot check some database to see if you it has been registered online  you can easily bypass the initial activation required screen  when first turning on the treadmill  just hold down ifit button on console until the normal user interface appears  the treadmill is should then be completely usable assembly was straightforward enough  but it definitely goes smoother with at least   people  required screws  washers and hex keys were provided and were sealed and labeled nicely  be careful not to lose or strip any as no extras are provided  the only other tools you ll need that are not included are a larger bit size phillips head screw driver and an adjustable wrench  some screws  particularly those that secure the arm handles  will require a good amount of force to drive all the way in  just be careful to not strip the screws in the process my unit s incline functionality seems to be dead or malfunctioning out of the box  setting the incline value on the console does not do anything  incline motor does not even make a noise to indicate a jam or broken motor  no matter what value is set  the console just sets it to max value     but the incline motor does not do anything  incline is just stuck at minimum value  parallel to ground   i suspect this may be an issue with the onboard computer or internal wiring not communicating with the incline motor not a big deal for me since i prefer training without incline  but this kind of issue would be a serious headache for someone who makes heavy use of incline  this issue and the scammy ifit software is the only reason why i would not give this treadmill a   or
bought this in may  it s now december and it has already stopped working

so far so good  the box is of course extremely heavy  i have upstairs in exercise room  i assembled myself took my time and watched assembly video on youtube  pressed down if it button to get around the subscription   other features are minimal without ifit  but you can run manual  so far   days use every day    min walk run no problems haven t tried the incline feature yet   big unit suggest in a room all by itself

i love this treadmill  i played softball for    years and have two bad knees  i needed a treadmill that has endless support and did not break the bank   i am a teacher   i avidly workout every day  with quarantine starting   months ago  this has been my favorite purchase  my knees cannot handle everyday pavement running so this treadmill has saved my life  and knees   i have already recommended it to numerous people  great investment  also  the ifit free trial is amazing  i love it and how it motivates me to run such great distances  i love traveling via this treadmill  it took me a few hours and one other person to assemble but was worth every penny

my treadmill came today   the box was beat up but my treadmill inside was not  i easily put it together   was running within   hour  holding down the ifit bluetooth button bypassed that whole mess   i was able to use my treadmill without joining that required idiotic membership that i have no use for  overall i am happy   just had a decent run  if anything changes i ll change my review but today i am happy

i am always very hesitent about ordering such large items from amazon   the product was shipped very well and was packaged very well   everything was in tip top shape   i was able to put almost the entire thing together by myself until one of the last steps for the piece that holds the treadmill up for storage   this treadmill is very sturdy and comfortable to run on   i am currently using the    day free trial of ifit live   being able to run a long with trainers at foreign destinations is pretty cool   i was also able to make a google maps trail close to home that showed street view l images as you ran around the neighborhood   i am very happy with this product and would recommend it to a friend

when i received this treadmill it was really heavy  it did have damage on the box like others have mentioned but it s packaged so well there was nothing wrong with anything inside  one person was trying to lug this box out of his van so i feel like the outside of it getting damaged is a given  my husband and myself put it together  simple precise directions  easy to understand  i have used this treadmill twice a day since i purchased it  i am so glad i bought it because of the mixed reviews i was nervous to spend the money  it s not any louder then a treadmill at the gym  sturdy  well built  it s not a scam when you go to active your treadmill you just decline to put your credit card on file for the ifit  you still get the    day trial  which i think is kind of cool   money well spent  i never write reviews but i read so many to make this choice on this specific treadmill i thought it was only fair  well worth the money since the next listed treadmill is

good  sturdy treadmill  and great value for the money  but the manual is useless  spends more time telling you how to put it together than using it  and there is almost nothing in it about all the features this unit has   one other thing  the display constantly cycles between time on the treadmill and distance   i really don t give a flip about how long i m on it  and i m sure there are other people who just want the time   since i change elevations at specific distances or quit with the same parameters  it find this irritating motor went to boot hill about two years after i bought it  started making a loud rattling noise which became progressively worse   no way to lubricate it  sealed unit   called nordictrack for replacement and was told that they would send out a tech for about      to replace it for me   told the girl on the phone  she was nice  that an idiot could replace the motor  it s only four wires and two bolts  and in fact i had already removed the motor to verify that it was the part making the noise   so they sent me the part  i installed it  and now i m able to work out each morning without ear protection and a fire extinguisher handy

we purchased this treadmill and loved everything about except for a strange issue that has made it unusable and dangerous  it randomly speeds up from a lower speed to a much higher speed without warning  we contacted the manufacturer and they sent a replacement controller board which took a month and a half to get and still did not solve the problem  working on a return    will update with results

bought this while stuck in the house thanks covid   and have used it nearly everyday for a few months   i love it and it does the trick   i had the ifit app  which is pretty cool as it automatically will adjust your treadmill to the speed and incline without having to stop and do it manually   i cancelled that subscription though because i didn t use it like i thought i would   my husband hated putting it together and things didn t go together smoothly but now it s together and will come as part of the house when we sell someday haha   i love it and like i said  use to at least  x a week   and i also love that it s not a tiny treadmill but a decent size

i was able to put this together in very little time with just a little help at the end   very simple instructions   i use it every morning and so far after       months it s been great   just fast paced walking for now but will get up to running soon   the cup holders are nice and big and hold a big water bottle  phone  channel changer    just a little noise from belt running but not loud like some reviews i had read   over all i m completely satisfied with this product

the delivery process was a fiasco   i don t know if the problem came from amazon or ups   after waiting three weeks  the product came with damage   it looked like it had lost a battle with a forklift   the carton had     punctures  the walking belt was slightly torn  and three of four screw receptacles for the motor hood were broken   i discussed the situation with an amazon representative  who wanted me to repack it and ship it back and wait another three weeks for a replacement   finally he offered a substantial discount  so i decided to keep the machine  contingent upon proper performance    my son and i got it assembled  which took a couple of hours   and it worked after i discovered i could activate it simply by pressing the ifit button on the console   after three weeks of use  the incline sensor failed  but a replacement was shipped within a few days   installation was very easy   the treadmill has been working well since then

this is a really great treadmill  it s easy to use  as far as buttons and what they do  and i love that it is so easy to fold  my dad put the treadmill together  so i don t know first hand how easy it was putting together but he said it wasn t too bad  the only thing i don t like is that the arm rails are really low for me  as a woman who is      i have to sort of hunch over to hold on  but  i m sure it s perfect for people off average height  and hopefully eventually  i went need to hold on  after i get over my fear of flying off the back  lol

a life saver during pandemic times  literally pretty straight forward use  the belt slips on occasionally   presumably do to my heavier weight  though i m already down     screen has plenty of videos  the free year of ifit is nice to track but i mostly watch on my ipad screen is essentially an android tab but it is limited and wo t let you install apps  it would be cool if i cooked just watch net flux or stream spotify

so far the treadmill works as advertised   the base is the heaviest part and you will need help moving it into the house   but it can be assembled by one person if needed   i like that it automatically syncs with my polar oh  heart rate sensor   i had to jump through a few hoops to get it to pair with my wireless headset but that is also working now   that should be made easier  i am not sure why pairing to a headset is hidden from the user   not everyone in the house needs to listen to the coaches instructions after a few months things are still working ok   i like the ifit training better then expected   so far i lost a few more pounds   i was stuck at my current weight for a year or more  so the extra push was needed update   with the last firmware update they added a headphone connect option to the warm up screen   so you no longer need to get into admin mode to connect a bluetooth headset

i am disappointed with this purchase  i am going to list several problems of this machine  first  the machine does not support     pounds  second  the machine makes noises  third  you have to pay a subscription it does not matter if you bought the machine  fourth  the machine weighs a lot and it is very big  to put it inside the house you need   people  fifth  the engine of the machine does not have much power  good luck if you want to buy this machine

pain in the a   to assemble but i did it pretty much by myself  the screen is really lovely  speaker is good  fan is good  easy to fold up and down  wheels are good enough  mine is in the garage on a mat so i don t move it around   wherever you assemble it  that s where it s gonna be b c it s not gonna fit through the door okay    it came with the trial ifit subscription but i haven t activated it yet  i just do manual mode  there are some free guided runs but they re not in english haha  i like that it has a warm up and cool down  buttons are responsive  i do run outdoors but it s way too hot in cali right now so i use this to do sprints before after i lift weights  could run for awhile on it though  most i ve done is    min

delivered four days after ordering  but it has been inoperable since day one  they were helpful over the phone and tried troubleshooting  sent a new motor and reed switch  installed motor and waited couple of weeks for switch  installed  with no luck  the next call they said it must be the controller  waited couple of weeks for that  installed with no luck  next call they finally agreed to send a tech with the next controller since the new one had gone up in smoke when powered on  waited couple more weeks for controller  than another week of phone tag to get the tech  he installed controller and had no more luck than i did  another controller was ordered and another tech came out  installed another controller  swapped motors and nothing  then he wiggled some wires coming down from the console and this caused the controller to go up in smoke again  when checking the wires he found three of them burned out  so now i have been waiting another    days for a console and controller with no information than in process  almost three months and this thing has n to moved yet

i prefer running outdoors and needed a little push to be  happy  using a treadmill as i find them all incredibly boring  the ifit technology is so totally worth paying for if you re like me who needs incentive to get on this thing  although i still prefer running outdoors  this treadmill has been a godsend as i log in miles in between meetings and run  ks all over the world with some of their awesome coaches  if you re going to cheap out and not pay for ifit  that s fine as long as you don t mind running on treadmills in general  they do give you a year of free ifit to try out  i certainly plan on continuing that membership as i feel it is totally worth it  i believe there are workouts within the system itself without ifit  but i ve yet to try those  the treadmill itself is awesome too  i just dust it often to make sure it s clean and that s it  i ve had it for over three months and love it  i only wish that i bought one that had a decline too  and not just an incline  still  go for it

i m a daily runner training for   marathons a year and run roughly     miles per month  needed to find a good enough treadmill that could accommodate speed work at      paces  box came late which created a problem with the installation group  opted to build it myself which was fairly easy to do  solid treadmill and as good as anything i ve used in the gym  folding action is smooth and easy  not crazy about the ifit software and how long the machine takes to boot because of it  but this is still a   star because of the solid running ui and excellent quality of the machine  had been worried that i should have gone with the pro level  but this was excellent  at      the smaller width is actually preferred  highly recommend

awesome treadmill  looks  features  functionality  foe the price pros  interactive or manual mode  has bluetooth and folds to save space cons  assembly  heavyi did not see the option to pay for assembly so i  very  not handy   was tasked to put this together  all of the necessary tools were included with the product  but for some steps      people are required and you will need a ratchet set to make things go faster  not supplied  i would suggest to be absolutely certain on where you choose to install this because moving it  although it does have rollers  will not be easy all in all  i am pleased with the treadmill and very happy with the purchase
