i went back and forth on buying this  after having it for about a week now i am so glad i did  i can t believe how quiet and stable it is  i ve ran a few times on it and it s been amazing  had a friend put it together and it took about two hours  i bypassed the ifit program just because i don t like to give out my personal info by holding down the ifit button to get it started and it worked right away  super simple  my only regret is that i didn t purchase it sooner  i also used to work out at equinox so i m surprised how happy i am with this purchase at this price point  i thought for sure it was going to be wobbly and loud but it s perfect

the unit arrived and was assemmbled  which we paid for  it was fine until    minutes in when the display fried and the unit stopped  we thought it was the motherboard  a call to nordic track with a video of what was happening resulted in nordic track sending a new display and saying it was  easy to assemble   it wasn t that easy  so after figuring it out and assembling it  voila   same deal  yep  motherboard  nordic track had not offered to do anything to assemble the display and clearly diagnosed the problem incorrectly anyway  they were only interested in ending the phone call  so this all resulted in a return and a really negative experience  amazon was more or less ok   nordic track was a complete and utter joke

we just got this treadmill yesterday  amazon delivered it with no problems  there was a big dent in the box  but everything was packaged so good  there was no damage to the actual treadmill   beware  it is heavy  you will definitely need two people to move it  it took a couple hours  with a pizza break  to put together  while tedious  we didn t have any problems   going off advise from another review  you can hold down the ifit button for about    seconds and it will  unlock  the machine so you don t have to go through the register process   so far  we are very pleased  for the price  you can t go wrong  i would definitely recommend this treadmill

the good   ifit  which is the main selling point  pretty easy to assemble  fairly quiet  great interfacethe bad   will not connect to external device via ifit s bluetooth sync instructions  you can screen cast with compatible tv s but only in privileged mode  the smart tv we purchased  tcl roku  is not compatible the manufacturer was very short sighted to think that just because the app is built into the console tablet  that their customers would not want to screen share to other devices   this was a major disappointment for us and something we will take into consideration for future purchases of this type

my nutritionist recommended a nordic track  i found this one and was so excited  it had everything i needed  i was able to get it  a   year warranty  and have it delivered assembled for almost a       less than their lowest model on their website  it doesn t have a tv screen but it has a ledge for my ipad  the guys that assembled it were fantastic  they set it up completely and i did not have to sign up for the ifit trial  i ended up signing up for the ifit trial just to see  it was easy to sync with the treadmill from my iphone  my whole family is using it

my girlfriend is certain nordictrack purposefully made it so hard to assemble so that you will give up and pay the extra hundred to have a professional come and do it  her reasoning is that it s so bad that it can not be attributed to mere laziness on nordictrack s part  but must be a product of conscious effort here are some of the highlights if you re foolish enough to attempt it  you will need at least two people and six hours to complete  you will need power tools as some of the screws are too big for their sockets and must be forced in  there will be screws in corners that no screwdriver can get at  you will need a specialty tool for them  you will on several occasions have to undo the work you just did and reassemble it a different way i m not kidding about that last one  see on step   it will say something like attach a to b  but what it won t say is that you need to first move a as far to the left as possible   much further than a should reasonably go  if you do it wrong  you won t notice anything until you get to step   at which point you will realize your mistake and begin to curse yourself  anyone standing nearby  and maybe a deity or two for good measure once you finally get it built it runs pretty fine  the only problem is the tread keeps slowly creeping to one side and rubbing against the edge  surprisingly they actually predicted this problem  and there s a good youtube video online that tells you how to adjust it back to the center  still it s annoying to have to spend    minutes of doing this once or twice a week  which is what i ve been doing one last thing  before i bought this treadmill i bought a      treadmill that was  i soon realized  too small for a person of my weight  the only reason i bring this up is because that assembled perfectly as you would expect most things you purchase online would do  so it is perfectly possible to create this thing better  nordictrack simply didn t want to  i would definitely not buy again  and suggest you don t either

treadmill is great  it goes up to    mph  which is well above what i need  and does an incline up to      i think it s      my wife and i usually just use it for brisk walks with a high incline  we only use the manual controls and  never the pre programmed workouts   note that they try to get you to pay for an ifit subscription but it is not required folding up is fairly heavy  but not hard  same with folding down setup was a bit time consuming and one of the screws wouldn t  go in until i used a drill  which the directions expressway said not to do

i do not recommend trying to assemble this alone  which is what i did  yes  i did it  but it took nearly   hours and every ounce of energy i had  it was easy to assemble for the most part  the pieces are just really heavy  i had to adjust the belt but it works perfectly  i did not have to instal or download the software that it says is needed  it was a great purchase overall

it s been almost   months since we purchased this treadmill  we are so happy as we made the decision to go with this  no issues so far and i would say  this is best quality treadmill we could get in market for this price  only bottleneck we faced was with installation  it s little difficult to do it and will require help of an additional person or two to get it completed properly  also  one of the parts received was not in perfect fit but i would say received a great support to get the replacement part and that too so fast  i would recommend buying this to anyone

i m in my   s and decided to improve my cardio during this pandemic  this treadmill has been just what the doctor ordered now that i m working out at home  treadmill assembly was pretty straightforward  it s sturdy and pretty quiet at higher speeds  only a few minor concerns      the plastic motor cover sits pretty low on the belt causing the user to step on it now and again so you must train yourself to run further back on the belt      ez to fold up but sticks a little when trying to lower it      heart rate monitor is not very accurate but to be fair i ve yet to find any fitness equipment of any kind to have an accurate hrm  imo  a very good purchase
ridiculous that you have to jump through hoops with their stupid ifit program just to start the treadmill   zero customer service available as well   would not recommend   would not buy again

received treadmill in a timely manner  not any damage besides a small plastic piece when it arrived was insignificant    set up took like   hours but everything did fit  when you turn it on  nordic tells you that you that you have to register the treadmill before it will unlock  this is a scam to try and get you to pay their monthly ifit fee  you dont have to do it  if you press the manual button on the treadmill  it should unlock the treadmill  you may have to hold it for a while  holding ifit button didnt do it for me   holding the manual button did it for me  it is crappy thought that they dont tell you this but rather they tell you that  product registration required   thats bs and misleading and a low thing done by the company for unsuspecting people  otherwise  the treadmill works great so far day   and have gotten good workout from it  will update if it becomes faulty and does not work or malfunctions

i have been using the nordictrack t series    s treadmill since day one  this is my first treadmill from this brand  i had two provioulsy from other brands i could feel and see the difference in quality at first glance  the material is high quality  the pieces fit together perfectly when assembling the machine and the screws fit perfectly with minimum effort  the machine is quiet and easy to operate  the band area is wide and deep  you feel really safe when using the treadmill  i really love this treadmill

we purchased this treadmill a few months ago  and waited a bit before writing this review  after using it for several months quite often we think it was a great purchase  i think this is nordictrack s cheapest treadmill  we got it for a great price and it performs very well  feels very sturdy and has the ability to connect to ifit via bluetooth bottom line  if you are on a budget don t hesitate to buy this treadmill

i ve never experienced such a disregard for a customer care process and focus  let me be clear  the people i finally got through too about multiple parts missing were nice and very helpful in one case  two phone calls where i waited in excess of    minutes each  one for missing handrails which arrived separately by a few weeks apart and the second for the rubber handrail covers that took    minutes each to heat and stretch to fit  unable to get them on fully  no surprise as they are no doubt added by machinery to the handles  i ended up cutting them short by   inches  the icing on the cake was when i completed the installation some   weeks after receiving it and proudly removed the clear plastic protective sheet on the console only to have it remove with it  chunks of the  satin finish  on the console  i realized i made a huge mistake buying my second and last nordictrack product from icon fitness

like many of us  the pandemic has caused some restraints with our normal life patterns such as going to the gym and enjoying the equipment that is readily available to us   with that being said  we decided to purchase the nordic track t series   it was easy to assemble  my husband assembled it by himself   the incline and speed features are easy to maneuver   i read many reviews that indicated you must sign up for ifit to operate the unit  however this is not true the bluetooth feature is easy to activate   we are able to jog and exercise while watching our favorite television shows in our home gym   the only reason why i didn t give the purchase a rating of   stars has more to do with our initial customer service experience   the unit blew a fuse and stopped working   we have a newer home so the surge protector was doing its job  the manual indicated that an arc adapter would help with this issue but it didn t give any other details regarding the same we chatted on the vendor s website and the agent kept asking if we wanted to return the item after being on hold for over    minutes   we explained that we didn t want to return  we simply needed information on the type of adapter needed to use the treadmill   we were the told that we would have to be transferred to another department   after being transferred and placed on another long hold  we received a message that they were closed frustrated  we called the toll free number and reached an agent who ran a diagnostic test over our phone and shipped the arc adapter within a week   this representative was patient and resolved our complaint so far  we love it

from delivery through assembly this is not for the faint of heart  the delivery schedule kept us on the hook for   days  waiting for the scheduled appointment to yield results  when the item finally arrived  the assembly process began  first  we received a screw that was deformed  we replaced it  we contacted the company about ways to attach the ground wire correctly  it took a week to get a response  and that did not include an answer nor any assistance  only an inquiry for more information  we proceeded on  it takes a socket set to tighten the screws  which is not in the instructions  and we also took the advice of others about avoiding the scam of ifit membership  however  note that you need to use the key before pressing the ifit button  ours squeaks but functions  so that s the good news  looking forward to using it now

i love the nordictrack treadmill so much i could spend hours on it  it makes it easy for me to accomplish my fitness goals without gym membership which i probably won t follow through with  assembly was easy with the instruction that came with it and it took my husband about an hour and a half to unbox and assemble  i have to give a big thumbs up to the seller because they exceeded my expectations with delivery  my treadmill came in a day earlier and the delivery guys called me when i was not home and even waited a few minutes for me to reroute and get back home  they were very polite and courteous  i am impressed with theirr service and the treadmill has been serving my entire family  i got the free month of ifit but like other reviewers said  you can use the treadmill without ifit  i just chose to use ifit for the extra challenge

i have had the treadmill for   days now and am very pleased with operation and features available   unpacking  took about an hour  assembly  took   hours  worked alone even thought it said takes   people  was not difficult working alone  start up  a previous review indicated how to start without signing up for ifit  which i did not want  pressing and holding the ifit icon on the main screen for    seconds allowed me to start my treadmill without signing up  operation  in manual mode   simple   which is what my wife and i were looking for  for the advanced user the features offered would provide that as well

this treadmill is amazing i am         lbs and i have no issues running on this treadmill i was a little concerned because i am tall and have long legs and was worried about this treadmill not being long enough  but it is more than long enough for me to run  i typically run at    mph with the incline i bought this treadmill because of covid    and having to stay at home  i was nervous because i run and walk  frequently changing the speed and incline during my workout  this treadmill is amazing  truly good quality  very comperable to the commerical grade at the gym i was used to  from the shipping to the assembley to the quality of the product a  also  you do not need the ifit app for the treadmill to work

very pleased with this treadmill  i have it in my basement for working out  it s fairly quiet and has a wide range of speeds and inclines  my one complaint is you cannot input your weight to customize your calories  otherwise it s a great treadmill for the price  i definitely recommend the amazon installation service to set it up

pros  sturdy machine and good motor that seems built to handle weight and demands of a person trying to get in shape at home  display is easy to understand and use and has a lot of features that i hope to become better acquainted with  but i am perfectly happy running in manual mode at desired speed for time being cons  this was difficult to assemble  instructions are fine but there are screws bolts in awkward to reach places which adds significant time in assembly  there is really no details on parts that should have recommendations for ensuring are in proper order out of the box  rear belt roller and adjustments to make sure the belt is centered   at appropriate tightness   my machine makes noises when i first start running and i am completely unable to diagnose the issue  would have been good to include diagrams   illustrations of how to make sure your machine is finely tuned

this treadmill is great  but it does not have memory   i do not use the fit you have to sign up with just to unlock your treadmill when it is brand new   not a fan of that   but  the treadill is great

the thing that nobody else mentioned was that you must have the safety key in place before you hold down the ifit button to bypass ifit activation  it won t bypass ifit w o the safety key  super shady business tactic to try and force us to hand over our credit card info simply to use a machine we already gave you money for

i bought this because i wanted to exercise at home due to covid   i wanted something that will last because it is quite big investment  then i found this by nordictrack  national brand with long history the tread is very wide and long that it is very comfortable running long time on it  it has reclining and    different speed settings  i tried up to    i don t think i can keep with    even though i play tennis regularly the best thing is i can run anytime i want  rain or shine  even after midnight  it is so easy to operate  and folds unfolds very easily

we have the peloton bike and are huge fans of peloton  hardware  exercise content and experience   i am using my nordic track while watching peloton classes on my ipad   we considered and tested out the   more expensive peloton treadmill options   and chose nordic track because it was immediately available and slightly more reasonable price wise   peloton had a     month wait at the time my family use the treadmill weekly and get good exercise on it   it s well made   sturdy the heart rate monitor doesn t work well  so we don t use it   the controls to adjust speed incline are tough to see in dim lit room  but usable   nothing as well designed or user friendly as the peloton   cheap plastic buttons  not dials and toggles   the led is nothing like the peloton monitor the treadmill works fine   works well   but compared to other purchases in this price range  it s not even close quality or design wise

it took a long time to put it together and you will need a second person  it s great for inside walking and the incline gives an amazing workout  i like the ifit programs  there are several that offer strength training during the walk which was a nice twist to treadmill training  my only complaint is that is does squeak a lot when i jog  i ve contacted customer service and like the others posted  they are slow to respond  if at all   it started squeaking a month after purchase  i followed suggestions on youtube and the company s website and it s still squeaking  guess i will just have to live with it  overall it s a good treadmill  i just wish customer service was more responsive in providing a solution for the squeaking which clearly affects a lot of their machines

it s a great value for getting a treadmill that has motorized incline  ifit capabilities  and came in     days   assembly was pretty straightforward and for even the novice person comes together easily   hold the ifit button down for    sec and you get around the requirement to use ifit   seems like decent quality but i removed a star because the belt doesn t seem tight enough and during assembly some of the plastic seemed thin and brittle and made me think it s not going to last   we shall see   otherwise this treadmill has features that you  cannot find at this price and that s  why i think the value is so high  free prime shipping and delivered  it inside my garage just where i wanted it  that alone beats saving a few bucks at the store and having to bring it home myself

yet another defective treadmill to add to the   star reviews  i figured i d be lucky  but i wasn t  screen doesn t work  have unplugged and restarted  after reading all the negative reviews i m just inclined to return it  not looking forward to dealing with their customer service it was actually pretty easy to assemble  i m female            and i assembled      solo  it took some maneuvering  but it can be done   screen worked for about   minutes  so now it s just a summertime coat rack  it s also not as easy to move from room to room as they make it look  it actually won t fit through any of my doorways

i ve been using it for about   months  my husband and i run at least    min a day and we like it so far  the treadmill is big but not too big to take up a lot of space  we bought it during the quarantine and we couldn t get an expert to assemble it so we had to do it ourselves  it is fairly easy to assemble it as long as you have the right tools and you read the manual very carefully  i gave   starts for   reasons  first  they ask you to sign up for ifit in order to activate your machine  it s a trial so just make sure you cancel the trial  sencond  sometimes when you turn on the treadmill  it starts to lift the belt all the way to the highest incline setting and then goes down itself  so you have to wait until it goes back to its original position  my husband and i don t mind it but it does happen and it shouldn t the treadmill works well so far  i will make an updated review in a few months from now

just put together nordictrack treadmill  after removing plastic cover from console  noticed grooved cosmetic blemish abrasion on plastic at lower part of console down lower half of  incline  and over to  start  buttons  this will aggravate me daily  as is  in my face   because grooved blemish seems to have been smoothed over and has no jagged edges  appears product left nordictrack with knowledge of the cosmetic defect  causing me to think it s a normal business practice to send products that have  cosmetic defects  out the door to customers who are expecting an unblemished  new product s he paid for  disappointing  have requested nordictrack send out new  unblemished  console  about to lodge formal complaint to amazon  too  calls into question the actual operation of the unit  which i m about to try out now  will keep you posted

i am on the treadmill daily  no excuse  because it s in my home   total convenience   i just turn on my music which i enjoy playing loudly  can t do that at the gym   i hate wearing ear buds   it is very user friendly  easy to switch up speed and adjust the grade of steepness   my husband put it together himself without  too much difficulty   i would recommend this treadmill  well made at a good price   set small goals  be realistic   try to be consistent so it doesn t turn into an expensive clothing rack

cannot activate the treadmill unless you go to their website and sign up with all your personal and credit card information for a membership  unbelievable  absolutely terrible anti consumer business practice and i hope they go out of business  will be returning this junk asap imagine buying a car and the dealer telling saying you can t drive the car unless you sign up for a membership i paid for this product

it is a great treadmill with wide running surface and very quiet motor and soft impact   easy on the legs and joints   operation is very straightforward   auto incline works perfectly while you are running   has a little loud click when you initially set the incline but works smoothly after   the pulse rate fluctuates inaccurately  and highly sensitive to where you place your hands   it is a very heavy treadmill and not easy to move   assembly requires   people and has many moving parts to connect   after starting  i hired pros from amazon s resources to finish the job   they were great  and completed the assembly in about    minutes

you get the nordictrack quality at a relative bargain compared to lesser known and established competitors  on top of that  amazon offers delivery to any room of your choice  a welcome option especially during these days  this is a no frills  no nonsense treadmill that gets the job done with minimum distractions  a pragmatic purchase p s    assembly was a challenge  but this will vary from person to person depending on experience  it can be done individually  but a second hand is recommended  be safe

ordered it at the beginning of july during the pandemic  shipping was canceled and rescheduled a couple of times but finally it arrived at the end of july  i hired a tech to assemble it and he was done in    minutes with me only holding the track one time  i probably could assemble it myself after watching him but i went the safe route  didn t do the subscription so no set programs but that doesn t bother me too much  easy to change speed and incline  was a little loud at first but got quieter with use  i m pleased with it  pic is during assembly in case you want to hire them

this is a nice treadmill  i m really impressed with the treadmill and actually the ifit software  i was totally set on cancwling the program  but now that i ve used it  it makes the treadmill soooo entertaining    you can do courses from all over the world in the comfort of your home  don t stress about the software til you try it  it looks like you can cancel the membership at any time and still have access to a couple ifit things and the normal manual mode at that time

i love my nordictrack treadmill   i did a lot of research before making this purchase   treadmills are pricey   i found the nordicktrack t     si and was thrilled with the price range and features   the treadmill shipped quickly through amazon and was easy to schedule delivery online when i read reviews before selecting this model  i saw that others complained about the size of the display screen and the range of the incline   i cannot disagree more   the screen size is perfect   the quality of the image is amazingly crisp and clear   also  for a novice walker jogger  the incline is perfect for me i also want to say that the ifit membership that is included with this product is amazing   i can take a walk through the tulip fields of holland or travel to the great wall of china   the work outs are challenging and fun   as you workout  the trainers share facts about the surroundings this was a great purchase and i would recommend the nordictrack t     si to any novice walker runner

i purchased this treadmill about a year ago and have been fairly happy with it  aside from two major issues nordictrack ships this unit in an unusable  locked  state   they will not unlock it until you sign up for a trial of their     mo ifit service   if you forget to cancel within    days  they will bill the next year in full        to your credit card the treadmill worked properly for   months then stopped running   still under warranty  nordictrack replaced the control board  but they took approximately   months to do so given the forced sale of their ifit product and the failure of the unit within the first year  i can t give this product more than two stars

the delivery was horrible    truck took out both our drive way poles that indicate with a light to stay on driveway   then they did not ask me as i was downstairs and did not hear them so my    yr mother told them to leave it inside so we had to get it downstairs   they should always ask for whom the delivery is for   then it says we had to activate it and sign up for the ifit  which is a credit card charge of     a month unless you can figure out how to cancel   we were able to bypass this scam by reading previous reviews   the machine fantastic but nordic track has some issues

just purchased from nordictrack directly via amazon  received treadmill and has a defective roller  treadmill doesn t work    hours no exaggeration  on hold and told there is no guarantee because i bought it through amazon even though the seller was nordictrack  horrible company  told me i can t return it and get a replacement  so i bought a   ft paperweight  don t make my mistake

pain to assemble  but the instructions are actually quite good and all the bits and bobs you need are nicely packaged and labeled with the number of the step to use them at  i liked the organization  follow the instructions exactly i e  don t tighten bolts until the instructions tell you to  for example  if you tighten the bolts at the bottom of the right and left uprights   which are the first things you put on    it becomes impossible to attach the pulse crossbar later  so you have to go back and loosen the bolts so the upright poles are loose enough to wiggle back and forth and attach the crossbar to all the complaints about the ifit  scam  are valid   it is quite misleading  but if you call the customer service number  a recorded message tells you to hold down the ifit key for    secs  if you go to ifit com activate  you can enter a garbage name and email  skip the credit card  then on the next screen they tell you to download an app   ignore that   just scroll down to the small print where they give you an option to activate without an app   click that  then they finally tell you how to hold down the ifit button for    secs  sheesh however the most important thing   don t forget to attach the red magnetic key before trying to activate the treadmill  otherwise it simply doesn t start  the activation instructions on the secret web page do mention the key  but the printed assembly instructions don t  it is obvious  but oops  i didn t attach in the key and the darn thing simply wouldn t activate  glad i finally realized it before losing my mind it s a decent treadmill overall  my kids love it too  it s fun to run on   i feel like i m at the gym

this is a great treadmill  it has the best features  bluetooth  connects to ifit  foldable  not too complicated to assemble  and great price  the only con is it was a bit larger than i thought  my fault   we have a large ipad so a giant screen was not necessary  really  buy this  you will not regret it and do yourself a favor and get the ifit membership  the family membership allows my three teens and i to walk  jog  exercise in beautiful locales  my daughter has explored castles in france  another has run around ancient forts in portugal and i ve walked the beaches in hawaii then sat and meditated as the sun went down  we are all loving it

in multiple places when you open the box this treadmill tells you that you need to register the product online to use it  initially i was okay with this thinking that it was a warranty thing or something  however  this means giving your credit card information to a secondary site and agreeing to a subscription service which you will then have to cancel  or not as they surely hope  after further research this is apparently not true even though packaging throughout the machine tells you this multiple times  had i known that the machine came with such predatory practices built in i would have not bought it it is rather overly complicated to assemble and that s coming from someone that is mechanically inclined  the packaging is frustrating and there s more tape than you can imagine  bolts are odd sizes that don t snugly fit quality wrenches and that s not confidence inspiring it does not stand straight up when folded and the mechanism that holds it up feels flimsy again i cannot overstate my disappointment with the machine in the sense that it demands that you register for a paid subscription service to even be able to use the machine at all  the machine that you ve spent a lot of money on  and although this is apparently a lie and there s a workaround that seems to make it worse considering the instructions demand you to register  this coupled with a rather complicated assembly and so so operation gives you a disappointing product i am very unhappy with this purchase and i will not consider a nordictrack in the future

great treadmill  we purchased during quarantine and have been very happy with it   the only think i recommend is not paying the extra money to have it brought into the home  they dropped it in my garage and i have yet to get my refund we paid for the extra service   we just took piece by piece to location   but over all exactly what we needed

i read all the reviews and   getting past those about the fitness membership   i decided it sounded good enough to give a try  unpacking it  my heart sank a little   it seemed kind of cheap and flimsy  we set it up per the instructions  which were a tiny bit more complicated than maybe they could have been   disabled the fitness membership  as the other reviewers recommended   and i hopped on  i couldn t believe that i was on a treadmill in my own home because it felt just like the ones i m accustomed to at the gym  i got the less expensive model  so it doesn t have the fancy display  or a fan   but the deck is solid and flexible just like those treadmills that are  x the price  to combat the lack of fancy display i mounted an extra tv on the wall in front of it and plugged in a firestick so i could access virtual running videos on youtube  many mornings i now run on waikiki beach or the golden gate bridge  oh  and i set up a small fan in front of the treadmill to simulate those ocean breezes  this thing has been a lifesaver this winter helping me keep up the mileage when temps have been lower than ideal  just for reference  i m a slightly better than average runner    ish minute miles  about    miles a week    and this treadmill has been perfect  trust and believe  there are still good deals out there

all in all  this is a great treadmill  i have zero complaints  i did a lot of research prior to the purchase and i get that there are better treadmills out there  quieter  stronger motor  etc  but for the price and what you get  it s a great buy  unless you re specifically looking for something that this treadmill doesn t have  this treadmill is more than enough for most people the year of free ifit is great  i thought it would be an afterthought  videos and whatnot seemed like they wouldn t be for me  but when you re actually doing a guided run hike  it s pretty great  the treadmill automatically adjusting speed and incline based on the video is so awesome my wife and i are probably      miles in  and the treadmill is working great  zero complaints  definitely recommend

we purchased this product as a result of covid    and being stuck at home with minimal activity  it is the perfect size  not too bulky and quality made  what i liked most about this model is the    inch screen for the lower price  one thing i wish i knew prior to setting it up though  is that you need a strong internet connection for it to work  when first assembled and turned on  the screen was stuck on the ifit triangle logo  to fix the issue  perform a factory reset according to the manual  this is done by inserting a paperclip into the tiny hole at the top of the machine while another person flips the switch from off to reset  once we did that and connected to a stronger wifi  the product worked like gold   i love the ifit feature  it keeps me entertained and inspired during my workout  awesome treadmill

the good  great treadmill  easy assembly  solid  works great  great treadmill for the price  if not for the ifit membership  i d happily give   stars the bad  you have to create an ifit account to turn it on  i then had to call to figure out how to run the treadmill without the ifit membership    push and hold down the ifit button for    seconds the ugly  nordic track called me a few days later and offered me an extended warranty if i create a positive review  they also offered to cancel my ifit membership and at the end of the call  they confirmed my membership was canceled  a few weeks later  my credit card was billed for the ifit membership   now i have to call them again and try to get the charge reversed

most frustrating part of the purchase is having to deal with nordictrack to get this device initialized and up and running if i had known about having to give them personal information including a credit card just to make this machine active i certainly would have looked else where   you have to sign up for their ifit program in order to get your treadmill to work then you you have to cancel ifit prior to your    day free trial     they make it easy to sign up but much much more difficult to cancel your subscription

i was surprised at how easy the assembly was  i am     and put the entire machine together by myself  i recommend putting the standing bar at the bottom on first instead of waiting until the end  the machine can easily be flipped to the side to put it on  this process is just easier before putting on the arms of the machine  especially if you are doing it alone overall the machine is sturdy and the free membership to ifit adds value  the screen is big and crystal clear

i purchased this treadmill in july      and have been using it regularly for three years   i am a consistent runner and use this treadmill two   three times per week for most of the year  i prefer to be outside  but when i can t run outside  this treadmill does the trick  it is a sturdy  strong work horse  i run between         miles per hour for endurance  interval training and speed work  up to an hour ish per session  and have found no issues with the machine  changing speed and inclines is simple and quick  set up was fairly easy but it did take two people  my husband and i assembled it ourselves  with a minimum number of bad words  no  this treadmill is not as  soft  as commercial versions  but it is very serviceable   if you are looking for a well built  workable treadmill  this one will be perfect

after finally getting it professionally assembled  i love it   it s user friendly  ease to walk on and definitely beats walking outside in the cold and or rainy weather   it also does an excellent job keeping track of your workout   i have not tried the ifit program or other features as i only wanted it for indoor walking

i purchased this treadmill because i m not comfortable going to the gym anymore due to the pandemic  as a type   diabetic with other health conditions that place me in the  high risk  category  i just can t risk it  so  i turned my third bedroom into an in home gym with an elliptical  treadmill  and weights  this particular nordiktrack model  around       was steeply discounted as the newer version  around         recently came out  this is a substantial machine  not the least bit flimsy or cheap feeling  i can t speak to the ease or difficulty of assembly as i hired someone to put it together for me  but the treadmill arrived in perfect condition  no cracks  dents  or scratches  and functions like a dream  thanks to the reviews i read before making my purchase  i was able to bypass the ifit registration frustration others warned about  it s true  if you hold the ifit button for    seconds  you can bypass the ifit registration trap and immediately begin using your treadmill  overall  i am very pleased with this purchase  this treadmill is well worth the money

my husband told me i was crazy to buy a treadmill  he said i would never use it  he was wrong  it gets used almost every day   even on nice weather days  we run outside and inside   this treadmill came with the ifit membership for a year in which   people can be on the account and create their own file  selecting their own workouts  training with an ifit trainer is so fun  my    year old is using it as well training to get his time shorter on his next real live  k  the treadmill works well following the trainers in speed and incline  it has a     incline  it is easy to assemble as my    year old and i  a    year old woman  put it together ourselves  easy to fold  but we don t really fold it because we use it so often  getting it when i did at     off  free financing with amazon credit card  and prime delivery it was an overall win for us

we ve had this tread for a few months now and are really happy our purchase  the machine itself is quite compact for storage purposes and very easy to fold and unfold  i prefer running outside but between really hot summers and snow in the winter  having a place to run indoors during those times is great  very much looking forward to using this winter   i particularly like the incline speed buttons  i think as far as home compact treads go  this is one of the best options out there

i wasn t really sure that we would use a treadmill  but knew with the weather turning hot and humid it would be better than walking outside   but  we use it almost every day   especially with the covid virus closing down our recreation centers   now we can walk and get our exercise while listening to music piped through the speakers or listening to the radio   this machine seems to be holding up very well   i had one slight problem  which will occur eventually   the belt eventually moved slightly   one quick email and i got a prompt response with instructions on a simple fix   i would definitely purchase a nordic track again if ever the need occurs   but  this one will probably last a long time

delivery was by third party with only   person when it s huge so wasn t handled properly and box was tore up  good thing packing insulation kept from most damage  couple scratches on bottom  frame  nothing major also  nordick try s to make you think that your treadmill  is locked with a big red sticker of warning saying it will not start until you go to  com activate where it s just to make you pay for a subscription for a bunch  of programs through them  which  is fine if you  want them  but  if not just  press and hold the  ifit button for    seconds and it will unlock and be ready  to go without  having to pay anything

i was looking for a treadmill to run on as gyms were closed and to avoid people outside during these unusual times  i was expecting a decent treadmill  but my expectations have been exceeded with this treadmill the treadmill was delivered into my garage and i assembled it in about three hours  i only needed help from my son to hold it in the folded up position as i installed the pole that keeps it up   i did take some time making sure it was level  as my floor is not  the rear legs adjust out to adjust the rear height of the deck  the running mat did not need adjustment as it ran centered and does not slip i m a fairly experienced runner  and was in the middle of training for a marathon which of course is now cancelled  i m now running about    miles a week on this treadmill  and about    outside in the course of a week  what has surprised me is how much i love ifit  there are an endless variety of instructor lead workouts as well as the ability to create your own maps anywhere in the world  it really does take the boredom out of treadmill running and by creating a schedule for the week  makes you accountable to finish them  i just completed the boston marathon series which was broken down into five runs  each of     miles  really enjoyable and i let ifit do the pacing and incline as it seemed just right to me     challenging without being impossible  i also like the onboard fan   really works  well  speakers are not great  but quite sufficient because of that  i wish i had spent      more and got the     screen instead of the     it would be totally worth it with the incredible ifit content negatives other than screen size   the hr sensors on the grip handles are woefully inaccurate  but not a big deal for me since i have my own hr monitors that sync with the treadmill  no downhill incline on this model  not something i ever thought i would have wanted  but lots of ifit workouts have downhill sections in summary  i m very happy with the       price for this  but now wish had bought the next model up for a larger screen

in full transparency  i have been offered a treadmill accessory by icon fitness to write a positive review  however everything i am writing below is      authentic and accurate the positives this treadmill is high tech and works beautifully for everything i want to use it for  we use it in our home and it is amazing for walking and running both inclined and flat  it comes with a year of ifit membership which includes video workouts for both running and walking  and while i haven t used them yet  they are easy to access and the treadmill tracks my weight  workouts  and calories burned for all past workouts  i have even sprinted on the treadmill and it works flawlessly  and i am over     pounds  the   drawbacks to my experience with the treadmill are    when i first used the treadmill the belt would  stick  a little when i walked  after over an hour of troubleshooting on the phone i was told that the belt wasn t properly lubricated at the factory and that i would have to pay to buy their specific lubricant from nordictrack  you are not allowed to use silicon based lubricants  which is every single lubricant on the market   this seemed wrong to me  if the factory didn t properly lubricate the belt  i don t understand why i am now obligated to fix that problem by spending more money with the manufacturer  i was assured over the phone that there was no way around this and it was now my problem to fix    as cool as the digital screen is  there have been a small handful of times when i have turned on the treadmill and the software failed to load and i could not start the treadmill  even by pushing the manual start buttons  i was forced to shut it down and power it up again in order to get it to start  i worry about what happens if eventually the screen doesn t load and there is no way to start the treadmill  i would have been just as happy without the screen and the software  like the treadmills at the gym where you just press  start  and the belt starts  there is an upside to the bells and whistles  but i worry that some day there will also be a downside that being said  the machine works beautifully and i am happy with my purchase

when i received this product  after assembly  i could not use  my  machine  for it was locked by the manufacturer  to unlock  i was instructed to go to a web site  once on the web site  i was given no choice to unlock or register  instead i was forced to enroll in an exercise program  which was advertised to be free for a month   but alas like all fly by night businesses they demanded my credit card number  which i refused to do  i did not want such a valueless service  so i tried the numbers provided in the manual  and assembly instructions  also went to the internet under  nordictrack  for more numbers  in one of the numbers  they told me the process to unlock the machine with out having to establish an ifit account  that worked  all was well  until my console component had a defective finish  it worked well but looked bad  so i tried to contact nordictrack and not ifit for resolution of my defective product  at the end of days of fruitless attempts they all ended that in order to receive any service one has to have an ifit account  i went back to amazon for assistance  i can tell you that amazon has an exceptional customer service staff  unlike the non existent nordictrack  amazon had difficulty getting them to contact me and wound up giving me a rebate on the machine  from here on  i will never buy another nordictrack product  especially that now i know there is no support unless you pay for a valueless service  sure the first month free  but by the second wham you get hit because  you forgot to cancel it

do not buy a nordictrack   they forced us to sign up for  ifit  at     a month just to use the damn treadmill we paid    for   we are furious   there is supposed to be a way to override it but after   hours on the phone with  customer service  getting no answer on how to use the machine without paying extra  we gave up and just paid the      this is a rip off don t buy it   horrible

does what i expect it to do         make me run only   stars because the machine console shakes while running   i ve tightened and retightened several times to see if that s the issue  could be an uneven garage floor   i ve used a level  treadmill mat  increased decreased the leg height to ensure things are even  not sure  still shakes   if using the console panel to hold phone  it makes it tough to watch a movie due to the shaking   to overcome  i hang my phone from a shelf above treadmill to avoid the shake other than that  the machine is solid  feels good running on it   you can t feel the shake while running  only the console shakes   been using it   min a day at       no signs of wear and tear so far

purchased this a month ago and love it i used to go to the gym daily  but due to covid  i haven t been back since february  i started to run and walk outside  but the concrete was starting to do a number on me  i m still not ready to venture back to the gym to use their treadmills  so i decided to get something for home i did a lot of research on treadmills and finally decided that this was the one nordictrack is a name you can trust and they make a very sound and quality product  this unit also has a very impressive manufactures warranty  this treadmill is great for the price  especially if you compare the features to other treadmills in this price range and below lower price treadmills had two features that turned me off  first  was the width of the belt  seems that lower priced treadmills had a     wide belt or less  that made me concernned that my arms were going to hit the support bars  this treadmill has a     wide belt with plenty of room to feel comfortable with either running or walking  the other issue that cheaper treadmills had were that their incline levels were manual  so before you ran  you had to physically lift the treadmill up and adjust the incline  which were usually   levels  and those levels did not provide an adequate incline  this treadmill has an electric generated incline with    levels and that is a far better option  it also has    speeds  which at this price level  is pretty impressive assembly took over three hours  there are videos on youtube that help walk you through the process and are very helpful  some of the screws did not fit  but eventually got them to fit  i assembled this by myself  having two people helps  but you can do it with one person  worst part was the very last part installing the hydraulic arm  just use a chair to hold up the belt and rollers and you should be fine make sure you maintenance the belt and rollers with silicon  which can be found for purchase on amazon  the more you use it  the more friction is going to affect the belt  needs to be lubricated every few months  not expensive only complaint is the display is a bit bright and bare bones  and like most people havd said the subscrition to ifit seems fishy  but that can easily be bipassed by holding the ifit button for    seconds are the treadmills at the gym better  yes  but they also cost thousands of dollars  and this treadmill does not feel cheap or inferior to those you would find at a gym  while running  its almost impossible to tell the difference  if you miss the feeling of running or walking on treadmills at the gym  this is what you need i would definitely recommend buying this  no regrets  except wish i would have purchased it sooner

the set up drives me insane  i just want to get on the flipping treadmill and run  you have to wait forever for the screen to load and then it doesn t pick up the internet and then you have to continue without wifi  the actual treadmill  once you finally get it to where you can keep track of the laps and the time  isn t so terrible physically   i think i ve discovered i would rather have something simple  i ve caught myself wanting to punch the screen a couple of times because i can t believe i ve made this purchase  i would not suggest buying this if you just want to hop on and go because believe me you will get tired of it quickly  the loading process is just terrible  if you have to have the fancy screen which sucks and you want to attempt for the wifi to pick up then sure

x     surface the treadmill arrived quickly but had several broken plastic pieces  side rail and associated parts  parts of the motor hood  and the base under the motor belt drive   this is a very heavy item  but i think the packaging could be improved to help prevent damage on the sides and corners  which is where most of the damage to my treadmill occurred i was able to order the broken parts within and hour and a half of delivery  it took       minutes to get the icon fitness customer service rep on the phone but once i did she was courteous and very helpful  the parts were delivered free i assembled as much of the treadmill as i could while waiting on the replacement parts  the assembly instructions were very good and i only needed assistance with another person when installing the lift assist cylinder  it took me no more than an hour and a half to assemble  i like that the parts screws hardware was packaged with their part numbers and corresponded to the assembly steps in the instructions my replacement parts arrived in three separate shipments which ultimately took a month to get all of them  i was able to begin using the treadmill after the second shipment of parts arrived startup was easy with the hints given by others to bypass ifit i have the   inch screen and it is perfectly fine  there are    workouts    each for calorie  intensity  incline  and speed   the speed and incline are controlled by the treadmill during the workout but you can override them to suit you or just make all settings in a manual mode  the incline is working well and can really make you work harder during your workout i wish the warranty were a bit better on the motor which is why i did not give the treadmill   stars  there are other similarly priced treadmills with better motor warranties but overall i think this is a very nice treadmill  i was able to get it at a very good price  if you ae considering it i suggest checking the price on amazon each day and waiting for a sale

the treadmill is amazing  but one thing you should know is that if you plan on using it with bluetooth headphones completely wireless  you won t be able to  i have the jabra elite   t active and i bought them just to use them while i workout  but when i use them on this treadmill  it interferes with my headphones and i just hear static the whole time  i found out it does it with almost all types of bluetooth headphones that are completely wireless  so that s something to keep in mind  wired headphones work fine  but completely wireless will mess your ears up and won t be able to hear your music comfortably  also  keep the pulse reader clean  it seems to be some cheap metal that gets rusty fast  the speakers on the treadmill are bad  don t even think about using them for music  lol  other than that the machine is amazing though  highly recommend it

this treadmill is by far the worst thing i ve ever bought on amazon  the treadmill never functioned properly and was even scuffed up  plastic motor cover  like it was a refurbished product though i bought brand new  the belt skipped so bad my husband almost hurt himself attempting to run on it  icon fitness refused to send a replacement machine and only offered fixes like  let s try having you lube it   they finally agreed to replace a part after my second or third call on hold for hours  the part never arrived  when i talked with a rep i was told the past was in  quality control  thankfully  amazon customer service was awesome and agreed to take the treadmill back despite being past their return policy i don t know why this piece of junk is amazons top pick  but i d imagine it has more to do with a contract then people actually rating this treadmill   stars do not buy this treadmill  i repeat do not buy this treadmill

overall the treadmill was easy to assemble   i did it by myself after we got the pieces moved to the  basement   the platform part is quite heavy and i had to have help with that  i m a    y o  woman    once i got it     assembled i quit   i cannot move it anywhere else and folding it up is unnecessary so i did not do that part   it works very well and is very enjoyable to use   i have never used any other treadmills  so i can t compare it   it came with the ifit membership which i didn t like and won t use  but it isn t required just to use the unit

this treadmill is everything i was expecting it to be and more not only it runs smooth and it s very quiet  it also has an enormous variety of workouts pre loaded and great videos of runs in different locations that will make time pass fast even when you re working out at home and we all know how boring that can get it also comes with a free   year membership to ifit which for a fitness committed person is a great perk i was reluctant at the idea of buying a tm because i hate not running outside but i ve had a lot of fun on this machine and i think we ll be friends for many years to come

this is a nice treadmill   it is basic with no bells and whistles   it is not blue tooth compatible unless you buy the ifit plan  but that is not a big deal for us   there is no fan  which is also not a big deal for us   we chose to pay to have it assembled and the assembly team arrived timely and were very nice   they didn t try to sell us on the ifit plan  they simply told us to hold the ifit button down for    seconds and the treadmill would work   we have used it a lot and we like the     belt as opposed to a smaller one   very satisfied with the treadmill

i am a fit female and it took   people to set this up and   hours   after set up  machine was locked until you subscribed to minimum        month program  that is the push  don t fall for it  push and hold bluetooth button for    seconds and it will unlock  had to get a customer service to tell me this   a bit of a scam if you ask me    not too happy with the thickness of belt  seems flimsy  not impressed with nordictrac for

your browser does not support html  video                          this treadmill is great   i got free assembly from amazon   i was able to start it manually just by holding the ifit button for    seconds   i didn t have to create an account the floor is firm  yet has a nice cushion to absorb pressure when running

stars for misleading packaging disclaimers re  ifit  treadmill arrived today  assembly instructions well written  straightforward  no real time spent on it yet  so cannot attest to overall quality  will review after time   but seems very solid for an entry level treadmill from a reputable company  that being said  there are multiple disclaimers on packaging indicating unit will not function until you register sign up for an ifit plan  this is misleading false  to bypass  once assembled  power on unit hold ifit logo on front panel down for appx        sec  this bypasses any need to register unnecessarily  and unit will function as intended  again  the packaging would lead you to believe you must register with ifit  this is misleading and incorrect  unusual that nordictrack  a company with a very solid reputation would do this without informing consumer

this treadmill is a fine purchase  don t bother paying for additional shipping options  we paid to have it delivered to the room of our choice and got it left at our door  amazon would not refund our money  that aside the machine does the trick  not a lot of bells and whistles but provides a smooth run  i ve had it up past  mph with no problems  we also bypassed the ifit program by calling the number on the treadmill and saying we didn t have internet access  my only complaint is that once you center the belt it moves with use and becomes off center  you just have to adjust it every so often  not terrible  overall  pleased with the purchase  does the trick when the weather is bad and i don t want to run outside
very poor customer support  shortly after purchasing i one day started to hear a squeaking sound  customer service refused to send a tech to look at it even though it s under warranty

i got my treadmill in about   weeks before i broke my hand  thankfully it is so easy to fold that i can do that with   hand  as for ifit  i have never found a program that makes me so engaged as the ifit app does  i don t even care to try to figure out how to use the machine without the app because there are so many places to explore and so many talented and knowledgeable trainers that keep me      engaged  i love being able to do a work out and then get so wrapped up in learning about the geology  history  and views of foreign countries and cities that all of a sudden the work out is done  i am currently doing the iberian beginner running series with tommy rivers puzey and i can t recommend his program enough the machine is nice and stable and i have had very minimal glitches with it  mostly  it occasionally doesn t want to start the video right away and i have to close the app and reopen it  nbd very satisfied  very much worth the price

for the amount spent on this treadmill i feel like their should be a little more into it  it was heavy and a little annoying to put together as expected but the plastic and some parts feel too flexible  flimsy you d think it would be strong heavy duty plastic  although once together it feels a little more sturdy  i really wish it was a little more tech advanced like with bluetooth enable and able to have apps like youtube  it s a little loud too while warm up walking but once running it s not too annoying  i really like this treadmill but i think they over priced it a couple hundred

i was looking for a treadmill that i would actually use not just as a clothes hanger  and i quickly realized the cheaper options were not going to cut it  i came across this model  and the description sounded perfect to me  wide belt  automatic incline  easy assembly  free delivery  and hydraulic assisted unfolding  the motor is quiet  and powerful enough for my needs  speed         miles   although i can take it up to speed     customer service is great  as i already used them soon after my delivery  the hood cover broke during shipment storage  and i called to see about a replacement  both amazon and nordic track were on top of it  and they shipped out a cover within a few days free of charge  one complaint is the display is a little hard to read if the lights are not bright enough  sure you can read the time and distance  but if you want to change speed or incline  i have to really look hard  the other complaint is that with this kind of money spent on a treadmill  they couldn t even add a charging port for my phone  smh  great treadmill otherwise  would buy it again

i m giving this three stars due to several factors one of the screws included in the assembly packet was a defective screw  once the product was assembled it was still not very sturdy and it also was not level   the process to get the machine activated and to use it without ifit is a headache i wouldn t reccomend it but if you do go with this treadmill be sure to pay the extra for expert assembly to save you the headache  also be aware of the hoops you have to jump through to activate and then deactivate ifit if you are not interested in a monthly premium workout program

just got this machine yesterday  assembly was relatively easy  and the machine itself runs smoothly  the major issue is with start up  nordictrack wants you to sign up for its ifit service  which is     a month  my wife used it first and the treadmill easily paired to her phone  she was able to start up the machine and take off after just a few minutes  i went next and had a completely different experience  i downloaded the same app  but my screen looked completely different than hers  i also wasn t able to pair until my wife disconnected from it first  even paired to the machine i could not get it to start i went online to try and troubleshoot and nordictrack s website which indicated that something was wrong with equipment and needed to replaced  fortunately  my wife found on a review that if you hold down the ifit button for    secs the ifit system eventually shuts off  this is indicated by the light turning from blue to green  once that happens the machine works exactly as it should

i ve been a runner for     year but i admit that running in high hear  bitter cold or heavy cold rain is not my thing  i was looking for a treadmill that won t break my budget and helps me keep going  a friend got this one and highly recommended it so i bought it  best decision ever  my significant other installed it in an afternoon  we have been using it for the last   months regularly  he s mostly power walking but i m running  hiking  you name it  the ifit app keeps me entertained and gives me the opportunity to virtually travel to places where i only dream to go while i train  highly recommended

it has been about   months since i ve been using this nordictrack treadmill  so far so good  i like the folding technique as it is fairly easy to store when not in use  it runs smoothly and the incline is a nice touch  the only downfall would be the set up process  it took me a couple of hours to setup but if i had someone else helping me it would of taken less time  overall  a pretty nice product
cant use the screen if you dont have internet connection  so basically your buying a good treadmill with a white screen and an arrow in the middle of it

while the treadmill is nice  the ifit application almost ruins it and their customer service doubles down  cant even activate your treadmill unless you go through ifit for whatever reason which was an aggravating process in itself then be prepared for multiple emails a day  when simply asking to unsubscribe to the emails  i was informed they had to delete my whole account thus removing me from the free month  then chat closed  ifit is a horrible experience the treadmill itself is pretty nice and gets the job done however  its a shame they are linked with a company like ifit

do not order a nordictrack unless you are prepared to do all the work on it yourself   my belt wasn t adjusted properly on install   i bought a   year maintenance plan that says it covers in house work   but they will refuse to honor that   you are on your own   one day you are going to have to change the belt   you have to disassemble the whole treadmill to do this if you are an expert treadmill technician then go for it   otherwise do not purchase a nordictrack

an extreme hassle to put together  takes way longer than expected and not too many of the pieces holes actually line up  not all the told are included  instructions get a little iffy  do not toss any of the screws they tell you too until you are completely finished   you will be asked to reuse some of them later on  i always keep mine just in case   theres an additional wire on the base part of the treadmill and the screen that is not listed anywhere in the instructions or online  do we connect this  or not  also weighs     pounds so i d pay someone to deliver it and bring it in  will take two people to put together  someone you trust and can politely feud with over the idiotic design of how to put this together   not everything is tight and not all screws will go in  i would start with step       first as it has to do with the bottom on the treadmill  they want you to put the entire thing together and then put the bar in on the bottom that holds it upright for its store away design  don t be fooled  someone will have to manually hold it up as someone fenagles the putting together of the bar set up  it isn t fun  it s heavy and arduous

i purchased this treadmill to use during the winter months  given that gyms are closed  the treadmill is great when it works  unfortunately  the treadmill console stopped working about    days after receiving it  just in time to not be able to return it   nordic track customer service was unable to help and directed to me to a third party called ifit who determined i probably needed an entirely new console  the console will take     weeks to get here  and they did not guarantee it will work  the treadmill will not turn on at all  this means that after    days of owning a treadmill which i used maybe    times  i already cannot use the treadmill  will update if there is any improvement with new console

i use this for walking   miles per hour  hard stuff  i ve walked    miles  the belt no longer works  excellent value for the price    took forever to arrive  broke almost immediately  love it edit  i fixed it myself  the belt came off of the motor connecting the machine to the treadmills belt

so far  so good  runs smooth and relatively quiet  we use it mainly for walking  but it also provides adequate performance for moderate running  please note that it is a heavy piece of gear  and requires two people to lift  assemble  and or move from one location to another  you ll need quite a bit of clearance and space to store this away between uses  otherwise  expect to add it to your home as a permanent piece of furniture

the assembly was a pain  when i got to the upper part of the treadmill the pulse bar would not align with the uprights  little did i know that they added two right handle bars   instead of left and right handle bar  i would not understand why things were not aligned  i tried hard to make it match but it was impossible  after   hour of trying to align everything  i found out that is was a part error and i was given two identical handle bars  i had two cheap proform treadmills over    years  with no problems  i upgraded to a better brand  just two find out that nordic track does not know how to include the correct parts for their treadmills in the factory  very disappointing     i called support but they don t work on saturdays  of course  stay clear of this sloppy company

i get terrible shin splints no matter the shoe or running service  so far  nothing  run walk on it   times as a week  so far so good  yes  fan is noisy  but other than that  all is good  note  we didn t sign up for the ifit program as we are usually overseas  and it still works fine  we just use it on the manual setting  it gives me all the info i need  we have one small issue with the heart monitor  and they shipped us the replacement part very  very promptly  no complaints  just a great running experience

i recently bought the nordic track    s   both me and my wife have been using it for    minutes every day and it was running ok for a month i am   ft     lbs and my wife closer to     lbs  i guess i should have been skeptical and put a little bit more faith in the critical  negative reviews  it broke down after a month and customer service is very poor  can t even get to the customer service after waiting on the phone for more than an hour never will buy anything from nordic

first off  pricing on this treadmill was a great deal  i have rated it   stars as     is not possible  i love how easy it is to fold up and drop down  i also put a lot of pressure on the locking strut without lifting the base any further to test how it would hold up if it was accidentally bumped  it didn t budge  you actually have to push the base up a little more to disengage the lock assembly was fairly straightforward and the instructions were very detailed  i marked it   stars under assembly as the box was not holding together very well once delivered and some of the plastic pieces are cheap fragile  navigating downstairs with a heavy treadmill no longer in its box proved difficult  the plastic cover for the motor incurred a little damage to   of the   internal screw hole locations  luckily the nuts used are the little metal clips that are slid on  there was still about half the plastic for them to hold onto  so i was able to put the cover back on with no visible damage or issues  other people may not be so lucky  so be careful with the plastic parts if you are assembling this yourself as for actually using the treadmill  it is great  the incline action was a little louder than my wife expected  but doesn t bother you once you are listening to music  the speed adjusts quickly and we love the quick select options to adjust the speed even more quickly  great for manual interval  sprints   if you want to bypass the ifit on this particular model  be sure the emergency cord is attached and then just hold down the ifit button for like       seconds i highly recommend this treadmill for others than want quality without all the unnecessary bells and whistles of some others

i had a cheap and flimsy treadmill because it was free  and i didn t want to spend money if i wasn t going to use it   well  i didn t use the cheap and flimsy one because it was too hard to use   you definitely get what you pay for   assembly took my spouse and i   hours   i want to thank everyone who left reviews before us   you do not have to register with ifit or anything before you use the treadmill   we put it together  pressed and held the ifit button for    seconds  and have been using the treadmill with no problems ever since   i have been using it every day for the past week

great and does what a treadmill is suppose to do  during assembly the pulse bar didn t fit but with some elbow grease it was made to fit warnings  the treadmill does not gradually go up in speed so if you press a number it will go to that number immediately so don t be an idiot and complain that you were injured  it s a treadmill not a toy it has running pieces try not to get caught in it

i absolutely luv this machine and once covid    hit and the shelter in place begun  i was extremely happy i had it   i am able to workout around the world in the most beautiful locations in the comfort of my home   another reason i bought this one is the ability to fold it up and use less space   i actually rarely use this now  as i just leave it open but it s still a great feature to have for when i need it   i use it daily and love the ifit workout library   i have a free year but plan to keep subscribing once it expires next january  i highly recommend this machine  great price  great quality   value    worth every penny

i read a ton of reviews for treadmills  this one is wonderful  i use it for running daily  it is sturdy and comfortable to run on  it says the ifit is something you have to do  if you hold down the button for a few seconds it will start without paying for that subscription  it is extremely heavy so i recommend at least paying the extra money to get it in the room you want  i ve been very happy with this and it is very easy to operate

we are thrilled with our nordic track purchase  it was a big purchase for us and we ve been thinking about for a few years  we are so glad we finally did it i love the interactivity with ifit  the videos and trainers are a blast  i especially love being able to walk and see places all over the world when it is bitterly cold and cloudy outside here  getting it into the house was a trick  and getting back where we needed it required some ingenuity  but it wasn t too hard  make sure you get the delivery people to get it inside your door  we then opened the box and took the pieces to the room we wanted we saw comments about not being able to use it without ifit  but i use it on manual mode often  a member of our family is working through long term illness so sometimes they need control over speed and incline  the manual mode is ideal for that again  we re super happy  if you want to walk or run inside  this is a great machine

if you are looking for a relatively compact  inexpensive and functional treadmill for your home gym  this is a great choice   we have been using it for the last three months and it has been a great experience   we use it on average   to   times a week for about an hour each time   some negative reviews mention the ifitness setup after installation  there is a way to bypass the ifitness app by holding down the  ifit  button for longer than    seconds   i learned this by reading the reviews before purchase and it worked like a charm   if you don t take the time to do your research online and read the reviews before buying a product like a treadmill  you should not be shopping online   the speed and incline setup is very easy and straightforward from   to      the cup holders are big and nice for me to put down a water bottle and a towel   when i am running on it  it is very sturdy and doesn t shake   it is just big enough to feel comfortable on it but not too big where it fits nicely in the basement corner   you can fold it up if you need extra space when not using it   it is very easy to fold and unfold   personally i don t need all other frills that come with the treadmills that cost        such as a built in fan or tv screen   for the price of under       we have been very satisfied with this treadmill
