we bought this because my mom has a    year old proform  same parent company  treadmill that has lasted    years without maintenance excellent for walking jogging without any fancy or unnecessary features  i m   foot and      pounds and have no problems with walking jogging  very tall people may have problems with a full sprint  the treadmill is quiet and very sturdy with a clear display don t expect any fancy features or for the heart rate monitor to be even moderately accurate  just buy a smart watch and tablet with your savings over the expensive treadmills expect assembly to be     hours and there are steps that really need   people note  bypass ifit setup by holding ifit button for       seconds  only the first time you setup   no big deal

after years of contemplating buying a treadmill but always deciding it wasn t worth the money since i had access to them at the gym  i started looking seriously a few months ago after several months of covid lockdown kept gyms out of access  and even after they opened  i was leery of going into one  i had a tough time deciding on a treadmill  i was looking at budget treadmills in the         price range but every time i read a review it said things like  belt too narrow    not sturdy enough for running   i didn t need anything with bells   whistles like a huge display or tv or speakers or fans  so i kept raising the price range until i found one that i was able to find the qualities i was looking for  i came upon the nordictrack t series    s  and i love it so far  i like the spacious    x    tread belt running surface  i like that it is sturdy  the speeds are      and most of the time i can t even go past     to   for my fast jogging  the panel has plenty of options to keep track of all kinds of stuff  i only use time  or distance   i wanted something that could be folded up  this thing is heavy   i had to hire someone to put it together for me  thanks to other reviewers  i was able to figure out how to bypass the ifit registration to activate  i have had this treadmill for over   months now and so far i am very happy with this purchase   my only regret is that i paid      for it and have since see it list for around         a price that would have made this an even greater value

works great  hubby put it together in about an hour  but had trouble getting the tension bar  what helps it fold up and down  together  make sure to follow the instructions to get around the start issue  press ifit button for    seconds

this treadmill definitely helped me stay active at home  decent purchase for the price and carrying the brand name nordictrack  ifit connectivity with this treadmill is definitely a plus  even though it has monthly fees it does the job well of having you connected  motivated with different workout options and reasonably priced  the only reason i give a   star is mainly due to the fact that it makes a creeky noise during the incline walk run  would have been nice to have a smaller display than digital numbers  have found models with display after the purchase for about the same price but have long lead times for delivery

i have had this for about a month now  i got this for a discounted price and it works great for my purposes  and couldn t beat the price for what you get  i was surprised how nice it actually was once assembled  folds easily  soft tread  it doesn t have a fan or a fancy screen but i use a larger tv in front of it anyway and have a fan overhead  would prefer an option of more than     incline but again for the price it s great  there is a way to bypass the ifit membership

so far so good after about a month of use  i just use the manual mode and have not yet used ifit  am sure i will at some point due to the free year  but was not why i bought it  very quite especially compared to the proform unit this replaced after the motor went  no complaints aside from having to wait for the unit to load and then skip the ifit mode before you can use the manual mode  a little annoying but after a minute am up and running  assembly not the most enjoyable thing as others explained  but not bad and pretty much as expected  overall very pleased  as normal  delivery from amazon on time and without a hitch

i like that it s easy to use  easy to fold  but harder to move than the last nordictrack i ve owned there are no front wheels so it s a bit more challenging  i ve only had it for a couple of weeks  assembled  but i use it near daily   i put it together myself  one person  a women    it s not that difficult

this is a basic home quality treadmill  no frills and definitely lacking the robustness of a professional fitness center machine it took me   nights to get it assembled  by myself   the pieces are not well formed and don t easily fit as per the instructions  the machine bounces much more than i d like

your browser does not support html  video                          this is exactly what i was looking for  it s perfect  just remember when you put it together to start it without ifit subscription you just have to press and hold the blue ifit button on the treadmill and it will by pass it  i highly recommend this treadmill

i purchased this treadmill and opted to assemble it myself to save the     bucks  the assembly was difficult  the treadmill comes with certain parts screwed together for shipping purposes i guess  but they re not permanent screws  the instructions neglect to mention to remove these screws until after you ve assemble a part causing you to have to un assemble that part  remove the screw  and re assemble it  which is annoying and wastes time  other than that  the assembly was going okay until i realized they forgot to send me a part  it was the bar that attaches the two handles and that the console screws into  so kind of a key component  it took three weeks to get through to icon fitness to get my replacement part ordered  every time i tried to get in touch  they were experiencing longer than usual wait times  even first thing in the morning  and when i would get through to somebody  they said they couldn t help me with my issue  finally  i thought i had the part ordered  but a week passed  and i never received a confirmation email  so  i ordered the part again  a few days later  both parts showed up  no idea why the first part took so long to ship but the second one only took a few days  seems inconsistent  but anyway   neither part fit  both were too short to reach from one handlebar to the other and if even they did  the treadmill wasn t built squarely  so the screw holes on the bar were nowhere near lining up with the holes in the handle bar   so after much frustration with reaching customer service over three weeks  i got duplicate parts and neither fit  waste of time  i sent this treadmill back and ordered a proform treadmill

the package arrived damaged  nordictrack s customer service has not replied to my ticket that i submitted over a week ago after trying to call  the automated answering system for their customer service actually hung up on me because they did not detect a registered product under the phone number i was calling from i ve since needed to ducktape the broken plastic back together  the motor is making a rapid tick  tick  tick sound while running the belt has a huge oil stain from assembly at the factory that you can see whip around when in use really disappointed in this purchase and the lack of customer service

lots of pieces to put together and very heavy in the box  partially due to some of the heavy packing material    however  once together it works well and it a great piece of workout equipment   i don t use all of the features like the incline and the programming for different courses  but it seems well made   i love the built in speakers where i can plug in my phone to hear music or watch a video much easier than having to have my earbuds in  i did have to purchase a compatible cord to connect it though as it does not come with it   i was disappointed that one of the feet was damaged during shipping  but nordic track replaced it at no charge and it was able to get it on with no problem  i can honestly recommend this as a great treadmill

i received this from my amazon order on april     it did not come with any of the hardware parts to install  since this was a saturday  i had to wait until monday to call customer service  i was on hold for over an hour  and then was hung up on  i got ahold of someone the next day  who put in an order for my parts  it is now   weeks later  may    and i still have no parts  i am constantly given the run around with their customer service and spend minimum    min to an hour on hold to try and reach a customer service rep  i would love to say whether or not i like the actual treadmill  but i am still yet to be able to put it together  let alone try it out  i will update when i can actually try the product out  but so far i am far from impressed with nordictrack customer service

bought this as a christmas gift for my wife  we have both been using it  it works great  love it  the box came in good shape  all the parts were undamaged  assembly went perfectly  all the parts  hardware etc  are good quality  holes all lined up perfectly  no complaints  the box is quite heavy  two people to move it for sure if someone got a damaged treadmill or something doesn t work  i can understand a bad review  those things aside  this treadmill is everything it claims to be  i have assembled countless things over the years   this is well made

we don t know how we could have coped without the nordic treadmill during this coronavirus pandemic  with the closings of parks and some rainy days we are able to exercise anytime on any day  we constantly talk about how ordering this treadmill was the best luckiest thing we ve done to prepare  wink wink  for this time in our life  the treadmill has been flawless and the ifit programs have taken it to a level we never imagined  picture  literally  you are able to world travel during this time of isolation and being able to work out at the same time  well  that s what you get an assemblage of super trainers to lead you through exercise routines geared to your abilities with the backdrop of some of the most beautiful locations in the world  and the trainers are so knowledgeable about the history and culture of these locales  besides the techniques and conditioning needed to achieve your health related training goals  my wife and i have found this to be invaluable  you also have the ability to develop your own routines  there is a website where you can adjust the speed  the intervals  the incline for any timed workout you want to create  and then when you are ready to workout it miraculously shows up in your favorites on the treadmill itself  it s like magic  well not really  your treadmill needs to be connected to your home wifi for internet connection  but that s pretty much it  the only thing you have to do is to make exercise part of your daily routine  this nordic track treadmill has taken exercise to a new level of enjoyment

i was looking for a decent low cost treadmill and was a little concerned about the mixed reviews  i m very happy i purchased  this fits my needs perfectly  setup was straightforward and took me about an hour to put together with help from my wife  it was very simple as long as you follow the instructions  though i d definitely recommend assembling in the location you ll be keeping the treadmill due to the weight deliver was also easy  it came through a separate freight company who were communicative throughout the process about selecting a date and time and contacting me when they were about an hour out from my location on the delivery date while other people have talked about the need to use ifit  you can bypass this  but i actually decided to try it out and have continued using since  i like the preloaded workouts offered along with the ability to create my own and it s cheaper than a gym membership  having that extra motivation knowing i m trying to achieve a certain distance or duration helps me to keep pushing myself i ve been using it   times per week for   months now without any issues  it has a nice range of speeds  i m not a sprinter by any means  and generally keep my runs in the     mph range  the incline function also works well all in all  it s a great value for the price and the build quality compared to similarly priced machines is fantastic

with the recent pandemic and gym closures  it became increasingly difficult to maintain a sustainable exercise routine  buying our nordic track treadmill with ifit has been the solution  with this machine in our home  we have no excuses to maintain or lose unwanted weight  and keep fit  which is so important during times of stress and while we age  we love this product and would highly recommend it to meet your health and fitness related goals

so glad i bought this  kinda hard to put together    you need two people but so worth it  we are using it daily with no problems at all best part is that you can also install apps like youtube  spotify and more on it to use while using the treadmill  it s also very quiet

in less than a year this treadmill has had three catastrophic failures after about   months the belt control module died   at that point the treadmill belt no longer moved it took   months to get a replacement part  which was covered by the warranty a week or so after replacing the module  the walking deck cracked down the middle   the actual wooden deck has a foot long crack caused by  ish months of normal use   keep in mind  i weigh about     lbs  which obviously isn t pushing the upper limit of treadmill s weight rating   however  the walking board was also covered under the warranty  and took another month or so to arrive that takes us up to the year warranty that comes with the treadmill everything worked well for about a month  until the motor started making a clicking noise   softly at first but over the next week it continued to grow louder   additionally  the treadmill could no longer maintain speed and would jerk randomly while in motion   finally  it completely died   the entire treadmill went black  everything shut off and no amount of unplugging or resetting would get it to turn on since it was no longer covered by the warranty  and considering in less than   year  i had only been able to use the treadmill for about   months  i abandoned it so  i have some additional thoughts that i ll go into below  but if you don t care about my personal opinions experiences with nordictrack  the above list of problems should be enough to give you pause before spending money on this treadmill ok  so i have some additional thoughts related to  but not specific to my series of problems   nordictrack customer service is a joke   i ve seen other reviewers mention this  but you won t be able to talk to anyone personally   i sat on hold for   hours before hanging up   i tried calling a few other times and sat on hold for    minutes before giving up   the point is  it doesn t matter when you call   or how long you wait  you won t talk to anyone   it s not worth your time to try that being said  the online customer service was fine   they responded relatively promptly and for what it s worth  sent me the replacement parts i needed   i do understand it isn t personally their fault that it took   months for a computer part and another month for the walking deck to ship keeping in mind the numerous calls and being on hold for as long as i d want to sit and wait   never personally talking to anyone throughout the entire multipart ordeal    the single most annoying part of my entire nordictrack experience was receiving a call from nordictrack trying to get me to renew my warranty   all of the sudden when they want more of my money  they have people available to call and talk   amazing   needless to say  i didn t extend my warranty sadly  what this all means is that i wasted       bucks and the only thing i got in return was a crummy  poorly made     lb clothes hanger if it s relevant to any other runners   i usually run       miles a week  so  if you re looking for a treadmill that will hold up  this is not that treadmill tl dr  don t be like me   don t buy this poorly made treadmill

i have no idea if this product works because  it remains in pieces on my floor   when i first unboxed i was unable to find    page manual with assembly instructions   i was able to find online and managed to get printed   i then discovered no screws or washers were sent      days later  wow that s speedy  i received missing parts after lengthy discussion with nordic track customer service   one would think i m all set  but no  still missing parts   after cross referencing with manual  i have some parts not able to identify  and missing some i need   after yet another call  i am again eagerly awaiting parts to be delivered   i purchased this treadmill so i could run in the winter   at this rate i may not have a functioning treadmill until spring     not happy

so after we got the treadmill all setup  went online and activated it  paid for the subscription  i started to mess around with it and it wouldn t incline  you could hear the motor trying to raise it up but it just wouldn t go  i looked through the manual and they said to try and calibrate the incline so i did and it then went up and down without issue  after i looked at it i noticed it was still inclined and never went back to   on the incline  it was stuck at    so after exhausting my knowledge i called nordictrack and they said it sounds like a bad motor or a incline sensor so they ll be sending me out a new one and i have to install it in      business days  so now this all happened within the first   hours of me having the treadmill and i was a little disappointed with their customer service that it s going to take      business days for them to get me the new motor all and all i ve still worked out on the treadmill and i love the ifit app that controls the treadmill and your workouts  it s a great addition to it  the treadmill seems to be build well and it s very sturdy and overall i m happy with the treadmill just very bummed about it not working correctly out of the box

i just received my order today and did the set up myself  after finishing the set up i followed the instruction to activate my treadmill and work on it  however  they are asking me to sign up for a monthly subscription of more than      i didn t sign up for that when i ordered the treadmill  why should i pay every month for life for something i didn t ask for   i don t need any trainer  i don t need your nutrition advice  i know what i want   i wanted a treadmill  i didn t sign up for anything else and i won t  i just want to use my treadmill they way i want  anytime i want  i have been using amazon prime for many years and i haven t seen anything fishy and un ethical like this one   very disappointed

the nordictrack t series treadmill has been excellent as i ve canceled my gym membership due to covid     the treadmill is heavy and assembly took about   hours so i recommend having   people as assistance was required  the grounding screw was defective but we had no issues with contacting nordictrack and getting a replacement screw shipped  the belt can slip a bit at higher speeds  but just make sure to properly adjust the belt with the allen wrench  we did this using youtube videos for assistance and it s working great  the treadmill isn t too bulky and fits nicely in our basement  it folds easily  i do recommend buying a treadmill mat the absolute best feature of this treadmill is how it syncs to my ipad to use ifit  the treadmill came with a free    day ifit subscription and i was hooked  ifit has a wonderful library of workouts  i started with power walking and now i m jogging for the duration of my workouts  with the ifit sync  trainers can control your speed and incline which tends to give me the extra push i need  this has helped to motivate me to keep consistent workouts at home  i m enjoying this so much that i don t anticipate another gym membership post covid

i m in love with this treadmill  i ve waited a long time to replace mine since it broke several years ago  after lots of research i decided on this one but i was skeptical about the ifit membership  thankfully the treadmill came with a year for free  after a month of actively using the treadmill and the ifit training  i will gladly pay for the membership yearly the machine is very user friendly  it s very easy to fold up each day  i left the hydraulic arm to assist unfolding  it s convenient and saves space the treadmill was delivered in a heavily damaged box with a small hole in the belt which was a minor set back  i called nordictack customer service and after providing the serial and model numbers they were able to ship out a new belt that was received within seven business days  unfortunately  due to covid  there wasn t an option for a tech to replace it but my husband was handy enough i m overall extremely satisfied with my purchase and look forward to using it every day

i ve had the    s for a little over a month  and i think it s a solid machine   i needed to replace my old proform cs  which after only    years of use gave up   i was looking for a foldable unit  and one that would fit in a tight space  about     width available   this one fit the bill  and had good reviews the assembly took a bit  and does require two people at certain points  but generally speaking it wasn t too difficult   once up i created my ifit account included in my price was a free one year membership   i was a little skeptical of ifit  as my old cs had  ifit  probably v     so    years ago that pretty much consisted of running dvd s through an attached computer   shockingly  things have changed a bit since then  and i can say i m really enjoying the guided runs   there s enough variety and skill levels that you can always find the type of walk jog run you want as for the treadmill itself  very smooth belt  good controls for both incline and speed  the tablet screen is responsive  the speakers are loud enough to hear when you re running at a good pace   lots of good metrics are available through the screen  and the information on the tablet during the workout is easy to read  and all the controls are big and easy to read   ample storage areas on the treadmill   the fan is nice  it does a nice job of circulating the air   my knees have become less forgiving on certain outdoor terrains  and the deck on the    s has provided enough cushioning to allow my to run without any major pain issues that i would normally have running outside the bluetooth connectivity works fine  but i haven t really listened to my music much  as i m running mostly with a guided run all in all  i m quite happy with the    s  and i can only hope i get    years of runs out of it

we bought this during the stay at home orders and i am so glad   we love our new treadmill   it s easy to use and i love traveling to different places all over the world via the ifit   it makes it not seem like exercise as you get to travel all around the world as you exercise   which has been great during the pandemic as there s not much real life traveling going on    i love the large touch screen and the trainer john peel is my favorite   i also like that it automatically inclines to go along with what the trainer does   if i were to purchase another in the future i think i would get one that has the decline feature too  just to make it that much more realistic as you jog up down a hill for example   i definitely look forward to exercising now the only downfall was that we purchased it during the stay at home orders so had to assemble ourselves   which we did  but would have been nice to pay someone else to do it and probably would have taken them less time to do it

i ve been using the nordictrack t   s for about a month now and it is working great  i d read a lot of the reviews and noted quite a few mentioned that they squeak  my unit does not squeak and belt noise is minimal  if you don t want the ifit program just hold that button down on the display for       seconds and it will go away  i ve used it daily since it arrived and wish i d had one a long time ago  it s a breeze to use and easy to put together   i put it together by myself with no problems

the guys that put my treadmill together did an awesome job they could figure out the ifit so they called their manager he came over the next day and i love my treadmill the first guys out it together with care and their manager helped me install the ifit on my phone i would use them again and again

learned the belt was torn when we turned it on after setting up  set up wasn t the easiest thing in the world but it s doable  fitness videos are great to watch and work our with others  custom setting to work our without a coach which also good  doesn t come with a lubricant for the belt so you will have to order some before you can even use it

the treadmill arrived on time and was well packaged  two delivery men placed the treadmill in my house where i asked them to  the treadmill is very heavy  so i emphatically suggest putting it near where you expect to use it   or at least move the individual parts a couple at a time  if there are two of you putting it together  no problem  hopefully  one of you is somewhat handy with reading directions and using hand tools  there is a hex wrench  but it is only good for starting the screws  you will need a better hex wrench because of torque needed to fasten the screws down  also a correct phillips screwdriver is needed  the instruction booklet is very good  just slowly and carefully read the instructions  don t rush the installation  i was missing one little star washer  no big deal as i always save extra hardware  now the good part  the treadmill is very heavy and stable with all kinds of options on using it  i got it for my cardiovascular workout and not wanting to put a lot of pressure on my hips and knees  this treadmill is perfect for me  you can do a lot of different exercises on this unit if you really want to  i usually turn the radio on high incline to   and speed to     mph for    minutes  absolutely perfect for me    as a postscript  this unit isn t really meant for moving around    did i mention it is very heavy   i also don t plan on lifting the deck up anytime soon  i did install by myself

they paint over the screws and bolts making them very hard to put in  stripped   trying  assembly is very difficult with one person as well  however  once you get through that    it seems to be solid and nice  delivery directions were a bit misleading with set up being implied including demo and clean up but i found out that was not true   not sure why it was stated without a disclaimer but that is a separate issue  product itself meets expectations

this is perfect for me  i m a power lifter that also likes to run  weird i know  age has caught up with me and two ankle surgeries later  hard to run at    yrs old and    lbs  realized that i like to jump on the treadmill and walk at an incline  got this treadmill because of the reviews and the reputation or nordictrack  i love it  moves well  quiet and easily carries my giant body

bought this the first day of shelter in place  i have four teenagers and hamsters stuck in a cage need a  running wheel  after they get up and eat lunch all of them spend some time running walking sprinting on the treadmill in the garage  it is saving us     my husband assembled   took     hours  i have a hs school varsity ball player and a division   college swimmer and they both find it sturdy enough to work out on

pros  very easy to use  simple machine that gets the job done  great for beginner intermediate runners  i run     miles per day and is great for my purposes   relatively quiet machine  easy to fold up trackcons  customer service people are nice but it took   attempts      weeks  to get the appropriate parts sent to me to put it together  so it sat in my living room collecting dust     i had to call   times to get the right parts because the piece kit it came with was incorrect and they kept send the wrong ones    but now that s it s finally together and working i haven t had issues  good machine  probably won t buy from them again though because their customer service was very poor in execution though they were nice when they spoke with me

my    year old and i have been using this for a couple of weeks   it s been great for short breaks during schooling and working at home   it s really what we have needed to adjust in a healthy way to the way public health restrictions have changed and impacted our school and work life we assembled it together  no problem   it s been working well  and i love that it folds up so that we can use our space better   the incline and speed variations are enough for us this is a solid product  especially at this price point   we did have to go to the website to activate the treadmill  but you just  decline  the ifit subscription upsale and it works just fine   we bought the   year maintenance plan to be sure this investment will last at least several years very happy with this purchase

st delivery mother board didn t work  second unit works intermittently and my feet slip any speed over  mph   waste of money

the craftsmanship was so poor on the treadmill i received it made the product borderline defective  i strongly dislike the fact that i have to register and download the ifit app just to turn on the treadmill  evidently nordictrack holds it s treadmills hostage after the sale  predatory sales marketing techniques like that should be illegal   last nordictrack product i will make the mistake of purchasing

i was hesitant to purchase this treadmill because i wasn t sure just how much it relied on the ifit app subscription  but i needed something with the gyms closed  and outdoor temps of     or higher  so i decided to chance it on this treadmill because of the affordability and nordictrack reputation   the ifit app does offer a lot in terms of workouts training  but is not necessary to use this treadmill  there are    built in workouts to choose from  or you can just run in manual mode  any of those options still allow you to change speed and incline at any time  you can adjust the softness fitness of the tread platform  and at          lbs the platform is plenty long enough where i don t feel like i need to crowd the front for fear of coming off the back  also no issues of the belt stalling  or stuttering  with any footstep landings   the only cons i really have for this treadmill is that you can t input your height weight setting  and you can t create custom workouts  other than manually adjusting on the fly while running in manual mode

this is a great machine  received at a great price  bypass for the i fit works  so you do not have to buy this program  use it daily bypass is holding the ifit button for thirty seconds once on first use  track slipped a bit but the tools provided for assembly helps you adjust  assume shipping   overall my husband and i are both using it with no issues  recomend paying the extra for inhouse delivery  unit weight is heavy and the two guys that brought it in had a hard time  so its worth the delivery fee

so far    month  this is an excellent treadmill   the     wide belt is much better than the     width often seen on home treadmills   the incline and speed are just right for the range of running that i want to do indoors   i like that the speed and incline selections are great big buttons  responsive and easy to hit even when running full speed   the treadmill has a solid feel  is not too loud  and overall performs very well

please note that before you are even allowed to turn this treadmill on you are forced to log into an  ifit com  website and enter your credit card number and sign up for an auto renewal monthly membership of     month   there are warnings all over the treadmill and stop and before first use you must  activate  your machine   meaning you have to log onto this website and  activate  your monthly subscription   you are allowed to cancel anytime but this is a ridiculous bait and switch tactic and entirely unacceptable   i already paid for the treadmill   if i wanted the monthly subscription i would sign up  but forcing new purchasers to sign up before they can even turn on their treadmill  you need an activation code  you are forcing something on us we may not want   if these were easy to return i would   and i suspect that s part of their reasoning   people are just going to do this b c they don t want the hassle of returning a heavy treadmill   well you got what you wanted but i want to make clear every prospective purchaser   beware of this forced requirement   buy at your own risk

after spending almost  hrs to assemble this by myself  the last step requires you to  activate  the treadmill via ifit   once on ifit  you have to provide a credit card to proceed to the next step to activate the treadmill   while the first month of ifit service is free  it automatically enrolls you in a     month plan  unless you then go back into the site to unsubscribe   after spending      and  hrs to assemble a treadmill  do you really think someone wants to have to provide a credit card to turn the damn thing on

ok  this may be review number  one of several  i had a nordictrack pt    i bought around    years ago  i put     every other day on it over that    year period  it finally started having issues  frigging amazing so i got another  makes sense had a lot of trouble putting it together  things don t line up   the plastic pieces do not fit together well and so forth  next will be to see if it is as quiet and performs as well as the old one  i do not have high hopes to be continued

i ve been using this treadmill for about three months and have been very pleased  it s a great treadmill for squeezing in a quick workout  many of the lower priced treadmills i looked at were for walking only  so the fact that i could actually run on this one stood out  i haven t used this one at it s top speeds but it s been very capable and comfortable for easy and moderate runs  the ability to change the stiffness is a really nice feature  i ve done a little bit with the ifit integration  but not sure if i will keep it  it feels a little small and cramped compared to the gym treadmills i ve used  but i m sure i would need hundreds more for that quality  this treadmill is a great value for the money i highly recommend paying the little bit extra for professional assembly as well as the delivery upcharge to deliver to a specific room in your house  this package was heavy overall i feel really good about this purchase

we love the treadmill  i would rate it at a   as far as structure  feel  features etc   but  you literally cannot use the treadmill until you register through ifit and enter your credit card information for your free trial  i buy a      treadmill  set it up in my home and i literally can t use it until i sign up for your ifit program  that is complete bs  i signed up and cancelled it immediately which isn t that big of a deal   but still  i shouldn t have to submit my cc information to you just so i am allowed to turn my treadmill on  i could understand registering it for support  etc but to actually have to enter payment information seems very wrong to me

once assembled the treadmill is great  lots of settings to adjust to get your perfect run  i played with the trial subscription for a bit  but didn t find it worth keeping  i forgot to cancel and got charged  customer service was great and removed the charge without any questions  the longer tread is great for taller people  i m       tall and have never felt like i was running out of space  i m also    lbs and quite often run into  slip  issues on other treadmills where my weight would cause the treadmill to lose grip and slip beneath me  i have not had any issues with that so far  assembly is a little difficult  but not too bad with the help of someone else  make sure you read every step though  i missed two covers  aesthetic only  and i didn t notice until the end  just left them off because i had to take the whole thing apart back to step   to get them on

i called nordictrack and they kept me on hold for    minutes before i hung up   i called back and they said i had to register my equipment before anyone would help me   but on the manual it said that if you have any questions or need a part  don t call the store call customer service   a rep finally called me back after   days and said that he had to transfer my call over to someone else   i held on for another    minutes before hanging up   i called back and they said they no one will help me until i register the equipment   i just need a new screw   i don t want the ifit membership   they can come get this equipment and give me my money back

easy to assemble instructions are really easy to read  sturdy  not loud  only complaint no fan and no on off switch or sleep mode  there is a re set button not sure if that is like an off button  first day using treadmill  so far only used manual mode  no need to buy the ifit membership  i read other reviews   you just have to hold the ifit button for a few sec and it starts  i really like the treadmill for the price

i m so happy with this treadmill  down fall it s so heavy  we had to carry it to our basement and it was rough  i figured it would be heavy though  assembly was extremely easy only issue is that it s definitely a two person job in certain steps  i fit is awesome  however  after the free   year trial is up i don t want to spend that money to renew it  overall happy  i read a lot of reviews that their treadmills were damaged upon delivery  it s just a gamble you take ordering online  luckily  ours was packaged well

edit to add   i ve had the treadmill for a little over a month now  i ve done over    ifit tours programs and the treadmill is still holding up beautifully  this was definitely worth spending a little extra on  and i am pleased with my purchase  definitely recommend and will likely purchase more equipment from nordictrack in the future    and i ve lost   lbs so far  so that s also nice granted  it s only my first day with it  but this treadmill is fabulous  it was easy to assemble  it was done in about an hour  we did need a couple of tools of our own  but nothing out of the ordinary  nothing was damaged  scratched  or missing  and it s performance was great  i got   miles in and didn t notice any issues  and i love that it came with a  yr ifit membership  i love their virtual tours  absolutely fabulous

the     t series treadmill by nordictrack was well worth the price  the price was actually      less on amazon  the worse part about this purchase was that due to covid    it s very hard to get someone to assemble it for you  and getting it delivered in a   floor walk up was also challenging  but now that s it here and up and running  we absolutely live have it  now we have it  we canceled our gym membership as well

buyer beware  we had nothing but trouble with this treadmill since we received it  we paid for the professional installation  but from day one  there was a really loud squeak from back roller  i contacted amazon and the rep suggested that it may have been a problem with the installation  the installer came back out and took a look and just confirmed that there was a loud squeak at the roller  then  while my teenage son is running on the treadmill  it just cuts out and loses power  i called nordictrack this time and they suggested that i get a professional electrician out to check that the treadmill is on a dedicated circut  i had an electrician come out and everything was set up the way it was supposed to  he even measured the amps for the treadmill and we had plenty of power to run it     amp   four days later and now the belt just stops moving when you step on it  i finally had enough and just called amazon  amazon offered a complete refund on both the treadmill and assembly  i really appreciated that  but i cannot recommend this machine to anyone  now i have to find a way of disposing of this piece of junk  probably have to pay to have it moved to the dump  frustrating   love amazon  but will never order or recommend any product from nordictrack again

dont get scammed by nordictrack  dont give them subscriptions  avoid by holding down ifit button for    seconds  may have to do several times and you will see   s or letters at bottom left screen on t   s then hold ifit again until activation screen is gone then use your machine and nordictrack can shove where the sun dont shine with there subscriptions   i read it s a absolute nightmare to cancel subscription after your credit card is inputted

treadmill works great  ifit has improved the intensity of my workouts too

i ve owned this treadmill since january thinking it was my new year s resolution to get fit  since the whole covid   situation  this purchase makes more sense than ever  i ve been running almost everyday for about     miles everytime  this treadmill is amazing for the price   the ifit program is a great feature because there are all types of instructors that push you  the treadmill was fairly easy to put together   you need atleast   people   a wrench and alot of patience   took about   hours or so to assemble  i m glad to have purchased this as i use it everyday  it beats going to the gym when i can run in the privacy of my home  i would highly recommend buying this product

takes   mildly intelligent people to assemble     ish hours  it s true you can bypass the ifit membership thing  once assembled  plug in  attach red safety  flip the off reset switch on the bottom corner  the screen will light up  hold down the ifit icon for    seconds and yeehaw start jogging

really impressed with the quality given the price   very solid and enjoyable run   took my husband about    minutes to assemble   tech is a bit dated   who uses an auxiliary port anymore   but has a ledge for me to watch youtube virtual trail runs on my ipad   would highly recommend

i was looking for a quality treadmill to fit into a relatively low ceilied basement  less than   feet high  that had a belt long and wide enough for somone   ft     this nordictrack fit the bill  the treadmill has a low belt  and a convenient fold up storage feature   but is a comfortable width and length  i also appreciate that the treadmill can be set to a specific speed up to a tenth of a mph  assembly was easy  was able to do it with my husband at home   the treadmill was also a very  very reasonable price for the quality  i would recommend it to anyone looking for a starter treadmill  and who may have limited space for the equipment

very upset  ordered this product at a higher price than it should have been  and it came in a damaged box and the treadmill was damaged  rips in the belt and cracks and breaks off the edges  i ve heard horrible things about nordic track support  so i m unsure how i feel about going through the return process  overall severely disappointed

received the product within   weeks of ordering it  assembling took about   hours  just pay attention to the instructions and you need   people to assemble it pro s  it is strong and sturdy  has different options for the runs which is great depending on what you are trying to achieve  noise level is not an issue for us because it is in the basement and it is no different from the treadmill at the gym   length and width of the track are a good size  if you have space this treadmill is good but if you do not have a lot of space  you may want figure the size first con s  speaker s are not the greatest but they work okay for the workout overall  i am very happy with the treadmill  it is worth the amount i paid for and gets me moving which is what i wanted to reach my goals

when i received the item there was some cosmetic imperfections in the plastic engine cover which wasn t unexpected since i bought this via an amazon warehouse deal and this was disclosed  unexpectedly  the incline motor was bad and was unresponsive to any input  customer service took a couple of weeks to get back to me which brings the overall review down to   stars  but when they did  they sent the replacement products based on my explanation of the issue and had a local technician reach out to me and schedule the repair  after the repair was complete  it now works flawlessly on the incline  i understand things like this happen  and they stood by their warranty albeit with not overly fast service overall a great purchase for the home gym  i use it     times per week and it feels very sturdy and like it will last a long time

it s not a bad unit  it definitely costs more than it should  it was delivered with chunks busted out above the screen which is the packaging company s fault  but still the material used looks and feels cheap  i was surprised with the name nordic it would be such a cheaply manufactured piece of equipment  i would recommend buying a different brand entirely  pretty disappointed in this purchase but it ll do the job if you re willing to deal with extra bs

i ve had this machine for nearly   months  and use it   to   times a week  i m not a big guy at     lbs  just have a little spare tire from quarantine  unfortunately  this machine louds croaks and groans several times during a workout when changing inclines  it is very noticeable and causes some anxiety when i start interval running or high incline hiking  i m just waiting for the support structures to crash down mid workout and take me with it the interface is pretty easy to use and understand  the ifit program is the greatest part of the workout though  since you can select a video and the program will adjust your speed and incline while you focus on the trainer and scenery  or tv  would i buy this again  maybe  if the price point were lower and more in line with quality of the machine i received  it is overpriced for the lack of quality

this has been a great purchase  the touch screen makes using ifit extremely easy to navigate  and the ifit program has been well worth it also  putting it together took about an hour and half  but easy to follow directions of where everything goes  also  super easy to fold to clean under or to push out of the way  the only issue that i ve had is that it s not bluetooth compatible on the revision i bought  and the aux cord is for input only   so you can t jack in to hear the ifit audio  i just run the app and the machine at the same time to hear the audio   overall  it s been an a great purchase and couldn t be happier with it

love my nordictrack  this has been a lifesaver during quarantines hot summer months with my gym being closed  my husband put it together by himself  it did take him a few hours but was successful  it does not have a huge footprint in the room we put it in  it doesn t take up too much space  the programs are amazing  you can go to a different country every day and exercise while learning something new and distracting yourself from the exercise  you can also use this as a regular treadmill without the programs  overall  i would recommend this to anyone and everyone  it was so worth the investment  i love it and use it every day

this is a fantastic home treadmill that has all of the functions  speeds and features that i could ask for   it was relatively easy for two of us to put together in about an hour  you definitely need two people   the hardest part was getting it from the front door to the basement because of how heavy it is   my only complaint is the attempt to force us into signing up for an ifit membership   there were big  bold notices on top of all of the paperwork and the treadmill itself saying it won t function until you register for an annual ifit membership  which i did not want to do   thankfully i read a lot of reviews ahead of time and learned that i could get around this loophole by holding down on the ifit button on the console for    seconds the first time i turned it on   thank goodness this worked because i would have been upset to have to register and pay for a membership that i didn t want after spending hundreds of dollars on a new treadmill   hopefully nordictrak will reverse this strong arming practice with ifit for future customers

we received the treadmill in time and in good condition  appreciate the packaging from nordictrack i gave a   star as i ran into some problems  and havent had the chance to start up the treadmill  my      investment has to wait for another week to experience the roi     the equipment is heavy  so you need   adults to help with the initial assembly    strange that the pre attached screw for grounding at the bottom of the right handrail fits better than the one provided in the pack     the equipment comes with some pre attached screws  i am still not clear why screws are pre attached when they anyway need to be discarded   maybe there is an engineering reason    while setting up the handrails  there are   sets of pre attached screws on each handrail  i could remove   of them but the fourth one wont budge  its seems to have got stuck in the body of the handrail or the threads are stuck  unless i remove it  i cant fit the console with the screws provided in the hardware kit  i reached out to their customer service chat and after a few minutes of online conversation  they ordered a new left handrail  i have to wait for     days for that part to arrive so  eagerly waiting to receive the part and experience the treadmill      phase    received the part but was the wrong one    i had an issue with the left handrail and after speaking with the customer service agent  she ordered the same part  however  ended up receiving the left upright  anyway  i then ended up going to home depot and remove the screw with a power tool with their help so far  the treadmill s been running well

the t series    si treadmill is working great for me  it took me a long time to diced which machine to get  but i think i got the perfect size for me   to assemble takes two people and you really need to read the instructions before you do anything in order for it to work  it took us some time but was worth it  we did it with out any problems its easy to fold and it works great   i got the perfect size and equipment for me    nordictrack makes great products and this one is one of them    ana emily

the treadmill works fine except for one problem  about a week into using it it developed a horrible squeaking noise  i sent an e mail to support and they said they would contact me shortly  while waiting i found a temporary fix by putting the incline to   and the squeaking noise would stop  this work around only worked for a week and now the squeaking noise persists regardless of incline  i would give this   stars even with the squeaking noise if it wasn t for the horrible customer support  i contacted them exactly   weeks ago  i have not gotten a single reply through e mail or phone call  they just completely ignored me

three days after gyms closed for shelter in place  got this treadmill and its kept me sane   i power walk incline so it s perfect for what i need p s  regarding another review  i never had to sign up for ifit membership at all   my husband put it together and we registered it to begin  no credit card was given needed   don t fall for that when in the app  if you don t want to use the app at all  then register  don t pay for anything and don t use the app people just need to be smarter and take time to pay attention  look into things on their own before complaining

pro  good for home cardo   the majority of the assembly instructions were clear con  i bought an extended warranty through amazon  and it took a long   long time to get my paperwork in the mail  i tried to contact icon fitness customer service but had a hard time getting ahold of someone  the majority of the time  no one was available  or i kept getting transferred  it was frustrating   the belt kept moving to the right  should have been already aligned  however  the good point is that there are instructions in the manual on how to align it general point  good for an owned house or first floor apartment  for higher levels without an elevator  it will be a real pain to carry or even have it carried up the stairs

this nordic track t series treadmill performed as expected and better  first of all  right out of the box it seemed slightly overwhelming to put it together but with the simple installation instructions it made it simple and quick to put together  i did not have any problems  took about    min  my family and i all love it and we have had it for a couple of months now  it has worked flawlessly   out of the box there was a small cut in the belt and i contacted customer service and they were really polite to work with and they quickly sent out a replacement part  as for the folding and storage it is surprisingly easy to fold up  even my    year old can do it  so far the product has been great  the customer service has been great and it has been fun for me and my family  i definitely recommend this product to anyone thinking of setting up an in home gym

i have had this treadmill for about   months now  and absolutely love it  it replaced my old nordic track that i purchased in      and used regularly for    years before i decided it was time for an upgrade  it is still working fine and i plan to donate it to charity    the big selling point for me purchasing this particular treadmill was the sturdiness of the device and the online reviews that had nothing negative to say about it  plus the ifit capability  to which i am now addicted  due to covid i miss the ability to travel  and with ifit i ve been able to visit and do hikes and walks from coast to coast as well as many foreign countries and exotic islands  in short  it s awesome  i am also thrilled that you do not have to be a runner to enjoy the ifit products or this treadmill  with the ability to do a     incline  plus the variety of ifit programs  i can walk and incline hike until my heart is content  i have nothing short of praise for this treadmill

i ve maybe left one or two negative reviews in my entire adult life  and i wish i didn t have to leave this one  the only reason i went with this product was that similar treadmills from other brands contained toxic chemicals known to cause cancer and birth defects   probably the only good thing i can say about this treadmill  assembly is a nightmare  i m guessing they expect you to pay for professional assembly  that s the only reason this could be so difficult  the assembly process is confusing and convoluted  screw holes are not threaded and need to be tapped  screws are painted over and so do not fit easily  they did not include the hand rails and so i had to get in touch with nordic track and request the missing parts  when they arrived  half of the parts were still missing  and when i finally got it assembled  it seems the treadmill is locked and cannot be used without downloading an app  thankfully  i found the hack to bypass this here on amazon  started it up and the belt seems a bit loose  wonderful

excellent product  very high quality  better quality than most treadmills i ve used at the gym  simple to adjust incline and speed  it syncs with ifit cardio which is a subscription service  but if you own an ipad i strongly encourage the use of the app as it is very immersive and fun  using the app you won t have to do any manual adjustments at all  there are a ton of videos for all levels of training from beginner to experienced  my wife and i had so much fun we ran a combined   miles the day we set it up  the training videos are engaging and shot from a first hand view in locations all around the world from italy  to france  to south america  beaches  cities  and mountains  as well as group training sessions  i never like running on treadmills because of the tedium  but these videos are a beautiful distraction and allow me to get a great    minute run in simply instead of having to leave my house and add travel time set up its easy if you follow instructions and take your time  it helps to have another person just because this is a sturdy piece of equipment and tough to maneuver before it s completely assembled con  you do need to activate it initially and put a card on file to use it  but you can cancel immediately  i didn t like this feature because if you don t have a card or easy internet access it would be frustrating for a person to setup  it s really my only complaint and it has nothing to do with the equipment

my nordictrack t series treadmill is the best   easy to assemble   set up and use   i paid        with free shipping from amazon and would have paid a         for it is worth it   well built and many options on the display   not on the large size and not small just a perfect size   easy to lift up and move out of the way if needed   i looked for a few months before i purchased and almost bought a used  one on craigslist for the same price   i researched and checked reviews and made the purchase last november   i am so happy one of my best purchases ever

bought this treadmill for the apartment when the building gym was shut down due to covid  it s a good value for the price  opted for the smaller screen     inches  due to cost and availability  has all the basics to get a good workout in  accelerates quickly when changing speeds  may be a little more difficult to use if you re a taller individual   have a longer stride  paid for someone to assemble it and it took him     hour  overall good purchase and would recommend

i love this treadmill  i am a retired school teacher just looking to get a good  uninterrupted walk on a daily basis  while i love to walk outside  the weather isn t always conducive  this makes it possible to do daily and i catch up on shows or binge ones new to me  i would  however  think carefully about signing up for the ifit app  i did the    day free trial and now am haggling about my cancellation  which i did well before the trial time was up  it just wasn t for me  but their customer service is terrible   totally unresponsive   most unhelpful

installation took a couple of hours only to figure out the incline does not work  that is in addition to the deceptive marketing content in the box about requiring an ifit account for this to work  it does not customer support was bad   no effort to dig into the issue   all they had to offer was i will send you a part that i think will solve the problem  but i am not sure  in addition  you have to open heavy equipment to install it  even when i was within the warranty had bought extra service package   go fork yourself customer   and buy again

they don t tell you when you order this machine that you must sign up for a subscription for their ifit   the machine won t work without it   its free the first year  but you still need a credit card   the machine won t work otherwise   there are ways around it  but they don t tell you   if you don t have  or want to use wifi  you are sol i feel this is underhanded   i would not trust nordictrack the machine itself is okay   not great  but it is a     dollar machine   i didn t expect much and wasn t disappointed go for another brand the online help is just  awful

i ve had this treadmill for   months  i get a lot of use out of it and it performs to expectation  however  i have   complaints first  it apparently comes with a free   year subscription of their digital fitness program  but they still want me to enter my credit card  so i didn t end up using it second  i find it to be a bit pricey to not have built in fans on the main console like most treadmills  stair masters  etc nowadays do third  and this one is the one that actually really bothers me  the heart rate sensors absolutely unequivocally do not work  i can be at the end of a   mile run and the sensor reads   bpm  which of course is poppycock  this part never worked properly if that part is important to you  you might want to check to make sure that works right away and if it doesn t  call their customer support which frankly isn t something i ever did since i assembled it myself out of the box and didn t want to hassle with returning it  box was incredibly heavy  overall  it s a treadmill with a digital screen that has some cool features that i mostly never use  and it largely works as a home treadmill should

directions for putting together could definitely be better   putting together took some work  about three hours  for our daughter   however  that is the only negative   she said it operates very smoothly and is in her words  futuristic    we bought it so that she could work out from home during all the ups and downs with covid and closures   it is a great size all away around and fits in her urban condo   we would buy again

this is the second treadmill i purchased and so far i have not been disappointed   you will need at least two people to lift and move the giant box into your assembly location   the unpacking and assembly can look overwhelming however the step by step directions are easier than you think   the treadmill is constructed with strong metal and plastic materials   the shock absorbers on the running platform are exceptionally strong for smooth running walking use   the ifit additional add on is an awesome bonus to the nordictrack     si

assembly was fairly easy  although some steps took a little work   once assembled  the treadmill works great  and has been a lifesaver during this quarantine lockdown   walking or running on it feels safe and secure   two large compartments are large enough for water bottle  towel  etc     i also love the shelf which can be used for a tablet phone so you can watch something while exercising   only small complaint is that the power switch is located on the front of the treadmill  at the bottom  right where the motor is  it s a slightly inconvenient location if the treadmill is placed near a wall   highly recommend a mat to put underneath  both to protect the floor and keep the treadmill stable   overall  very happy with the purchase

days after assembling this machine  the incline motor failed    weeks after going back and forth with customer service  i finally have now received the new incline motor   now  i m supposed to install this and expected not to void my warranty    hours of time spent today trying to replace it  and i m just barely at     complete with the install if i could go back and do it over  i d have forked out at least double on a machine that is reliable  this get what you pay for  product and service

way easy to put together  much more solid than i originally assumed it would be  super easy to fold up  screen is large and the app is easy to navigate  very good speakers  the work out programs are very enjoyable and it is cool how the speeds and elevation change on their own  on lower speeds    and below  you can feel an inconsistency in how fast the track is moving each time you take a step  that is the only complaint i have  very good product and i am very satisfied

i m really enjoying this treadmill  the belt is a perfect width  not too narrow  and the the length is great too the  incline   speed  one touch  controls are my favorite part of this treadmill  i don t have to spend time pressing up or down buttons multiple times while running  i just press once on the   i want i don t use the ifit app so i can t report on experience with that  when you first turn on the treadmill the screen will ask you to register with ifit  to bypass that  you just hold down the ifit button for about    seconds and then it takes you to the treadmill screen  you only have to do that once  the next time you turn on the treadmill it ll take you directly to the treadmill screen convenient shelf allows me to rest my phone comfortably so i can watch something on it  and and the cup holders allow me to keep water easily accessible   great value for the price point  highly recommend

love my nordictrack and the ifit app  delivery from amazon was great and they even delivered it to my basement door  assembly was easy  you get a year of ifit included which is a      value  this was an awesome purchase
this a very great machine  it took me couple hours to unbox and assemble  it is not loud and contains a variety of workout for any level  i would recommend it for a home gym use

i love my treadmill   i hadn t stepped inside my gym in months due to covid    and needed something to keep my workouts going  i wanted something that i could run  not walk  on and something that wouldn t break the bank  this treadmill has been used almost daily for about    minutes and is still running well  my husband and i set it up and it was relatively easy to do  the only setback is that the arms are loose and thats because i didn t tighten the screws before attaching the top part  my treadmill is a life saver

i really love this treadmill  wonderful quality for a reasonable price  the treadmill is quiet and runs very smooth  i use it nearly daily for  k runs  the ifit membership has been awesome  you receive a complimentary free one year trial upon purchase  i can  go  on runs and hikes in global destinations like hawaii or thailand  they have engaging trainers and highly realistic scenes  there are so many virtual runs hikes to choose from  from beginner walks and hikes to advanced marathon runs  and everything in between  you can also download the ifit app   simultaneously follow and track your progress on your smart phone  i always check in with the calendar on the touch screen  which helps me see  track  and monitor my goals  there treadmill track is also long which i love  i am     and my boyfriend is      we each have a long stride while running  and we can run at fast paces easily and comfortably  with the longer length of the track  assembly directions were clear and relatively easy for my boyfriend to assemble

the tredmill itself is quiet  sturdy and i m overall happy with it  the assembly instructions  on the other hand could have been written by a   year old   whoever wrote the instructions apparently never tried to follow them   the c as pper was the last detail told you to slide the foot covers down the front rails   you would have had to take the whole thing apart to do that   i was also happy i read prior reviews to learn how to bypass the ifit feature   hold the icon for approximately    seconds    this made things a bit easier

you do not need ifit to use this product  after receiving it all you need to do to activate it is hold down the ifit button for approximately    seconds and it will bypass ifit activation  i read another review that mentioned you could bypass the activation as well but was skeptical until i tried it myself  it may be plastered all over the device and box but do not fall for it  ifit is not required  the subscription is not mandatory  other than that it is a great treadmill for the price

the treadmill is great  but like  the other reviewers mentioned  i absolutely am opposed to a company making you join a network ifit that you don t want and would never use even if it was free  that s the only reason they didn t get all   stars  it makes me look at nordic track differently that they have to use sneaky gimmicks to get your info   including for some people their credit card info   but you can bypass the registration  put the safety key in and press and hold the ifit button  it works  what s sad is the company does not offer this direction to those that aren t interested in ifit i used the amazon assemblers to put my treadmill together   it took him   hours and i heard a lot of sighing  he did an excellent job  but i don t think it was easy    probably cause the instructions say it s a   person job and he came alone

i   alone  put this together  i am    yr old woman   i carefully read the instructions  step by step  and it was very helpful that each step was also written on the screws supply package  because of this   i knew exactly what to do  it took me   hours to assemble   it was also very helpful to read other people s reviews on this   because when it came time to turn it on  i knew how to bypass the ifit membership   this treadmill is built strong  running pad and motorization is great  and the computerized screen is great too

i cannot express how i happy i am i bought this  it is amazing for the price  perfect at home treadmill under      wow wow wow  the minute i started using this treadmill the joint pain i was getting after running disappeared  i have no idea what anyone is talking about the i fit being a scam  i set it up with i fit used the one month free cancelled it and now use it without  you do not need i fit to use it    i am beyond pleased with this product

i love this treadmill and the ifit program   my daughter and i put it together in about   hours  girl power   it is very heavy so   people make it much easier all the way around  we have used it     times a day  everyday since we got it together and have had no problems with its programs or its sturdiness  it is also very quiet and smooth  no floor shaking while using it  highly recommend this treadmill  great price as well

nordic track makes nothing but the best quality products   this particular machine is packed with high tech features easy to use to get the best out of your walking or running workout   the wider and long tread area is hard to find on many treadmills unless you pay a fortune   this one surely won t disappoint anyone looking for a great workout machine and it s an awesome deal too

amazing  this was my first treadmill purchase   got it professionally installed   works great  roomy treadmill with comfortable handlebars   display window  love running and walkin on this  would highy recommend the purchase

i bought this treadmill in april  it was hard to find one when quarantine started but this one was affordable and had good reviews so i decided to give it a try  i use it between     days a week to walk on incline  it s perfect for a walker i m not much of a runner but i bet it would be good for light running  it was super easy to put together  folds easy for storage  and is quiet  i don t use ifit  you have to sign up for the    day trial to start it up but you can cancel it right away  still works afterwards without it  treadmill was much larger than i expected but perfect beginner treadmill
