i am a treadmill newbie and decided on this unit due to its features compared to other units  it was fairly easy to put together but was really heavy and required to be opened and moved piece by piece with another person to where i wanted to set it up  there are several onboard exercises that do not require the subscription to ifit and plenty of variety to get started with before using the ift membership  i find it really convenient to use and have really enjoyed it  the screen is awesome and the video workouts are really well done too  super satisfied with my purchase and it has helped me get in shape

treadmill is good for basic model  assembly is easy just read all before you start the packing is overwhelming   lots of packing i had the inside delivery  received no calls prior to delivery   all of a sudden they were at my door  the box was all tore up  manufacturer puts strap bands which the delivery team pulled them thru the box make sure you buy silicone oil as the treadmill didn t come with any  you will need to coat belt well  if not you will have a good hot belt and burn smell adjusts easy and works well with ifit app

nearly impossible to fit through a standard doorway  i wish i had not purchased for that reason the surge suppressor used with this treadmill must be ul     listed as a transient surge suppressor  tvss   with a minimum surge dissipation of     joules  despite searching  no surge suppressor that meets the first standard can be identified on amazon  if someone finds one  please link

wow this nordictrack is worth every penny  not nosy at all  you can get a great work out  listen if you want to bypass the ifit subscription make sure that your equipment is fully installed  i got anxious and i had it fully installed by    percent  with out the safety key  i tried to bypass by pressing down on the ifit but it wouldn t work  so i called customer service and they guide me   the representative stated that the equipment needs to be fully installed   the safety key needs to be on or it will not work  so i tried that method and boom it worked  so if you want to bypass the ifit you can hold down for    seconds after your equipment is fully installed  i refuse to add another bill to my budget even if it s    dollars a month  you can manually use it without the subscription

much easier to put together than other reviews said  it did however take   hours  there are a few  other odd things i noted however  the ifit app is       a month and not user friendly  secondly the unit is giant so takes a lot of space  more than i had thought  that also relates to the height of the hand rails  they are made for someone who is more than     and best for someone       but overall a great price and unit

the product was surprisingly easy to assemble  i would say it is the same or better quality than what you would find in a gym  my wife and i have used it   or   times a week for over   months with no issues so far  very satisfied with the purchase

i just got my new treadmill after my previous one of       years went out on me  i did lots of research and wanted a budget friendly treadmill but needed a good quality one due to how much running i do daily  this treadmill is great  its nice and quiet and perfect for my running  i average    miles of running a day and so far i have no complaints at all

i was so scared to order this machine as i read so many reviews where it arrived broken   mine was the same thing   it was broken on the top of the motor i returned it and asked amazon to send me a new one   this one came perfect   my husband and i put it together   it took a few hours   it is a big machine and heavy   i have not used it yet   i am going to try it tonight   i will place pictures and i will give another feedback soon

i had a different nordic track treadmill for years and loved it   when it broke down i held off buying another but quarantine lead me to buy again   i didn t expect to value the ifit subscription that came included for first year but my entire family loves it   we each have our own profile and there are programs for all levels of fitness  the guided tours make me look forward to working out each day   my old treadmill had built in fans   i miss that feature but overall i am so glad we bought this nordic track

it is a sturdy machine and have a bigger motor compared to the other similar product and hope it will last longer  it does have a friction noise from the belt and the motor  but it is not too disturbing  it would be better if it remove the ifit program to unlock the treadmill initially  i do not use the ifit but use the treadmill daily for light exercise  overall  i like the product

product is a bit noisy   assembly was ok for one person with some experience   i used a strong rope at step   get the arms to align so i could put it together   overall the machine seems solid   it was missing a nut bolt that is needed for the folding feature and support has not been great  too long on hold  lots of web forms  other  support sites  asking for money       it is functional but the motor jumps a bit from time to time   again  this amount or treadmill for price is still a fairly good deal

we did a lot of research and decided to purchase this treadmill after a while  i m very happy with it overall  i really like that i can  fold  it up when not in use so that it isn t taking up too much space or getting walked over by our dogs  it offers a lot of pre programmed workouts but i d also easy to adjust for your specific needs  i would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a treadmill

if you have ever bought a treadmill then you know how expensive they are  this treadmill works as good as the one s at the gym  it s smooth  quiet and most importantly it cost s about a third of what the gym machines do  for the price i thought it would work for a while then start having problems  but no it just keeps going and everything is just great  you can t ask for more  my wife does over an hour a day  some walking and some running  so the machine gets a full workout and again works perfectly

this is a wonderful product for the price  i would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a treadmill  i have put a lot of miles into it and it is holding up very well  putting the treadmill together wasn t the most difficult thing in the world  but i would suggest having two people when assembling  overall i am very happy with my purchase
i loved the price  and all of the features it has   i also love the way it folds  and the bluetooth capability   great buy

i purchased assembly service but it looked a lot more difficult and heavy than i could have ever completed by myself  it runs smoothly  i thought it had blue tooth connection for my phone but i had to buy a cord that attached to my phone and then attached to the console speaker  the speakers are not great but adequate  it s a good basic machine  it has blue tooth for ifit programming  heart rate monitor is not accurate

all the bells and whistles i need  and none that i don t   my training runs on the road are normally in the          pace range  this treadmill has no trouble easily exceeding that speed if desired  the incline works great and the buttons are easy to use  as was previously mentioned in another review  you do not have to join ifit to use the machine  upon your first power up  simply press and hold down the ifit button for    seconds and you will be ready to go    my nordictrack

we ve had this treadmill for about    days and are very pleased so far   it s a very heavy piece of equipment but once you get it assembled it s easy to move and doesn t take up much floor space   my wife likes the audio features   now that it s getting colder i m loving having it near the home office so that i can get a quick run or walk in right before work or at lunch   just as powerful and sturdy as the ones i used to use at the y only a tiny bit smaller

the t     s is nice until it needs repairs  our treadmill stop operating june       since then  nordictrac had service repair workers replace all electrical and moving parts with no success  we are now being offered one of two options     refund only the service warranty        get a credit of        towards another treadmill starting at          they want us to pay double for their poor product and service  unacceptable  february

it weighs a ton  and even for   people  it was a nightmare to haul it into the house  i did the assembly myself and it took me most of a day  i would have paid for assembly on delivery  but it would have delayed delivery by   weeks  i would recommend paying for assembly  assembly was pretty straightforward  with a couple of confusing steps  the recommended   d assembly app doesn t offer any guidance beyond what s in the assembly booklet  the machine works well and seems sturdy  unless you sign on for the i fit subscription  the console doesn t store your time distance or any other data
put key in  hold  i fit button    sec i fit is gone   enjoy your new treadmill

waited a while to receive and the box and treadmill came all busted up and spent half the day on the phone w amazon trying to get a pick up sooner than    days as this huge box unpacked was sitting in my entrance   not to mention i have to wait another    days to get a replacement and who knows if it will come intact   very disappointed

we ordered this on a sunday and received tuesday morning  worth paying amazon     to install  overall very happy   it seems high quality build and the ifit app is cool as you can follow along with the trainers  there were some glitches setting up and nordick track charged us a full year upfront and it was supposed to be free for first year however call to customer service fixed it

early review the nordictrack arrived yesterday   after reading all the comments about shipping damage i was worried what shape it would be in on arrival  sure enough the box had significant damage from what appears to be a forklift tine  there was also some secondary tearing damage  that said  the device itself had no obvious damage so i accepted it from the shipper assembly was pretty straightforward with what may be the best set of instructions for assembly i have seen  the only hitch was getting the hydraulic lift into position  that took some work and expletives took it for a half hour test drive and no problems emerged  if no issues arise i may come back and alter the rating upward  nonetheless  the persistent reports of shipping damage should make one careful to inspect on delivery

we wanted a lightweight treadmill and this machine has been a great purchase  my wife and i each run on it daily and it seems able to handle the many miles with no problems so far  assembly wasn t easy  but it took less than a couple hours  we didn t expect to love ifit but after the one month trial  we were hooked and signed up for a year  the programs are really interactive and make you want to get in a workout

so happy i got a great price on a great treadmill  have been using it to walk and jog and it is very good  you have to have the app to do a lot more with it  but it can do the basics on it s own  the app is free for a limited time and up to you if you need it longer  definitely read the manual through or call to find out how you can work it without the app  i will have to do that myself soon

zero stars the first one   purchased was damaged in transit and never made it to my home the csr told me they were having problems with it making it through shipment the replacement arrived but even putting it together with a professional gym installer  it was terribly shakey and the bolts stripped just by our hands  it was even unbearable to try and disassemble for return pick up  also  please provide your delivery drivers with trucks that have on off ramps they had to unload and eventually reload this extremely heavy item onto a truck bed that was   feet high

we had an older model of nordictrack that gave us a good run for the money  twenty years   thought it was time to get a newer model  so when a good deal came up on amazon we jumped on it  the package was delivered on time  and up two flight of steps  the box was a bit battered and i was apprehensive  but everything inside was intact  assembly took two people and two evenings  but was straightforward   we watched a couple of youtube videos and those were very helpful we didn t turn on ifit  treadmill started up without it  the treadmill was whisper quiet  and it gave just the right amount of feedback when walking and running  no bounce  no creak  the controls were intuitive and simple  all family members are very happy with the experience and we use it every day  it has only been three months  we hope we won t need to replace it for another twenty years

i really enjoy this treadmill  i share it with my mother in law  who uses it for    min walks   times a week  and my wife  who goes on moderate runs for about       min twice a week  i use it whenever i can about     times a week for       min runs  don t have any troubles with it  very easy to calibrate belt since it can move slightly to the left or right  my guess is because we all have different running forms  i enjoyed the ifit trial it s very cool to see different landscapes when you run  don t think it s worth it to keep the membership though  hr sensor doesn t seem very accurate  but it s okay because we all have fitbits  all in all  good dependable treadmill

this is an update to my last review very disappointed in this thing  literally my husband and i used this thing   times max and it s already broken  the belt  which is already on the treadmill came unaligned  we noticed that it was making a very loud scraping noise  not much time afterwards  the belt completely folds  it s not even usable anymore  definitely contacting them directly for at least a replacement  not worth it

came in damaged  was a lot of work back and forth to get the free parts from nordictrack  now i have to disassemble and rebuild  works good but don t like the ifit having to be activated to make work during the set up process  you should not have to activate a monthly subscription to activate a treadmill  i know it s free for the month but still not right

this is perfect for our needs  it is still well made and with a good motor  all we really wanted it for was walking and changing the resistance when we were ready  we didn t need the video trainers  higher speeds  or any of the much more expensive features we would never use  the only negative is the shipping companies seem to have a penchant for mishandling treadmills  this one came in with the box destroyed  and several broken parts  it was a replacement for another one that arrived in even worse shape  we decided to let nordictrack replace the parts  and kept this one as everything else was ok  and now that s it is restored  it is just what we were looking for

i was really nervous about this purchase because of the negative reviews   however  i m loving it   i didn t want to spend lots of money on a treadmill and this seemed to be an affordable and sturdy choice   i didn t need a big screen and all the bells and whistles   it  has all i need  one touch incline to     speed to     and distance and heart rate monitoring  at the end of the day   it s about the workout   i m extremely happy with the choice   i had the assembly done through amazon and the guys were amazing and fast   i guess i was lucky and didn t have any dents or scratches and all works well   i say go for it  and get it assembled   it s worth it

for the price  this treadmill is worth every penny  i bought this for our home gym so that we don t have to run outside around the block during our hitt workouts  florida mosquitoes are terrible here  the package arrived on time  our carrier called the day before and gave us a  hr window of when he would show up  they showed up on the earlier side of it  the box wasn t damaged what so ever  the padding inside the box seems to ensure of that as well  we ordered just before christmas on the   rd and it arrived on the   th  so we were worried of the  rush deliveries  getting sloppy  definitely not the case  assembly took me and my wife about   min in total and we weren t in any rush  it comes with an alan wrench for most screws  but you ll need a phillips screwdriver and a wrench for a few of the connections  other than that  if you re competent and can follow instructions in order  the assembly shouldn t be hard at all once the treadmill was together it s been pretty awesome  it vibrates a little bit when you really get running on it  but not too bad  everything works great  the functions on it are great and very useful  it goes up to a    speed and also a    incline  it has an auxiliary connection to play music from if you choose to do that  obviously if you have an iphone  or higher you ll need that adapter piece for it  for the price of this treadmill you really can t beat it  we opted to get the warranty on it  but hopefully we won t need to use it  better safe than sorry though  i read some reviews of people that got it damaged and couldn t return it because they didn t purchase the warranty  thankfully that wasn t the case for us  we will get a lot of use out of this machine

we purchased this machine back on december   th  we ve debated about making this purchase for a couple of months this machine has taken a daily pounding first from me and then by my wife  it operates exactly as it should and it is ready to go every morning when we are i would recommend this machine to anyone looking for a machine that provides a good value

this was my birthday present that i requested  i love it but my husband loves it more  it s so easy to walk and run on and it has ifit red for a month which was nice to explore  we love our treadmill  it took a while to put together but it was fairly easy and it had multiple ways to get the directions which was great

extraordinary quality and performance for the price level  definitely worth the investment  don t expect this basic product to perform as the top of the line  does the job and exceeded expectations given the price  which includes shipping  contacted tech support and they were very responsive  t does not get any better than this  given the price category

first  you do not have to register for ifit to use the treadmill   thanks to another reviewer on this thread  you just hold down the blue ifit button for around       seconds and it will bypass the requirement to register and pay the monthly fee  now  you will not be able to access the workouts  but if you just want to do your own workout  you don t need to pay the fee  the treadmill was easy to assemble   you really need two people    it took my husband and i about an hour to set it up  it works great for what i need to do  on my first use  i ran    miles on it and it worked just fine   not as fancy as the gym treadmills  but a great price for a sturdy and reliable home treadmill for a decent price  i plan to use it for my very early morning runs or days when i don t want to go outside  i did purchase the three year warranty for around     just in case  but great purchase so far

so far  this is the worst experience ever  we have had this treadmill for over a month and have not even been able to use it because it was broken when it arrived  took forever to get a tech to come out  when he finally did we then continue to assemble it  and of course something else broke  when we called nordic track they wanted to charge us for the part that broke  ugh  if it ever gets fixed and assembled then i will hopefully be able to give a better review

this treadmill is great so far  it has tons of options and the touch screen and ifit make it seem really high end  my only couple of complaints are really nothing that should deter you from ordering this  however  for review purposes i ll list my minor dislikes anyway  although this treadmill folds  it doesn t fold completely upright  it still sticks out quite a bit  making it a little bulkier than most foldable treadmills  my husband put this together in about   hours while i was at work  he said it wasn t too hard  although  he did have a time getting the belt to line up perfectly  so that it did not rub the sides  my last annoyance is the plate that is directly in front of your feet when standing on the treadmill  it seems like it should be further back and it s slightly in the way  i think nordictrack could easily re position this in future models  these things are truly just personal dislikes  they would in no way cause me to re think my purchase  i m very happy with it overall

i am very happy with the nordictrack treadmill   it is large enough to walk and run comfortably  even with wide steps   incline feature feels real and incline range is big enough   it was easy to assemble  but it takes at least two people to bring it up a flight of stairs as the main component was heavy even before assembly  after assembly  it is quite easy to put in upright position and move around with the wheels   the trainer programs are awesome  it really gives a sense of completion in your workout  and you get to do all this tours around the world   sometimes my    g network has issues  and the treadmill can t connect to the  g network  i know that this is a problem of my network  but it would be nice to have the additional option

the machine didn t even last a year  i bought it and now it doesn t run  it turns on and then resets when i hit start  i called and was on hold for over   min  finally got helped and they are sending a replacement part

super sturdy    i love it  it does not shake or wobble when you are walking on it  to assemble it you need two people but the instructions are easy to follow  you don t need an ifit membership  once you plug it in  press the ifit icon for    seconds and the treadmill board will be ready  i love it     i m a    lb girl trying to lose weight and needed a sturdy treadmill but on a budget and i found it   i would definitely recommend this brand and delivery method through amazon

researched and looked for a treadmill and finally just did it   very happy with the nordic trak t series treadmill   my husband and i put it together without any problems and so far it is working great   the incline and speed are perfect for me   my daughter who works out a lot harder than i do used it while in town and got a pretty intense workout too   pleased with my purchase

stars because i m happy with the purchase  i was not impressed with pilot  the shipping company amazon used for delivery  they rescheduled my delivery twice setting up the treadmill was frustrating and you definitely need a second pair of hands for part of it  also the release system for bring it down is odd  but happy with the performance and love how strong the fan is

so happy we purchased this treadmill  we get our       steps everyday   i thought maybe we would get it and not use it  but it s so convenient to walk on it and not have to leave the house

very comfortable treadmill to walk or run on
relatively easy to put together  use it all the time and have no issues

i bought my treadmill about two months ago and overall i have had a great experience   i run     miles a day and this treadmill has been perfect for that  assembly took about two hours but the instructions were clear and easy to follow  my treadmill has performed to expectations and have not had any issues with it  overall  this is a great treadmill if you do not want to sped thousands on a treadmill  thanks

very solid and easy to use  we ve been running on it for about   months so far and no complaints  as others have mentioned  you can bypass the ifit option easily  the hydraulic fold up is a nice option  though its footprint remains pretty big    as is only reasonable i used amazon s option to hire someone to set it up  so i can t opine on how easy or hard it was  but that process    hiring someone through amazon to set it up was straightforward and easy
this treadmill is really nice  easy to fold and easy to install  also  its user friendly and i am enjoying this since i bought   months ago

treadmill runs more evenly and smoothly than any i ve used before in a home setting  no speed jitter or wobble   of frame or belt   even when running at   mph  and i m above     pounds  so that s some stress on the machine    hydraulic folding mechanism is robust and easy to use  assembly was a bear  but truthfully  no worse than comparable products

the first one we received  which was new  came broken  the replacement has similar issues  still made weird noise   assembly was not fitting    the technician recommended that i either get a full refund or a huge discount  neither was offered  by that i mean  we got a small discount if we kept it  it had already been a couple months since we had purchased it and i was losing  money with our trainer  the replacement machine itself runs ok  i wish the fan was a bit stronger  and that the speakers were a bit louder  takes some time for it to  start   on screen   serves its purpose

do not buy this product if you just want a treadmill without a fancy  and expensive  fitness program   i was just put on  hold  for    minutes trying to cancel an ifit subscription which i didn t want in the first place   had i not emailed them while i was on  hold  i d probably still be there   purchasers of a treadmill should not have to go through this

i have had this treadmill for   months now   it s been great to have a safe place to get my walking in   i did not put it together  my husband did   it took him about  ish hours to complete   it s very well made and very easy to use   the ifit program that came with it for a free month was great   you do not have to continue the ifit membership to use the treadmill  but it s a great program  the treadmill syncs to the workout   if you are running walking uphill the treadmill automatically adjusts to the terrain of the workout you choose   i would recommend this nordic track because it s a fairly good value and in      it s easier to stay inside and workout than to wear a mask outside

so excited to receive my nordictrack only to discover that as soon as i started to unpack it  it was already cracked and dented  who knows who s fault it was  shippers or originators  but i m not happy  sorry nordictrack

for the price it was an excellent deal  i literally use it everyday and absolutely love it  i ordered the ifit app for a year which was also a great purchase since i also  use it daily   this was the cheapest norditrack treadmill i could find so it doesn t have all the bells and whistles as the other one s but it gets the job done  i do wish i would have splurged a bit more because i have to use my phone to access the ifit app since it doesn t come on the actual screen of the treadmill   still it was a great deal and i m so happy i bought it

my machine was sent to me with a part meant for another model  making it useless  i have now waited for a month and a half for the defective part to be replaced and the return window has closed  so now i have a machine that won t work  no replacement part  and no recourse  amazon tells me my problem is with the manufacturer  manufacturer tells me my problem is with amazon  i have now lost    hours of my life trying to resolve this

per title i really love my nordictrack   easy to use  not too big but not too small  this is rarer than you might believe   and surprisingly not too loud it is a bit of a hassle to assemble  but i would not doc points on a review  it is what it is and i can t imagine how to make it easier    my issue is that you have to create a nordic account   sign up for  free  workout plan to get started   yes  you can opt out of the  free  trial but note that if you will be paying   opting out is not as easy as it should be  and honestly speaking it should not be a precondition to start using your track once you are past this hurdle though  you will love this nordic

i would not recommend buying this product if you plan on using it to run on a regular basis i bought this machine at the beginning of        within a month or about    uses  the control panel shorted out   after several days of navigating through customer service and tech support  they sent a reset key and then eventually a replacement console panel  which i spent a couple hours installing  and the unit worked fine i stopped using the treadmill when the weather got nice   i resumed using the treadmill when      started   within a month or about    uses  the console shorted out again   this time  the treadmill and the replacement console were no longer under warranty   customer support offered to send a repairman        to put in a new console          in summary  the repair would cost almost as much as buying a new unit and would most likely only last another month or two   did i want to buy a different norditrack treadmill   no thank you i don t know why my treadmill console shorted out twice each time within one month of use   i was running     miles daily  enough to break a sweat   i suspect liquid may have entered the console through the speaker units   whatever the reason  the treadmill does not seem to handle regular use and would caution buyers against purchasing this unit if they plan to use it regularly

if i could buy it over again  i would have purchased from a local store  so they would have put it together for me   i purchased the additional delivery charge to have it delivered to the room that is was to be used in   my thought is they work put it together for us   definitely  like the machine  but did not like the job of putting it together   sometimes saving money  costs a lot of your extra time

i m so in love with this machine  i have   small children so in the midst of this pandemic i am home all the time during this pandemic  i used to work during the day as a teacher so i got   miles day just in the classroom  i can now sneak in a workout during their naps  it s great  the ifit app is ok  it s nice that they have hikes and things to feel like i went outside  the app is awful for picking workouts though  you can t filter and they are by location  not difficulty or time or even activity which just kills me  i also have the peloton app and i have to use that one if i don t have about    min to sit there and search the random categories  the machine itself though is great  it folds up easily and securely  it s not too loud  and it s user friendly  nice size cup holders  etc

the assembly parts are not well made such as the screw holes are not precisely drilled for easy assemble  as a result the dashboard is shaking once you start to walk or run on the treadmill  it took me several install and uninstall to get it right  as far as for exercise  the machine works well especially it can be integrated with ifit where i can use their exercises and see how others are doing  it gives me a sense motivation   in terms of amazon s delivery  it s horrible  it took over three weeks to get the package delivered and i am a prime scriber  supposedly two days or   days delivery  their delivery system is broken where amazon  site texted me i missed the delivery  but in reality  the vendor said they didn t even tried yet   it turned out amazon s tracking system sent the wrong text
great value for the machine   it has worked fantastically it has the features we require   it has a month belt

i like the wide belt on this model   it s easy to operate and gives a smooth walk   the screen is a little small for watching workout videos from ifit   i really didn t like that i had to sign up for ifit in order to turn it on originally   i don t use credit cards and had to borrow one or i wouldn t have been able to operate it   i ve read that there was a way around this but it didn t work for me  now i have to remember to cancel the subscription or the card will be charged  love the treadmill but hate being strong armed into a feature i haven t used and don t plan on using in the future

the arms that mount to the base of my treadmill are crooked  they should be at a    degree angle to the base  but they are at an    degree angle or so  they mount to the base with   bolts each  so this was not a setup error  this was a manufacturer error  when i fold the treadmill up  the right side rubs against the right arm  while the left side has a big space between the track and the arm  a good product overall  but i am disappointed the product is not as it should be

pros  i am picky when it comes to treadmills  i ve used many at various gyms and have owned two others   and i love this one  it s very stable and comfortable to run on  the screen is very clear  the touch screen works great  and the sound is good also  ifit is very fun  there are so many different workouts you can do other than just running  hiit  yoga  etc  which makes it a versatile machine   so  i like that there is a lot of different things you can do with this treadmill  which makes it s fun to play with  i look forward to my workouts cons  my treadmill came with a broken fan  the fan is very important to me so this has been a major inconvenience  fortunately  nordictrack sent me a new fan  free of charge   it took    days to get here and i had to install it myself  unfortunately  installing the fan myself wasn t an option  the directions were garbage and not for my model specifically  so i have to get a technician to come out and fix it for me  it will be another     business days until i hear from one to make an appointment  by the time this gets fixed  i will have lost   month of my ifit membersip i was also disappointed that getting the ifit account setup has been difficult  the treadmill came with an activation code that is basically useless   you have to call ifit and they will get you setup  not a huge inconvenience  but rather an annoyance  i will need to make another phone call to get my husbands account setup ifit is great  but i do hope to see it improve to make browsing and scheduling workouts much more convenient all in all  i would recommend this treadmill because it s great  it may take time to get it setup  hopefully your luck is better than mine

just to be clear  you are not really buying a treadmill so much as you are buying a kit which includes all of the parts required to build a treadmill yourself   it takes about five hours  and is not for people who are casual do it yourselfers   having an extra person on hand helps during certain parts as you will be required to lift and hold the treadmill while screwing in items under it   overall use is good and was as expected  but i really think they could have spend a few bucks to have some of this assembly done at the factory

what do i mean by  runner    you ll know who you are   anything above   mph makes the treadmill rock back and forth  even after multiple adjustments  tightenings  and reallignments   my water bottle basically rattles back and forth in the built in cup holder for my entire run   it s not like the treadmill isn t sturdy  but it s not the same experience as a commercial grade treadmill you would find at a gym also   this treadmill cannot display speed in minutes per mile  only mph   this should be a basic function of any treadmill  so it s really disappointing   i know i can convert using math  it s just not what i want to do while i m trying to get through a workout

this is the first treadmill i ve ever owned and i m glad i went with this brand  it s a solid  well built platform  the information screen and input buttons are conveniently located and easy to read  the added value option of the ifit program is an interesting plus  i have yet to use the ifit program myself as i m recovering from open heart surgery but the demos look interesting as mentioned  i m recovering from o h surgery where a mitral valve was repaired  a bypass graft was installed as well as having a hole between the right and left ventricles repaired  the local cardiac rehab was going to charge me a co pay of    bux a session with three sessions a week that equals     a week x four weeks a month for three months for a total of      bux  all that for three    minute sessions on a treadmill per week  soooo    i decided to buy my own treadmill and save      bux  now  i don t have to get myself ready for the day and  drive over to rehab in inclement weather  i just grab my t shirt  shorts and  running shoes and have at it  as mentioned before  the machine is quiet  built sturdy to last and a stable platform able to accommodate the beginning walker as well as a marathon runner wannabe my only complaint thus far  is that the pulse meter readout is a bit flaky it flashes bpm in a somewhat erratic fashion  being a heart patient  this was a feature i truly wanted needed for my rehabilitation  perhaps someone at support can walk me through a fix  we ll see  it was this issue that kept me from giving five stars instead of four regards john f

i like this machine i am     so i don t want to run but like following the walking trainers between     and     miles an hr  or less with higher levels obviously at my age i just want a decent workout but will never run as much as i love the machine i sometimes have a hard time to fine different walking places on the places offered  i wish i knew where the best walking areas are with the trainers for people my age  maybe someone can help me i like john peels costa rica beach walk very much and did the mountain climb in the alps and a lady in hawaii on the beach  like i said i am having a hard time finding many places to fit my level there also is a great scotland mountain with an older gentleman   all in all i love the machine as they have changed so much since my last machine of    years ago pro form  which is still working but antiquated glad i decided to get a new one it stimulates me more with the video  linda n

this treadmill is awesome  great quality and price  the setup was easy and simple  the treadmill is sturdy and the belt is wide enough to run on  i would recommend it to anyone

i absolutely love this treadmill   the assembly was pretty straightforward   the parts  aka nuts and bolts  were packaged individually and labeled according to which step they are used  which takes the guessing out of everything   the most difficult part was putting the hydraulic piece that holds it upright  so i recommend having a second person to help   as far as ease of use  it was very easy to set up a profile on ifit and this purchase included a one year subscription   there are several workouts to select   i prefer running  and i have been able to run in places i would never really be able to go and see the area and with trainer led workouts  they have so much knowledge about fitness and well being  but also the areas where they run   i would highly recommend this treadmill

i ve had my treadmill for   months now  i do love it  it came with a pretty damaged box which was the evident cause of a crack in a non functional piece  only there for looks   that same plastic piece that was cracked is apparently also put on via   sided tape and it often pops up on one side   this doesn t affect the function of the treadmill but it does get on my nerves  apparently not enough to simply apply another piece though  i opted to leave it alone  the damage   so i can t speak to customer service  my husband put it together in roughly an hour but he s blessed with a bright mind and alot of common sense  i did have to help hold some heavy parts while he bolted them together  that said   it s a   person job to put it together   it is louder than i would like   my husband can t sleep in the next room while i m on it  i don t have any trouble hearing my show or music which i stream on my tablet   that leads me to mention the terrible speakers  they are just that    terrible honestly   they are absolutely shameful  i will never make any attempt to use them again   if that s an important feature to you  keep looking  this is not the treadmill for you   it serves no function here  max volume is not even remotely audible to any degree of clarity while the treadmill is running  even at a slow pace   this is  in my opinion   the biggest negative on this treadmill   back to the positive    i walk and run and the transition between speeds is both easy and smooth   the incline is fantastic albeit slow  there are lots of programs but i m a simple girl but a bit of a control freak so i tend to stay in manual mode   the machine is moveable with its   wheels but it s very large   very heavy   and quite cumbersome to move in and out of rooms  it is quite easy  however  to lift it and lower it for the space saving feature  the price was great for the features  and at the end of the day   i get my cardio in every day in the comfort of my home and it didn t break the bank   all in all  i m satisfied with the purchase   good luck to you

i can t believe i got this for         on a daily deal  immediately after the complimentary expert assembly  i got on for a test run  this machine runs smooth and fairly quiet  we re talking quieter than a vacuum cleaner  probably as loud as an idling newer model automobile  the bells and whistles are all within reach and it appears to be able to withstand my purposes of running to get back into shape  i used to run regularly  now  i plan on jumping on the treadmill to run at regular intervals again  i m confident this machine will take the miles  i also want to add the review of this model on treadmillreviews net is very misleading and unfairly discouraging for runners shopping for this treadmill  that review site states that this machine is not designed for runners  in my estimation  a   time marathon runner and a   time half marathon runner  along with countless other charity runs  they are wrong  the top speed is    mph  that equals a   minute mile  that  in and of itself  is fast enough  to not only compete in an elite marathon event  but it s good enough to win  come on now  you have the presence of mind to say this machine is not designed for runners  i totally disagree  you will be running once the speed gets up to around   mph    i guess the top   speeds are for really fast walkers update  about one month into ownership i experienced a motor failure  this was apparently due to amazon selling an older model  i called nordictrack and was immediately sent a new motor which was fairly easy to install   note  take a picture of the wired connections before taking the old motor out   since then this machine has performed flawlessly now for     months  i am loving the steady runs and my wife and kids hop on to get some exercise as well

i almost downgraded this machine for one reason   we have to use a package forwarding service because we live out of country  so  it s a bit of a crapshoot to buy things since a product might have a defect  shipping problems  etc  unfortunately  one other reason is when a manufacturer doesn t do a basic package check before a box is sealed and shipped  as was the case for us first the good     the machine is awesome  i did a pretty major search for treadmills w an incline and a few extra features that wouldn t break the bank  this definitely filled the bill   it was great to use my mp  player and have music loud enough to hear  but soft enough not to bring out the wrath of the neighbors  for me  any distraction while walking  such as tv or music  helps  while we haven t yet signed up for ifit  that s next  i have no doubt it will be another bennie   i was surprised at how basic the assembly was  i m totally useless at figuring out putting things together  but even someone as non mechanical as i am could do it  everything was labeled  listed in order  and placed on a sealed piece of cardboard that it made it nearly idiot proof  i say that because there s always that one person       the packing was very well done  a great deal of care and shipping materials were used to protect everything now  the not so good inside the box  there was a yellow sheet for lubrication instructions  it told us what to use  included applicator and lube  and how to do it  well  the sheet was the only thing included  while someone may say that we probably threw them out  nope  hubby broke down the entire package before we began  all parts separated so that we knew what they were  putting the waste aside  etc  etc   then  i went back over all of the packing material a second time before we boxed it all up for the garbage  yes  we really did that since it s too easy to misplace a part if you re not careful  while this is extremely annoying  i finally decided i didn t want to downgrade a   star machine over some packing wonk s one star check off performance

i ordered this treadmill back in march of      and have been using it regularly so far  the main reason i chose to purchase this model is because it has a higher weight limit  allowing all of the members of my household to use it instead of just me  that is honestly the only reason i would purchase this model  here are the reasons i am not really impressed   i have found the heart rate monitor has no idea what my heart rate actually is  usually my heart rate is high  resting is in the   s  but when i run it is in the    s   this monitor says that after running a few miles my heart rate is in the    to    range  the speaker also seems to get louder at random times for just a moment or two before going back to normal  the speaker only goes up to     which with some devices i find to be extremely quiet  sometimes i just leave my tablet unhooked to it because the tablet speaker gets louder anyway  about two months ago the treadmill began to squeak and i can t figure out why  the belt does not need lubricant and it squeaks on and off  if it is changing the incline the noise stops  after a minute or two it comes back  it usually squeaks every step  but sometimes it randomly stops and i think it fixed its self  then it will start back up for no reason  i am honestly baffled as to what is causing this noise and have no idea how to fix it all in all  i would only buy this if you require a higher weight limit  this machine is limited to     pounds where most cheaper units are     pounds   the other features on it seem to be vastly lacking

so far this has worked just as expected   it wasn t too difficult to put together either   i d say it took my wife and i less than an hour to assemble   one downside is that it is heavy  i got quite the workout just moving it from the garage to the basement but overall  it s a nice looking treadmill  with many functions   and when folded  it doesn t take up much space   so far  i have no complaints   i did buy a surge protector to go with this as well  just to be on the safe side

it s a great treadmill for the price  the construction is very sturdy and the electronics are sufficient for customizing your own workout  it was well packed in the box and it s very heavy  the delivery guys said it felt like it weighs a lot more than     pounds  i can see why it had to be delivered by common carrier  it took me about   hours to put it together and that was a workout in itself  the instructions were very clear and the hardware was shrink wrapped and numbered according to the steps in the assembly manual  the hardware includes the key but you will need a phillips screwdriver and some wire cutters to clip the zip ties from some of the packing material  and there will be a lot of packing material  the unit doesn t look that big in the video but it s really huge  so it s not really suitable if you have a small apartment  there are some design issues that can be improved  the display and stands could be improved to allow it to collapse or removed for easier storage  the unit only has   wheels and if you re moving it in one direction then only one person is required  but to move it in the opposite direction you ll need help  it you look at the end of the video  it shows the model lifting the base with no effort  what is not shown is that the reason it s so easy is due to the gas charged strut like you see on the hoods and trunks of cars  moving the base to the ground is very easy and the strut will ease it to the ground with no hands the base is extremely heavy without the strut  i estimate that about     of the total weight is in the base which is at least     pounds  the weight alone gives the impression that it is a really solid piece of equipment on par with commercial models  the instructions don t go anywhere near a workout routine  you will have to do your own research based on your own fitness level and goals  it is compatible with ifit but that s an expensive endeavor  once assembly is done then you are on your own in regards to a suitable workout routine  as far as the electronics  there are no input parameters for gender  height  weight  age  and fitness level  so i don t know how the calorie burner could possibly be anywhere near accurate  considering that other more expensive nordictrack models this one is very good for the price

update  i ve now had this treadmill for over   years and love it  it s still working great and i love the no slam feature for releasing it after i ve had it folded up  i now have a tv with my treadmill soo i don t use the speakers  and never got the ifit to work like i was hoping  but for a just a good treadmill with incline i love it review from        overall i enjoy this treadmill so far  the right side plastic cover at the bottom of the treadmill was broken when it arrived at my house  but the treadmill works great besides this cosmetic fracture  it has instructions regarding how to lubricate the belt  but it doesn t come with the applicator and lubricant to perform this  it also doesn t have the best instructions  and i have yet been able to figure out how to connect my ipad   ifit program to work with the treadmill  i know it is possible  and i plan to search youtube for clear directions the only true complaint i have about this treadmill is that the speakers are very quiet  when i am walking i am able to hear the music  but when i am running and have the music turned up all the way  i can barely hear it  i prefer louder music and better speakers  as the belt is about equivalently loud to the speakers when running  i have enjoyed several runs on it so far  and am pleased  i hope that this treadmill lasts me a couple years

this is a negative review i wish i hadn t bought it sight unseen  it is poorly designed in the following ways   i am a     woman with fairly long arms  however the short stubby hand bars on the side are too short for comfort   my hands have to be resting on the outer edge of the bars and even then the tips of my sneakers hit the edge on the protective cover over the belt   thus every time my sneaker hits the cover there is a clatter  if you are running you have to step back in order not to hit the protective cover   when you step back you are out of range for grasping the side bars   this is a potentially dangerous situation  in addition the hand bars are not designed for easy grasping  they are short  thick  tapered  and smooth another design flaw is that when holding the cross bar where  you place your hands to have information transmitted  regarding heart rate etc  it requires that you stand fairly close to the front of the machine  thus more clatter when your sneaker hits the protective cover   my husband has the same difficulty with both situations i have described i am appalled that a company with a reputation for quality and design slipped up this way  given the cost of the machine it is even more reprehensible  unfortunately nordic track is not shown in most sports stores store anymore  according to the company representative i talked with what i like about the machine is it is sturdy  the belt is wide and it is quiet

this company is as slimy as they come as referenced by hundreds of reviews on this facebook page alone  we bought a nordictrack treadmill   years ago  we like it when it works but has broken several times and is under warranty  on our latest issue we called noridctrack as we have before and the representative asked if we could video chat so he could examine the problem more closely  we complied  he instructed me to start taking certain part of the treadmill apart so he could look at  the components  i foolishly complied  even though i had  no obligation to take my tools to a product under warranty after about a half hour the representative realized out treadmill was in the garage  yes it s in the back room of a temperature controlled garage in as area set up as a gym  he immediately canceled our warranty based on  unsuitable environmental conditions   what an invasion of privacy after we agree d to a video chat  he refused to let me talk to a supervisor or send someone out to reassemble the now dismantled machine that now doesn t work at all based on his instructions  he then discontinued the phone call  this company is for profit only  be warned

ve decided to capitalize on that getting rid of the sturdy metal frames that established their brand and convert to cheap  flimsy made in china plastics  i assembled it out of the box and found the sacrificing product quality nt    my heart rate monitor will not work  and nordick track says it s a feature  not a bug  giving me readings of     bradycardia   then    seconds later      tachycardia   then back down to the    s  then who knows where  either my treadmill is malfunctioning or i need a pacemaker  if nt had advertise it as a random number generator  i wouldn t have a complaint  but bar  that didn t work  they did the math on shipping a new console  decided that was too expensive  tried to buy me off with a chest strap heart monitor  wat    then ultimately decided to piss on me and tell me it s raining   you can t expect medical grade accuracy   that was their line  so my heartrate is somewhere between    and      well thanks  that covers just about the range of survivable human heart rates  thanks nt  it s bull     and insulting  nordic track did their best to convince me they re incapable of designing a functioning treadmill instead of paying to ship a replacement console  but i m not as stupid as they clearly think i am    you ll notice the absence of a convenient tray for a book or a tablet present in earlier models  they even designed their heart rate bar to be rounded to ensure anything you try and rest  on it ends up falling to the ground  so  smart phones  tablets  enjoy shattered screens   now why would they possibly do that  previous versions had it  could it be that they re moving to a subscription model for their ifit content  maybe they want to make it difficult for you to provide your own jogging distraction material so they can sell you theirs at      a year  sure they give you a year free  what better way to get you hooked on their product  it s a cynical cash grab  taking away functionality to breed dependence somewhere  corporate efficiency experts are advising companies to cut corners  convert to plastics  out source labor  engage in shady micro transactions  and otherwise squeeze every last dollar out of their cow like consumer base  if we as consumers want to be treated any better  we have to hold them accountable  change the mathematics and demonstrate that their are consequences for underestimating your customers  otherwise  shoddy  valueless products will be the future  millenials are a lot of things  and willing to see through corporate exploitation  finding offense with crooked business practices  adjusting i ordered the white glove delivery service  which included assembly of the treadmill   after they left  i reviewed the user s manual and found multiple assembly errors   some that may be potential safety hazards   i discovered multiple screws missing  star washers not installed  screws over torqued  and the plastic housing overlapped and not properly seated   most importantly  the power cord was not fully placed inside the right support arm and the wire was pinched between the frame and the bottom metal base   it does not appear that the ground wire was properly attached   my wife and i have unplugged the unit due to a concern for potential fire hazard or electrical issue s  i was going to dissemble the unit myself and assemble correctly  however i discovered that the  patch screws  used to attach the crossbar to the left and right uprights had been completely stripped   the manual states in several places not to use power tools for assembly   a power drill was used throughout the assembly process by the delivery personnel   the  patch screws   will need to be cut for removal   not certain what else is missing or improperly instaled  as i could not disassemble the unit before unplugging  attempted to use the treadmill  but found it to be very unstable   not certain if that is due to the inept installation or the unit itself   the other unit we had started smoothly   this treadmill jerks abruptly when it starts and stops   concerned about wrenching my back and or knees   also discovered that you can not access the      preinstalled programs   a complaint has been sent to customer service and waiting for a response   we are requesting a replacement   do not use the nordictrack website or their  white glove  delivery service at           amazon is much cheaper   amazon lists a     hour assembly time for their service   the delivery people from ryder were in and out in    minutes

for this price i think it was great  i researched for about two months  looking for a treadmill that was within my price range and had everything i wanted  automatic incline  good for long legs  touch screen  not too loud  foldable   i m       months pregnant and put it together myself  i m     and the length of the track is great  i waited a few weeks to write this review after setup use to make sure it was honest  the package upon initial arrival was heavy  luckily the delivery guy brought it inside my house  small front stairs  without paying that extra     fee that they charge to bring it inside and not leave it on the front step  you can usually just give the delivery people a cash tip and they ll do it without the fee   the package itself was a bit torn or holes in some places  i didn t take off any stars for that because that s a delivery problem not nordic s  my treadmill wasn t broken or cracked like other reviews  it took me like three hours to put together  i used a tall chair for the parts that it said to use another person to hold certain parts while you screw in  took off one star during this because one bolt in the front wouldn t screw in  the pre made whole was too big  they also didn t include the tool needed to tighten the front bolts  i have a standard tool box that didn t come with the wrench size needed and i had to order it off amazon  i followed the given manufacturer manual to assemble and also followed along with a youtube video from a professional that gave me tips and tricks  highly recommended the ifit was included free for a year which i actually enjoy  i set it up before i turned on the treadmill  i love the programs and the ability to run with a trainer  this system is constantly updating itself and bug fixes which is nice  it records all your runs and progress too  i m not a marathon runner by any means  i just enjoy the daily    minute run so it works for me  the treadmill isn t very loud  my infant daughter can t hear it down the hall when i run in the mornings  the manual does suggest a surge protector so i would definitely pick one of those up before the treadmill comes  the treadmill also comes with  springs  that help create a bounce while you run  you wouldn t notice it at all if they weren t bright orange  however  i m in love with them  my knees and hips usually hurt from running longer runs or too many days in a row  this seriously takes that away  it s awesome  you re not constantly coming down on hard surfaces like cement  i think of it like shocks for a jeep i ordered this treadmill off the nordic site because after some googling i found coupons and they offered better ifit membership deals  i also sprung for the model with the bigger touch screen  totally worth it  it took over a month i m really surprised by all the negative reviews  we receive our    s  assembled it ourselves in about     hours  carefully follow the directions  and have been using it for almost a week now  we received a gift card with our purchase with a code for the free year of ifit and have enjoyed it as well  unsure if we ll keep it after the year  but have liked it so far  we also found a video on how to fully use the screen and android system functionality to better serve our workout preferences this was an upgrade from a  very  old treadmill from a cheaper brand and i m very happy with the upgrade  i would absolutely recommend this treadmill for low to moderate in home workouts  for reference  we use our treadmill    people  for brisk walking  jogging and running strength training almost daily

so despite deciding not to buy this product  i simply couldn t find anything comparable for the price  especially not with the trusted brand name  so even though i hated the nonsense they were doing with the ifit  i ordered it anyway  so minus one star because of the ifit controversy  it s amazing how much work they ve went to to convince you you can t use this thing without ifit  seriously  a giant stop sign   in across right on the front of the machine that says  stop  your machine is locked  you must register with ifit  see the picture  a total lieso if you re wondering if the other people are correct  they are  you do not need ifit  place the magnetic safety turn off switch in place  hold down the ifit button for    seconds  machine never asks again  works perfectly  what s funny is  i wanted to try ifit  dummiesokay  minus second star because of assembly  yeah i knew it would be a complicated assembly  and that s fine  but i do expect things to fit better  i guess that s just the price we pay for still relying on china to build our products  and yes i know  that will never change  so just remember not to tighten things up until you ve got all the screws started other than alignment things it really doesn t go together too bad if i haven t changed this rating  the equipment works fine

while the treadmill seems like a sturdy piece of exercise equipment and so far seems to run well  we were disgusted by nordictrack force feeding the ifit subscription and extended warranty to the consumer   first  it is not necessary to activate the treadmill using ifit  but nordictrack says nothing about that in their directions  preferring to push the ifit subscription instead by claiming that the user must go through the activation process using ifit  which  after the free month costs     a month   we had to find out via the internet how to activate without ifit   after spending      dollars for the equipment  why should we have to pay to activate it   second  in order to simply register the treadmill  you have to bypass their extended warranty offers  which cost money   it is not intuitive as to where you go to simply register for the basic warranty   you have to poke around the website to figure out how to register without giving them your credit card  both of these things are  to my mind  scamming the consumer   the equipment seem sturdy  moves well  etc  but nordictrack is not doing themselves any favors by pushing the ifit activation the way they do   it certainly did not set well with us

i know we are in a pandemic but i wouldn t anticipate a new treadmill belt to snap at the seam after   months  the only reason i got this model is because i can t fit a huge one i my home  i am beyond disappointed  i am stuck with this thing and there will never be another belt available while the warranty is good until            i will never buy equipment from iconfitness again    months for        i am going to have to get this hunk of junk out of my home myself i bought directly from nordictrak com  they don t have any belts available and no estimates for arrival    months

very nice for home use  glad i happened to get this coincidentally right before the state quarantine lock down so we ve gotten a lot of use out of it  read the manual when you put it together to learn the basic maintenance of it  it seems like a lot of the negative reviews stem from operator error of people not knowing how to fix minor things  like belt alignment  and that causes them a lot of headaches that can be avoided by reading the booklet that comes with it

delivery was good  i started unpacking this behemoth and putting it together with the wife  we assembled the arms with ease and went to attach the console crossbar   its     inches too short its not wide enough  i would assume it was packaged with the wrong console  you can t even bend the bars inwards to attach the console  pro tip  they are metal   so after hours trying to get a hold of nordictrack we finally spoke to a human  they told my wife she got the wrong department and to call the same number we just called   times then hung up on her   when she called back they were closed so    we called amazon and they are replacing the unit  we tore up the box because its really heavy so we are unsure of how to return it  hopefully the replacement will be properly engineered and fit together     i will post again when it is delivered  ps  if you made a video on how to put this together  please do not skip steps so the audience doesn t have to see you wrestle a piece in or screw a screw  its actually helpful to watch you put it together    that s why you made the video right  took me forever to find a video wherein a person set the piece in question on the arms    and it fit perfectly in the video  so thnx for that

i purchased this to replace a treadmill purchased in      and that i heavily used until it wore out   i ordered the amazon assembly service when it arrived and highly recommend that service   two technicians put it together in   hour and it worked perfectly on startup   i am impressed by the clarity and color of the touch screen that opens when i turn the system on   it offers a quick entry workout video program that changes each day and displays images actually recorded at sites all over the world  the belt incline raises and lowers according to the terrain being displayed   there are also many additional videos available with more different workout scenarios that are impressive in their detail and interest   an example  a workout with a  partner  on the sidewalk along the seine river in paris  the workout winds in and out of other runners  pedestrians  sidewalk cafes  a constantly changing scene of visual and audio activity as though i were actually there doing the workout   this is a fantastic improvement over my old treadmill that only displayed  an oval track and provided no visual stimulation at all  i highly recommend this product

bought the t     years ago  within a year of buying it  had to get a new motor  the new one was  also faulty and it would shut off after one hour and    minutes every damn time   it was also super noisy   less than a year after that  it needed a new display board   now here it is four years later and the motor went out again  i am    years old so i am not an avid super athlete you know  they ve got some serious problems to figure out  it would be nice to find  a way to contact them by email to discuss my complaints and hope for a miracle whereby they could send me a     off coupon if i were to ever buy again  i was on the phone with them earlier today  and on hold for a good hour   considering the money i spent on that piece of junk it cost me      a year     a month to call it my  own piece of junk
