this review is for the t   si updated series  it is awesome  was delivered in a timely manner  they called the night before to make sure someone would be home  helped my husband drag it in the house    thank god the box has handles   it is heavy because of the motor  everything was in the box  parts tools including the i fit code card for the free   yr membership  easy set up online  it ll ask for your credit card  but will not charge it  thankfully nothing was damaged  was packed very well  it only took my husband an hr to assemble the treadmill  average instructions  very solid machine  we are very very impressed with the console  the     hd screen is just as big as my ipad  touch screen features are very cool  several classes to choose from on the i fit  love how the incline and speed automatically adjust with the instructor s workout pace  speakers are really not that bad  you can adjust volumes separately on both the instructor and the music in the background at the same time  which is another cool feature  not a real noisy machine  am satisfied with the comfort level walking on the belt  this treadmill with the added i fit personal training and wide hd screen has definitely revolutionized the walking jogging experience  helps put motivation with disciple in your workout  all in all a very solid  stylish and fun treadmill  was worth paying a little more  hope this review helps  it took my husband and i a few days of reading reviews to help us decide on the right one  and we did a lot of comparisons as well  we are very happy with our purchase

flex select after months of using the treadmill  i love it  except      they tout the flex select feature  unfortunately no where do they tell you how to make it softer  or firmer called nordic trac  they put you into new sales  that persons says they have no idea  i don t know about you  but i would think that customer service would know that  since it s a feature  they refer you to ifit  my favorite scam with nordic track  ifit didn t recognize my registration and said they d only talk to me if i registered the unit  one of the things you need is the serial number  i have no idea where that s at  ditto  other information great  they re selling you a feature  but don t tell you how to use it

great treadmill  quiet  but that is subjective so check this out  my    year old proform was so loud i couldn t hear the tv at full volume  with this i can hear fine at         so  i still have it on the loud side but it is a huge treadmill  i don t know how quiet it s going to get  assembly wasn t a big deal  the deck was alligned and lubricated from the factory  i was a little turned off that i to register it and download the app to get it to work  you only have to use the app once to activate it  after that it works like any other treadmill  there might be a way to use it without downloading the app first but i couldn t figure it out i was deciding between the horizons t     which i had seen in person  and this  which i had not  i really happy i went with this one

i shopped for quite awhile before i finally decided on this treadmill  i just got it last week and i ve been on it every day since i got it  it seems very sturdy  is a good size without being too small or too big and is not noisy at all  i have no idea how easy it is to assemble because i paid extra to have them assemble it  i m not a runner so i don t know what it would be like to run on but so far it s perfect for me just for walking  the only complaint i have about it is when you pause it to go to the bathroom or whatever  you can t re start it without the clock and distance starting all over but that s not a big deal for me  i just remember how much time i had on it before i get off it  as others have said  to start it without subscribing to i fit just push the i fit button for    seconds and it will start  nowhere does it say this  i found this out from these reviews  so far i am very satisfied

i m grateful to previous reviewers who tipped me on how to bypass ifit by pressing the app button down for about    seconds  otherwise  i would have believed all the warning signs plastered all over the packaging   what a scam   very deceptive  nordictrack  i thought you were better than that  this may scar your reputation and  frankly  i hope it does  i don t like feeling forced to buy something i simply don t need  i may eventually purchase the ifit module but only when i m ready it took my boyfriend an hour to assemble and he said it s a well built machine  everything fit as expected   i m pleased so far  i ve only had it   days  so i hope my sentiments are the same at least a year from now it does squeak and it s disappointing you can t connect your music via bluetooth  however  reviewers didn t care for the speakers so i m using my airpods instead   despite the highest set volume  i can still hear a little of the squeak   that s a little annoying the belt is fantastic  my running shoes don t slip  it s nice and wide as well as long   i m really leggy for someone who s only        aside from the intermittent squeaking  it s a great platform i m a bit disappointed with the user manual  my console is not the one that is in the manual so i m going to have to figure out some of the buttons and features on my own   i don t know if the console is for an older model or newer model  i d hate to think i got an older design       is not small beans overall  i am pleased so far   i ll remember to update my review in a few months  hopefully  nothing changes

took about an hour to assemble  seems to work fine but beware  what they don t tell you is that the ifit subscription isn t a perk  it is a requirement or else the treadmill won t work  it won t even work unless the phone is paired with it   luckily there is a fix  to get around this  press and hold the ifit button until it resets and then you will be able to use it like a regular treadmill   you will not find the direction to override this anywhere in the instructions  very  unprofessional for a company with this amount of a presence in the fitness community to scam customers into an unnecessary subscription when they have already spent      on this treadmill  i won t return this because it took too long to assemble  but i will not be buying from preform again

did not buy this item on amazon but ebay   but i wished i had bought it on amazon for the ease of returning painful  but doable assembly and the device itself runs ok however  and you need to be absolutely aware of this it cannot be started in manual mode after a while  i hesitated to register for ifit because i really see no sense in watching someone doing my workouts and paying a yearly fee on top of the hefty price of the machine itself at first it worked quite nicely to override it and start a manual workout  however a day ago this option was no longer possible and all it allowed you to do is to register for ifit or increase decrease the incline so i ended up basically with a large black brick that is completely useless for      bucks for me this is enough pain to return the item  and if that is not possible start a class action suite against this company do not buy it i could not belive

i like my nordictrack t   s with the exception of the ifit and monitor display controls  i really don t understand what ifit is all about  maybe i just don t get it but can t see why anyone would pay for this service  getting the treadmill to work without using ifit is a procedure  i just want it to turn on and work when i want it to work  and not have to cancel out programs and go to manual settings etc    also my unit did not come with any sort of manual so i had to research it on amazon and find a manual just to figure out how to make the thing work

got it friday april  rd   box looked fine but opened to find plastic base on one side was cracked   no one available at amazon or nordictrack until monday   monday   now on hold with number from nordictrack manual for  over    minutes   gonna hang up and call amazon   either the base needs to be replaced or the whole dang thing update   return and replacement approved by amazon on april  th and expected to take place april   th   just notified by carrier nsd that they have no pick up order from amazon   amazon  legally must provide the free pick up  which they approved  before their set deadline of may  th   will  update again with results no response from amazon for picking up return even though dropping new one off tomorrow   go back to my orders screen and original order gone and only says replacement order   go back to home to look at returns    that was gone and the price went up by roughly       bottom line they sent a broken machine and need to come pick it up for free

the walking belt would always move to the right or left side of the tread mill after several times of aligning it and it would still move to one side where it would rub against the side rails finally called the company and they said that they new about the problem and would send out new roller screws   not easy to install unless you take the back end caps off   after installing the new roller screws it looks like the belts does not move that much to   so much for the   year parts and labor   they just send you the replacement parts and we do the labor    for that price it is ok   plastic motor cover very flimsy  but i got to see once you get thru customer service they are very helpful and easy to send out replacement parts  note to start the treadmill without  ifit just press manual
fraud

i have owned my nordictrack treadmill for several years  i typically do not purchase service plans  but because i use my treadmill at least   times a week  i decided to take the chance and i am so glad i did  it has been super easy to have my treadmill serviced every year and parts replaced whenever needed  and i have never had to pay a dime for any replacement parts  the service plan has more than paid for itself  i am at the point where i now renew for   years at a time just because i am so pleased with their service plan  i highly recommend a nordictrack treadmill with a service plan

i ve been loyal to the nordictrack brand for the last    years  in that time  i ve had two treadmills  currently an elite        two ellipticals  currently an elite        and one upright bike  gx     pro   except for the no maintenance easy to assemble bike  i ve always had service contracts on my equipment  why wouldn t i  they re mechanical  anything mechanical is going to need maintenance and eventually repair  the service contracts i ve purchased that are backed by icon fitness have ensured that i don t have a huge repair bill when i least want it  and that i don t have to go without my equipment for an extended period of time  and i always enjoy the certified repair people that icon sends out  i always learn from them  and  at all my homes in those    years   colorado  michigan  wisconsin and now back in colorado   all the service folks have been great to work with  having the service contract also means i don t have to go out and buy new equipment  which is good for me because i don t always like the newer versions being offered  i was able to keep my first nordictrack treadmill for    years and that s the one i liked the most  upon reflection  i d say the service contract has greatly influenced my loyalty and overall satisfaction

overall i really like the t    s  a few things i think could use improvement    fan is useless  even at full blast  i m waiting for a clip on fan to be delivered    the side foot rails seem narrow and i have very small feet  if you have large feet i think you d either have your feet hanging off or be stepping on the belt    the    screen really is small due to black bars in the screen and that the stats appear in a thick bar across the top  i wish i d sprung for the upgraded model for a larger screen  or nordic track should give you a larger screen  it s not a cheap machine    some of the components feel a little cheap  if you tripped on the front belt cover it feels like it would break i had no problem with ifit as some other reviewers mentioned and really like the workouts  my only feedback is that there isn t as much to choose from as i had anticipated so i wonder if i ll get bored at some point or if they cycle new ones in regularly

have had my t     series treadmill for four weeks now and use it everyday   i absolutely love it   the ifit training is a great addition to my work outs and i love the fact that it offers cross training as well as walking running   i paid for assembly so i really can t say how easy it was to set up but being i didn t have to do it myself i gave the five stars as the assembly person was on time and very professional and friendly i truly look forward to logging many  many miles on my nordic track all whilst sweating and smiling

the treadmill itself offers a great workout but i do not choose to use the ifit programming  my husband got it for me as a gift so i can exercise indoors and avoid gym fees  it does not take up too much space and is foldable  amazon provided a technician to assemble the treadmill  which was very helpful  however  the ifit subscription requirement is a downer  so that removes one star  after assembly  we could not use the treadmill until we registered and activated an ifit account  they took our credit card info  we understood we were ordering a    day trial of the ifit program  which i never used  then about a month later i received a  congratulations  email notifying me about my  purchase  of an ifit program subscription  it was a one year fee of      plus tax  which i had not received advance notice of  when i emailed their customer service to attempt to cancel the subscription and get a refund  they said they could only refund a portion  about half  of the amount since i had agreed to their terms earlier  i am very disappointed in this process  it should be an option and not a requirement and consumers should be warned in advance of the additional costs  i also took one star off because i am unable to pause my workout for a couple of minutes  such as when needing to go answer the phone  etc   and pick up where i left off on the distance  timer  and progress of my workout  i have to start all over each time  i have the treadmill on a mat on carpet and there seems to be too much bounce when i am working out  other than that  it is a good machine

bought a treadmill from them  the incline failed on initial set up  replaced the incline motor  the circuit board  and the wiring  still does not work  now they refuse to enter my house to pick up this defective machine  despite the fact that they entered my house to deliver and set it up  do not buy nordictrack  horrible company  horrible customer service

everything arrived in solid condition  instructions were fairly straight forward  but really glad i read other reviews warning about the ifit com registration  terrible business practice to try and trick your customer into registering for your product  what would make more sense is to automatically give the customer    days free trial without asking for any credit card information   and then  if the customer likes it  he she can pay for a subscription service  besides that though  everything seems good

i was looking for a very basic treadmill  to use once in a while  particularly during the winter months   this is a fine machine for my needs  my needs include brisk to moderate walking     miles at a go  to sometimes a low jog  i don t really care about any of the exercise settings  though my husband does   my only gripe  i wish it wasn t so loud   it s not horribly loud  but i can hear it mildly on the main floor when my husband is walking on it in the open basement   nonetheless i would definitely recommend the product so far and possibly buy through nordic track instead of amazon  when i ordered through nordic track  i got a  free  fourth year warranty included by the representative  instead of the three year that was promoted   also  i went ahead and paid for the installation through nordic track  well worth the money  in my opinion

okay  nordic track  is made by a company  that make treadmills for other people   first  you don t need those fancy features  the are useless  a place to put your book is all you need   these things are made for people who don t use them  if you are going to stuble about  at low speed  three times a week it s fine  if you re going to use it five times a week  so it will actually be usefull  it break  two  you need something with a four horse power motor  and four inch rollers  if your going to use it all  that cost about four thousand bucks  and it will still be needed to repaired  so unless your near a repair station  don t order it

super disappointed in ifit and nordic trac  i recently downloaded the ifit ap to use with my nordic trac c    treadmill  the ap told me my treadmill needed an update  i started it and it stopped mid update  then my treadmill wouldnt turn on  i called nordic trac and they told me it s a common issue with the ap and treadmill  my console got fried and i need to buy a new console for       they said because i am outside of the one year warranty i have to pay for their ap frying my console  no way    if it s a common issue that they know about they should fix it  my treadmill worked perfect till i tried to use the ifit ap  i m so disappointed that the company won t replace the console because it s in issue they knew about  i never would have downloaded the ap if i knew i could fry my console   nordictrack  ifit

this review is more about the ifit applicationfirst the ifit pro s  the graphics are fabulous  the trainers are also fabulous  some celebrities show up to   there is a wide range of workouts for the treadmill  everything from easy hikes to endurance runs    up hill and down hill  if you don t feel like running you don t need to follow the trainer  put it on zero incline and     speed for an easy walk  great for the grand parents  you can play your own music or listen to theirs or listen to the trainer or not at all or listen to all   each has there own volume controlcons  it is a subscription service     i like working out with the trainers so i pay for it  but if you don t want it  there is a manual process and it works  ifit requires an internet wifi connection  if your wifi connection drops  there is no way to get back to the middle of your workout  you would think a programmer could fix that in a couple of hours  some of the trainers can be a little intimidating when they say keep it up and the machine is going faster then what the trainer is doing  that is when i do not follow the trainer and slow my machine down   it shows your work out compared to others and you can swear that some person put the treadmill on the fastest highest steepest setting and then jumped off to get their name at the top of the list

purchased it from sears  with a    yr extended service plan  on         by         the first motor finally went  i called nordictrack and they immediately placed an order for a new motor that i had to install  no problem  it was pretty straight forward by         the second motor went  this time i insisted that they send a technician to install it  he came and replaced it and i was  once again  a power walking madman fast forward to today motor number three has gone  i called to their delight and found out that not only is the treadmill getting a new motor it is also getting assy lube wlk belt d c w ri  walking platform walking belt motor belt controller all for a grand total of      moral of the story is to get a gym membership or an extended service plan when purchasing exercise equipment  service plan ends
